story:
Introducing StarLabs 

StarLabs is built around the mission of providing customers with high end products without the hefty price tags. Our team is dedicated to creating the most innovative and demanded elite products with prices you can actually afford. Our goal is to start a revolution, to put the technology you've always dreamed of, right in the palm of your hands.

The Design

StarLabs Earphones feature an all new, completely customisation never fall out design.

  • Adjustable ear strap.The adjustable ear strap can be bent and moulded to wrap perfectly around your ear to secure the outer earpiece. 
  • Interchangeable earplug
    • Choose the earplug size that fits your ear to ensure the perfect noise cancellation and added security.
  • Secure neck strap
    • The built in neck strap allows you to easily carry around the earphones while also helping to ensure they're security when they're in use. 

 

 

Interactivity

StarLabs Earphones have 3 programmable buttons built into the right earpiece. 

  • Control your volume with the + and - volume rockers 
  • Hold down the + volume rocker to skip forward one song
  • Hold down the - volume rocker to go back to the previous song
  • Press the power button once to pause and play music as well as answer and hang up incoming calls
  • Double press the power button to activate your smart devices personal voice assistant. 
    • Make calls
    • Choose a song or playlist

 

 

This is Waterproof

Unlike our competitors, StarLabs Earphones offer a fully waterproof design with an IPX7 rating. Many of our competitors are stuck back on IPX6 or even IPX5 limiting them to water/sweat resistance. The StarLabs Earphones are fully waterproof allowing you to not only sweat or even shower with them but also to take them for a swim. 

 

 

Built in Mic

The built in microphone allows you to take and make calls on the go without even taking out your phone. Accept an incoming call at the click of a button and activate your voice assistant to make calls or even send messages.

 

 

Quick Connect

StarLabs Earphones use bluetooth 4.1 partnered with our own quick connect technology that helps you connect to previously paired devices faster than ever before. Simply hold down the power button and you will receive a voice indication as the earphones turn on and then connect instantly. 

 

 

Perfect Playtime 

StarLabs Earphones offer 8 hours of playtime on just a 90 minute charge. Charge using the included micro USB charging cable or the stylish charging stand that is available for purchase. 

 

 

Available Colours

StarLabs Earphones will initially ship in Blue, Red, Black and White. With the potential for new colours to be added. You will be able to select colour options just before we send out your Earphones.

 

 

FAQ

1. When will I receive my StarLabs Earphones?

Our Earphones are ready to be shipped. You will be contacted shortly after the campaign ends to choose your colour and we will be sending all orders from our Indiegogo campaign starting mid August through to mid to late September. 

2. What is the IPX rating of the Earphones and what does it all mean, 

StarLabs Earphones are rated as IPX7. This means that they have been tested to withstand immersion in water up to 1 meter for a minimum of 30 minutes. This basically means that while you can easily take your earphones to the gym for your workout, you can also shower with them and even take them for a swim without worrying. 

3. Are there plans to add more colour options?

Yes! We will be adding colour options based on customer polls that will be taking place over the coming weeks. Any colour options that are added will be available to choose from just before we ship your order. 

4. What version of Bluetooth do you use and what is it compatible with?

StarLabs Earphones use Bluetooth 4.1. This allows them to be compatible with most smart devices across all operating systems whether you're an Apple fan or an Android supporter, you won't have any issues connecting. Our earphones are also compatible with laptops as well as some smart TVs.

5. What is the warranty policy?

All our products are covered by a manufacturer defect warranty. If your earphones arrive with a defect we will replace them as quickly as possible, no questions asked. 

6. How do I get my Order ID?

You can find your Order ID by logging into your Indiegogo account and clicking on ‘My Contribution’.

 

The StarLabs support team are always here to help!

story:
Imagine filling your living room with music, streaming your favorite music from your Smartphone or Laptop to your home stereo system.

How about answering calls, or giving Siri a shoutout while driving? Don't have a bluetooth enabled stereo system? No problem, Plugzee has got you covered!


A tiny little device that turns any audio speaker into a Bluetooth speaker without compromising on its audio quality.

Pair your Smartphone, Tablet or any other Bluetooth-enabled device with Plugzee and stream your music wirelessly.




Plugzee uses low complexity sub-band coding and aptX codec for compression which streams music over Bluetooth in a lossless manner, without any change in the original quality of the song you are playing i.e. CD quality sound over Bluetooth.







Plugzee uses a power efficient Bluetooth 4.0 LE module that lets you seamlessly pair any generation Bluetooth device with the press of a button. The AptX streaming lets you stream high-resolution music over Bluetooth.

 Plugzee boasts a range of 33 feet and pairs with up to 8 devices.


Plugzee can be hooked up with any speaker that has a 3.5mm audio jack, from a Boombox or Home Theater System. No more constant plugging of your Smartphone, Tablet or Laptop into an AUX cable.


Plugzee comes with a Micro USB charging port and can be charged from any existing USB outlet, eliminating the need for special cables and chargers.


Don’t take your hands off the wheel while driving; with the built-in noise cancellation microphone effortlessly answer your calls over loudspeaker or take control of your phone by with a shout out to Siri or Google Voice Search.


Plugzee comes with a Lithium-ion battery that lets you stream music for up to 18 hours on a single charge with a standy-by time of 30 days. The device also comes with an over-current protection circuit which lets you use a charger with any Amperage. 


Be it an iPhone, iPad, Nexus, Sony, Nokia or even a Laptop, never again worry about compatibility issues. Plugzee is compatible with every Bluetooth enabled device you will ever use.



We believe design is so much more than just the way something looks, it's the way something actually works, on so many different levels.


For the past 5 months we have worked really hard, developing Plugzee, perfecting design and functionality. Our main goal was to make a device that is simple and efficient, intuitive and user-friendly. We have taken care of the tiniest details, from adding an oleophobic coating, to including a microphone to seamlessly answer calls.

After several iterations, and extensive prototyping, we think we have a device that will blow your socks off!

A device with crystal clear sound delivery and no loss in quality, so you can hear every note. Never again worry about acoustics. You need to try it to believe it.




After many a sleepless night, and pots of coffee, we have a prototype that is ready to be launched. A device that will win you over as soon as you hold it.

Through Indiegogo, we look forward not only to raising funds, but also towards creating an Early Adopters Community that will help us get the product to the market. In return, you will receive a Plugzee at a special price.

It is time to descend from the lofty generalities of CDs and pen drives. Be part of the campaign and make the Plugzee community grow. Let's change the way we play our music!










The past few months have been really challenging to us, but we have accomplished quite a bit. We are very excited to bring Plugzee to the market as soon as possible. 




Shipping within India is free. If you reside outside India then you have to include International shipping charges. Shipping charges are as follows.

Up to 2 units of Plugzee: $5
5 to 10 units of Plugzee: $10
20 units of Plugzee: $25
Resellers package: $50


Manufacturing:

We have tied up and developed a close relationship with manufacturers from China, who have been producing electronics for over 7 years. Though we will do our best to deliver the perks to you before the estimated time, there can be unavoidable circumstances which can lead to manufacturing delays. We will do our best to deal with such issues and try to tackle them.

Taxes and Custom Duties:

For all international buyers, there are taxes and custom duties applicable depending on your country. While it may not be applicable for one or two units, we cannot assure you of this. Please confirm this with your local postal or foreign trade office.

Shipping:

We tried to keep the shipping costs minimal so you do not have to pay a high shipping fee. The downside, the delivery time is one to two weeks, and in some countries up to three weeks. All shipments will be trackable and registered. If you have a large quantity, or wish to receive the perk faster, we also provide expedite shipping for $25 with a delivery time of 3-4 days.

Fulfillment:

If the campaign raises funds way above its target, we will get more people on board to share the work load so we can fulfill your perks faster.




What is Plugzee?

Plugzee is a device that can be connected to your speaker's 3.5mm audio jack in order to stream music wirelessly via Bluetooth.


Why did we make it?

There are a few Bluetooth adapters out there but no such dedicated device that will give you HD sound along with good battery life, compatibility, and portability. That's why we came up with Plugzee.


Who is it for?

If you feel Bluetooth speakers are horribly expensive, whereas your existing speakers do a pretty decent job and the only missing feature is Bluetooth, then Plugzee is for you. If you love music and are tired of constantly plugging in your phone, laptop or tablet to your speakers time and again, then Plugzee should be your new friend!


What will I get?

Back our project by choosing a perk that will fit your needs and you will be one of the first people to receive Plugzee. Also your name will be featured on our website as a funder for Plugzee.


Why should I buy Plugzee?

This is an opportunity for you avail Plugzee at a great price and become a funder for the project. Once the campaign ends these discounted prices will not be available on our online store or anywhere else.


Why did you pick this name?

We have always been determined to make the device intuitive and easy to use. All you've got to do is plug in your speakers. Plug, Easy.... Plugzee, close enough eh?


How do I know you will deliver?

The founder of this project has single handedly run a successful Indiegogo campaign in the past and fulfilled it. Now we're a team of five, a lot more potential. If the campaign spikes up beyond our expectations we will recruit more individuals to deliver on time.


When will you start shipping?

Expected date of shipping is July 2015, we will try and deliver before that.


I live in a foreign country, will you ship to my address?

Yes, we are shipping all over the world, make sure you add your International shipping fee depending on the perk chosen. Read 'shipping' section for more details.


Do I have to manually add shipping?

Since shipping will vary depending on your order we request you to add it manually. We do not want to charge everyone the same since it will turn out expensive for some perks. 


I entered a wrong address! What do I do?

If you have entered a wrong address or wish to change your address we suggest you write us a mail at info@plugzee.com


Why don't you have Paypal as a payment option?

In early 2011, the Reserve Bank of India passed a regulation that restricts Indian accounts from receiving funds from accounts outside India. Only Indian accounts can send funds to other Indian accounts via PayPal. We regret the inconvenience caused due to this.


What if I forgot to pay for shipping?

Don't worry if you've forgotten to add shipping. Refer to the shipping section for the shipping you'll be charged and make a contribution of the same amount. Make sure you send us a message once you've done this.



We will be updating the FAQ section as the campaign progresses, if you have a question in mind do leave us a comment or feel free to shoot us an email at info@plugzee.com

story:
Meet the world's longest-lasting true wireless earbuds: SonaBuds 2 Pro. Our goal with the all-new SonaBuds 2 Pro is to engineer a full-sized headphone listening experience into true wireless earbuds with the lightest, smallest earbud enclosure and the longest-lasting battery life on the market. SonaBuds 2 Pro delivers incredible 15 hours of music play time on a single charge with 20% smaller earbud size than the first generation SonaBuds. And the handy charging case provides 74 hours of total battery life.

 

We shrunk the most of it.
So we can squeeze more performance out of it.

We have meticulously designed and shrunk most of the components inside SonaBuds 2 Pro to fit them in an incrediblely small and light earbud enclosure. We chose powerful and efficient Qualcomm Bluetooth 5.0 chipset and optimized our circuit design to draw as little power as possible. Thanks to the optimized antenna design and all other minimized components, there is plenty of room for big battery to support longer music play time. Now you can listen to your tunes or watch your Netflix movies for 15 hours without recharging.

 

 

Never run out of battery again.

Up to 74 hours of battery life.

Fast recharging.

SonaBuds 2 Pro provide amazing 15 hours play time on a single charge. If you ever ran out of juice and need a quick top up, no problem. With our fast recharging design, you get three hours of play time from a quick 15-minute recharge and fully top up the power in just 1.5 hours.

 

Good things come in pairs.

We've worked extensively with both Qualcomm and Realtek to utilize their latest technologies in RF fields. We picked the equally impressive Realtek's latest Bluetooth 5.0 chipset to power SonaBuds 2, so you can enjoy the long-lasting music listening experience at an even more affordable price. We have meticulously engineered the earbud's mechanical structure so these two excellent chipsets can fit into the same minimalist earbud enclosure. Here's a quick comparison between SonaBuds 2 Pro and SonaBuds 2. They are identical in every way except for the Bluetooth chipset we put in.

 

Compare SonaBuds models

 

Rewards

Latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology.
Performance meets efficiency.

SonaBuds 2 Pro is powered by the latest-generation Qualcomm Bluetooth 5.0 chipset. This ultra-efficient architecture draws very little power from the system. Combining this efficiency with our robust antenna design, SonaBuds 2 Pro delivers high performance which means you can keep enjoying your music longer without any interruptions. Wirelessly.

 

Unbreakable connection.

The definition of robustness.

A lot of engineering efforts were put into the development of SonaBuds 2 Pro antenna design. With our robust custom antenna design, we developed SonaBuds 2 Pro to maintain stable connection to the Bluetooth-enabled device within 35 ft (10m) and the bond between the left and right earbuds, so you don't experience any music breakups, drop calls, or any signal loss. Our efficient custom antenna design increases signal reception while maintaining very low power consumption draw from the battery, so you can keep your playlists on repeat without recharging.

 

We ran tests on real-world usage scenarios with SonaBuds 2 Pro. We tested with Bluetooth phones inside the front pockets / back packets of jeans, inside a bag while carrying on different sides, inside a backpack while carrying on the back. We tested countless scenarios that you could possibly imagine to ensure you could enjoy your music without any interruptions.

 

Enjoy with peace of mind.

SonaBuds 2 Pro is IPX6 rated water resistant, so these earbuds are weather-proof, rainproof, and splash-proof. You can rest assure that the next time you go out for a run, the drizzle and the sweat are not going to slow down your workout.

 

Intuitive touch controls.

No more annoying clicking sounds in your ears when changing tracks. We use advanced touch-sensor control system in SonaBuds 2 Pro. Take, make calls and also pause, play and adjust the volume of your music, wake up Siri or Google Assistant with simple taps.

 

Dual-Channel Stereo Call

All ears for your phone conversation.

Mono calling was one of the common limitations of earlier generations true wireless earbuds. It's uncomfortable when only one earbud has sound when talking on the phone. We've worked and overcome this limitation by efficiently utilizing the bandwidth provided by the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology. Now you can listen to your phone conversations in both ears!

 

Secure and ergonomic fit.

Perfect isolation. Perfect sound.

We designed the eartips using comfortable proprietary silicone material and created different sizes to ensure SonaBuds 2 Pro are a snug fit to every ear and perfect seal from the outside noise. For those who prefer foam tips, we've also worked extensively with Comply to find that their Truly Wireless series works best with SonaBuds 2 Pro.

 

Audio-video sync

SonaBuds 2 Pro are built with a Bluetooth 5.0 technology, which provides a strong, reliable, connection between your devices— providing a higher capacity data transfer for incredibly detailed and robust sound dimensions and virtually zero audio-video lag.

 

Auto pairing.

SonaBuds 2 Pro automatically turns on and connects to your phone when earbuds are taken out of the charging case.

AUTO ON & CONNECT

 

SonaBuds 2 Pro automatically turns off and disconnects from your phone when placed back to the charging case.

AUTO OFF & DISCONNECT

 

Magnetic magic.

The magnets magnetically aligns SonaBuds 2 Pro with the charging case for a perfect fit, while magnets inside the charging case help earbuds stay put.

SonaBuds 2 Pro earbuds are guaranteed not to fall out of the charging case with the secure magnetic alignment design.

 

Snappy magnetic cap. No more chipped nails. Thanks to the built-in magnets, now you can open and close your SonaBuds 2 Pro charging case with a simple snap.

 

Rewards

Tech Specs

Working Prototype Demo Video

See SonaBuds 2 in action
 

Frequency Response Curve

 

 

Delivery Timelines

We tested with Bluetooth phones inside the front pockets / back packets of jeans, inside a bag while carrying on different sides, inside a backpack while carrying on the back. We tested countless scenarios that you could possibly imagine to ensure you could enjoy your music without any interruptions. Enjoy with peace of mind.SonaBuds 2 Pro is IPX6 rated water resistant, so these earbuds are weather-proof, rainproof, and splash-proof. You can rest assure that the next time you go out for a run, the drizzle and the sweat are not going to slow down your workout. Intuitive touch controls.No more annoying clicking sounds in your ears when changing tracks. We use advanced touch-sensor control system in SonaBuds 2 Pro. Take, make calls and also pause, play and adjust the volume of your music, wake up Siri or Google Assistant with simple taps. Dual-Channel Stereo CallAll ears for your phone conversation.Mono calling was one of the common limitations of earlier generations true wireless earbuds. It's uncomfortable when only one earbud has sound when talking on the phone. We've worked and overcome this limitation by efficiently utilizing the bandwidth provided by the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology. Now you can listen to your phone conversations in both ears! Secure and ergonomic fit.Perfect isolation. Perfect sound. We designed the eartips using comfortable proprietary silicone material and created different sizes to ensure SonaBuds 2 Pro are a snug fit to every ear and perfect seal from the outside noise. For those who prefer foam tips, we've also worked extensively with Comply to find that their Truly Wireless series works best with SonaBuds 2 Pro. Audio-video syncSonaBuds 2 Pro are built with a Bluetooth 5.0 technology, which provides a strong, reliable, connection between your devices— providing a higher capacity data transfer for incredibly detailed and robust sound dimensions and virtually zero audio-video lag. Auto pairing.SonaBuds 2 Pro automatically turns on and connects to your phone when earbuds are taken out of the charging case.AUTO ON & CONNECT SonaBuds 2 Pro automatically turns off and disconnects from your phone when placed back to the charging case.AUTO OFF & DISCONNECT Magnetic magic.The magnets magnetically aligns SonaBuds 2 Pro with the charging case for a perfect fit, while magnets inside the charging case help earbuds stay put.SonaBuds 2 Pro earbuds are guaranteed not to fall out of the charging case with the secure magnetic alignment design. Snappy magnetic cap. No more chipped nails. Thanks to the built-in magnets, now you can open and close your SonaBuds 2 Pro charging case with a simple snap. RewardsTech SpecsWorking Prototype Demo Video

See SonaBuds 2 in action
 
Frequency Response Curve

 
 Delivery Timelines

story:
This album has been inspired by my clients in need of relaxation and guided meditation recordings.  Many individuals need a way to take a time out from the various stressors and pressures of today's world.  At the same time, people often claim they don't have time to take for their own health, well-being and self-care...Some state they have no time to exercise, prepare healthy meals, or engage in prayer, study, meditation or relaxation. Oftentimes, it is only when one is already suffering that he or she begins to consider any mental health or self-growth activities.  Ultimately, by not taking care, not "sharpening one's own axe," our lives are adversely affected in many ways.  We begin to feel depleted and notice that we are becoming less time and energy efficient than we could optimally be.

 For the past 15 years I have been developing relaxation recordings for my clients and students, but doing them informally, on my laptop (or previously, more antiquated equipment).  As a musician and a therapist, however, I know that even better quality can enhance the efficacy of the recordings.

As a psychotherapist who has been introducing the benefits of meditation, guided imagery and relaxation exercises to my clients for many years, I have discovered that there is a need for me to make my own recordings rather than try to use those that are already available. My work with sound healing and recording my own meditations and exercises for my clients has come as the result of many direct requests to create something different. Firstly, since my clients trust me, they prefer my intentions and cultural sensitivity.  Many of my clients have told me they would prefer to listen to meditations and relaxation recordings that do not have any Eastern religious or philosophical implications.  In my research, I found the most important qualities necessary for a high quality, effective production, would be a well-engineered recording which includes no undesirable elements such as: background noise, poor acoustics, excessive jargon, etc.  In developing this album, I have needed to be mindful to use a speaking voice which is free of dialect or accent and to speak in a tone of voice which is easy to listen to and to relax with,   Additionally, these recordings are free from any religious elements, and have been developed with scientific principles and techniques. Any added music or sound elements are purposely chosen to enhance the listening experience.  As a matter of fact, research states that the effect of healing audio can be increased by up to 30% when embedded with various additional elements such as nature sounds, binaural beats, singing bowls, etc.

For all these reasons and more, I believe this carefully researched, engineered album must come out for the benefit of the public.  Please allow me to help you attain some relaxation and peace of mind. I would even be happy to assist you in meeting some  previously unmet goals and aspirations.  Join me in my Indiegogo Campaign.  With a one time financial investment  in this project,  the benefits you will accrue will show a long term, continuous and positive yield.  The skills and techniques you will learn will be lifelong!  By just listening to these recordings daily or as needed, you will find very rapid improvements in various areas of your life such as improved mood, increased energy, enhanced immune response, diminished anxiety, diminished blood pressure and other heart ailments, and more!




There are many ways to utilize sound for change with the use of singing, nature sounds,and instruments, such as crystal bowls, didgeridoos, and tuning forks. Today, drumming is widely used to release stress and build team consciousness. Sound is being used by clinical psychologists to help their patients combat anxiety, improve sleep, and enhance their creative expression. Music with sound healing principles embedded (such as binural beats), can be used to entrain the brain into specific states of consciousness. The medical community is also beginning to use sound and music to relax their patients and relieve their pain during and after surgery, to break up gallstones and other blockages and to "vibrate" vital organs back into a healthy state.  One example of this is oncologist Dr. Mitchell Gaynor who uses sound healing to assist his  patients in their healing process. (http://gaynoroncology.com/services/mind-body-spirit/#sound_healing).


By engaging in very simple exercises and techniques, one can experience reduced stress and anxiety.  Additionally, there is often a dramatic and visible effect on one’s resilience on all levels - body, mind and spirit.  This is an enjoyable, economical and portable way for anyone, of any cultural or religious background, to find simple, affordable, drug free* strategies to reduce stress, strengthen the immune system, lower the risk of heart attack and other heart ailments, and improve overall well being. Additionally, many other benefits are available through such audios and sound healing in general.  Certain recordings can induce or entrain the brain to various brainwave states for experiences other than relaxation.  For instance: audio can help a person become more alert or focused.  Additionally, by developing skills, individuals can improve their memory, test taking, reaction time or diminish pain*, etc.

* Healing audios are not a substitute for proper medical or attention


Relaxation - Using Beach Scene and Forest and Stream Imagery. In these 2 exercises you will experience a vacation that you will see in your mind and experience in your body, right from the comfort of your own living room or bedroom. Through your imagination, you will be transported to a place that is safe and serene and experience sensations through all of your five senses. As this is practiced regularly, and the "safe place" becomes more vivid and familiar, you will be able to induce the same relaxation at will, even when not listening to the recording!  You will emerge relaxed and refreshed.

Meditation - This is an attentional exercise where you will learn to 'check in' with each part of your body...part by part, just calling attention to and becoming aware of any tension and places you may be "holding" tightly. Just by becoming more aware, we can eliminate the negative effect that tension has on our body and mind.  This exercise is great for anyone with nervous tension, teeth grinding, sleep disorders* of various kinds, and for those who are not "in touch with their body" as they feel they should be. 

Relaxation - Similar to the Body Scan, this exercise introduced by Edmund Jacobson in the 1920's, takes us gradually through the body.  However, in this one, the participant is far more active during the recording, being asked to intentionally tense up, hold, and then release each area of the body, part by part. This exercise can induce deep relaxation of the body.

Meditation - A Children’s Meditation as well as 1, 3, 5, 7 & 10 versions- These are of the most basic meditation practice where the focal attention point is one's breath.  These exercises progress from 1 minute to 10 minutes.  As the individual develops greater skill with repetition and practice, longer meditations can be used to augment the beneficial effects. Doing one of these daily "in the background" as if you were taking supplements to maintain a healthy body, will help you gain the most benefit.  When necessary, either to calm down or to prepare for an event, these "spaces" can be utilized in the moment as well.

This is an advanced, unguided meditation on breath, body sensation, image or sound.  Since this a more advanced practice, the participant should be familiar and comfortable with the shorter meditations above before doing it.  The individual is introduced to the already familiar meditation "effort" at the very beginning of the recording, but then is left to do it on his/her own for the remainder of the time.  

The listener will be taught different relaxation exercises utilizing various breathing techniques.  These will utilize some of the principles of "The Relaxation Response" of Dr. Herbert Benson and others.
http://www.relaxationresponse.org

These exercises are so simple, they can be used "right out of the box."  However, the listener may have questions regarding how they should best be done.  These simple instructions will help listeners maximize their benefit from this album.

*The album many contain additional recordings.


Any investor donating $1000 or more will receive a custom developed guided  meditation or healing recording specifically developed for the area of need, or industry.  Such recipients might include: doctors, dentists, chiropractors, therapists, nutritionists, doulas, etc.  Each donor will also receive all other perks as well.  The custom recording will be individually scheduled for production.   Prior to creation, donor will need to supply ample information for development of the recording.  At this time, it would be estimated that the donor receive custom recording 60 days after information is supplied.  Additionally, if requested, their names will be featured on the album as sponsors. 

Please use these relaxation audios with care.*  To get the fullest therapeutic effect, please use headphones, earbuds, earphones, etc., since many of the sounds are “placed” in a virtual 360º audio.  Additionally, some selections include therapeutic audio tracks (including nature sounds, binaural beats and resonant drones) that require headphones for optimal benefit.  Do not listen to relaxation materials while you need to be fully awake and alert. Never listen while driving or operating heavy machinery. Please use relaxation sessions only when it is safe to do so. These recordings are not a substitute for medical attention. It is important to remember that pain is your body’s way of calling attention to that part which is hurting. These exercises will be best utilized in the privacy of your own home or in another place that you have control over the privacy and quiet of the environment.

Additionally, since each person has individual needs, one person’s sensitivity to certain sounds may be more acute than another's.  It is for this reason, on this album, we are including various options with or without background sounds or music.  However, research has proven that such recordings, including spoken scripts with sound healing elements together, have up to a 30% greater effectiveness than those recordings that have either audio or only healing music (separately).  When combined, it has been shown that they create a synergistic effect.

* Healing audios are not a substitute for proper medical or psychiatric attention.  

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!
Darcy F. Wallen, LCSW, ACSW, PC • (a.k.a. Rus Devorah Wallen)

Clinical Consultant Social Worker • Psychotherapist • Motivational Entertainer
Williamsville, NY
Connect With Me!

Facebook|TELLL Fund |ReverbNation |LinkedIn |Pinterest |Twitter

story:
BUMPOUT IS IN PRODUCTION!

BEHIND THE SCENES AT THE FACTORY

BumpOut is the first speaker system in the world to feature Motorized Expansion Technology™. This audio industry breakthrough allows BumpOut to remain slim and ergonomic while being carried comfortably in your pocket yet, expands creating an acoustic chamber that results in powerful, high quality sound and rich bass response. We then paired this technology with BumpOut Coins that feature a patented repositionable adhesive that allow you attach the speaker to any smooth surface: even your smartphone. Truly Portable.

BumpOut: (verb) to break out of the pack; be an individual; boldly do what you love, not just what you are told.

We believe in today’s youth. By providing guidance and exposure to career paths that foster individual talents, we aim to make a meaningful impact on the Creators of tomorrow. Our first live event held on October 8, 2016 brought community leaders, entrepreneurs and students together for a day of bumping music and breakout sessions developed to inspire creativity and ideas backed by positive action. With your support, our commitment to BumpOutU and proactive approach to making a difference will scale along with our company.

Read more at the Delaware County News Network

 

 

To create BumpOut, we partnered with Mike Giffin and John Crisco of Wren Sound Systems. The pair bring more than 50 years of audio experience developing products for industry heavyweights JBL, Harman Kardon and Polk Audio to name a few. We combined their expertise with an international team of engineers and product experts from Hansong Technologies. Together, we maintain a joint focus of delivering a powerful, high quality product that will redefine portable audio.

When will I receive my BumpOut Speaker?
Backers will start receiving their BumpOut starting February 2018. They will ship in the same order they were placed so get yours early!

Will the coin still work even if I have a case on my phone?
Yes, the coin can be placed on any flat surface.

Is BumpOut water resistant? 
Yes. BumpOut is both water & dust resistant.

Does BumpOut need to be attached to my phone to work?
BumpOut does not need to be attached to your phone. It is Bluetooth enabled and can be used anywhere as long as it is within range of the device music is being played on.

Can I play music on more than one BumpOut at the same time? 
Yes, you can play music on two Bumpout at the same time from one device.

How long will BumpOut last when fully charged? 
BumpOut can play music for up to 7 hours on a fully charged battery.

How long does it take to fully charge BumpOut?
Approximately 3 hours

Will there be a warranty? 
BumpOut comes with an industry standard 1-year limited warranty.

Can BumpOut be used for telephone calls?
Yes, BumpOut has a built-in microphone that allows you to answer phone calls.

What are the dimensions of BumpOut?
Approximately 4.7”L x 2.4”W x .83”H. It was created to fit on the back of any smartphone without impeding camera function.  

What is the wireless range of BumpOut?
The range from BumpOut to connected device is approx. 30’ (10 meters).

How does BumpOut connect to my device?
Utilizing Bluetooth version 4.0. you can connect BumpOut to your smartphone, tablet or other Bluetooth enabled devices.

Can BumpOut work if it is not expanded? 
Yes, BumpOut works in both expanded and non-expanded positions. When BumpOut is expanded the quality of sound and intensity of bass improve dramatically.

story:
Limited quantities of SOUNDPEATS’ H1  are now available at Official website

https://www.soundpeatsaudio.com/en/h1.html

For those scouting for earbuds capable of delivering the best wireless sound performance at an affordable price, SOUNDPEATS H1 is without doubt the best option, and it’s worth every penny. Where the SOUNDPEATS H1 shines the most is its sound quality, which beats other competitors in nearly every category: highest-performing hybrid dual-driver system, most advanced Bluetooth chipset, adaptive compression algorithm and professional acoustic tuning, just to name a few. It sounds as good as TWS earbuds two or three times the price, and even rivals wired earbuds.  

 

Be prepared to have your ears sharpened, eyes opened, and mind blown by SOUNDPEATS H1’s excellent audio performance. 

Not all earphones are created equal. We make SOUNDPEATS H1 for people who share values with us when defining a pair of GOOD earphones - they need to sound GOOD, with no distortions in the treble and no rattles in the bass, rendering the music in a harmonious fashion that satisfies the soul.

We went to great lengths to deliver the perfect sound to you while keeping them in a reasonable price range. The magic formula of SOUNDPEAT H1 is its unique driver system - a combination of a Knowles balanced armature driver, a customized dynamic driver, and a patented crossover. In addition, they have been tuned by award-winning sound engineers to ensure an unparalleled audio experience.

 

 

You may find it difficult to get a pair of earbuds with decent treble at all volumes, as a disproportionate focus of many earbuds’ production is diverted to the bass response. Deficiency in higher frequencies can lead to so-so quality for podcasts, e-books, voice and video calls. When it comes to turning up the treble for exceptional clarity and realism, there is no better option than the Knowles BA Driver, an industry leader in advanced audio processing solutions and the first choice for professional musicians and audiophiles. It reproduces clear and precise treble that doesn’t extend excessively and penetrate your ears, so more acoustic genres will simply shine on SOUNDPEATS H1. 

 

Most earphones tend to overdo it on the bass for a beefy baseline at the cost of suppressing the mids and other frequency ranges, so they sound muddy, tinny, or lacking in detail. In contrast, SOUNDPEATS H1 strikes a delicate balance between the resonant depth in the bass and rich details in the mids. Its large dynamic driver  preserves the tightness and beat of the music, while the extreme slimness of the diaphragm brings out the liveliness where you can hear the artist’s finger picking on guitars, or gasps and breaths in voices like you were inside the studio with them.

 

It’s no easy task to get the balance right in earphones to create a full and spacious soundscape. SOUNDPEATS H1 advances this field by innovatively utilizing a proprietary crossover to seamlessly bind all frequencies, so that you can listen to almost any type of music with it. The crossover keeps different frequencies divided up accurately, like highs, lows-to-mids, and then sends them to the dedicated driver to precisely reproduce the separate frequency regions. They then will join together to form a harmonious confluence of chords rippling in your ears, inviting you in and carrying you away.

 

 

Don’t you just hate the annoying skips and compromised sound in music played over Bluetooth? Sadly, it’s a fairly common problem among wireless earbuds. If you want a wire-free technology that can take a beating and give you unmatched high fidelity for music and calls alike, SOUNDPEAT H1 earbuds are the way to go. They are armed with the most up-to-date Bluetooth technology in the industry, so you can enjoy your favorite tunes and video chats in peace.

 

With this technology, SOUNDPEATS H1 provides the most robust and seamless wireless connectivity for a truly immersive, on-the-go listening experience. Only one earbud at a time maintains the Bluetooth connection with the smartphone, while the other one mirrors the connection. In the event that the primary connection is cut off or detected to be weaker than that for the mirroring bud, it will be rapidly and seamlessly swapped from one bud to the other - all without you being aware or having to do a thing. This translates to optimized sound quality free of glitches and dropouts, and a maximized battery life up to 50% longer when compared to the previous generation of TWS earbuds.

 It is also engineered to make your life easier with simultaneous one-click-pairing for both earbuds, as only one device appears when you connect SOUNDPEATS H1 to a smartphone. 

 

The moment you pop SOUNDPEATS H1 in your ears, the lossless, beyond-CD sound quality is immediately apparent. The better the codec, the higher the bitrate, the superior the sound quality. What powers the hi-res wireless audio behind SOUNDPEATS H1 earbuds are some of the world’s finest audio codecs. 

 

In addition to SBC and AAC, the only two codecs iOS devices support, SOUNDPEATS H1 also supports Qualcomm® aptX™ Adaptive, a codec that dynamically auto-adjusts its bitrate based on the quality of the source, the connectivity and the surrounding RF environment, to guarantee a robust and consistently premium experience, whatever your device, wherever you are. It is also backward compatible with aptX enabled devices.

Get the very most from the games you are playing or the videos you are watching with SOUNDPEATS H1’s low latency mode.  Triple tap the earbuds to enter this mode to engage in a virtually lag-free gaming experience and win that chicken dinner, or to feel for the characters in the movie as you practically enter the scenes with them. 

Does this sound familiar? In a chaotic environment, such as on the bus, subway or bar, the music you listened to or the voices on the other side of the call got drowned out by the noise and became tough to hear. You tended to dial up the volume to mask the noise, but by doing so, you risked inflicting damage upon your hearing.

 SOUNDPEATS H1 earbuds employ an ear-conforming design that flushes perfectly with your outer ear and molds naturally into the ear canal to form a proper seal, providing optimum noise isolation and pristine bass quality, even in noisy-as-hell conditions.

The passive outside noise level is further suppressed to as low as 28dB, just above a whisper, through the use of Comply™ eartips. Silicone eartips are widely used in competing earbuds but nothing beats the ultimately malleable Comply™ memory foam eartips in creating magical seals which make the external noise disappear. 

 

 The second microphone samples the ambient noise, and thanks to the embedded cutting-edge cVc™ 8.0 algorithm, that signal can be effectively canceled out from the original captured by the first microphone. So you can make crystal-clear calls and experience quiet conversations over FaceTime, Google Hangouts and Skype wherever you go.

If you want to get Siri or Google Assistant to complete a task while wearing other earbuds, you’ll have to either tap multiple times or press and hold the button on the earbud to summon them. It can cause so much inconvenience when your hands are occupied with driving, cooking, fitness exercising such as weight lifting and yoga, and countless other activities. Our self-developed virtual assistant has made things so much easier for you. You can simply say “Hi, SOUNDPEATS” to immediately invoke it, completely hands-free.

 It’s even smarter in terms of making phone calls while wearing these earbuds. If you receive a call, you are able to answer or reject it quickly and effortlessly, with a simple voice command of “Accept call” or “Reject call”. To make a call, say something like “Hi, SOUNDPEATS. Call Eliza”. No touch or gesture required.

(*Note: SOUNDPEATS H1 supports Touch wake-up virtual assistant and only SOUNDPEATS H1 PREMIUM supports voice wake-up AI assistant)

 Through gentle taps on the earbuds from your fingertips, you can wield control over everything from calls to music navigation and volume adjustments. 

SOUNDPEATS H1 has an outstanding 40 hours of battery life in total, which is almost 1.4 times longer than Apple AirPods Pro. You get 10 hours of battery in the buds from a single charge plus an extra 30 hours from the case, which means that not only are they convenient for a jog or commute, but are also able to last for a long-haul drive or flight. 

 Don't panic over a low battery anymore. The charging case can charge the earbuds about 6 times, and can be quickly recharged through either a Type-C cable or a wireless charging pad.

 

Items Included: 1 x SOUNDPEATS H1 Wireless Earbuds / 1 x USB-C Charging Cable / 1 x Wireless Charging Case / 3 x Inter changeable Ear Tips (S/M/L)/ 1 x free Comply™ Ear Tips /1 x User Manual

(*Note: SOUNDPEATS H1 supports Touch wake-up virtual assistant  and only SOUNDPEATS H1 PREMIUM supports voice wake-up AI assistant)

We are the SOUNDPEATS team, a group of music lovers who share a passion for truly great music and an active lifestyle. We are committed to providing our customers with audio products of not just good, not just great, but the absolute peak listening experience.

As a high-end audio products developer, manufacturer and industry veteran of 10 years, SOUNDPEATS continues to bring headphones that live up to the high quality and reasonable price to customers worldwide. Nowadays, in a market inundated with true wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds at all sorts of prices, SOUNDPEATS breaks through and has earned recognition as being among the top sellers in US, Canada, Japan and Europe. Our hardcore and successful product lineups, TrueShift, TrueWings, TruEngine, Truebuds, etc. have all been very well received and regarded by our customers. 

 

The release of the SOUNDPEATS H1 follows the successful launch of the SOUNDPEATS Truengine 2 on Kickstarter.  Raising over $350,000 from backers worldwide, SOUNDPEATS has built a world-class reputation for high-quality headphone construction and sound quality. 

 

 

SOUNDPEATS H1, our latest model of TWS earbuds, debuts on Kickstarter as the conclusion of many great ideas and concepts. However, they were all centered around one single subject when we were designing it, and that was YOU, our most valuable customer. That is why we utilized nothing but the best components and technologies: the Knowles balanced armature driver, oversized titanium dynamic driver, Qualcomm’s latest flagship Bluetooth chipset, adaptive compression algorithm, professional acoustic tuning and ergonomic design.

 

We created it with the confidence that you could wear and hear its sounds not only with satisfaction, but with amazement at its quality and comfort. We pledge to continue relentlessly pursuing innovative and better solutions for you than anything that’s come before!
story_txt: Limited quantities of SOUNDPEATS’ H1  are now available at Official websitehttps://www.soundpeatsaudio.com/en/h1.htmlFor those scouting for earbuds capable of delivering the best wireless sound performance at an affordable price, SOUNDPEATS H1 is without doubt the best option, and it’s worth every penny. Where the SOUNDPEATS H1 shines the most is its sound quality, which beats other competitors in nearly every category: highest-performing hybrid dual-driver system, most advanced Bluetooth chipset, adaptive compression algorithm and professional acoustic tuning, just to name a few. It sounds as good as TWS earbuds two or three times the price, and even rivals wired earbuds.   Be prepared to have your ears sharpened, eyes opened, and mind blown by SOUNDPEATS H1’s excellent audio performance. Not all earphones are created equal. We make SOUNDPEATS H1 for people who share values with us when defining a pair of GOOD earphones - they need to sound GOOD, with no distortions in the treble and no rattles in the bass, rendering the music in a harmonious fashion that satisfies the soul.We went to great lengths to deliver the perfect sound to you while keeping them in a reasonable price range. The magic formula of SOUNDPEAT H1 is its unique driver system - a combination of a Knowles balanced armature driver, a customized dynamic driver, and a patented crossover. In addition, they have been tuned by award-winning sound engineers to ensure an unparalleled audio experience.   You may find it difficult to get a pair of earbuds with decent treble at all volumes, as a disproportionate focus of many earbuds’ production is diverted to the bass response. Deficiency in higher frequencies can lead to so-so quality for podcasts, e-books, voice and video calls. When it comes to turning up the treble for exceptional clarity and realism, there is no better option than the Knowles BA Driver, an industry leader in advanced audio processing solutions and the first choice for professional musicians and audiophiles. It reproduces clear and precise treble that doesn’t extend excessively and penetrate your ears, so more acoustic genres will simply shine on SOUNDPEATS H1.  Most earphones tend to overdo it on the bass for a beefy baseline at the cost of suppressing the mids and other frequency ranges, so they sound muddy, tinny, or lacking in detail. In contrast, SOUNDPEATS H1 strikes a delicate balance between the resonant depth in the bass and rich details in the mids. Its large dynamic driver  preserves the tightness and beat of the music, while the extreme slimness of the diaphragm brings out the liveliness where you can hear the artist’s finger picking on guitars, or gasps and breaths in voices like you were inside the studio with them. It’s no easy task to get the balance right in earphones to create a full and spacious soundscape. SOUNDPEATS H1 advances this field by innovatively utilizing a proprietary crossover to seamlessly bind all frequencies, so that you can listen to almost any type of music with it. The crossover keeps different frequencies divided up accurately, like highs, lows-to-mids, and then sends them to the dedicated driver to precisely reproduce the separate frequency regions. They then will join together to form a harmonious confluence of chords rippling in your ears, inviting you in and carrying you away.  Don’t you just hate the annoying skips and compromised sound in music played over Bluetooth? story:
We are over 700% funded, and thanks for making it happen. 

X-SHOCK True Black Edition is now available on www.soulelectronics.com 

For X-SHOCK Transparent White Edition, please pre-order on INDIEGOGO at $149 (Retail Price $169)! Please continue to support us.

 

Media Highlights

 

World's First True Wireless Earphones with LED lights

 

According to the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety, about 40 percent of all crashes involving pedestrians occur at intersections, and more than half of all fatal pedestrian crashes occur at night, between the hours of 6 p.m. and midnight.

At SOUL, your music experience is the most important thing to us.  Which is why when we designed the X-SHOCK, we kept safety as one of the highest priorities.  The safety LED's built into the X-SHOCK is one of the top features we put into the Transparent White Edition.  When wearing the Transparent White Edition you will be safer and more visible at night.

 

Designed with Superior Quality

X-SHOCK is designed to uphold its superiority to shock the world. In SOUL, we infuse music and sports with precision.

At the core,

  • Gold-plated antenna to achieve the best connection quality 
  • 60 hours of playtime, the longest amongst its competitors
  • Instant auto-pairing function
  • Seamless control of your mobile device functions

On the outside,

  • Safety LED's; added safety for protection in the dark
  • Double-injection technology, one of the best water-resistant solutions, which makes the X-SHOCK a true sport earphone
  • Ergonomic design that guarantees the perfect fit
  • Naturally isolate outside noise

 

Interact with Siri or Google Assistant

It is just a touch away to activate your voice assistant via the multi-function button on the X-SHOCK. Meaning you never have to take your smartphone out of your pocket, giving you a genuine wireless, hands-free experience.

 

Safety LED Design, Protection in the Dark

If you’re among the many who take to the streets for a run or walk after hours, the X-SHOCK Transparent White Edition was built for you with safety in mind.  The Safety LED’s will make sure that you are safer at night.  When listening to your music the X-SHOCK will alert those around you with bright LED lights, which can be seen from distance.

 

Superior Materials, the Best Connectivity Ever

Instead of conventional copper alloy antenna, the X-SHOCK is built with a gold-plated antenna to keep interference at a minimum.  This makes X-SHOCK one of the best connectivity performers amongst its competitors and delivers the best quality listening experience.

 

 Enjoy the Rhythm for 60 Hours 

Supporting up to 60 hours of playtime, X-SHOCK does not only deliver the best sound quality but also the longest playtime among all the competitors in the market. 

 

Advanced Mobile Connectivity and Seamless Auto-pairing, an All New Digital Experience

The X-SHOCK provides you functionality control of your mobile device, such as answering calls, controlling your playlists, as well as other functions such as Siri and Google Assistant. The X-SHOCK’s advanced connectivity allows you to stay engaged with the outside world while working out.

We understand that people don’t like waiting when it comes to sports. That's why we designed the X-SHOCK’s auto-pairing feature to save you time. Take out the earbuds from the charging case and enjoy your music instantly.

 

Protection Against Extreme Weather, Beyond Nano-coating Technology

Many water-resistant earphones are protected with a Nano-coating technology. However, our engineering team decided to take it one step further, by developing the X-SHOCK with a more complex idea, the double-injection technology.  This enables the X-SHOCK to be submerged in water for up to 30 minutes, ensuring it can withstand extreme sweat and weather conditions. Quality and durability are two features that a true wireless sports earphone should have.

 

Ergonomic Design, Made for Natural Noise Isolation

The ergonomic design does not only enable the X-SHOCK to securely fit into your ears, but also creates a natural noise isolation to give add bass to your music. The natural noise isolation really brings out the SOUL Signature Sound. The X-SHOCK is truly one of a kind.

 

X-SHOCK True Black Edition

Aside from the transparent white edition, the X-SHOCK also comes in a True Black edition which can match any outfit for any occasion.

 

Product Specs & Dimensions

  • SOUL Signature Neodymium Dynamic Drivers
  • Built-in microphone for Music and Calls
  • Bluetooth V4.2
  • Charging Case
  • LED Battery Indicator
  • Supports Siri and Google Assistant
  • Micro-USB Cables
  • 2 Sizes of Silicone ear-tips
  • Carabiner included

The Development

 

Why X-SHOCK

After relentless efforts in perfecting the product, we proudly announce that the X-SHOCK has passed all 32 pre-production tests and we’re here to say “It’s ready!”

The X-SHOCK is designed with superiority inside-out. It will truly be the Best Sports Earphone for Safety, having the longest playtime, best connectivity, outstanding sound quality, ergonomic design and other important features such as auto pairing and water resistance.  At it's core The X-SHOCK is sports and music.

SOUL Customer Reviews 

About SOUL Electronics

At SOUL we are a team of creative industrial designers and makers specialized in consumer electronics and manufacturing, with a rich history in delivering innovative technology and concepts including high quality audio, noise cancelling, and wireless products.  We represent a vision for innovative feature-driven designs with state-of-the-art acoustics, and stylish appearance that can be found in SOUL’s past and future products.

FAQ

When will I receive my product? What if I receive it after the listed date?
We have had experience with production runs of up to 5,000 units at a time with other products we’ve made in the past, We’ll put in the orders as soon as we finish the campaign. From that time, it will take 1 month until we can get them across the sea and to your door.

We will honor our timelines as best as we can and aim to ship to you by Christmas. December generally is a busy time due to the holiday. If we hear of any delays on the shipper’s side, we’ll notify our backers immediately. We apologize but we won’t be able to refund you for shipping delays but we will try our best to expedite all orders out to our supporters asap. Besides, please note that we will not be able to refund orders once they've locked or shipped out.

*  For the shipping date of X-SHOCK Transparent White Edition, please stay tuned to our Indiegogo Page.  

What happens if I never receive the product?
We’ve already done a production run of 500 units to test for defect rates (we have photos and videos to prove this). Things are looking great so far. We do not foresee any challenges in scaling up the production quantity. If there is a problem you can contact us directly and we will do everything we can to help fix the issue.

How much is international shipping? Am I responsible for taxes and duties in my country?
We will cover shipping to US. For areas outside of this, we will charge a flat $10-15 shipping rate. This extra fee will help us cover some of the costs we incur in shipping it from our manufacturing facility to your door. Keep in mind that you are responsible for paying your own country’s taxes and duties.

Can you ship to my country?
Right now, shipping is limited to regions where our shipping service provider operates. Since this is our first launch, we want to keep operations lean to ship the orders that we feel most confident about. In the future, we may open up orders to new countries. Thanks for bearing with us in the meantime!

Can I use these earbuds to answer phone calls?
Yes, there’s a built-in mic for phone calls, Siri, Google Now, etc.

What’s the standby time like?
Standby time is about 200 hours.

How many recharges can a fully-charged case provide?
You can recharge our earbuds 18 times before having to charge the case again.

What if I changed my shipping address?
Update your shipping address on your Indiegogo account. We will provide notice before we start confirming addresses.

When will I receive the backer surveys?
You will receive your backer survey 15 business days after the campaign ends. It takes 15 business days to process all contributions.

Can the two earbuds be used independently in mono?
Yes, both X-SHOCK earbuds have a microphone, multi-function and speaker capabilities. You can use them independently as a mono unit.

Can you charge one earbud while using the other?
Yes, when one earbud is being charged, it will disconnect from the device. The other earbud will remain connected

What colours are available for X-SHOCK?
X-SHOCK will be available in two colors: True Black and Transparent White.

What devices is X-SHOCK compatible with?
X-SHOCK features Bluetooth 4.2 technology to connect to any desktop computer, tablet, IOT and mobile phone. X-Shock will pair with any Android, iOS and Windows device which includes Bluetooth connectivity.

How do you charge X-SHOCK?
X-SHOCK earbuds dock into the charging pod and charges through contact ports on the earbud. The charging pod is charged with a standard micro USB cable.

What Bluetooth profiles does X-SHOCK support?
A2DP profile version 1.3
HFP profile version 1.6
HSP profile version 1.2
AVRCP profile version 1.5
SPP profile version 1.2

From that time, it will take 1 month until we can get them across the sea and to your door.We will honor our timelines as best as we can and aim to ship to you by Christmas. December generally is a busy time due to the holiday. If we hear of any delays on the shipper’s side, we’ll notify our backers immediately. We apologize but we won’t be able to refund you for shipping delays but we will try our best to expedite all orders out to our supporters asap. Besides, please note that we will not be able to refund orders once they've locked or shipped out.*  For the shipping date of X-SHOCK Transparent White Edition, please stay tuned to our Indiegogo Page.  What happens if I never receive the product?We’ve already done a production run of 500 units to test for defect rates (we have photos and videos to prove this). Things are looking great so far. We do not foresee any challenges in scaling up the production quantity. If there is a problem you can contact us directly and we will do everything we can to help fix the issue.How much is international shipping? Am I responsible for taxes and duties in my country?We will cover shipping to US. For areas outside of this, we will charge a flat $10-15 shipping rate. This extra fee will help us cover some of the costs we incur in shipping it from our manufacturing facility to your door. Keep in mind that you are responsible for paying your own country’s taxes and duties.Can you ship to my country?Right now, shipping is limited to regions where our shipping service provider operates. Since this is our first launch, we want to keep operations lean to ship the orders that we feel most confident about. In the future, we may open up orders to new countries. Thanks for bearing with us in the meantime!Can I use these earbuds to answer phone calls?Yes, there’s a built-in mic for phone calls, Siri, Google Now, etc.What’s the standby time like?Standby time is about 200 hours.How many recharges can a fully-charged case provide?You can recharge our earbuds 18 times before having to charge the case again.What if I changed my shipping address?Update your shipping address on your Indiegogo account. We will provide notice before we start confirming addresses.When will I receive the backer surveys?You will receive your backer survey 15 business days after the campaign ends. It takes 15 business days to process all contributions.Can the two earbuds be used independently in mono?Yes, both X-SHOCK earbuds have a microphone, multi-function and speaker capabilities. You can use them independently as a mono unit.Can you charge one earbud while using the other?Yes, when one earbud is being charged, it will disconnect from the device. The other earbud will remain connectedWhat colours are available for X-SHOCK?X-SHOCK will be available in two colors: True Black and Transparent White.What devices is X-SHOCK compatible with?X-SHOCK features Bluetooth 4.2 technology to connect to any desktop computer, tablet, IOT and mobile phone. X-Shock will pair with any Android, iOS and Windows device which includes Bluetooth connectivity.How do you charge X-SHOCK?X-SHOCK earbuds dock into the charging pod and charges through contact ports on the earbud. The charging pod is charged with a standard micro USB cable.What Bluetooth profiles does X-SHOCK support?A2DP profile version 1.3HFP profile version 1.6HSP profile version 1.2AVRCP profile version 1.5SPP profile version 1.2

story:
Samson Go Mic Connect

USB Microphone with Focused Pattern Technology™


Who is Samson?

Samson has spent over 35 years creating high-value, innovative audio products for both professional and consumer markets in live, studio and business environments. 11 years ago Samson developed the world's first Professional USB Microphone, the C01U, providing multimedia creators an instant upgrade to computer audio quality and convenience


Connect. Communicate. Create.

Go Mic Connect applies user-adjustable Focused Pattern Technology to Create superior digital Communication and computer recordings in even the noisiest office and mobile recording environments.


Focused Pattern Technology™ and
Digital Noise Reduction

Samson’s Focused Pattern Technology™ enhances pickup pattern directionality to better target the audio directly in front of the microphone. When activated, all sound that originates outside the focus area is significantly reduced, making the Go Mic Connect ideal for noisy environment communications.

The Digital Noise Reduction algorithm improves your speech articulation by reducing ambient noise in your environment such as computer fans and air conditioners. Continuous and repetitive noise is effectively removed from the microphone input, providing cleaner audio for speech recognition, videoconferencing, gaming, and voice over internet communication.



Testimonial

Justin Lassen composer, producer, multi-instrumentalist and remixer



A Day in the Life with Go Mic Connect


Why choose a Go Mic Connect?

Feature Samson Go Mic Connect USB Mics…
Blue, Audio-Technica		 Directional Shotgun Mics…
Rode, Shure, Audio-Technica, Sennheiser
Focused Pattern Technology Yes N/A N/A
Digital Noise Reduction Yes N/A N/A
Echo Erase Yes N/A N/A
Dual Capsule Design Yes N/A N/A
Desktop or display mountable Yes Yes N/A

As you can see by the above comparison chart, although there are several high-quality USB microphones on the market today, essentially none combine the compact design, flexible application use, and audio focus and noise reduction technology of the Go Mic Connect.


Design Evolution


Specifications

Polar Pattern Omni-directional
Capsules (2) 10mm condenser capsule
Frequency Response 20Hz – 20kHz
Sample Rate 44.1/48kHz
Bit Rate 16-Bit
Power Requirements 5V 50mA
Max SPL 130 dB
Dimensions 4.3” x 0.6” x 3.2” / 110mm x 16mm x 82mm
Weight 0.3lb / 139g

Features


Timeline


Why are we doing an Indiegogo campaign?

Samson is an organization that is dedicated to innovating new products that will enhance the lives of our customers around the world. Prior to crowdfunding sites like Indiegogo, we did not have the platform to directly interact with such a wide audience before releasing a product. We decided to create this campaign to give passionate creators the chance to use the Go Mic Connect before it becomes available to the public, as well as validate its place the market.


FAQ

1. What is the Go Mic Connect?
The Go Mic Connect is a USB microphone that can attach to the top of computer monitor, TV or sit on a desk.

2. What does it do?
Go Mic Connect combines user-adjustable Focused Pattern Technology (FPT) and Digital Noise Reduction (DNR) to create superior digital communication and computer recordings in even the noisiest office and mobile recording environments.

3. What is Focused Pattern Technology™?
Focused Pattern Technology™ uses an adjustable “beam” to target audio directly in front of the microphone, while reducing noise outside of its pickup area

4. What is Digital Noise Reduction?
Digital Noise Reduction is especially effective in reducing constant ambient noise caused by sources such as computer fans and heating and cooling systems.

5. How do I attach my Go Mic Connect to the computer?
The extremely compact Go Mic Connect has 3 adjustable sections of its body, allowing it to be used standalone on a desktop or easily attached to a variety of monitor shapes and thicknesses.

6. What makes the Go Mic Connect different?
Its dual-capsule design with adjustable pattern “beam”, noise reduction and echo erase software.

7. Where can the Go Mic Connect be shipped?
We can ship only to the USA for this Indiegogo campaign.

8. When will the Go Mic Connect be shipped?
Early bird units will ship by the end of April 2016. The rest of the units are expected to ship by the end of May 2016.

9. Do I need a special driver to use the Go Mic Connect?
No. The Go Mic Connect uses built-in class-compliant drivers that are built-in to your Mac and Windows OS (make sure you always have the latest OS updates)

10. What is the warranty for the Go Mic Connect?
Samson Audio products carry a two (2) year warranty. For complete warranty information see Samson's Warranty Information page.


Contact

For press inquiries please contact mailto:press@samsontech.com

For any additional questions, contact us at: indiegogo@samsontech.com

story:
As music lovers, we are always looking for ways to make our listening experience better. Imagine what it would feel like to be able to take full control of your music player with a simple wave of your hand.

That's why we made AIUR, a Hi-fi speaker that can recognize up to 8 types of hand gestures giving you the freedom to control the speaker on all the functions.

 

 

The complex pattern recognition algorithms embedded in the software, combined with a high tech 15mm sensor module, allow the AIUR to detect over 8 types of hand movements & gestures up to a range of 11 inches. Features such as changing the songs, adjusting the volume, Play & Pause and track control makes AIUR the most versatile and useful gesture control speaker available today.

Which emits the special infrared light, receives reflected a light wave, and restructures the 3D model of your hand. By analyzing different gestures, the sensor module transforms them into orders to take full control of all functions of AIUR.

  • Sensurround Hi-Fi Sound Effect

Designed to the highest acoustic standards, AIUR’s compact audio circuit design creates a highly-tuned acoustic chamber space for the very best sound quality – allowing the dual speakers and bass amplifier to deliver superior bass and clear vocals every time.

  • Auto Optimization

With its unique and patented technology, AIUR can adjust the configuration by detecting its surroundings and provides you with the optimized sound quality all the time.

  • Patented Decoding Algorithm

And if that wasn’t enough, we added our proprietary sound decoding algorithm, coupled with the latest CSR core and Bluetooth 4.2 electronics – along with APT-X professional audio decoding technology to guard against lossless transmission, plus the latest Digital Signal Processing (DSP) for enhanced amplification.

  • Ring off & Hang up

Not only for music, AIUR can also allow you to answer the phone calls once you connect it to the cell phone by Bluetooth.

  • LED Light Indicator

Using twinkle frequency and light interaction technology, the color changing LED provides clear visual feedback to instantly confirm each function as it’s selected.

  • Sync in Pair

What’s more, if you are looking for the ultimate surround sound 3D Hi-Fi theatre experience, simply perform a simple gesture to pair another AIUR and enjoy the true stereo sound.

  • 12 Hour Working Time

AIUR can work for 12 hours with one full charge. AIUR is designed to automatically turn off when there's no streaming music coming in, saving power for when it’s needed.

  • 3 Options of Stand Choice

We have designed 3 different stands, electroplating stand, spider stand, and a hanging strip, allows you to put AIUR wherever you like.

 

  • Premium Home Theater

Wireless connected with your Smart TV, AIUR turns your home into a premium home theater, taking control freely with gesture motivation. The unique design brings you a delight to the eyes when enjoying immersive Sound effects.

 

We have designed 3 different stands, electroplating stand, spider stand, and a hanging strip, allows you to put AIUR wherever you like.

story:
Chasing a Dream 

Podfest was born on August 5th, 2013 at a meetup I hosted with 13 attendees!  Here are our highlights from that point forward! 

In 2014 Chris Krimitsos holds 2 workshops around Podcasting 

2015 1st Official Podfest is held April 24th-26th  100 Attendees 

2016 2nd Podfest Feb 26 & 27th 181 attendees. Podfest Pioneers the Gratitude closing ceremony. The Messengers: A Podcast Documentary starts filming at Podfest 2016

9/13/2016 The Messengers reaches 123% of Goal raised with $22,152 becoming the 1st Documentary funded by the community for the medium of podcasting

Feb 23-25th 2017 Podfest Moves to Orlando to help demand from Intl Travelers The Messengers: A Podcast Documentary Premiers to a standing ovation 373 Registered Attendees.

2018 Podfest keeps growing 496 Attendees. Holds the 1st Ever Friars Roast of a Podcaster Dave Jackson of the School of Podcasting 

2019 Podfest March 7-9th 975 Attendees Doubles in size 975 Attendees Launch of Vidfest The Roast of John Lee Dumas 

2020 Podfest doubles in size with over 2000 Registered Attendees Last conference to go on prior to Coronavirus shutting everything down Podfest Launches Microcons to rave reviews. Podcast Editor Con, Audio Drama Con, Military Creator Con, and many more targeted brands for sponsors to partake in. 

Be part of the Podfest story as we take on the largest undertaking to date. 

This Summer we have Partnered with WHOVA our Tech platform to Bring Podfest to life and are Officially going for a record-setting attempt to host the World's Largest Podcasting Conference Virtually this Aug 10th-17th!

What We Need & What You Get

The Bandwidth needed for this undertaking Technologically is immense we need your support helping us raise the funds needed to connect the world together! 

We have put together Perks for those that want to help us START UGLY as we bring the world together giving them education and camaraderie that our community has built within it! 

The Funds from this crowdfunding will help us cover the team behind the scenes helping put this on as well as keep a freemium option viable helping people from continents outside North America participate without having to purchase a ticket.

The Impact

This is a global undertaking that is intended to bring what we do so well Community, Collaboration, and Education to peoples homes the world over. 

We believe everyone should have access to the richness of the Podfest community.

We have been helping people since 2013 in this endeavor.

This record attempt is special because it begins almost 7 years to the day it all began so long ago with 13 people.

Risks & Challenges

We have put it all on the line to make this happen and believe that in life the most important thing to focus on is helping others get their message out to the world.

We will be partnering up with local podcast meetups & Groups across the globe bringing them under the Podfest umbrella and allowing the cross flow of information to disseminate freely! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

 You Can help us make some noise about this campaign by sharing out.

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
