The founders who came up with the Sodapop idea all share a passion for music and technology, and they have a lot of experience in electronics and consumer products. 
The founders gathered experts in multiple domains such as audio design, Industrial design, music-, speaker- and tech industries. Between them, the team members have over 20 years of experience in audio, technology, product design and manufacturing. 
Getting Sodapop from idea to reality has been a tremendous team effort. We’ve worked on it full time since 2016. Our Sodapop portable speakers are now ready for production, and we’re so excited to share what we’ve built with the Kickstarter community.
Early after the birth of the idea of Sodapop, the original founders of the Sodapop concept initialized a cooperation with Permafrost design studio. 
 

 
Permafrost is a groundbreaking Norwegian design studio with multiple Red-Dot award including best of the best awards. Permafrost was established in 2000, founded by 4 industrial designers all educated from the Oslo School of Architecture. Today Permafrost consist of 5 brilliant industrial designers and is leading and carrying out the design process for the Sodapop speaker.
 

 
Øyvind Warp, Co-founder of Sodapop, and head of Product Development, has significant knowledge and experience with speakers and tech-business in general from over 20 years working with electronics. He is also a passionate part-time designer and has done the artwork on this campaign including videos and animations.
Priding himself on being very hands-on, Øyvind spends a lot of time in Norway and China ensuring that the Sodapop is developed using the very latest technology, whilst making no compromises on quality. Øyvind's passion for tech was the very motivation to start up the company – and he was the one bringing the Sodapop from idea to reality by making the first prototypes in the back office of his electronics store. Øyvind has great passion for music, his music taste was a bit stuck in electronica in his early years, but luckily his taste for music has expanded to almost every genre you can imagine.
Øystein Lien, Co-founder of Sodapop, is educated in marketing from the Norwegian Business School (BI), has a long experience in customer relations and service and has worked for more that 15 years in the payment industry.
Together with Nicolai, Øystein will take care of Sales and Distributions of the Sodapop. And together with Øyvind he is bringing his marketing skills to the test. Øystein has a passion for football and he is often referred to as "Factastein" as he has knowledge of things nobody else has the brainpower to remember. His taste in music spans from 70´s Bowie and 90´s grimey hip-hop in Wu-Tang Clan, to the 00´s Norwegian golden age of electronica and rock music personified in Queens of the Stoneage, Foo Fighters and The White Stripes.
Ole Nicolai Olsen, Co-founder of Sodapop, is educated within maritime disciplines from Southampton University, has worked within the shipping business for the last 18 years. Nicolai is head of the company board and our financial guru. Together with Øystein he is also in charge of Sales and Distributions of the Sodapop speaker. Nicolai has a big heart, and he is a funny guy to hang out with, but he can also be very focused and disciplined, and that’s a good thing when he uses that to keep the project on the right tracks. Nicolai also plays the guitar, used to be in a band, and is a huge Pixies fan.
Tom Alexander Trones, Acoustician, is educated from The Norwegian School of Science and Technology and have worked as a sound consultant on the Sodapop project. We knew it would work, Tom explained to us why it did. Tom also has a great passion for guitars and he used to have long hair to go with it, today he has cut his hair but still loves his guitars, so much he is even building his own on his free time. It looks like his music taste all spans around bands that frequently uses the guitar in their songs. We like that about Tom, he´s got passion!
We are all audiophiles here. Every member of our team participates in different ways in the product development process, from the conception of the idea to fulfillment. We develop the kind of product we would love to have ourselves. 
 

 

 

 
We have already spend a lot of our own money on the development of this speaker, now we need your help to make this project come to life.
We love cakes! Let us visualize the spending for you.
The production and development of the moulds + the speakers itself carries the largest cost, after that comes marketing costs of this campaign, because we need to boost our campaign-related posts on Facebook and Instagram in order to stand out from the crowd.

 

 
As a start-up, we are fully aware of the risks we are facing and have taken pro-active steps to manage and reduce them. Having identified our own strengths and weaknesses, we have teamed up with best-in-class partners wherever we can, in order to have access to appropriate expertise wherever we need it.
We have identified the below as our main risk factors, and taken the following steps to eliminate and reduce risk where we can:
 
Production
The main concept of our speaker is to deliver superior quality at an unbeatable price. We have chosen to outsource production to a Chinese factory with a long and strong track record of delivering speakers to European markets. The factory was chosen after careful vetting, and we are confident we have made the right selection. Our research revealed that this factory has delivered with error margins down as low as 0,3% (i.e. 3 of 1,000 speakers returned after sales due to errors (this is very good in electronics, where retailers usually accept up to 2%). 
We intend to keep personnel regularly at the factory once production is up and running to monitor the process and ensure our quality requirements are strictly followed. Sodapop intends to start of production in small batches to ensure we are able to monitor and adjust the production to any unforeseen issues. 
For larger quantities, we run typical supply chain risk. We've done mass production before and we have existing relationship with the manufacturer, who has years of experience with large volumes and has well established connections with subcontractors for the parts needed in this product. Our factory partner can deliver well in excess of 4 million speakers per year and hence factory capacity is unlikely to become an issue in the near future.
 
Concept quality
In order to ensure maximum sound performance, we partnered with an experienced acoustician and an industrial design studio to optimize the design and structure of the speaker. Throughout the process, we have tested the prototypes in a professional sound studio. 
 
Financing 
Revolving credit facility for orders up to 10,000 units is already in place. If the product proves to be a big success the credit facility would have to be re-negotiated, but we believe the credit facility we already have negotiated, should be sufficient to handle the demand. The company also has the option of having orders shipped by air freight, reducing the time the drawn credit is used and hence can increase the rotation of the credit to handle an increased number of orders.
 
Logistics 
To ensure that the distribution of our speakers will go as smoothly as possible, we have outsourced the logistics to a professional third-party service provider.
 
Sales 
This is an ongoing process which will be intensified once the first production batch has arrived. We have tested our speaker with a couple of electronics retailers and received very positive feedback, but most retailers are reluctant to make orders based on prototypes. Still, we have already secured the commitment of one of the leading electronics retailers in Scandinavia, and we believe we have already validated the commercial potential for the product.
 
Marketing 
This is also an ongoing process, where we will make use of the different resources available to us at every step of way. We are committed to renewing ourselves constantly, staying updated on the latest tools and trends, to get this speaker on top of every potential portable speaker customer’s mind. We also have the advantage of having an in-house team of great creative artists that can produce and deliver any marketing material needed, from in-store graphics, packaging and sales material to commercial videos, webpages, banners and posts for social media marketing.
 
Patent rights 
The company has already secured international patent rights for our speaker under The Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) network which consists of 152 countries and states. We are in the process of securing our patent in most of this network with the help of the biggest intellectual property law firm in Norway, also listed as top tier in the world regarding trademark, copyright and patent law.
 
Local taxes 
Please note that whilst we endeavor to ensure that import taxes and duties are kept to a minimum for territories outside of our warehouse locations, local import taxes and duties may be required to be paid. Sodapop has no control over local customs offices and, as such, cannot be held responsible should you be charged import taxes and duties in addition to your purchase and shipping price. It is always best to check the position in your country beforehand.
 
Thank You!
All that's left to say is a big THANK YOU! We at Sodapop sincerely appreciate your support of our project and for backing us. May we bring real bass to small speakers together!

story:
Your Portable Video Playing Speaker

Volareo is a speaker - and so much more. Want to listen to music? Connect to Volareo over Bluetooth and experience rich, room-filling sound.

Time to watch video? Connect Volareo to your TV and explore a world of content. Your phone is your remote. Netflix, Youtube, Twitch… Volareo runs Android. Simply install the apps directly on Volareo.

In short, Volareo is a portable speaker and Android TV box in one. Entertainment has never been so easy.



It’s a Speaker

Wirelessly connect your smartphone or tablet to Volareo and experience impressive stereo sound. The built-in rechargeable battery supports up to 6 hours of non-stop playtime - at home or on the go.
 

It’s also an Android TV Box

Stream entertainment on your TV. Volareo connects through HDMI and has WiFi.

Once connected, your TV now has SmartTV powers. Volareo runs Android, and lets you install and browse the apps and services you know and love. All in one place.


The Volareo comes with all the services you love

Volareo comes packed with features, and you can easily personalize Volareo by installing your favorite apps from the Play Store. Enjoy all the services you love, directly on Volareo: Spotify, Netflix, Twitch, Hulu, HBO, Instagram, Google Chrome,... Make your Volareo yours, install the apps you love and use everyday!


Voice, Touch or App control? It’s up to you!

You can control the Volareo through many ways, whatever suits you most at that moment. Feel like speaking? Use the “Hey, Vo” voice control to wake up your speaker. Are you playing loud music from the Volareo? Use Touch or control it through the Volareo companion app, available for Android and iOS.


Voice Commands

Control Volareo with your voice, in 80 Languages! 
Simply say “Vo, play next track” or “Vo, turn up the Volume” to get the music going. It's super easy and works really well.


 

Touch Gestures

Don’t feel like talking? Use Volareo's touch gestures to play, skip, control the volume and more. The touch trackpad puts music right at your fingertips. Draw a circle for volume control, tap to play and pause or swipe to navigate through your tracks.

 

Microphone off switch

Volareo is built with privacy in mind, so for everyone's peace of mind you can switch off the microphone with a built-in hardware switch. Nobody can listen to anything when the microphone is switched off, simply because the power towards the microphone is cut off.

 

With Volareo's Touch Gestures, music is at your fingertips. Tap to Play & Pause, draw a circle to control the volume. Flick through your tracks or mute the microphone.

Volareo's one-of-a-kind Magnetic Tips - click them together and magic happens! Define it to whatever you like, for example play your favorite playlist, tip your musician, or even send a message to your loved one :)

 


Volareo versus the competition

Features Volareo Amazon Echo Google Home Apple HomePod Sonos One JBL Flip 4 Google Chrome-
cast
Price in USD 99 99 129 349 229 99 39
Always listening
Portable
Video streaming
Crypto payments
Wireless charging
Languages supported 80 7 8 20 7 0 0
Voice command
Tip musicians
Sound 10W RMS N/A 10W RMS N/A N/A 16W RMS None
Connectivity





 


How does Volareo look in your home?


 


Volareo in the press

Download presskit


 

 

Our Blockchain Partners

Musicoin, Choon, Emanate, Soundeon, the top music platforms decentralized on blockchain connecting musicians & music fans directly. LyricFind has all the lyrics you can imagine, makes music very searchable and personalizable. Jazz de Ville, the top jazz streaming station puts you in the mood to chill, dance, groove or simply just jazz! TV2Z opens up a new world of customized streaming channels for creators & listeners. Gracenote, the industry's smartest AI music recognition & discovery system ever will be embedded in Volareo. And Raven Protocol's revolutionary Decentralized machine learning ensures the AI in Volareo is personalized for you, without spying on you. Watch out for more partner announcements!
 


We'd like to invite you to a discussion in the comments

We'd ❤️ to hear from you. How would you use the Volareo Smart Speaker? What features would you like to see? What apps do you want or have developed on the Volareo platform? Let us know in the comments!

Our team members are here to answer all your questions, so do not hesitate to ask us a question!
 


The Volareo Team

Volareo is an international technology startup based at the Cambridge Innovation Center in Rotterdam, Netherlands, founded by industry veterans with over 87 years of combined experience.

With a team of enthusiastic professionals we are paving the way to an open, voice-controlled future of e-commerce. The Volareo team has already grown to 30 person strong (and counting!), with more than 7 crowdfunding campaigns, and over 500.000 products shipped over the past years.

 

 

Truly embodying decentralization, our team hails from 3 continents over 12 countries and we work from Netherlands, China, India and UK. What unifies us and the community is a shared passion for music, technology.

Let's build our global community of ambassadors, developers & users together, we can jumpstart the decentralized smart speaker revolution.


 


Roadmap

What happens at what time? Please find our Roadmap below.


Frequently Asked Questions

(Click each question below to view its answer)

✿ How much does the speaker cost?

The Volareo Smart Speaker costs US$99 (for Early Birds) and up, on Indiegogo, this is 50% off the Retail Price of US$199. Each speaker will come pre-loaded with 500 Musicoins, to get you started with tipping. All music streamed from Musicoin will be free of charge. You are encouraged to tip the musician :).

✿ Which countries do you ship to?

We ship internationally.

✿ What is the sound quality?

10W RMS (Dual Driver). The audio is similar or better than a quality branded portable speaker.

✿ What is the battery life?

Volareo's battery will have the capability of 6-8 hours continuous playback of music via Wifi. You can easily charge Volareo via USB or Wireless charging.

✿ Will there be a Volareo mobile app?

Yes, you can use Volareo via voice, mobile app and even via web.

✿ Will there be an App Store of sorts? How does that work?

Volareo works with Voice Decentralized Apps, which will be hosted decentralized. So you will be able to discover new uses, new features developed by our team as well as the community, without a central authority deciding what you can or cannot use. Take back control - you, the community decides.

✿ What language will Volareo be able to speak?

Voice commands will first be available in English, Spanish, and Dutch, and eventually in 80 languages (eg. Japanese, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Hindi, Tamil, Arabic etc), with the help of stretch goals. Smart voice assistant will however only be in English, plans for more languages will be announced in future.

✿ What AI is used in Volareo?

For the AI voice assistant, we combine several AI voice assistant engines. Likewise with cross-language engines. This makes Volareo truly unique in its approach to combine the best of the best, a very decentralized technical solution. AI is also used in music recognition, music recommendation, personalization from various partners such as Gracenote, Raven Protocol and more.

✿ What music blockchain platforms are integrated with Volareo?

Musicoin, Emanate, Choon, Soundeon, and we are in talks with more.

✿ Does Volareo play music from Spotify, Deezer, TIDAL, Youtube too?

You can play music from any music source with your phone on Volareo via bluetooth

✿ Can I really buy crypto with my voice on Volareo?

Yes, you can really buy crypto with your voice, small amounts for every day use. When the amounts are bigger, identification will be required. You can set up your Volareo to only recognize your voice for payments and shopping.

✿ How can I help the Volareo Movement?
  • Purchase one or more Volareo speakers
  • Tell your friends & family in meetups, family gatherings
  • Share on social media
  • Join our FB Ambassador Group, Telegram Group
  • Volunteer
  • Musicians: Release your music on blockchain with one of our partners Musicoin, Emanate, Choon, Soundeon
  • Developer: Get ready to build the Voice Decentralized Apps
  • Crypto : HODL :) Tell everyone about real world use case of crypto with Volareo, and how it should be simple for everyone. Let’s make crypto common.
✿ How can I (and my business / startup) be a Volareo Partner?

Send us a message on Comments Page, or reach out to us on hello@volareo.live. You’ll find us truly decentralized in spirit, and we absolutely love partnerships.

✿ Got an Idea?

If you have an idea of something you’d like to use your Volareo for - app, game, story, podcast or service eg. have your Volareo tell you crypto prices every hour, or tell you how the Indiegogo campaign you backed is doing :) … make sure you tell us in the comments page after you’ve pledged! Thanks!

Say hello to Volareo. Say Hello to an Open Future.

If you have any questions and would like to speak to us, please do not hesitate to contact us using one of the ways mentioned below:

  • volareo.live our main website
  • volareo on facebook our facebook page
  • volareo fb ambassador group our ambassador facebook group
  • volareo on telegram our main Telegram channel
  • volareo on messenger our fb messenger

story:
Not too old to innovate is my motto. I have enjoyed decades of professional, entrepeneural, and grandfather carreers. I have degrees in Mechanical Engineering and Systems Management. I hold a number of US patents. Now I am passionate regarding my latest project. My mission is to bring the beauty of the ocean and music from modern gadgets into homes. 

 

Shelldhwani speakers use natural shape and contour of the shell body to amplify audio signals. There is no external power to boost the sound level. Each units designed, hand crafted, and assembled in Massachusetts. These speakers are 12-16" tall and have beautiful kashmiri design box base and accoustically compatible stand.These speakers combine the technology and design for listening pleasure. Generally, the larger the shell, the better the amplification.

 

I seek to raise $10000.00 to create customized jigs for the production process and for design work for the stand. My engineering training would help me deliver these to the indiegogo supporters. Prototypes are ready, tested and written up in the media. Shelldheani video captures the concepts and experience. The assembly logistics are in place for quaality production. These units are hand crafted in USA for devices including iPod and iPhone.

 

I invite support from Indiegogo communinity. I offfer the following unique perks:

1.  Kashmiri Paper Mache Powder box. Select from square and round shape. 

 

2. One Shelldhwani speaker with your choice of large seashell. Select from Melo Melo, Tonna Oleria, and Natural Nautilus shell.

 

 Melo Melo shell Shelldhwani Speaker

 

 Tona Olearia Shellshelldhwani speaker

 

Natural Nautilus Shell Shelldhwani

 

 

3. A set of Shelldhwani spekers made of large Australian Trumpet shells.

 

        

 

Press

Shelldhwani at PopStart

Article in Echoes of LBI – Pg 50
 
 

‘Shelldhwani’ Speakers Amplify Nature’s Beauty

 

Article in Echos of LBI Spring Issue 2012 Pg 42

story:
Hello world! My name is Kelly-James, and I'm an aspiring audio engineer here in the beautiful city of Boston, Massachusetts.

I've always loved music since a young age. Ever since I was old enough to carry a Walkman, I've been listening to music non-stop. Whether it was riding the bus to school, walking in between classes, or driving in the car with my parents, I always had headphones on listening to my latest favorite band. In college, I studied audio, but these learning opportunities lacked the hands-on experience I needed. I searched far and wide for other educational programs to help me take my passion for audio to the next level, and that's when I found Plaid Dog's Apprentice Program.

This IndieGoGo campaign is the final step toward gaining the skills I need to pursue that dream career -- and with your help, I know I can make this a reality.

This campaign is raising funds for my apprenticeship at Plaid Dog Recording, where I would be learning from and working with Mike Davidson, a Boston-based producer, and engineer with 15+ years of experience working with both established and up-and-coming musicians.

One of the things I'm most excited about is just how hands-on this program would be, which is the quickest, best way to learn this trade. So many schools make students wait for years to touch any equipment or make their own recordings, but Plaid Dog cuts right to the chase. My apprenticeship would include the following components to help me enter the working world as an audio professional:

1. One-on-one training workshops: Plaid Dog's training program consists of 20 comprehensive lessons taught in one-on-one workshops, which keeps this personal, tailored to me, and hands-on. This is where I get to work with Mike and his knowledgeable engineering staff and really hone my skills on a variety of important topics.

2. Assisting on real recording sessions: I might be most excited about this part! Perhaps the coolest thing about this apprenticeship is that Plaid Dog puts me to work straight away when I start the program -- and, I GET PAID for my time assisting on sessions, which means from day 1, I get to put "Plaid Dog Assistant" on my resume. How cool is that? This is exactly what I need to start my career.

3. Hands-on recording labs: This is where I get hands-on opportunities with Plaid Dog's awesome gear, and get to work with actual bands to practice my recording skills. I can't stress how huge this is -- with audio, things don't really click until you can apply this stuff with your own hands in a real setting.

And what will you get for your generosity and support? So many awesome things!

I'm so appreciative and grateful for any support you can lend to this campaign. In exchange for your generosity, I've put together a really exciting group of gifts that are available exclusively through your participation in this campaign. Check out some examples below and a full list to the right!



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It's hard to express how much this project would change my life.

I’ve always wanted to work in music in some fashion but for a long time I struggled to know what route to take. Working and recording with artists that are dedicated and passionate about their craft has always been a dream of mine, and it didn’t always seem like it would be possible. Over the years, I’ve idolized guys like Matt Squire, Mike Sapone, and more recently Will Yip. They are some of the producers who were recording some of my favorite bands of all time and they have inspired me to be a part of the musical projects of artists who I care about, just like they were.

In the past, I attended New England Institute of Art for Audio Engineering but never received the hands-on experience I felt was necessary to break into the audio world. After leaving school and working in construction for a number of years, I’m ready to get back to working in the music industry that I love and is my passion.

With this Apprenticeship, Plaid Dog will help me develop the skills necessary to make high-quality recordings and help young artists get to their next step. This unique opportunity will not only give me the education I need, but will also provide real working experience with real musicians! This experience will help me to start my own studio one day, creating a musical community that I love and respect. This will be a big leap for me professionally and I can’t thank you enough for helping me get there!

If you're ready to contribute, choose a perk or just click the pink "Back It" button on the top right of this page! Every little bit counts, and I'm so grateful for all your support.

If you've got folks in your network that would be interested in supporting me please help get the word out and make some noise! There are social media share buttons on this page, and please tell your friends how grateful I am for this support.

Thank you so much for checking out my campaign page. I can't wait to take this big step towards a bright future.

AS full touch TWS Bluetooth headset, your music partner.

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930757823528497154

 

Headset and charging cabin all functions through touch is completed, the real full touch experience.

Top CSR chip, steady and fluent

Reliability is an essential quality of a Bluetooth wireless headset.

ASTWS has embedded top-quality CSR Bluetooth chip, which is manufactured in England and known for its stability and fluency.

It not only supports steady and low-power Bluetooth link but also provides a great experience of stereo with high fidelity.

High quality CSR64110 chip, surround sound more fidelity, CVC6.0 noise reduction is more clear and more healthy environmental protection emission power.

Long standby, cast life master.

 

The all-match sound source selection

Regardless of whether it is an Android or iOS phone or any other equipment of a different sound source, as long as it supports Bluetooth®4.2.0 protocol or below, it can link to ASTWS steadily and quickly.

The mainstream of Bluetooth 4.2 connection technology, signal connection more stable and longer transmission distance.

The explosion-proof steel shell lithium battery, more and more healthy environmental protection, to prevent all kinds of problems caused by battery drum kits, keep you safe and secure experience.

 

Mini storage box for the charger that is convenient for carrying

ASTWS is easily portable and you can enjoy music anytime as you wish, thus taking care of issues such as “headset’s out of charge, losing or inconvenience for carrying.”

The design module and a storage box integrated charging, built-in 700MAH battery, rechargeable 4-5.

It adopts 8mm copper ring dynamic speaker, high quality without distortion, restore the real quality.

Customized 8.0-mm enhanced vocal unit for professional auditory experience

The “double-diagram structural vocal unit,”customized by ASTWS, is powerful, and offers better tone quality and richer surround stereo field.

It further brings you real professional auditory experience.

CVC6.0 noise reduction technology, to help you get rid of noise disturbance.

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930757991632060416

 

It has Automatic Noise Cancellation function with good quality music performance.

ASTWS uses the six-generation CVC double-omnidirectional noise reduction microphone. Even if you make a call in a noisy environment, for example, a concert, your voice will be as clear as that in a quite environment.

The subversion of the advanced operation technology, to achieve full touch volume control, switch songs such as advanced features.

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/930758142031310849

 

Support calls to remind, voice reporting function, release your hands.

 

Product Details​

 

Application Scenarios

 

Product Parameter

 

Quality Certification

 

What is in the box

The Marking of ASTWS

Factory real photos

 

 

 

Team

 

We are a professional Bluetooth headset manufacturer integrating design, R & D, production and sales. We have an elite R & D team.

 

Adhering to the mission of satisfying customers, we are committed to providing industry-leading high-quality Bluetooth headset products for global customers.

 

We always uphold the integrity, innovation, efficiency, win-win business philosophy, absorb new ideas, strictly control the quality, full service tracking, really wireless stereo Bluetooth headset provides the high quality and high price for consumers.

story:
Truly Wireless Earphones (i.e Airpods, Earin) are extremely convenient gadgets. You can listen to your music on the go without struggling with tangled wires. Yet, TWS earphones come with their own set of problems:

1) Fall out of your ears easily as they do not fit all ear types. . 

2) Suffer from a short battery life of roughly 3-4 hours. Their battery life cannot last a full day without being charged.

3) To make things worse, TWS earphones requires a charging case to charge. This means that the user have to wait for it to be charged before using it again. It can be frustrating especially when TWS earphones' battery life is so short.

              

Named after the inventor of bluetooth, Jaap Haartsen, Jaap's revolutionary technology overcomes these problems to give you the benefit of truly wireless sound.

The behind-the-ear hook design ensures it stays secure during your toughest workout                      regardless of your ear size.

             

To cater to people with different ear canals, JAAP comes with Spinfit silicon tips. Spinfit silicon tips is the world’s first 360 degree rotating eartip. It greatly enhances comfort levels as it can go deeper into your ear canal.

              

  

The behind the ear design enables us to put a larger capacity battery. Thus, JAAP has a battery life of 6 hours, almost double the battery life of existing TWS earphones.

              

                             JAAP's portable charger lets you listen to your music while charging.

              

                              

     

Developed for activities under any conditions, its IPX5 rating helps it to endure through rain, water and sweat.

                      

      

  • 3 pairs of SpinFit tips
  • 3 pairs of silicon tips
  • 1 pair of foam tips
  • 1 portable charger

  • Bluetooth Chipset: Bluetooth 4.2 CSR64110
  • Driver: 11mm Dynamic Driver 
  • Battery capacity: 90 mah 
  • Portable battery charger capacity: 
  • Music playback time: 6 hours ( 14 hours with battery charger)
  • Talking time: 7 hours (15 hours with battery charger) 
  • Charging port: Micro USB Type B 
  • Build in microphone: Yes 
  • Microphone sensitivity: -38 dB
  • Supports Multipoint: Yes
  • Supports HD hands-free: Yes
  • Battery status on IOS devices: Yes 

We have been in the portable audio industry for 6 years. We specialize in selling portable audio products from China via our eCommerce website (www.lendmeurears.com). In 2015, we opened our first retail store in Singapore. 2015 was also the same year we launched our house brand, Alpha & Delta. Our aim is to create and provide more value for money products to our customers. Under the Alpha & Delta brand, we have launched two products: the dual dynamic AD01 earphones and the D2 budget sports earphones.

In 2015, we also launched our house brand, Alpha n Delta to provide more value for money products to our customers. Under the Alpha & Delta brand, we have already launched 2 products: the dual dynamic AD01 earphones and the D2 budget sports earphones. 

Alpha & Delta AD01

Alpha & Delta D2

story:
Why RNFs?

If you have ever owned a pair of earbuds, chances are, you've dealt with the frustration of having to replace them at least once. We recently had the opportunity to attend the largest consumer electronics show in Las Vegas, CES. There, we conducted several live polls and found that from thousands of participants, 100% of them had broken at least one pair of earbuds. While that might not be representative of the entire earbud-owning population, the fact remains: earbuds break all the time.

After producing several models of earphones and doing extensive analysis, we have noticed that there is something missing from the current market: affordable, super-durable earbuds with a lifetime warranty. We decided to create something new. Something stronger... Something reinforced. Thus, the AudiOHM RNFs were born.

Some companies offer earbuds that come with a one year warranty. Maybe two years, if you’re lucky. But what is the point of that warranty if you have to go through the hassle of getting a replacement pair every month when they inevitably break? With the AudiOHM RNFs, we aim to fix that problem once and for all. Not only are we providing you with a LIFETIME of support, we have made these earbuds so durable that you won’t have to use it!


What Makes Them So Special?

Every aspect of our Patent Pending AudiOHM RNFs were specifically designed to target the main areas of damage in ordinary earbuds.

  • The Patent Pending driver housings are constructed from a tough aluminum alloy

  • At 3mm, the Patent Pending cable is 3-5x thicker than average earbuds

  • The Patent Pending Y connector and audio plug are filled with a super dense solid injection molding and encased in a protective, flexible silicone overlay

  • The Patent Pending inner cable is constructed with aramid fiber which is used in aerospace and military applications like body armor


How Do They Sound?

When it comes to sound quality, we did not skimp on the RNFs. We put just as much focus on sound quality as we did on durability. After all, what’s the point of having a pair of earbuds for life if they don’t sound great?

The three sizes of silicone ear gels provide a customized fit for each individual user. The snug, secure fit provides a flush seal for your ears, enabling ambient noise isolation for uninterrupted audio in any situation. We used neodymium magnetic components for high performance/cost ratio and product quality uniformity. Ultra responsive cone allows for dynamic, full range audio with crisp highs, rich midrange and booming bass.

  • Speaker Power: (3mW x 2) 6mW RMS

  • Driver: 9mm

  • Impedance: 18 Ohms

  • Sensitivity: 98±3dB

  • Frequency Response: 20Hz-20KHz


About Us

A lifetime warranty doesn’t mean much coming from a brand new business. Fortunately, GOgroove has been selling earbuds, headphones, Bluetooth speakers and other audio equipment since 1980. Since then, we have expanded significantly and we now sell through portals like Amazon, ebay, Newegg, WalMart, Staples, Fry’s Electronics, Office Depot, and Best Buy. Articles and reviews for our products can be found websites like CNET, Kotaku, Gizmodo, Lifehacker, The WireCutter, Techradar and Engadget.


We have successfully been providing a three year warranty on all of our GOgroove products for the last 35 years. After having been in business for over three decades, we are confident enough to offer our customers a lifetime warranty they can rely on. GOgroove is established enough to provide you with the assurance that comes with any lifetime warranty, yet small enough to give you the personal customer care that the larger companies can’t offer.


Why We Need You

We use some of the highest quality components available to produce the AudiOHM RNFs. These specialized materials and their molds are expensive. Your contributions will help us maintain the high quality of our construction materials and continue testing for newer, even stronger ones.

The lifetime warranty aspect is a new area for our company. You will be supporting our ability to maintain that promise to you.

Most importantly, when you contribute here on Indiegogo, it gives you the opportunity to communicate with us directly so you can share thoughts and ideas to help us improve our product! Not to mention you are guaranteed to be the first owners of our brand new lifetime warranty AudiOHM RNF Earbuds!


If you have any questions, concerns or ideas, please do not hesitate to contact me directly at trevor.m@accessorypower.com

Thank you!

story:
Click Here to Learn About Our Rewards Program - Share and Get Money Back


WristBoom is the smallest and lightest Bluetooth speaker on the market allowing you to take a phone call or simply jam your tunes.

Great sound quality and simple elegant functionality, WristBoom could be the most fun you’ve had with a speaker in quite a long time.





Streaming music through your phone doesn't mean you're out of reach. 

WristBoom will switch to call mode with the touch of a button when a call comes in, and resume playing when you're done.



Powerful Sound, Small Speaker

Music lovers can rejoice and say goodbye to wires, equipment, manuals, and low-quality sound. Engineered to provide the best sound with the smallest speaker, Wristboom has a 4 Ohm 2 Watt speaker that blasts 20HZ - 20KHZ.


Pairing WristBoom Is Simple

Pair in seconds with Smart Bluetooth 3.0. Forget the wires, the docks – the only connection will be you with your audio. With WristBoom wireless you can always count on a hassle free music experience. 



Charging WristBoom Is Easy

Connect the micro-tip cable to WristBoom Plug the USB power cable into the USB outlet on your computer. A red light will emit from the USB connection, light will go out when WristBoom is charged.


Long Range Bluetooth 3.0

With a range of up to 30 feet, Wristboom can rock whatever space you're in without having to be near your source. Easily connect Wristboom to your smartphone, tablet, smart TV, or any other Bluetooth enabled audio output device.

Pairing WristBoom Is SimplePair in seconds with Smart Bluetooth 3.0. Forget the wires, the docks – the only connection will be you with your audio. With WristBoom wireless you can always count on a hassle free music experience. Charging WristBoom Is EasyConnect the micro-tip cable to WristBoom Plug the USB power cable into the USB outlet on your computer. A red light will emit from the USB connection, light will go out when WristBoom is charged.Long Range Bluetooth 3.0With a range of up to 30 feet, Wristboom can rock whatever space you're in without having to be near your source. Easily connect Wristboom to your smartphone, tablet, smart TV, or any other Bluetooth enabled audio output device.

story:
Never miss conversations again while watching your favorite TV programs. Simply attach TVSoundScoopZ and instantly get better sound!

Customer Satisfaction Rating: 99.6% Positive.  TVSoundScoopZ work as advertised! 

TVSoundScoopZ are Patented (U.S. Patent No. 9,583,092)

TV Sound ScoopZ are in production and available for immediate delivery. 

 
THE PROBLEM

TV manufacturers aim the speakers down rather than towards the viewer, creating the problem of muffled voices and missed conversations. These include the majors (Sony, Panasonic, Sharp, Vizio, Samsung, RCA, Toshiba, LG, JVC, Hitachi,  Emerson, Magnavox,  Sanyo, Westinghouse and more). 

This muffled voice problem has been well documented by CNET, PC World, Bloomberg, Forbes and other media sources. TVSoundScoopZ solves this audio problem, so you don't have to buy an expensive soundbar or speaker system, unless you choose to.

 

 

 

 

Solution-The Beginning

One evening while watching TV my wife picked up a magazine from beneath our TV and immediately I noticed an improvement in the sound quality and the voices were very clear. At that moment a SOLUTION to the Problem came to mind. Aka, the "Light Bulb" went on!

 

 

Once we realized we could fix the problem many shapes and materials were tested. Every test resulted in improved TV sound quality and we knew we were on to something BIG!

After filing the Patents and Trademarks, we consulted with Audio Engineers. They helped with the design, materials selection and concluded that TV Sound ScoopZ are the affordable Solution for improving voice quality of factory TV speakers.

Made in USA - 100% Recyclable Material

 

TV Sound ScoopZ are custom made in the USA using 100% recyclable materials and packaging. SoundScoopZ are each 10.25" Long x 5.5" High x 2" Deep.

 

 

TV Sound ScoopZ easily attach to any wall mounted or pedestal TVs using the Velcro strips provided with each set. Velcro allows for easy adjustment and leveling.

 

 

 

 

Never miss conversation again while watching your favorite TV programs. Simply attach TV Sound ScoopZ and instantly enjoy improved TV voice quality and clarity.

Standard Independent Test Results = A+ rating

Independent test results show that the factory TV speaker's clarity is improved to an A+ (Excellent) with TVSoundScoopZ, compared to a B (Average) without the product attached. The Speech Transmission Index (STI) is the standard test that measures all Public Address Systems.

 

 

 

Assembly and Fulfillment

We have partnered with Opportunity Village (opportunityvillage.org) for our assembly and fulfillment. They are the largest non-profit, employer of people with handicaps and disabilities. They provide a variety of packaging, assembly and promotional services to most of the major hotel groups and hotel chains in Las Vegas and for-profit businesses throughout the US. This partnership is a privilege for us, since we are helping provide jobs and a meaningful life for people with limited skills.

 

 

 

Support and Sharing

Thank you for ordering your TVSoundScoopZ so you can fully enjoy your favorite TV programs! Please share this exciting project with ALL your friends. If you have a Facebook page, please LIKE and SHARE SoundScoopZ, follow us on twitter @tvsoundscoopz and ask your friends to do the same. 

TVSoundScoopZ make a great, unique gift for the holidays, birthdays, anniversaries, or any other occasion. 

 

Goals and objectives


$30,000+

Will allow us to build larger molds, thus keeping pace with our growing demand for TVSoundScoopZ.

$40,000+

Will enable us to more than double our production capacity and have sufficient inventory available for all of our retailers and just-in-time shipments.

 

 

Risks and challenges

With any manufacturing and distribution endeavor there will be issues. However, we are experienced in setting realistic goals, solving problems, pivoting and making running changes, implementing these decisions and keeping the process moving. Our goal is producing a quality product, with on time delivery schedules and providing first class customer service.

 

 

FAQs - TV Sound ScoopZ

 

Q. Have TV SoundScoopZ been independently tested?

A. Yes. An independent Speech Transmission Index (STI) test concluded that TV SoundScoopZ™ improved the voice quality and clarity of TV speakers significantly.

The test results showed that TV speakers with TVSoundScoopZ™ rated A+ compared to a B grade without SoundScoopZ™.  

Q. Will TVSoundScoopZ™ void the TV warranty?

A. No. TVSoundScoopZ™ do not interfere with the power source, electronics, connections, cables or signal. They simply attach to the back of the TV at each speaker location.

Q. Do TVSoundScoopZ™ “amplify” sound of the TV speakers?

A. Yes and No. Yes, because TVSoundScoopZ™ direct the mid and upper frequency sound (voice ranges) towards the viewer, instead of down and the volume control “seems” like it has been increased. No, TVSoundScoopZ™ are not electronic. 

Q. Are TVSoundScoopZ™ Guaranteed.

A. Yes. TVSoundScoopZ™ are guaranteed against workman’s defects. If you are not satisfied with TVSoundScoopZ™, we will gladly refund your purchase price (less a 20% restocking fee) once the TVSoundScoopZ™ are returned, inspected and approved by our Quality Control Department. Contact us at info@soundscoopz.com to obtain an RMA # prior to sending TVSoundScoopZ™ for inspection and approval.

Q. Why does voice quality and clarity diminish with distance from the TV?

A. There are two issues. One, if the speakers are aimed down voices are not crisp or clear. Two, mid and upper frequencies diminish more rapidly with distance compared to lower (Bass) frequencies.

Q. Is sound quality the same for everyone’s hearing?

A.  No. Generally, speaker quality is subjective according the CEDIA, Custom Electronic Design Industry Association.

Q. How do TVSoundScoopZ™ improve the quality of the TV speakers?

A. The patented angles, shapes, curves, dimensions, material and application improve the direction and distance of the mid and upper frequency sound emitted from the existing/factory TV speakers. TVSoundScoopZ™ improves the listening pleasure since voices are now clear, crisp and not muffled.

 
  •

story:
The multi-functional, Eco-friendly, energy saving, Bluetooth-enabled, LED bulb with a high quality, built-in speaker.

_________________________________

(and it's cute!)


REMEMBER WHEN THE CLAPPER WAS THE

EASIEST-TO-OPERATE, HI-TECH GADGET IN YOUR HOME?

WE'RE GIVING THE CLAPPER A RUN FOR ITS MONEY.

Make a sound, smart decision to set the mood in your home, like the kitchen, bathroom, outdoor patio, garage, basement, or your office, with high quality Bluetooth-enabled, sound and LED lighting.  

Get all 3 colors in the Trio perk.

 

       

  
  1. Eco-Smart   Long life bulbs last up to 100,000 hours.
  2. Energy-Smart  Low energy consumption, low working temperatures.
  3. Efficiency-Smart  Wireless sound in every room using the space occupied by your current light fixtures.
  4. Everywhere-Smart   Use in personal residences, hotels, restaurants, offices, shopping malls. 
  5. Everyone-Smart  Easy to use with Bluetooth-enabled devices like a PC, tablet, phone or other audio devices.  
  6. Epic-Smart  Engineered with optical non-glare technology, unique design, and the leading sound photoelectric technology in the system.  
  7. Gift-Smart  A unique housewarming gift for friends and family.

                                      

Why Sound?

Our house is a rental house.  We do not have the know-how to install built-in speakers without doing damage that would be difficult to repair.  In the past, wires would be strung under rugs, and over curtains to reach the distant speakers.  To connect the PC to the TV to watch a movie, we have to use a little Bluetooth speaker for the audio portion.  Everybody jostles for the best position to hear and the volume just doesn't seem consistent.  Then the speaker gets misplaced, and everyone has to hunt for it.  Frustration led to a prototypes for the LED SoundSmart Bulb.  We have ended the speaker wars!  Or, so we thought. 

Our 14-year old took it out of the living room lamp and put it into the bathroom fixture so she could listen to it while she showered!  So we need to perfect the prototype to place one in each room. 
  
It's is easy to install, just screw it into a standard light socket and turn on the switch; you will have both energy saving LED lighting and high quality sound by syncing with your Bluetooth device to the LED bulb. 

Portable!  No wires to run, no speakers to install on your walls.  When you move, just unscrew the bulbs and take them with you to your new location.  These SoundSmart bulbs have a long lifetime expectancy, so you will enjoy them for many years. 

Why LED?

Flying over the country at night, we realized that the amount of energy being sucked up by regular incandescent bulbs in our field of vision was astronomical.  How many millions of energy-sucking light bulbs are currently in use?   People want to save energy, and LED lights is one very effective way to achieve exactly that. 

We are committed to producing the highest quality products. The differences between LED lights varied as we researched the latest technology, the next generation, state-of-the-art bulbs.  There are bulbs that last 10,000 hours and those that last 100,000 hours.  Our bulbs last up to 100,000 hours!  That is over 11 years of use.  Imagine the difference that would make in a 24/7 lit up parking garage or shopping mall. 

This could be the last bulb you ever purchase. 

Consider This...

  • LEDs are safer because they operate at much lower temperatures.
  • They contain no mercury.
  • They do not produce any ultraviolet (UV) light.
  • They light instantly at full brightness, with no warm-up time.
  • They emit a much higher percentage of light in a desired direction.

                                     


Long-lasting -

LED bulbs have an outstanding lifetime expectancy of up to 100,000 hours.


Energy Efficient -

LED lighting is 70-90% more efficient, which saves energy, saves money and saves the environment. 


Eco Friendly -

LED bulbs are free of toxic materials and emit zero UV emissions.


Durable -

LED bulbs are built with high quality materials, and are very durable.


                                           

You are surrounded by bulbs that need to be replaced!

We are asking for your support and offering you several perk packages so that you can start using this product in your home or office. 

We are also working on other smart products that will be ready to go in the near future.  Thank you for your support and enjoy your new eco-friendly, LED SoundSmart Bulb and Speaker.

LED bulbs are built with high quality materials, and are very durable.                                            
You are surrounded by bulbs that need to be replaced! story:
A Brief History of Enforcer

The Jim Yoshii Pile-Up played their last show on Valentine's Day 2006 at the Great American Music Hall in San Francisco. Soon after the group disbanded, I decided to continue making music on my own under the name Baby Panda. I worked on my solo debut for a little over a year,  getting help from my amazingly talented cousin Josiah Feinberg, virtuoso multi-instrumentalist and all-around-good-guy Will Wilcox, and production wizard Chad Imes, releasing it on July 17, 2007. The album, titled Enforcer, consisted of several songs that had been written for The Jim Yoshii Pile-Up's aborted fourth album, as well as many old songs from various periods of the previous ten years that I reworked. 

I took the cover photograph at Bennington College in Vermont during a Jim Yoshii Pile-Up U.S. tour sometime between 2003 and 2005. Bennington College gave the band the entire alumni house to stay in overnight after the show, and it was a huge house, so each band member got his own room to sleep in. Needless to say, this is not what normally happens for bands of JYPU's stature. Most nights we would huddle on floors of friends' or well-wisher's houses or in hotel rooms meant for two people. I wanted to remember that night and Bennington College's generosity, so in the morning as I was leaving the room I had slept in the night before, I snapped a picture of my (rudely unmade) bed. Once I got the pictures developed (these were the days of film), I felt like the light in the photo was striking and that the photo was evocative of something more than just the good night's sleep I had gotten, so I decided to use the photo for the cover of my debut solo album, Enforcer.

Vinyl Pressing

For the 10th anniversary pressing of Enforcer, I'll be going through Gotta Groove Records in Ohio, which comes highly recommended from a couple different sources. The pressing will be on random-colored vinyl with stamped labels and a full color jacket, under my own name rather than Baby Panda, as I've done with all my albums since Comfort. I've decided to keep the same photograph I originally used for the cover. The record will come with a lyrics zine that includes commentary on each track.

As a part of the 10th anniversary package, I'll be releasing "Kevin Decline" as a single with b-sides digitally and on a 7" lathe cut. I will also be pressing an 8" lathe cut with live in-studio versions of Enforcer songs. These lathe cuts will be limited to a numbered edition of 25 each. Additionally, there will be a special Enforcer t-shirt with an interpretation of the cover photo by artist Jonathan Bell Wolfe.

Rewards

  • $6 mp3s of the album and "Kevin Decline" single
  • $15 mp3s of the album and single, and a 7" lathe cut of the "Kevin Decline" single
  • $25 vinyl pressing of Enforcer on random-colored vinyl, plus mp3s of the album and single. The vinyl includes a lyrics zine with commentary on each of the tracks.
  • $40 Deluxe Edition: Enforcer vinyl, plus the 7" lathe cut single, Enforcer CD, 11x17 poster, and mp3s of demos and outtakes from the album
  • $60 Deluxe Lathe Edition: everything from the Deluxe Edition plus an 8" lathe cut of live in-studio performances of Enforcer tracks
  • $85 Deluxe Skype Package: includes everything from the Deluxe Lathe Edition plus a 20-minute Skype live show just for you, handwritten lyrics to any song of your choice from my entire catalog, a t-shirt designed by artist Jonathan Bell Wolfe, and a thank you in the vinyl credits.
  • $115 Test Pressing Package: includes everything from the Deluxe Skype Package plus a test pressing of Enforcer and a handwritten thank you note and drawing by me.
  • $125 Ful Physical Catalog Package: includes everything from the Deluxe Skype Package, plus my full physical catalog, including CDs of all my albums, vinyl of Avalanche Kiss and Anything At All Forever, and all three lathe cuts I've pressed.
  • $800 Picks Us Apart Original Artwork Package: includes everything from the Test Pressing Package plus one of the five original paintings used in the artwork for Picks Us Apart. Paintings vary in size, but are small oil paintings by me on hand-built maple boxes that were overlaid with drawings of butterflies on the inside of the Picks Us Apart artwork. If you're interested in this package, email me, and I'll send you photos of the paintings. If you purchase, you'll have your choice of one of the five paintings, first come, first served.
  • $1250 U.S. House Show Package: everything from the Test Pressing Package plus a show at your/a friend's house in your town. Price includes airfare and hotel for me.
  • $3000 Worldwide House Show Package: includes everything from the Test Pressing Package plus a house show anywhere in the world (except war zones). Price includes airfare and hotel for me.

story:
HI INDIEGOGO WE ARE BACK! 

 

After three widely successful crowdfunding campaigns, nearly a hundred thousands units sold, and three groundbreaking products in our portfolio, we are back in action with our most innovative headphones yet"

In a world where headphones are made from bulky and plasticky design, we, at EOZ decided to create a unique over the ear headphone that couples long-lasting and noble materials in a luxurious and premium package.

The Eoz Arc features a slick yet eye catching design. Built from materials such as Aluminum, stainless steel and vegan leather. With no detail overlooked, the Arc is definitely standing apart in the Audio world.

We've come up with our in-house aluminum alloy chemically and structurally very similar to the one used in the aerospace industry, specially designed for the ultimate audio experience. This allows the EOZ Arc to deliver a detailed and colorful soundscape, exceptionally natural that makes you hear your music exactly as the artist intended.

 

 

 

We use the latest Qualcomm Chipset QCC 3005 compatible with APTX codec to enjoy a true HiFi experience wire-free. 

While commuting or simply relaxing nothing is as precious as a quiet environment. The EOZ Arc has been designed to deliver a high performance Active Noise Cancellation, thanks to its chipset module that mirrors and tunes down the external noise.

A stylish headphone is nothing without proper comfort of wearing. The cushions of the EOZ Arc are constructed of memory foam, which insulates your ears with a perfect fit so nothing but the purest sound reaches your ear. The vegan leather on the outer part of the cushions stays cooler than traditional cushions to prevent sweat and any kind of discomfort.

 

The SUPER LIGHT WEIGHT aluminium headband features a pressure pattern that makes it ideal for long listening sessions.

 

 

Trigger Siri, Google Assistant, Alexa and Bixby by the push of a button, it's as simple as that.

 

 

90% of our competitors offering headphones at this price point use the Bluetooth 4.2 technology.

It might seem like a technicality but Bluetooth 5 is much, much faster than Bluetooth 4. It also needs much less energy to offer twice more bandwidth and 4 times the range.

Our goal was truly to make an object that you will keep over the years which is why the EOZ ARC is USB-C compatible, so you can juice it up with any of your chargers. We also added a 3.5mm jack so you can enjoy the EOZ Arc wired as well!

The EOZ ARC provides 25 hours on a single charge, that's literally :

  • -LA-Paris flight round trip
  • -Two weeks of music playback 
  • -the time you took to download an album 20 years ago

 

The EOZ Arc is compatible with all your devices that use the Bluetooth Technology:

  • Android devices (phones, tablets, smartwatches)
  • iOS devices (iPhones, iPads, Apple Watch)
  • Windows computers
  • macOS computers
  • VR Headsets
  • Smart TVs

story:
DADS (who we are)

DADS is a fan inspired audio/visual collaboration between Charles Caswell of the band Berried Alive, and Lucas Mann of the band Rings of Saturn. We decided to develop this collaboration because of an overwhelming flood of messages from fans telling us that we have very similar styles of music and need to collaborate with each other.

Charles Caswell is the guitarist, singer, songwriter, and producer of the band Berried Alive. Berried Alive is known for technical instrumentation, emotional lyrics, and chaotic, sometimes sadistic guitars, and is a pure expression of Charles's musical point of view.

CLICK TO CHECK OUT BERRIED ALIVE

Lucas Mann is the guitarist, keyboardist, programmer, producer, and founder of the band Rings of Saturn. Rings of Saturn's music features a highly technical style heavily influenced by themes of alien life and outer space. They have released four full-length albums, with their third, Lugal Ki En, released in 2014 and peaking at 126 on the American Billboard 200 chart, and their most recent album Ultu Ulla landing at 76 on the American Billboard 200 chart. 

CLICK TO CHECK OUT RINGS OF SATURN

Goals

  • Record and release the craziest team shred collaboration album
  • Develop a funny and entertaining animation series based on two shredder dads. One being an Alien (Al), and the other is a Strawberry (Berry)

Meet Berry

Berry is a DAD from our developing universe. He loves guitar, beer, yard work, and magic tricks.

Meet Al

Al (short for Alien) is a DAD from our developing universe. He loves guitar, coffee, grilling food, and space exploration.

We have a list of some of your favorite musicians in mind to perform on our solo album, and we also plan on having some special guests make appearances as animated characters in our DADS cartoon series! This will truly be something unique to give to the metal community! 

We have an animation music video of our single, a guitar play through of us performing the song, and an official audio stream of the song for your listening pleasure. You can check all these out directly below! 

DADS ANIMATION MUSIC VIDEO

DADS GUITAR PLAYTHROUGH

DADS OFFICIAL AUDIO STREAM

 

WE NEED YOUR HELP

As you can see, have already invested a ton of time and effort in producing our first song, and animation video. We do have a storyline outlined for our animated series, but WE NEED YOUR HELP to make it happen!  

We are trying to raise at least $30,000 to cover our album's production cost, as well as the cost to produce our musical cartoon series to its fullest possible potential.

What we both have in common is that when we put our minds to something, we want to make it the best it possibly can be. We really want to contribute something special and unique to the world of music.

YOUR PERKS

We have provided a lot of perks for you, as well as some great opportunities to become a big part of this experience with us. You can even become a character in our animation series! 

Reaching our goal is absolutely crucial to make this happen. If we do not reach our goal, we simply won't be able to give this the full love it needs to become real. This has to be done how we have envisioned it. 

We have teamed up with Indiemerchstore to assure that all the merchandise orders will be fulfilled in a timely manner. 

 

 

We are offering perks for our fans that are into music production. We have two tone packs that are close or identical to the guitar and bass tones we use on our full length album, they will be available for the Kemper Profiling Amp, and the Line 6 POD HD500X.  

Processed stems will be available from our full length album as well! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that some people can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean they can't help!

If you believe in this project, but can't support it financially, it would still help us a lot if you share our vision with your friends, and everyone you think would want to see our project come to life.

Your support truly means the universe to us. Thank you for hearing us out. 

Sincerely,

DADS

story:
Short Summary

Bethel Apostloic Church Ministries is a small church with a big vision for the Lord and a passion for souls. We would like to take our church on a short trip to Branson, Mo to visit the Sight & Sound Theatres in August 2013.
We need your help to sponsor some of the families in our church that would not be able to go other wise.
We thank you for your prayers and help.

What We Need & What You Get

We would like to raise $10,500.00 by sponsor. This will help pay for forty church members to have hotel and tickets to the Sight & Sound Theatre this summer. Your help will give this families the opportunity enjoy a two day vacation in a spiritually up lifting environment.

We are a small church but prayer and thank you is always free and so we give it freely.

Even if our goal is not reached we will try to sponcor who we can with the funds we raise.

The Impact

People love to feel that they are loved and are a part of something. If we could just help some one to know that they are love by God and that we are all apart of His great familiy then my goal will be reached.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Get the word out, make some noise about this trip and pray for Bethel Aposolic Church Ministries
  • We remind  to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And thank you for your time!

story:
A compact autonomous digital guitar with 15 standard-sized frets, adjustable tension steel strings, ¼” and ⅛” audio jacks, a bunch of onboard tones, and a true rock’n’roll feel

 

Due to a detachable neck, Jammy easily fits into most of the backpacks and complies with the airlines carry-on regulations. 

Just take it out, lock two pieces together, and you’re ready to rock -- we call it lock’n’roll! 

Jammy will quench your thirst for rocking out in the places where even a ¾-sized guitar and a mini combo would be a total drawback -- on vacation, a business trip or in an office space.

 

 

 

Although Jammy can be plugged right into an amp and has a cool companion app, it can be played entirely on its own -- you only need a pair of earphones to rock Jammy Guitar!


Compact as it is, Jammy Guitar provides a sound range sufficient to play most of the rock songs.

Due to a usual frets size, your fingers won’t feel any difference compared to a standard guitar.


 

The fret bars with the unique precision sensors allow for realistic emulation of all the essential techniques like slides, bends, fingerpicking, and other stuff:
 

 
Jammy can be used with different DAW's for creating on the go in both audio and MIDI modes:
 

But our backers find their own uses for Jammy:
 

 



 

Jammy Guitar generates sound directly on board, which allows avoiding any latency typical for digital guitars that send sound to mobile devices over Bluetooth.  

With the ¼” and ⅛” standard jack audio outputs you don’t need any adapter -- plug your Jammy into an amp or just stick your earphones in, and you’re all good to rock!


Jammy Guitar’s real steel strings allow you adjusting the tension to get the exact feel you want


With Jammy, you can choose among three guitar types and a variety of onboard FX organized into presets realistically emulating the most iconic sounds in the history of guitar music. You can adjust each pedal separately and create your own custom FX presets


You can use Jammy Guitar as a MIDI controller with a digital audio workstation or an audio editor of your choice


Simply put, Jammy has the smallest latency and the broadest sound range, providing the best playability-to-portability ratio among digital guitars.

¼” and ⅛” direct audio outputs and onboard sound generation puts Jammy in front of the competitors in terms of autonomous play.

There’s no accounting for taste, but Jammy is arguably the most stylish of them all, too, and it definitely tells far more distinct rock’n’roll story than any other MIDI guitar.


 

 

Jammy’s iOS and Android compatible mobile app allows you to use the metronome, switch the type of the guitar, change the tuning, adjust the FX parameters and configure the FX chain to achieve the desired sound.

It also provides you with the backing tracks in different genres, displaying the range of notes you can use to jam along to those tracks.

 

 

Our team has a track of successful projects we helped bring to life as a RnD lab. But this time we decided to make something on our own behalf.

Since the half our team of a bit more than 20 guys and ladies are guitar players themselves, the choice was obvious. As many of you here, we weren’t huge fans of inconveniences our standard-sized guitars caused us during the transportation.

Neither were we satisfied with the extremely poor sound range of the available portable guitars. So we decide to create Jammy.

 

  • Now, as Jammy’s got a 15-fret neck, will it be comfy to carry around

The longest part of Jammy is still only 17” long, which means Jammy Guitar fits into most of the backpacks. It also complies with the airlines’ carry-on regulations.

  • Since Jammy consists of two parts, will the attachment be sturdy enough to endure the playing and transportation?

It certainly will be. Our engineers paid special attention to that matter. The team has studied various industrial mechanisms which allowed us to come up with a super-durable solution.

  • Will I be able to adjust the strings tension on Jammy Guitar?

The new design allows for adjusting the tension so the strings felt as loose or tight as you want them to.  

  • Is bending, hammer-ons, pull-offs and palm muting available on Jammy?

Yes! All of that is possible thanks to touch, velocity and pressure sensors in the strings and frets. 

  • Can I use alternate tunings on Jammy?

Jammy is a MIDI guitar, so we can change tuning pretty easily with just a few taps in our companion app

  • Are there any Duties, Taxes or VAT included in the pricing?

No, these are not included in the cost of shipping or handling of your order, and we are unable to estimate those fees for you and are not able to pay those on your behalf. Please check with your local customs agency for details on estimated costs.

A huge THANK YOU to all the early adopters who believed in us from the very start, to all the people who helped us spread the word, gave valuable feedback, and kept us motivated to work our axes out delivering the best we can!

story:
Hello everybody .

 This is Lana I have started this project for my label called "SEEN"  and were currently working on releasing the first EP called Dreamers on this label . It is about people Aliens from other countries and those who live in the US that are pursuing their dreams no matter what  . And this is the first topic in this funding project .

 I got the idea to create this unique Art and Music Event that is going to be pop up at every corner around the Globe , you can experience view touch and get an Art from very unique artists and listen to a very great music from amazing Musicians - that is going to be great news and we would like to help to raise money for the charities as well as invest in more exciting projects , such as one we're currently working with CureSearch , finding the cure for the Child cancer . As well as climate Change Organization . Why we doing this ? Because kindness is what makes us good human beings today and what is letting us to feel happier, releases our pain and gives us a hope .

We also want to help thru the music and make people feel the light and the beauty joining this project . I think that everyone has a purpose and it is usually starts that day , when they start to dream in a very small age, remember yourself who did u want to be back then . And ask yourself why you holding up from it ? What do you measure your self worth with ? I know for a fact that your self worth is never be measured in likes , views , listens , friends or even money it is about the amount of positive influence you have on other people life's 

I believe that if you live your life thinking that every change that life has given to you is for the better you will never live a single day miserable . And a lot things can be changed today , By you ! 

 Someone really great said : There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though that everything is a miracle.

Let them miracles begin now

Visit this site to hear some of the music and preview snippets of the Dreamers EP 

Harperseen.com
 

Risks and challenges

Were backed by couple agency's that are working to help us promote the release after funding . We are very positive and inspired to do our best to create Next Event in one of the biggest cities like New York , Slowly move towards West Coast and explore the Venues around in Europe

Help Needed : Graphic designers , Painters , Designers Hosts and more. 

Venues and Spaces for the Events needed . Promoters

story:
The Story of the MUZEGG:

“Do you want to enjoy music on the beach or during water activities?  Do you want to bring your iPod but don’t because of water and sand?  Don’t you think it would be nice to experience music outdoors without any worry?” If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…

As Seen On:

Overview:

KIKTEC has just released a new project called the MUZEGG, It is a project raising money for a new piece of technology that can change the way we listen to music forever.  Currently to listen to your music on the go your options lack sounds quality and are generally size or cost prohibitive.  Not to mention the major negative of portable music players: they have nooks and crannies that are not conducive to places with water, sand and humidity!  The industry is only creating basic music technology.  Presently there are not any portable options for listening on the go, at this level.  Our creators have supplied all the resources to make this product possible, now we just need the funding for growth.

More About the Project:

Seventy seven percent of people regularly listen to music or radio and say it enhances their mood, feelings and even health.  This can all be enhanced further if we just make our music more portable, more accessible than ever before. The MUZEGG connects to your smartphone, tablet or computer with Bluetooth wireless technology and allows you to listen to wide range music, talk radio, pandora, spotify... etc., on the go and is safe and suitable for the beach and shower…

Now with the combination of convenience and technology, the fantastic benefits of listening to your favorite tunes can reach a much larger demographic of people. 
With a contribution these amazing features can be a reality:

  • Easy connection: Based on Bluetooth technology, everything becomes easy, the speaker is compatible with all devices using IOS or Android system and you can easily control it by your phone, pad and other devices.

  • High quality audio: The highest quality of music is all we provide.  Excellence in every note.

  • Stick and listen: With a suction Cup Mount, the MUZEGG is made to stick on any support: Sticks to frig, walls, desk, shower, you name it, and the MUZEGG can stick to it, this helps you become even more hands free while listening to music on the go

  • Handsfree: Just connect your phone to the speaker and not miss any call even when you are taking your shower.

  • Colorful MUZEGG: Six of the latest fashionable colors are available!

We feel these features make us incredibly qualified to succeed.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us the MUZEGG one of the best designed and performance speaker in the industry.

About Us:

Our company is passionate with creating a great music device that’s easy, affordable and safe for any conditions. We have engineered a unique design and model that is second to none. Not only that, but they are more affordable so do not have to worry about it being price prohibitive. Help us make this product a reality so you can listen to your music no matter where you are!

How You Can Help:

For us to bring the MUZEGG to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our product. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production of the first prototype. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the MUZEGG.

The MUZEGG needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and Youtube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

How We'll Use the Funds:

We need 50.000 USD in order to break the MUZEGG with all the rainbow colors onto the market. That will includes marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for production.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT:

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read out campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our KIKTEC family.

Contact us:

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at kiktec@kiktec.com.

The Story of the MUZEGG:
“Do
you want to enjoy music on the beach or during water activities?  Do you want to bring your iPod but don’t
because of water and sand?  Don’t you
think it would be nice to experience music outdoors without any worry?” If you
answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…
As Seen On:



Overview:

KIKTEC has just released a new project called
the MUZEGG, It is a project raising
money for a new piece of technology that can change the way we listen to music
forever.  Currently to listen to your
music on the go your options lack sounds quality and are generally size or cost
prohibitive.  Not to mention the major
negative of portable music players: they have nooks and crannies that are not
conducive to places with water, sand and humidity!  The industry is only creating basic music
technology.  Presently there are not any
portable options for listening on the go, at this level.  Our creators have supplied all the resources
to make this product possible, now we just need the funding for growth.More About the Project:

Seventy seven percent of people
regularly listen to music or radio and say it enhances their mood, feelings and
even health.  This can all be enhanced
further if we just make our music more portable, more accessible than ever
before. The MUZEGG connects to your
smartphone, tablet or computer with Bluetooth wireless technology and allows you to listen to wide
range music, talk radio, pandora, spotify... etc., on the go and is safe and suitable for the beach
and shower…
