story:
US PATENT NUMBER: D782,441

Granted on March 28, 2017

 

Don't Miss Your Second Chance!

Indiegogo invited us to join the Forever Funding Pilot Program!

Our campaign is live again, offering discounted pricing indefinitely (we hope).

 

Order Yours Today Right Here on Indiegogo

 OR VISIT www.MightySpeaker.com to pay full price!

 

The MIGHTY Speaker is WATERPROOF, Sand Proof and even FLOATS!

Looking for the perfect Bluetooth speaker for the beach, boat, pool or shower?

Tired of waterproof phone cases that make your music sound terrible?

Meet MIGHTY.

 

 

 

The Slightly Bigger, Much Louder and Better Designed Brother of the Rebel Speaker we launched last year on Indiegogo.

 

 

 

 

The Rebel Speaker was only Water Resistant...

 

The Mighty Speaker is WATERPROOF up to 1 meter for 30 minutes!

But don't worry about him going too deep in the water though, he floats!

 

 

 

Unlike Rebel, The Mighty Speaker is Sealed and Completely Sand and Dust Proof, Perfect for those sandy days on the beach!

 

 

The Mighty Speaker uses a USB to 3.5mm DC Charging Cable, similar to the iPod Shuffle, which eliminates the microUSB charger port issues the Rebel Speaker had.

 

 

 

MIGHTY is a portable and powerful Bluetooth speaker that connects wirelessly with your smartphone, tablet, MP3 player, computer and more!

You can play music, skip tracks, adjust the volume, speak to Siri and even answer phone calls from anywhere without touching your phone.

 

Use MIGHTY as a tablet stand or stick it to shower walls, windows and more. 

 

 

MIGHTY’s removable suction cup lets you stick it to most flat, smooth surfaces:

  • Shower Walls & Doors
  • Tablets & Phablets Galore
  • Car Windows, Computer Screens
  • Boats, Trucks and Planes, Oh my!

 

     

    Full Product Description:

     

    Stream music and take calls from the wireless speaker that is MIGHTY and completely WATERPROOF!

     

    • Compact wireless speaker gives you big sound for music, videos and games
    • Suction cup sticks to almost any flat surface—even your tablet!
    • Easy to pair with any Bluetooth-enabled device, like smartphones and tablets
    • Take speakerphone calls with built-in microphone
    • Rechargeable battery for up to 6 hours on a single charge
    • Soft silicone button cover with built-in volume controls
    • Super portable—only 3.25 inches wide and 2.5 inches tall!
    • Completely WATERPROOF, DUST PROOF and FLOATS!!

     

    Pairs easily with smartphones, tablets, and laptops. 
    Upgrade the audio experience for all your music, videos, games and more with MIGHTY—Bluetooth® speakers that stick to just about anything. Since it’s already in pairing mode when you turn it on, it’s super-easy to connect MIGHTY™ to your Bluetooth-enabled smartphone, tablet or other music player for big, crystal-clear sound. And once they’re connected, they’ll be friends for life. Then you can stream music, and even adjust volume and tracks right from the speaker.

     

    Take speakerphone calls with MIGHTY’s built-in microphone.
    MIGHTY™ makes taking hands-free calls easier than ever. With a built-in mic and 33-foot range, you can continue the conversation even when you’re not near your phone (or when you just don’t feel like holding it). Talking for a long time? No problem—MIGHTY™ has a rechargeable battery that lasts for up to 6 hours on a single charge.

    Charges via USB to 3.5mm DC cable (cable included)

    4 Colors available (Red, Orange, Gold and Blue) to suit your style!

     

    TESTING, TESTING!

    We figured we should show you how well the Mighty Speaker holds up.

story:
Versione italiana   |   中文頁面

 

---

 

NEW REVIEW!

 

«The M6 system is unique in that you don’t need a receiver to control the system. You merely sync all the speakers together in a way similar to syncing up a wireless controller to an Xbox. The set up is remarkably simple and also gives you several options for connecting to various sources.»

Ease of use: ✔️
Flexibility: ✔️
Outstanding audio: ✔️

M6 checked all the boxes in the latest review by Magnetic Magazine, the e-zine that combines social media, culture, style and music ?

But not only movies or music: M6 proved its value in gaming as well! Want to know more? Check out the full review ➡️ https://bit.ly/2AIx9Zv

 

---

 

In this technology-driven era, with all that multimedia content available anytime, we all desired to own a system that could let us enjoy our favourite playlist or TV series easily, even if just for a few minutes. Most of the times, however, the dream gets crushed by bulky equipment, puzzling wiring, and never-ending installation and configuration processes.

 

 

Does enjoying our favourite music or movie really have to be so complicated and time-consuming? Now that most technologies are evolving towards more intuitive and user-friendly approaches, why should Hi-Fi be any different?

 

Introducing:

 

 

Hassle-free installation, crystal-clear sound, intuitive interface—all without annoying cables or bulky equipment. Introducing the first Hi-Fi audio system that makes it superbly simple to get high-quality sound from all your entertainment devices.

Everything’s set up in minutes.

 

 

Full review

 

Full review

 

Full review

 

 

 

Now, it's time to introduce you the 8 best reasons why M6 could be the only piece of equipment you'll ever need in your entertainment room.

 

M6 is a multi-speaker stereo system. The basic set-up is a 2.1 configuration, which features a pair of Main Speakers and a wireless Subwoofer. To that, you can add up to two wireless Zone 2 pairs. Thanks to the exclusive wireless module operating at 5.8 GHz, Zone 2 Speakers and Subwoofer connect to the Main Speakers wirelessly, with minimal interference and latency. Plus, the transmission range reaches up to 20 m, providing you with multiple arrangements options.

 

 

Simply plug in the power and connect the speakers. No wires between the pairs, no extra connections. You no longer need to spend the weekend running messy cables through the ceiling or walls to connect the satellites, or the evening trying to figure out how to hide them: they simply won't be there.

 

 

Forget those bulky amplifiers or receivers. M6’s speakers are active, meaning you can connect your wired inputs directly to the back of the main pair’s master speaker. With such a clean and minimal set-up with practically no cables to manage, it’s a dream come true for sound lovers!

 

 

 

 

The M6 system has optical, coaxial, USB-C, AUX, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth inputs, allowing you to effortlessly connect up any device whether it’s a TV, PC, smartphone or turntable. No matter which device you choose, M6 connects to deliver the sound.

Switch source easily with the push of a button. No more puzzling settings or labyrinthine navigation menus.

 


 

Choose the configuration that best suits your environment or personal preferences.

 

 

The 2.1 set-up will give new life to your favourite songs, with a clean and balanced sound. Movies, TV series and sports matches also benefit from clearer voices and a more distinct bass performance. Recommended for areas of up to 65 sq.m.

With the 4.1 set-up, you get all the benefits of the 2.1 solution but with an even more immersive experience, comparable to that of surround systems. Take full advantage of the Live or Movie modes and enjoy live performances or movies and TV series, as if you were right there on the spot. Recommended for areas of up to 100 sq.m.

The 6.1 set-up gives you a full-on entertainment experience. You can arrange the additional speakers in different spots of the room—or even in a different room—to let everyone enjoy the audio content the way it was intended. Recommended for areas of up to 130 sq.m.

The wireless Zone 2 Speakers can be added at a later date. Choose the set-up that suits your needs now, and scale it up to 6.1 by adding the Zone 2 Speakers when you want them.

 

 

Also, the volume of Zone 2 Speakers can be adjusted to any level separately. Turn it to 0 to temporarily scale your system down to a standard 2.1 set-up.

 

 

The Front Speakers can be placed either vertically or combined together to form a single stereo soundbar. The soundstage will be just as accurate and the built-in G-sensor will automatically flip the LED display to the new orientation. Enjoy the great sound quality and the convenient user interface with both configurations.


 

Get the rich clear sounds with a simple operation: Power-Source-Play.

 

 

 

Before even starting with features and specs, we would like to let M6 itself do the talking: sit back and enjoy this playlist we prepared to give you a glimpse of its audio quality and power. All clips are unedited. Please note that this is a stereo recording: to enhance the listening experience, please wear your headphones/earphones. Music source: Spotify / Video source: YouTube.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The symmetrical configuration of the drivers allows for an on-axis response to give you the sound and stereo imagery the way they were really intended.

 

 

By preserving phase integrity and matching dispersion, the speakers deliver an improved soundstage. Sit back and picture the positions of every musician as if you were right there, in front of the stage.

 

 

Designed and made to blend seamlessly with the satellite speakers, the wireless subwoofer lets the system deliver the full, harmonious sounds of floor-standing speakers.

 

 

You no longer need to adjust the layout of your room to accommodate the audio system. With its sleek design, the subwoofer itself adds value to your environments.

 

 

Behind the soft grille, a discrete LED display to give you all the information you need without disrupting your listening experience.

 

 

Everything is at your fingertips, with the intuitive and essential remote control.

 

 

Enhance live performances, movies, games and sports matches with the algorithmic 3D listening modes and advanced customization options such as bass, treble and balance.

 

 

This was our goal when we developed M6. We adjusted the cabinet and the internal configuration over and over again, taking every opportunity to reduce the size of the speakers without compromising on sound quality. At the same time, we made installation and operation easier by providing wireless connection, scalable configuration and hassle-free source switching.

 

 


Most audio equipment features a black or dark finish. However, we have all wished—at least once—to own a system that could give our entertainment room a brighter and more intimate look.

Unveiling the silver white M6.

 

 

With its pearl-blasted aluminium case, anodized in carefully selected hues, this version is mesmerizing to the touch and shimmering to the eye.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our goal is to create products which are both intuitive to use and blend in well with the surroundings. When tuning our speakers, first and foremost, we put sound performance and the interaction between sound and the environment. We strive to design devices that will stand the test of time so that they may be your life companions well into the future.

Our manufacturing techniques aim to uphold the authentic texture of materials, allowing their properties to stand out. We deliver a refreshing blend of contemporary and traditional elements through the combination of different materials and details. The essential and classic aesthetics of our speakers blend gracefully with any style.

Named after the two daughters of the founder of the company, CELIA & PERAH represents more than just quality audio engineering. The name is a sign of commitment of the designer to our customers and symbolises how much we care about our products and the experience listeners derive from them.

 

M2—The Inspiring Moment

 

2013.01       CELIA & PERAH is founded

2014.10       Launch of P4 Wireless Bentwood Hi-Fi Speaker // Shown at Hong Kong Electronics Fair

2014.12       Launch of P3 Wireless Bentwood Hi-Fi speaker // Shown at The Original Festival, Taipei - Taiwan

2015.01       Sales begin at Eslite bookstore

2015.03       Winner of the 2015 Red Dot Design Award

2015.04       Sales begin at HOLA furnishing store // Shown at The Creative Expo Taiwan

2015.10       Winner of the 2015 Golden Pin Design Award

2016.02       Shown at Ambiente - The Show, Frankfurt - Germany

2016.03       Launch of P3 II Wireless Hi-Fi Speaker

2016.04       Shown at The Creative Expo Taiwan // Winner of the Cultural and Creativity Award 2016

2016.05       Shown at Computex Taipei

2016.07       Sales begin at Le Bon Marché

2016.08       Sales begin at Galeries Lafayette Haussmann

2016.09       Sales begin at The Lalu Hotel Qingdao // Shown at Maison & Objet, Paris - France

2016.11       Sales begin at HomeGoods furnishing store

2017.02       Shown at Ambiente - The Show, Frankfurt - Germany

2017.04       Shown at The Creative Expo Taiwan

2017.05       Launch of M2 Wireless Hi-Fi Speaker // Shown at Beijing Music & Life Show

2017.09       Shown at Tokyo International Gift Show LIFE×DESIGN // Winner of the Best Technology Award

2018.09       Shown at Maison & Objet, Paris - France

2018.10       Shown at STYLE Bangkok Fair

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

All the perks has been sent, thanks for the support

 

For the first time installation, please refer to below video

 

We worked on M6 for nearly 30 months before launching this campaign and did our best to ensure delivery reached your doorstep in the shortest time possible.

Our experience in designing and launching wireless speakers dates back to 2013. We have since made and shipped worldwide: P4—The Leisure Moment, P3 II—The Joy Moment, and M2—The Inspiring Moment.

Our selected manufacturers have supplied us for years. We are confident in their ability to deliver high-quality products always on time.

We will keep you informed along the way and, should you have any questions, we're ready to reply to them! Thank you so much for your support, and welcome on board of this beautiful musical journey!

 

Which type of plug should I select?

Type A: mainly used in North and Central America and in some Asian countries such as Japan, Philippines, Thailand, Taiwan and Vietnam.
Type G: mainly used in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Cyprus, Malta, Malaysia, Singapore and Hong Kong.
Type C: used in all countries of Europe except the United Kingdom, Ireland, Cyprus and Malta.

Can I connect M6 to a receiver?

You actually don't need to: being an active system, it does not require any receiver. Simply connect it to your sources and enjoy the audio right away.

Is M6 compatible with Dolby or DTS surround sources?

M6 is a stereo system. Both the Main Speakers and Zone 2 Speakers reproduce the same stereo track. We introduced the multi-speaker approach to take your favourite music to a whole new level, allowing you to be fully surrounded by it while maintaining a perfect stereo imagery. Plus, with the Movie Mode, you have a viewing experience comparable to that of surround systems.

Can I use the Zone 2 Speakers individually?

To deliver the audio signal, the Zone 2 Speakers must operate together with the Main Speakers. However, you can use the Main Speakers individually by turning down the volume of the Zone 2 Speakers.

Is M6 equipped with a HDMI input?

We believe that keeping the audio and the video separated is the way to go for a simpler user experience. Thus, when designing M6 we didn't include the HDMI input.

What's all the fuss about the Subwoofer?

The Subwoofer of M6 is entirely different from those found in most multimedia speakers and home-theatre systems. It allows the system to deliver a floor speaker-like sound despite the small size of its speakers. We achieved this by carefully tuning it with the speakers themselves. Bass and treble must always be balanced so the subwoofer is majestic but good in coherence.

Do I have to pair Main Speakers, Zone 2 Speakers and the Subwoofer every time I use them?

No: once you complete the initial pairing process, the speakers connect to each other automatically when you turn on the system.

Can I buy the Main Speakers only?

The whole system is designed with a Subwoofer, with which the speakers are carefully tuned. Therefore, we do not offer a speaker-only option.

Can I connect more than one smartphone to it?

Yes: after making sure that the smartphones and M6 are connected to the same Wi-Fi network, connect all the devices to M6 through the Wi-Fi and control the system on each mobile device.

Does each speaker need a separate power supply?

Each pair of speakers requires a separate power supply. The Subwoofer needs its own power supply as well. Taking the 4.1 set-up as an example, you would need: Main Speakers (1 power supply), Zone 2 Speakers (1 power supply), Subwoofer (1 power supply). So 3 sockets in total.

Does M6 use the Bluetooth technology? Is there any latency during transmission?

M6 adopts a proprietary wireless technology, neither Bluetooth nor Wi-Fi. Latency is less than 20 ms, which is too short for the human ear to detect and therefore you won't perceive any delay.

Do speakers have a battery inside?

M6 is designed for an indoor use and it needs to be plugged in all the time during operation. Thus, there is no battery inside the speakers.

Will I need to pay VAT/GST?

Being the importer of record, the recipient must comply with all laws and regulations of their local government. Orders shipped may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once the shipment reaches the country of destination. Thus, the recipient may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees. We have no control over these charges.

What is your return/refund policy?

You can process a refund for the entire amount of the transaction you made provided that the campaign is live and not ended, the perk claimed has not been fulfilled, and the funds have not been disbursed to us. After receiving the perk, you can ask for a 100% refund and send the item back to us within 15 days from the day you received it.

With such a clean and minimal set-up with practically no cables to manage, it’s a dream come true for sound lovers!    The M6 system has optical, coaxial, USB-C, AUX, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth inputs, allowing you to effortlessly connect up any device whether it’s a TV, PC, smartphone or turntable. No matter which device you choose, M6 connects to deliver the sound.Switch source easily with the push of a button. No more puzzling settings or labyrinthine navigation menus.  Choose the configuration that best suits your environment or personal preferences.  The 2.1 set-up will give new life to your favourite songs, with a clean and balanced sound. Movies, TV series and sports matches also benefit from clearer voices and a more distinct bass performance. Recommended for areas of up to 65 sq.m.With the 4.1 set-up, you get all the benefits of the 2.1 solution but with an even more immersive experience, comparable to that of surround systems. Take full advantage of the Live or Movie modes and enjoy live performances or movies and TV series, as if you were right there on the spot. Recommended for areas of up to 100 sq.m.The 6.1 set-up gives you a full-on entertainment experience. You can arrange the additional speakers in different spots of the room—or even in a different room—to let everyone enjoy the audio content the way it was intended. Recommended for areas of up to 130 sq.m.The wireless Zone 2 Speakers can be added at a later date. Choose the set-up that suits your needs now, and scale it up to 6.1 by adding the Zone 2 Speakers when you want them.  Also, the volume of Zone 2 Speakers can be adjusted to any level separately. Turn it to 0 to temporarily scale your system down to a standard 2.1 set-up.  The Front Speakers can be placed either vertically or combined together to form a single stereo soundbar. The soundstage will be just as accurate and the built-in G-sensor will automatically flip the LED display to the new orientation. Enjoy the great sound quality and the convenient user interface with both configurations. Get the rich clear sounds with a simple operation: Power-Source-Play.   Before even starting with features and specs, we would like to let M6 itself do the talking: sit back and enjoy this playlist we prepared to give you a glimpse of its audio quality and power. All clips are unedited. Please note that this is a stereo recording: to enhance the listening experience, please wear your headphones/earphones. Music source: Spotify / Video source: YouTube.  

 

 


 

 

The symmetrical configuration of the drivers allows for an on-axis response to give you the sound and stereo imagery the way they were really intended.  By preserving phase integrity and matching dispersion, the speakers deliver an improved soundstage. Sit back and picture the positions of every musician as if you were right there, in front of the stage.  Designed and made to blend seamlessly with the satellite speakers, the wireless subwoofer lets the system deliver the full, harmonious sounds of floor-standing speakers.  You no longer need to adjust the layout of your room to accommodate the audio system. With its sleek design, the subwoofer itself adds value to your environments.  Behind the soft grille, a discrete LED display to give you all the information you need without disrupting your listening experience.  Everything is at your fingertips, with the intuitive and essential remote control.  Enhance live performances, movies, games and sports matches with the algorithmic 3D listening modes and advanced customization options such as bass, treble and balance.  This was our goal when we developed M6. We adjusted the cabinet and the internal configuration over and over again, taking every opportunity to reduce the size of the speakers without compromising on sound quality. At the same time, we made installation and operation easier by providing wireless connection, scalable configuration and hassle-free source switching.  Most audio equipment features a black or dark finish. However, we have all wished—at least once—to own a system that could give our entertainment room a brighter and more intimate look.Unveiling the silver white M6.  With its pearl-blasted aluminium case, anodized in carefully selected hues, this version is mesmerizing to the touch and shimmering to the eye.       Our goal is to create products which are both intuitive to use and blend in well with the surroundings. When tuning our speakers, first and foremost, we put sound performance and the interaction between sound and the environment. We strive to design devices that will stand the test of time so that they may be your life companions well into the future.Our manufacturing techniques aim to uphold the authentic texture of materials, allowing their properties to stand out. We deliver a refreshing blend of contemporary and traditional elements through the combination of different materials and details. The essential and classic aesthetics of our speakers blend gracefully with any style.Named after the two daughters of the founder of the company, CELIA & PERAH represents more than just quality audio engineering. The name is a sign of commitment of the designer to our customers and symbolises how much we care about our products and the experience listeners derive from them.  M2—The Inspiring Moment 2013.01       CELIA & PERAH is founded2014.10       Launch of P4 Wireless Bentwood Hi-Fi Speaker // Shown at Hong Kong Electronics Fair2014.12       Launch of P3 Wireless Bentwood Hi-Fi speaker // Shown at The Original Festival, Taipei - Taiwan2015.01       Sales begin at Eslite bookstore2015.03       Winner of the 2015 Red Dot Design Award2015.04       Sales begin at HOLA furnishing store // Shown at The Creative Expo Taiwan2015.10       Winner of the 2015 Golden Pin Design Award2016.02       Shown at Ambiente - The Show, Frankfurt - Germany2016.03       Launch of P3 II Wireless Hi-Fi Speaker2016.04       Shown at The Creative Expo Taiwan // Winner of the Cultural and Creativity Award 20162016.05       Shown at Computex Taipei2016.07       Sales begin at Le Bon Marché2016.08       Sales begin at Galeries Lafayette Haussmann2016.09       Sales begin at The Lalu Hotel Qingdao // Shown at Maison & Objet, Paris - France2016.11       Sales begin at HomeGoods furnishing store2017.02       Shown at Ambiente - The Show, Frankfurt - Germany2017.04       Shown at The Creative Expo Taiwan2017.05       Launch of M2 Wireless Hi-Fi Speaker // Shown at Beijing Music & Life Show2017.09       Shown at Tokyo International Gift Show LIFE×DESIGN // Winner of the Best Technology Award2018.09       Shown at Maison & Objet, Paris - France2018.10       Shown at STYLE Bangkok Fair        All the perks has been sent, thanks for the support For the first time installation, please refer to below video We worked on M6 for nearly 30 months before launching this campaign and did our best to ensure delivery reached your doorstep in the shortest time possible.Our experience in designing and launching wireless speakers dates back to 2013. We have since made and shipped worldwide: P4—The Leisure Moment, P3 II—The Joy Moment, and M2—The Inspiring Moment.Our selected manufacturers have supplied us for years. We are confident in their ability to deliver high-quality products always on time.We will keep you informed along the way and, should you have any questions, we're ready to reply to them! Thank you so much for your support, and welcome on board of this beautiful musical journey! 
Which type of plug should I select?Type A: mainly used in North and Central America and in some Asian countries such as Japan, Philippines, Thailand, Taiwan and Vietnam.Type G: mainly used in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Cyprus, Malta, Malaysia, Singapore and Hong Kong.Type C: used in all countries of Europe except the United Kingdom, Ireland, Cyprus and Malta.Can I connect M6 to a receiver?You actually don't need to: being an active system, it does not require any receiver. Simply connect it to your sources and enjoy the audio right away.Is M6 compatible with Dolby or DTS surround sources?M6 is a stereo system. Both the Main Speakers and Zone 2 Speakers reproduce the same stereo track. We introduced the multi-speaker approach to take your favourite music to a whole new level, allowing you to be fully surrounded by it while maintaining a perfect stereo imagery. Plus, with the Movie Mode, you have a viewing experience comparable to that of surround systems.Can I use the Zone 2 Speakers individually?To deliver the audio signal, the Zone 2 Speakers must operate together with the Main Speakers. However, you can use the Main Speakers individually by turning down the volume of the Zone 2 Speakers.Is M6 equipped with a HDMI input?We believe that keeping the audio and the video separated is the way to go for a simpler user experience. Thus, when designing M6 we didn't include the HDMI input.What's all the fuss about the Subwoofer?The Subwoofer of M6 is entirely different from those found in most multimedia speakers and home-theatre systems. It allows the system to deliver a floor speaker-like sound despite the small size of its speakers. We achieved this by carefully tuning it with the speakers themselves. Bass and treble must always be balanced so the subwoofer is majestic but good in coherence.Do I have to pair Main Speakers, Zone 2 Speakers and the Subwoofer every time I use them?No: once you complete the initial pairing process, the speakers connect to each other automatically when you turn on the system.Can I buy the Main Speakers only?The whole system is designed with a Subwoofer, with which the speakers are carefully tuned. Therefore, we do not offer a speaker-only option.Can I connect more than one smartphone to it?Yes: after making sure that the smartphones and M6 are connected to the same Wi-Fi network, connect all the devices to M6 through the Wi-Fi and control the system on each mobile device.Does each speaker need a separate power supply?Each pair of speakers requires a separate power supply. The Subwoofer needs its own power supply as well. Taking the 4.1 set-up as an example, you would need: Main Speakers (1 power supply), Zone 2 Speakers (1 power supply), Subwoofer (1 power supply). So 3 sockets in total.Does M6 use the Bluetooth technology? Is there any latency during transmission?M6 adopts a proprietary wireless technology, neither Bluetooth nor Wi-Fi. Latency is less than 20 ms, which is too short for the human ear to detect and therefore you won't perceive any delay.Do speakers have a battery inside?M6 is designed for an indoor use and it needs to be plugged in all the time during operation. Thus, there is no battery inside the speakers.Will I need to pay VAT/GST?Being the importer of record, the recipient must comply with all laws and regulations of their local government. Orders shipped may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once the shipment reaches the country of destination. Thus, the recipient may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees. We have no control over these charges.What is your return/refund policy?You can process a refund for the entire amount of the transaction you made provided that the campaign is live and not ended, the perk claimed has not been fulfilled, and the funds have not been disbursed to us. After receiving the perk, you can ask for a 100% refund and send the item back to us within 15 days from the day you received it.

story:
WIRED US : "The WOW wireless bluetooth speaker not only sounds great but looks great too." 

http://www.wired.com/geekmom/2012/07/wow-wirele...

 

What is WOW?

Big Sound. Small Speaker. You can take WOW to the park, the beach, on holiday, to work.


You need WOW wherever you need your music.


Compact, durable, wireless, easy to connect and recharge, WOW makes all your music portable. Big on sound, WOW wirelessly streams music from any Bluetooth device.

 

We took WOW to the streets ... here is what people had to say https://vimeo.com/45596719

 

KAKKOii (Japanese: cool / awesome)

KAKKOii is a boutique design company set up by Antonio Arevalo.

A London designer, Antonio's passion is making innovative, high quality products that fit the urban lifestyle; WOW is the first in the KAKKOii range.

Antonio’s been designing products for clients for over 12 years, but KAKKOii is his own brand and he needs your help to share WOW with the world.

Why WOW needs you

The goal (listed over in the top right hand corner) represents the amount of money KAKKOii needs to pay for tooling, certificate fees (FCC and TELEC) and the minimum number of units to get WOW into production.

If you pre-order WOW you’ll get it at a big discount as well as the feel good feeling of being a pioneer that made our WOW dream a reality.

If we reach our goal the first batch of WOW will ship at the end of October.

 

WOW features / specs:

-       Bluetooth connection up to 10-meter (33-foot) wireless range

-       Built in rechargeable battery (recharged via USB) 

-       up to 4-6 hour play time, depending on the settings and environmental conditions. 

-       70 decibel power output (enough to fill a big size room or annoy the neighbour) 

-       Made from silicon for durability (accidentally falling-from-shelf-proof)

-       Auto silence mode when you have an incoming call and auto play when you finish taking your call 

 

 

 

-       Stand upright to get a 360 degree sound or lay down for more directional sound 

 

-       Wirelessly streams music from any Bluetooth-enabled device such as your mobile phone, notebook, iPhone or iPad.

-       WOW is available in RED (185*), BLUE (3005*), BLACK, WHITE and YELLOW (109*) - * Pantone reference

 

 

Can I help in other ways? 

Sure thing... spread the word; tell your friends, family and foes! Share our campaign on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, blog…. everywhere.

Thank you for your support,

Antonio and the KAKKOii gang

  



 

 

 PACKAGING

story:
#WirSindUbahnStars

Hallo ihr Lieben, 

seit bald 3 Jahren spielen die U-Bahn-Stars in den Stationen der Wiener Linien und verschönern euren Tag mit Musik.

Durch die Folgen des Covid-19 Ausbruchs finden keinerlei Auftritte in den Stationen mehr statt und auch bereits geplante Konzerte wurden abgesagt. Für viele der U-Bahn-Stars stellt dies einen erheblichen Einkommensverlust dar - vermutlich für einen längeren Zeitraum.

Aber wir lieben die Musik und wollen daher die Konzerte aus den U-Bahn-Stationen zu euch in die Wohnzimmer bringen. Auf der Facebook-Fanpage der U-Bahn-Stars: https://www.facebook.com/Ubahnstars/ werden daher regelmäßig Videos der verschiedenen KünstlerInnen gepostet - nicht nur Musik, sondern viele Überraschungen! Durch das Crowdfunding erhoffen wir uns, dass wir unsere laufenden Kosten für die Wohnungen ausgleichen können, damit wir uns voll auf die Musik konzentrieren können und euch auch weiterhin den Alltag versüßen können. Das Spendenziel von 52.000€ ergibt sich folglich aus den 130 TeilnehmerInnen und deren 400€ durchschnittliche monatl. Fixkosten. Der eingenommene Betrag wird unter allen teilnehmenden U-Bahn-Stars fair aufgeteilt.

In dieser äußerst schwierigen Zeit sind wir für jede Spende dankbar!
Herzlichen Dank für eure Unterstützung und bleibt gesund!
Eure U-Bahn-Stars

story:
Unplug and Unwind

 

It's simple -- BlueDAC makes your headphones wireless. And it sounds awesome!

Take your favorite headphones, plug them into BlueDAC and start streaming from your phone. No cable tangles, no wire mess -- BlueDAC will play high quality audio through your headphones without any wires, connectors or adapters!

Use your iPhone or Android device. Use a tablet or a computer. Anything that can stream over Bluetooth will broadcast to BlueDAC, letting you enjoy high quality tunes without having to worry about cables.

 

Features at a Glance

 

  • Wired or Wireless input, BlueDAC has you covered!
  • 3.5mm headphone jack and 2.5mm balanced output
  • Up to 384kHz and DSD audio quality with USB input
  • Lowest distortion and jitter due to proprietary clocking
  • AptX Sound Quality, proven to exceed MP3 quality
  • Long lasting, 20-hour battery (when using wireless input)
  • Digital volume control for precise L/R channel matching
  • Amp Extreme with 1000mW of power + line level output
  • 20dB gain switch to accommodate any headphones 
  • 3D printed chassis, Made in USA
  • Uses Earth-friendly, biodegradable plastic
  • Works with most iPhones, Androids, computers, phones and tablets
  • Distortion is so low that the device acts as a wire for a wireless signal
  • Available in black, other colors may be offered as campaign moves on

 

Timeline

We showed first prototypes at the Singapore Headphone Show in 03' 2017. They worked well and we collected useful feedback from lead users (thank you, guys!) Based on this feedback we are now making the final version. It will feature USB input and Balanced output. This product will be awesome with community input!

We expect to ship the first batch of 50 units in 06' 2017

 

Controls

 

BlueDAC builds upon the legacy of our award-winning portable audio products and adds the most requested features: Rechargeable Battery and Bluetooth Input. It comes from our team's years of experience in Audio Research and Development. 

This is our most advanced Personal D/A Converter and Amplifier, period. It will make your phones, tablets and computers sound their best without wires or draining their battery!

 

What's wrong with my phone's headphone jack?

You like going places and listening to music. You pack lightly when you travel, because it’s all about the experience and ease. You don't want to carry a separate music player for two reasons: First, they are expensive, and Second, you already have your phone! So, you load your music onto your phone, pack your favorite headphones and go!

But, when you plug your awesome headphones into your phone, something’s not right. Something's missing from your music. It sounds caged-in. It lacks impact, clarity, and emotion. Your music just isn't ALIVE. And these days, what's missing is the headphone jack itself.

The truth is that phones, laptops and tablets aren't designed by musicians and your phone is not an audiophile device! It was designed with the average consumer in mind, so it includes mid-grade parts to save costs. What a bummer! You hear the sound quality difference, and this gets very frustrating! 

Fortunately, there is an answer.

It’s called BlueDAC and it comes from CEntrance, a leader in personal audio. For the last 17 years we've built equipment for recording studios, performance stages and broadcast facilities worldwide. We've designed mixing consoles, recording equipment, and home stereo systems for music professionals – the most demanding ears out there.

BlueDAC is the answer to bad portable sound. We packaged an awesome audio system inside a small but durable case! Now you can listen to music in a whole new way using your phone, tablet, laptop or desktop. BlueDAC will breathe new LIFE into your music.

 

 

We make it easy to listen to music in high definition. Rediscover your own music collection, or enjoy streaming from Tidal, Spotify, Slacker, Pandora, and many others. Now you can access amazing audio quality at a truly affordable price!

 

A Bit of History

In 2009 CEntrance was the trailblazer. We made audio history with the release of a revolutionary product called DACport. It defined the cutting edge in portable Hi-Fi and single-handedly created a new product category. DACport, a cigar-shaped D/A converter and headphone amplifier, delivered audiophile sound to any high-end headphones and gave thousands of people access to high-quality music.

 

 

DACport's amazing sound earned it a place on Stereophile magazine's highly coveted "Recommended Components List" for 6+ years. It was featured on the cover and received numerous industry awards. This is unmatched by any other brand! Here is what Stereophile's John Atkinson had to say about DACport:

 

      

 

A Classic, Remixed

Later, an updated version called DACport HD added High-Resolution audio and became smaller, lighter, and more ergonomic. DACport HD was crowdfunded right here on Indiegogo and sold thousands of units within months of introduction. 

  

 

Here is what our customers said about DACport HD:

The quality of my listening experience from Spotify with the M&D headphone paired with DACport HD is truly awe-inspiring. I cannot emphasize enough how amazing and how truly impressed and blown-away I am with the sound from DACport HD!

Dominique James

CEntrance released many exciting recording and playback products. Products such as MicPort Pro and AxePort Pro, endorsed by the Hollywood elite. Products such as DACmini and HiFi-M8, named "Best DAC Ever Tested" by CNET:

 

 

Introducing BlueDAC

Today we are excited to introduce our most advanced portable DAC/Amp. The battery-powered BlueDAC. This is what our customers have been waiting for.

People with phones and tablets love to listen to music. But no one wants to carry around additional equipment, such as amps and battery packs. Our quality-minded customers demanded a self-powered DAC/Amp. Today, we are proud to deliver.

Gone are external batteries. Gone are amplifier stacks. BlueDAC simplifies everything! Small and lightweight, jam-packed with Sonic Goodness, BlueDAC does it all. And yet, it's extremely travel-friendly. As frequent travelers ourselves, we designed it to pack well. Most importantly, this amp is really loud! Your headphones will be happy, and so will you!

 

The CEntrance design team is known for its work with semiconductor leaders such as Texas Instruments, XMOS and AKM. We are listed on their websites as an official 3-rd party design firm. We have helped over 100 consulting clients such as Benchmark, Lavry, McIntosh, and Korg deliver great audio products to market.

When developing BlueDAC, CEntrance has taken advantage of our special relationships and utilized modern approaches to portable power and audiophile sound quality. Major advances in technology allowed us to achieve further miniaturization and sonic improvements. We put Hi-Fi in the palm of your hand.

 

What Does it Work With?

BlueDAC is designed to support a wide variety of digital sources, from laptops to desktops, to tablets, to phones, and even TVs. That's on the wireless side. You can use the wired connection for highest audio quality, up to DSD when used as  a USB DAC.

The unit is plug-and-play on Mac OS and we have drivers for Windows. Linux and newer Android devices are supported out of the box. You really cannot go wrong with BlueDAC. It will bring sweet music to your ears, no matter what you use for playback at work, at home, or in between.

 

Features

Just like in our flagship products, we used high-quality, audiophile-grade components such as resistors, amplifiers and power supplies to dramatically raise the bar on sound quality. BlueDAC makes it possible to truly enjoy hi-res files on your phone. Here are the main features:

 

 

Performance Parts

  • Most Awesome Headphone Amp. Clean, quiet and powerful Amp Extreme™, "The best amp ever", according to CNET.
  • Balanced outputs. Highlight the Bass and treble!  Enjoy the silky-smooth high frequency sounds and punchy bass via the 2.5mm balanced connection, or the regular 3.5mm jack.
  • Amazingly Musical DAC. Our premium, Velvet Sound DAC from AKM is used in the world's most expensive recording and playback gear.
  • Digital Volume Control with 256 precision steps. Volume control with digital tracking keeps channels in perfect balance, always.

 

Technical Innovations

  • A Li-Po rechargeable battery delivers 20 hours* of sweet music to your ears.
  • Seven regulated internal power supplies provide full isolation from noise.
  • USB input is the charging port: Charge the internal battery, while playing music!
  • Two Picosecond clocks with JitterGuard™, our jitter removal technology.
  • Two output level settings - LOW for Line output and HIGH for Headphones.
  • Dual Input lets you listen without wires on the go, or via USB for best quality.

 

Under the Hood

You are probably wondering what's under the hood. No problem! We don't mind sharing. 

Upgraded Power

BlueDAC takes 5V from a USB charger and filters the living daylights out of it before it gets to the audio circuitry, to make sure all noise is kept out of your music. Internally, BlueDAC has seven power supplies and multiple filter stages, creating different voltages to power its high-end digital and analog circuitry.

Upgraded Amp

During the very successful HiFi-Skyn design effort, we developed Amp Extreme, a headphone amplifier circuit that delivers high power and ultra low distortion, making headphones sing loud and clear. BlueDAC has Amp Extreme built in! 

Upgraded DAC

BlueDAC also shares the DAC chip with HiFi-Skyn. We use the brand new AK4490 from AKM. CEntrance is an official 3-rd party developer for AKM, so not only do we have access to best parts, but we also know how to use them.  Analog circuitry is known as "black art", but we've perfected it over the last 15 years.

Upgraded USB

The asynchronous USB interface is handled by the brand new XMOS U8 chip. CEntrance is also a 3-rd party development house for XMOS. We help them build their parts into other companies' products and this gives us unprecedented level of support straight from the chip developers. Naturally, you can depend on CEntrance tech.

 

Designed For Any Headphones

Some headphone models remain customer favorites due to their special sonic signature. Yet, these headphones are not efficient enough to be driven directly from the cell phone. A powerful amplifier is needed. And the amp needs a power supply. This is why die-hard audiophiles carry stacks of gear—batteries, DACs, and amps:

 

 

BlueDAC changes all that. Our past products were powered from USB. But the amount of USB power is limited, making it hard to achieve really loud output. In such products we always had to make compromises on output power. Now that we have an internal battery, we can really amp it up for most demanding headphones. BlueDAC pumps out enough power to drive almost anything!

 

Which Headphones should I use?

We get that question a lot. You are in luck. You can use pretty much any high-end headphones. Because BlueDAC has a powerful headphone amp, it will match up not just with the ultra-sensitive IEMs, but also with the high-end models from AKG, Audeze, Beyerdynamic, Fostex, HiFi-Man, Master and Dynamic, Mr. Speakers, Sennheiser, and many others. Very few DAC/Amps can boast this kind of performance, but BlueDAC can! And now, thanks to user feedback, we are also offering balanced headphone connection, along with the standard 3.5mm headphone jack. That's two ways to listen to music!

We engineered BlueDAC to take the digital signal out of your phone, tablet of computer, process it and convert it to analog using the same technology found in our award-winning audiophile products, and amplify it to a powerful, crystal-clear signal that will drive any headphones, with pristine highs and powerful bass.

The CEntrance BlueDAC is also an awesome USB sound card inside a small lightweight case. It delivers your music in unmatched audio fidelity and on top of that, packs a long-lasting battery! BlueDAC is perfect for those extended shifts at work, while working out, on long flights, or at home, when you need some quality tunes but the phone's own buzzy sound just wouldn't cut it.

 

Your iPhone is no Match for Your Cool Cans

The smartphone is a great digital music player, but its headphone jack sucks! You may have awesome headphones, but your iPhone won’t get the best out of them—the sound will be muddy, lack clarity and punch, to say nothing about feeble bass.
If you are into audio quality, these headphones are the real deal. But your iPhone doesn't support these headphones. That's the problem we solve with BlueDAC.

 

 

 

Who We Are 

CEntrance owes its reputation to thousands of happy customers, all around the world. Starting out as designers behind today's famous audio brands, CEntrance now has many products on the market. Our products are endorsed by Hollywood's famous producers, mastering engineers and musicians: people who demand quality— just like you do!—and whose livelihoods depend upon our quality.

 

 

Our list of endorsers includes Harry Shearer from This is Spinal Tap and The Simpsons, John Kapelos from Law and Order, David Bryson from Counting Crows, Richard Fortus, who plays with Guns and Roses, Rihanna, and Britney Spears; David Hampton, recording engineer for Herbie Hancock, Prince and many others!

 

CEntrance recording products are used by the these famous broadcasters: 

 

With CEntrance, you can rely on audio quality, build quality and value.

 

CEntrance in the Media

We've been profiled in numerous media publications. Here is a small sampling.

Our Industry Awards

The Absolute Sound Magazine has given our HiFi-M8 the coveted editor's choice award for 2015! BlueDAC is largely based on the HiFi-M8 design, which means that you will not be disappointed in sound quality and portability. We are making our flagship product easier to use and more affordable.

CNET called our HiFi-M8 “The best-sounding headphone amp ever tested.” 

 

Our DACmini was featured on the cover of Stereophile magazine!

CEntrance is a world leader in digital audio. You’ve seen our professional products in recording and broadcast studios all over the world. Our personal audio products are killer, too.

Just look at industry awards given to CEntrance:

Given our background, you wouldn't expect us to settle for mediocre sound quality—and we didn’t! We used our expertise with audiophile products to transform the audio system for your phone and dramatically increase you music enjoyment.

Our motto is "Making Audio Personal™" and we believe that you don't need to pay thousands of dollars for a great sounding system.  Over the years we have perfected portable audio technology and learned how to shrink an audiophile system down in size. 

 

Specifications

 

Digital Specs

Sampling rates: 32, 44.1, 48, 88.2, 96, 176,4, 192, 352.8, 384kHz

DSD Support: DSD64 and DSD128 

Audio Resolution: 32-bit (also supports 24-bit and 16-bit) 

Clocking: Two custom, mil-spec clocks, 1 ppm precision, 1 ps jitter

Sreaming LED: Lights up when digital audio is streaming 

Compatibility: Mac, Windows, Linux, Android and iOS*.

USB Audio: Asynchronous

 

Analog specs

Frequency response: 20Hz...40kHz, +0.0/-0.2dB 

Signal to Noise Ratio: 110 dB

Harmonic distortion (THD+N): 0.001%

Output power into a 32Ω load: 775mW (total)

Output impedance: 1 Ohm

Supported Headphones: 16...600 Ohm

Max Output Level (1kHz): 4.1 V rms / +14.5 dBu 

 

General Specs:

Audio output: Gold-plated, 3.5mm headphone jack, gold-plated 2.5mm balanced jack

Headphone amp: Class-AB with super-clean, bipolar power supply 

Analog supplies: Battery-isolated, triple-filtered ±9V power supply rails.

Battery: Rechargeable Li-Polymer, 20 hours play time *

Charging: +5V (2.1A) from external adapter, such as iPad charger

Dimensions: 110 mm (L) x 57 mm (W) x 18 mm (H)

Case material: Scratch-resistant, lightweight, plastic chassis 

Cables: Same cable can be used for Audio or Charging 

 

 

What Will I Get?

BlueDAC MSRP is set at $560. But Indiegogo contributors such as yourself will get a great deal! We are giving you access to a limited number of attractive perks. These deals won't last, so act now to take advantage of exceptional savings! 

But it gets even better—you can make money by simply sharing this campaign with your friends across all of your social media channels (facebook, twitter, instagram, reddit, head-fi, etc.)!

 

Let's Work Together!

By pledging your support, you can help us increase the amount of product we can order from the factory, as well as accelerate the speed, with which we can get it into your hands. This in turn lowers production costs and helps us make the product more affordable. Your support will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with creating the best sounding, most liberating audio devices in the world.

Please support this project today and help us fight bad sound on this planet!

 

Risks and Challenges

We are proud to say that this is our fourth Indiegogo campaign. Every time it's a learning experience and we are getting better and better with each one. The benefit to you, the customer, is that you are dealing with a company that has gone through this process more than once and has hundreds of satisfied customers from our previous campaigns. We know how to deliver. We are "driven to ship". 

The key to campaign success is simplicity  and predictability. Our latest campaign for DACport HD only took 3 months from start to finish. This is unheard of in the industry, but we did many things right. The product was based on existing technology, prototyping had been complete before campaign start, and no third parties were involved. The result -- swift project execution and many satisfied customers. That's how we prefer to move forward.

We have a goal of shipping the bulk of units in July 2017. Your support will help us speed up mass-production, acquire parts, and hire additional manpower to get units shipping asap.  If we don't meet the funding goal, we will still continue with the project and will bring this revolutionary product to market. We believe in this product concept and will make it happen. We've done this on our own with DACport, DACmini, HiFi-M8, and other products, but here we are looking to speed things up via crowd-funding. So speed is the main risk, which you can help mitigate by contributing today and sharing. Help us deliver the product as fast as possible!

 

Share And Get Free Gear!

"Get a Free BlueDAC for referring 10 contributors!"

Please spread the word about this product across all of your social media channels and don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools! 

If you send your campaign link to your friends and ten of them contribute, we will give you a free BlueDAC! You don't need to contribute yourself.

Important: Use the sharing tool at the top of the campaign. Your sharing link is unique -- that's the link you need to send to all friends. That's how we will know how many contributors you have referred. Your link will look something like this:

http://igg.me/at/bluedac/x/111111

Note: 111111 is an example number, your own number will be different.

 

Share your link and let people know about it on facebook, twitter, instagram, reddit, head-fi and other sites! Make some noise!

This way you can win free products from CEntrance just for sharing. That's our way of saying thanks.

* Final battery capacity is still being confirmed at the time of this writing.

** Native iOS compatibility pending Apple approval.

CEntrance™, BlueDAC™ HiFi-Skyn™, HiFi-M8™, DACport™, DACportable™, DACmini™, JitterGuard™, and others are trademarks or registered trademarks of CEntrance Inc. in the U.S. and/or other countries. Apple, iPhone, iPad, iPod, iOS and others are trademarks of Apple. Other trademarks are property of their respective owners.
story_txt:
Unplug and Unwind
 
It's simple -- BlueDAC makes your headphones wireless. And it sounds awesome!
Take your favorite headphones, plug them into BlueDAC and start streaming from your phone. No cable tangles, no wire mess -- BlueDAC will play high quality audio through your headphones without any wires, connectors or adapters!
Use your iPhone or Android device. Use a tablet or a computer. Anything that can stream over Bluetooth will broadcast to BlueDAC, letting you enjoy high quality tunes without having to worry about cables.

 
Features at a Glance
 

Wired or Wireless input, BlueDAC has you covered!
3.5mm headphone jack and 2.5mm balanced output
Up to 384kHz and DSD audio quality with USB input
Lowest distortion and jitter due to proprietary clocking
AptX Sound Quality, proven to exceed MP3 quality
Long lasting, 20-hour battery (when using wireless input)
Digital volume control for precise L/R channel matching
Amp Extreme with 1000mW of power + line level output
20dB gain switch to accommodate any headphones 
3D printed chassis, Made in USA
Uses Earth-friendly, biodegradable plastic
Works with most iPhones, Androids, computers, phones and tablets
Distortion is so low that the device acts as a wire for a wireless signal
Available in black, other colors may be offered as campaign moves on

 
Timeline
We showed first prototypes at the Singapore Headphone Show in 03' 2017. They worked well and we collected useful feedback from lead users (thank you, guys!) Based on this feedback we are now making the final version. It will feature USB input and Balanced output. This product will be awesome with community input!
We expect to ship the first batch of 50 units in 06' 2017

 
Controls

 
BlueDAC builds upon the legacy of our award-winning portable audio products and adds the most requested features: Rechargeable Battery and Bluetooth Input. It comes from our team's years of experience in Audio Research and Development. 
This is our most advanced Personal D/A Converter and Amplifier, period. It will make your phones, tablets and computers sound their best without wires or draining their battery! What's wrong with my phone's headphone jack?You like going places and listening to music. You pack lightly when you travel, because it’s all about the experience and ease. You don't want to carry a separate music player for two reasons: First, they are expensive, and Second, you already have your phone! So, you load your music onto your phone, pack your favorite headphones and go!But, when you plug your awesome headphones into your phone, something’s not right. Something's missing from your music. It sounds caged-in. It lacks impact, clarity, and emotion. Your music just isn't ALIVE. And these days, what's missing is the headphone jack itself.The truth is that phones, laptops and tablets aren't designed by musicians and your phone is not an audiophile device! It was designed with the average consumer in mind, so it includes mid-grade parts to save costs. What a bummer! You hear the sound quality difference, and this gets very frustrating! Fortunately, there is an answer.It’s called BlueDAC and it comes from CEntrance, a leader in personal audio. For the last 17 years we've built equipment for recording studios, performance stages and broadcast facilities worldwide. We've designed mixing consoles, recording equipment, and home stereo systems for music professionals – the most demanding ears out there.BlueDAC is the answer to bad portable sound. We packaged an awesome audio system inside a small but durable case! Now you can listen to music in a whole new way using your phone, tablet, laptop or desktop. BlueDAC will breathe new LIFE into your music.  We make it easy to listen to music in high definition. Rediscover your own music collection, or enjoy streaming from Tidal, Spotify, Slacker, Pandora, and many others. Now you can access amazing audio quality at a truly affordable price! A Bit of HistoryIn 2009 CEntrance was the trailblazer. We made audio history with the release of a revolutionary product called DACport. It defined the cutting edge in portable Hi-Fi and single-handedly created a new product category. DACport, a cigar-shaped D/A converter and headphone amplifier, delivered audiophile sound to any high-end headphones and gave thousands of people access to high-quality music.  DACport's amazing sound earned it a place on Stereophile magazine's highly coveted "Recommended Components List" for 6+ years. It was featured on the cover and received numerous industry awards. This is unmatched by any other brand! Here is what Stereophile's John Atkinson had to say about DACport:        A Classic, RemixedLater, an updated version called DACport HD added High-Resolution audio and became smaller, lighter, and more ergonomic. DACport HD was crowdfunded right here on Indiegogo and sold thousands of units within months of introduction.    Here is what our customers said about DACport HD:The quality of my listening experience from Spotify with the M&D headphone paired with DACport HD is truly awe-inspiring. I cannot emphasize enough how amazing and how truly impressed and blown-away I am with the sound from DACport HD!Dominique JamesCEntrance released many exciting recording and playback products. Products such as MicPort Pro and AxePort Pro, endorsed by the Hollywood elite. Products such as DACmini and HiFi-M8, named "Best DAC Ever Tested" by CNET:  Introducing BlueDACToday we are excited to introduce our most advanced portable DAC/Amp. The battery-powered BlueDAC. This is what our customers have been waiting for.People with phones and tablets love to listen to music. But no one wants to carry around additional equipment, such as amps and battery packs. Our quality-minded customers demanded a self-powered DAC/Amp. Today, we are proud to deliver.Gone are external batteries. Gone are amplifier stacks. BlueDAC simplifies everything! Small and lightweight, jam-packed with Sonic Goodness, BlueDAC does it all. And yet, it's extremely travel-friendly. As frequent travelers ourselves, we designed it to pack well. Most importantly, this amp is really loud! Your headphones will be happy, and so will you! The CEntrance design team is known for its work with semiconductor leaders such as Texas Instruments, XMOS and AKM. We are listed on their websites as an official 3-rd party design firm. We have helped over 100 consulting clients such as Benchmark, Lavry, McIntosh, and Korg deliver great audio products to market.When developing BlueDAC, CEntrance has taken advantage of our special relationships and utilized modern approaches to portable power and audiophile sound quality. Major advances in technology allowed us to achieve further miniaturization and sonic improvements. We put Hi-Fi in the palm of your hand. What Does it Work With?BlueDAC is designed to support a wide variety of digital sources, from laptops to desktops, to tablets, to phones, and even TVs. That's on the wireless side. You can use the wired connection for highest audio quality, up to DSD when used as  a USB DAC.The unit is plug-and-play on Mac OS and we have drivers for Windows. Linux and newer Android devices are supported out of the box. You really cannot go wrong with BlueDAC. It will bring sweet music to your ears, no matter what you use for playback at work, at home, or in between. FeaturesJust like in our flagship products, we used high-quality, audiophile-grade components such as resistors, amplifiers and power supplies to dramatically raise the bar on sound quality. BlueDAC makes it possible to truly enjoy hi-res files on your phone. Here are the main features:  Performance Parts
Most Awesome Headphone Amp. Clean, quiet and powerful Amp Extreme™, "The best amp ever", according to CNET.
Balanced outputs. Highlight the Bass and treble!  Enjoy the silky-smooth high frequency sounds and punchy bass via the 2.5mm balanced connection, or the regular 3.5mm jack.
Amazingly Musical DAC. Our premium, Velvet Sound DAC from AKM is used in the world's most expensive recording and playback gear.
Digital Volume Control with 256 precision steps. Volume control with digital tracking keeps channels in perfect balance, always. Technical InnovationsA Li-Po rechargeable battery delivers 20 hours* of sweet music to your ears.Seven regulated internal power supplies provide full isolation from noise.USB input is the charging port: Charge the internal battery, while playing music!Two Picosecond clocks with JitterGuard™, our jitter removal technology.Two output level settings - LOW for Line output and HIGH for Headphones.Dual Input lets you listen without wires on the go, or via USB for best quality. Under the HoodYou are probably wondering what's under the hood. No problem! We don't mind sharing. Upgraded PowerBlueDAC takes 5V from a USB charger and filters the living daylights out of it before it gets to the audio circuitry, to make sure all noise is kept out of your music. Internally, BlueDAC has seven power supplies and multiple filter stages, creating different voltages to power its high-end digital and analog circuitry.Upgraded AmpDuring the very successful HiFi-Skyn design effort, we developed Amp Extreme, a headphone amplifier circuit that delivers high power and ultra low distortion, making headphones sing loud and clear. BlueDAC has Amp Extreme built in! Upgraded DACBlueDAC also shares the DAC chip with HiFi-Skyn. We use the brand new AK4490 from AKM. CEntrance is an official 3-rd party developer for AKM, so not only do we have access to best parts, but we also know how to use them.  Analog circuitry is known as "black art", but we've perfected it over the last 15 years.Upgraded USBThe asynchronous USB interface is handled by the brand new XMOS U8 chip. CEntrance is also a 3-rd party development house for XMOS. We help them build their parts into other companies' products and this gives us unprecedented level of support straight from the chip developers. Naturally, you can depend on CEntrance tech. Designed For Any HeadphonesSome headphone models remain customer favorites due to their special sonic signature. Yet, these headphones are not efficient enough to be driven directly from the cell phone. A powerful amplifier is needed. And the amp needs a power supply. This is why die-hard audiophiles carry stacks of gear—batteries, DACs, and amps:  BlueDAC changes all that. Our past products were powered from USB. But the amount of USB power is limited, making it hard to achieve really loud output. In such products we always had to make compromises on output power. Now that we have an internal battery, we can really amp it up for most demanding headphones. BlueDAC pumps out enough power to drive almost anything! Which Headphones should I use?We get that question a lot. You are in luck. You can use pretty much any high-end headphones. Because BlueDAC has a powerful headphone amp, it will match up not just with the ultra-sensitive IEMs, but also with the high-end models from AKG, Audeze, Beyerdynamic, Fostex, HiFi-Man, Master and Dynamic, Mr. Speakers, Sennheiser, and many others. It delivers your music in unmatched audio fidelity and on top of that, packs a long-lasting battery! BlueDAC is perfect for those extended shifts at work, while working out, on long flights, or at home, when you need some quality tunes but the phone's own buzzy sound just wouldn't cut it. Your iPhone is no Match for Your Cool CansThe smartphone is a great digital music player, but its headphone jack sucks! You may have awesome headphones, but your iPhone won’t get the best out of them—the sound will be muddy, lack clarity and punch, to say nothing about feeble bass.If you are into audio quality, these headphones are the real deal. But your iPhone doesn't support these headphones. That's the problem we solve with BlueDAC.   Who We Are CEntrance owes its reputation to thousands of happy customers, all around the world. Starting out as designers behind today's famous audio brands, CEntrance now has many products on the market. Our products are endorsed by Hollywood's famous producers, mastering engineers and musicians: people who demand quality— just like you do!—and whose livelihoods depend upon our quality.  Our list of endorsers includes Harry Shearer from This is Spinal Tap and The Simpsons, John Kapelos from Law and Order, David Bryson from Counting Crows, Richard Fortus, who plays with Guns and Roses, Rihanna, and Britney Spears; David Hampton, recording engineer for Herbie Hancock, Prince and many others! CEntrance recording products are used by the these famous broadcasters:  With CEntrance, you can rely on audio quality, build quality and value. CEntrance in the MediaWe've been profiled in numerous media publications. Here is a small sampling.Our Industry AwardsThe Absolute Sound Magazine has given our HiFi-M8 the coveted editor's choice award for 2015! We are making our flagship product easier to use and more affordable.CNET called our HiFi-M8 “The best-sounding headphone amp ever tested.”  Our DACmini was featured on the cover of Stereophile magazine!CEntrance is a world leader in digital audio. You’ve seen our professional products in recording and broadcast studios all over the world. Our personal audio products are killer, too.Just look at industry awards given to CEntrance:Given our background, you wouldn't expect us to settle for mediocre sound quality—and we didn’t! story:
Why We Create WooHoo

Enjoy music for fun. WooHoo is newfangled speaker to explore music with its curious eyes , its spirit of exploration. It is ideal designed for you who is pursuing new music style with fun and fashion.

Blinking Eyes

We adopted the 2X7W NdFeB magnetic dynamic driver and professional hifi speaker structure design to achieve quality bassy.  Blinking the eyes to enjoy high sound quality and wake up your energy.

Rotating mouth

The rotating mouth is designed to adjust your voice volume and achieve the cute expression in the meantime. Let the emotional WooHoo be with you to adjust your mood.

Unique Design 

WooHoo is designed by the award-winning team. The convertible magnetic hair and the pipe run design is the unique style of WooHoo.

 

 

Meet WooHoo

The Cute & Cuddly Smart Speaker with Amazon Alexa Built-In

 

Intuitive Voice Command Powered by Alexa

Woohoo is your adorable personal assistant. Integrated with Alexa,  WooHoo listens to your voice commands for smart home control, weather updates, playing music, and much more. Powered by the world’s most advanced AI technology, WooHoo can perform more than 35000+ Alexa skills for its user.

 

Alexa On-the-go, Take Voice Control Anywhere

WooHoo is the 1st Alexa-powered, on-the-go smart speaker. You hands-free voice command experience is no longer limited to Wi-Fi range. Take WooHoo out with you for a picnic, dance battle, or stroll in the park. WooHoo is always, at your side and ready for your command.

 

Tell WooHoo What to Play

Just ask for your favorite song, album or band. You can also request a specific genre or mood to perfectly fit any occasion, or simply let WooHoo pick the music for you. Integrated with Alexa built-in, you can subscribe and listen to any song using Amazon Music Unlimited.

 

Enjoy Your Music with Better Sound

WooHoo’s great big eyes are actually two built-in high-quality 5W speakers connected to port tubes that deliver magnificent stereo sound. Want it louder? Simply rotate WooHoo’s beak to control volume and create a funny appearance. 

 

Make Your Home Smarter

WooHoo integrates seamlessly with most smart-home technology systems. Including Philips Hue, Nest, WeMo, Tp-link, and more. Use your voice to turn on lights, warm up your space or clean your house. Take convenient control of your home by simply speaking your commands to control appliances, thermostats, lighting and more.

 

Activate Vacuum Cleaner

Turn Up Your Fan 

 

Setting Room Temperature

 

 

Organize Your Day & Achieve Your Daily Goals

Been busy lately? WooHoo can help you tackle your day in the most efficient way. Just ask and WooHoo will answer questions, order a pizza, read books, or even become your personal trainer to lead your workout routine. With thousands of Alexa Skills, you can tailor your WooHoo to match your lifestyle and meet your needs.

Remind your important appointment

Shop on Amazon Instantly

Be Your Personal Training Companion

 

 

Unique Design

At Otic, we’ve spent more than a decade manufacturing top audio devices. Over the last few years, we've seen hundreds of voice assistant enabled smart speakers enter the market since Alexa was announced 4 years ago. However most of them look boring and lack personality. They are either a simple cylinder like Echo, or a clone of Apple & Google. That’s why we want to make a difference.

We designed WooHoo for our young and passionate users. Every component is designed to the last detail so that WooHoo can come alive in your life, adding convenience and fun to your daily routine.

WooHoo’s design team was led by Mr.Li Weilin, founder of GWOWO Studio. Mr.Li’s team is dedicated to Happy design and has produced many award winning industrial designs over the past decade. When we first created WooHoo’s image, we all agreed that this speaker should be something truly unique and play a meaningful role in the daily lives of our users.

 

What's in the Box

 

Choose the WooHoo You Like

 

Perks We Offer

 

Tech Specs

 

 

How We Made WooHoo

 

About Otic

Otic is a team led by a bunch of young and passion designers, engineers, geeks and acoustic experts. We are ourselves music lover and tech enthusiasts. Our R&D team is deeply supported by Junlan Electronics, world’s leading audio design & manufacture company. Otic was established to disrupt the boring traditional audio market. WooHoo is our first product and the begining of our journey to bring more innovative products to life.

It is ideal designed for you who is pursuing new music style with fun and fashion.Blinking EyesWe adopted the 2X7W NdFeB magnetic dynamic driver and professional hifi speaker structure design to achieve quality bassy.  Blinking the eyes to enjoy high sound quality and wake up your energy.Rotating mouthThe rotating mouth is designed to adjust your voice volume and achieve the cute expression in the meantime. Let the emotional WooHoo be with you to adjust your mood.Unique Design WooHoo is designed by the award-winning team. The convertible magnetic hair and the pipe run design is the unique style of WooHoo.  Meet WooHooThe Cute & Cuddly Smart Speaker with Amazon Alexa Built-In Intuitive Voice Command Powered by AlexaWoohoo is your adorable personal assistant. Integrated with Alexa,  WooHoo listens to your voice commands for smart home control, weather updates, playing music, and much more. Powered by the world’s most advanced AI technology, WooHoo can perform more than 35000+ Alexa skills for its user. Alexa On-the-go, Take Voice Control AnywhereWooHoo is the 1st Alexa-powered, on-the-go smart speaker. You hands-free voice command experience is no longer limited to Wi-Fi range. Take WooHoo out with you for a picnic, dance battle, or stroll in the park. WooHoo is always, at your side and ready for your command. Tell WooHoo What to PlayJust ask for your favorite song, album or band. You can also request a specific genre or mood to perfectly fit any occasion, or simply let WooHoo pick the music for you. Integrated with Alexa built-in, you can subscribe and listen to any song using Amazon Music Unlimited. Enjoy Your Music with Better SoundWooHoo’s great big eyes are actually two built-in high-quality 5W speakers connected to port tubes that deliver magnificent stereo sound. Want it louder? Simply rotate WooHoo’s beak to control volume and create a funny appearance.  Make Your Home SmarterWooHoo integrates seamlessly with most smart-home technology systems. Including Philips Hue, Nest, WeMo, Tp-link, and more. Use your voice to turn on lights, warm up your space or clean your house. Take convenient control of your home by simply speaking your commands to control appliances, thermostats, lighting and more. Activate Vacuum Cleaner Turn Up Your Fan  Setting Room Temperature   Organize Your Day & Achieve Your Daily GoalsBeen busy lately? WooHoo can help you tackle your day in the most efficient way. Just ask and WooHoo will answer questions, order a pizza, read books, or even become your personal trainer to lead your workout routine. With thousands of Alexa Skills, you can tailor your WooHoo to match your lifestyle and meet your needs.Remind your important appointmentShop on Amazon Instantly Be Your Personal Training Companion    Unique DesignAt Otic, we’ve spent more than a decade manufacturing top audio devices. Over the last few years, we've seen hundreds of voice assistant enabled smart speakers enter the market since Alexa was announced 4 years ago. However most of them look boring and lack personality. They are either a simple cylinder like Echo, or a clone of Apple & Google. That’s why we want to make a difference.We designed WooHoo for our young and passionate users. story:
The Nuisance Engine (NE-1) is a handmade, analog pocket synthesizer unit designed by Hammerhead Audio. Modeled after a circuit that emulates the sounds of a V8 motor, the Nuisance Engine is an abrasive noise box with a mind of its own, capturing the coveted quality of unpredictable yet clear results from user input. The signal flow consists of a square wave oscillator exciting a variable frequency resonator filter, which then passes through a combination lowpass filter / distortion circuit that cranks in incredible amounts of gain as the filter cutoff decreases, creating a decidedly smushy, crushy end result. This all runs into an audiophile unfriendly Class B amplifier circuit so cheap that it ducks the power supply of the entire device in the process of driving the built-in speaker, leading to some weird, chaotic feedback magic that makes the NE-1 the Nuisance it is. Perfect for irritating your friends and enemies on the go...

Technical jargon and hyperbole aside, I designed a cool thing. I put a lot of time and love into the project, and I build each one of them by hand. The circuit is fun and unique, and captures the absolute best qualities of a noise synthesizer: harsh, wacky unpredictability combined with clear results from your input. It's an illogical system that you can learn to navigate. It runs off a 9V battery (or a 9V wall wart supply), it has a built-in speaker, and the enclosure is made of durable aluminum, making it perfect for noisemaking on the go. It also has a 3.5mm output and control voltage input, meaning that it plays nice with other synth/studio gear. The engineering inside is a work of beauty, and something I feel very proud of. There's awesome art by Suzanne Yeremyan, as well as the artful use of Webdings and the Almonte Snow font. The Nuisance Engine is a really cool thing, and I'd like to share it with people.

I'm taking preorders in order to finance an initial production run of 100 units. For a limited time, you can get a Nuisance Engine of your very own for the discount price of $80 (later this price will go up to $100). All the money I raise will go towards purchasing the enclosures, circuit boards, and electrical components. Putting something into large scale production has been a dream of mine for quite some time, and in addition to raising money for parts, it will be incredibly helpful knowing that all these Engines will go to good homes. Your support would mean the world to me. 

If you'd like to learn more about how it works, please see the instruction manual here: NE-1 Manual

If you'd like to learn more about who I am and what I do, you can check out my website here: hammerheadaudio.com

If you'd like to keep up with other cool stuff I'm making, find me on instagram: @hammerhead_audio

TLDR: I designed a synthesizer. You can preorder one for the discount price of $80, and this will help me buy the materials I need to build them. I'd really appreciate your support, and you'll get a cool thing in return.
