The way we've designed this clip is to be easily brandable. Whether a Race, non-profit, or business, look no further for the next fun marketing piece your customers will love. This clip is so amazingly handy, your customers will keep thinking about your charity, event or business for years to come. Special White label opportunities even available for the right customers. RETAILERS!If you are a small or mid-sized retailer looking for a great summer-time promotion or impulse buy, then this is the perfect opportunity for you. With small and medium retail packages available, we send you a box of our retail ready products, and even throw in a POP display for your storefront!NON-PROFIT?We love non-profits! So much that we give special perks just for you. Get a steal on a branded piece of merchandise to help support your cause. Give your customers a chance to keep remembering why they support your non-profit and a reason to give more! Select the right perk for your non-profit and let's start something together.SCHOOLS!
Calling all high-schools & colleges! Support your school spirit by branding your school's mascot and slogan on an O!Snap. With retail ready products, we can have your school mascot on a clip in no time, ready to be sold at the student store or football game!SHIPPINGAfter submitting your contribution, we will contact you with a link to pay additional shipping. This is best because we can bulk together multiple orders and send to you under one shipping cost instead of multiple. We will contact those that qualify for early shipping too!International customers: It would be worth your shipping costs to buy more than one!!!Estimated Shipping CostsSticker :: $Free  (US States) / $1 International1-5 Clips :: $2 Domestic (US States) / $10 International6-25 Clips :: $5 domestic (US States) / $20 international26+ :: $15 domestic (US States) / $30 internationalCustom Order/ Large Orders :: We will be contacting you directlyREVIEWShttp://thepalmettoqueen.blogspot.com/2013/08/osnap-convenience-for-headphone-wearers.htmlhttp://www.livyupdater.com/2013/09/osnap-headphone-clip-review.htmlhttp://libbyslibrary.com/2013/09/osnap-headphone-clip-review.html

story:
Missed the campaign?
You can still pre-order Mobius at audeze.com
Thank you for joining the Mobius Revolution!
We are now 4,083 strong! We look forward to giving you an unforgettable experience. Together we will enter a new realm of audio!

 

Introducing Audeze Mobius:

It's more than a headphone, it's an experience 

At Audeze, we create products that break the mold and change the rules.  We strive to create magical experiences for our customers that go beyond just being an ordinary headphone.   We have been at the forefront of the planar revolution, honoring the audiophile and exciting the audio pro.  Movies, television, and video games are all experiencing an era of unprecedented transformation. Additionally, media consumption is undergoing extraordinary changes.  

We wanted to create a headphone that could enhance this new frontier and provide an immersive cinematic experience that echoes the scope and grandeur the gaming and media world has become.  Mobius is our take on the ultimate gaming and media headphone.  

Mobius is more than a headphone, it is an experience, an opportunity to dynamically interlace your gaming audio in a 3D environment around yourself: to truly live and exist within your media.  Whether it’s a plane flying overhead or the rustling of brush from an enemy behind, the Mobius breathes life into every experience, taking the game from the screen to an entire room.

 

Mobius is a Critical Hit!

Don’t just take our word for it, hear what others have shared about the incredible Mobius experience:

 

A good analogy would be comparing Mobius to an audio equivalent of what VR headsets do for the visual component of games. We played some Assassin’s Creed Origins and listened to some music and both instances sounded as if I was in the middle of whatever scenario was going on, whether it was a jazz combo playing or some angry man with a sword trying to kill me.”

 

The soundstage of the Mobius headphones exhibited was immensely wide, which is by design, but — and this is the thing that will especially appeal to gamers — it was the precise positioning of each rebound that was most impressive."

 

 
With extremely advanced and integrated head tracking to create an uncanny sense of surround realism, the Audeze Mobius is something far greater than just a gaming headset. The Mobius is a highly sophisticated mixed media platform, and it's amazing."

 

Instead of relying on flashing lights and other gaudy gimmicks, Audeze is entering the headphone space with meaningful innovation. Building on the foundation of its planar magnetic drivers, the company has created a headset that can deliver 3D audio and sound localization that enhance video games as well as music, videos and phone calls."
 
 
 
 
Until you've tried Mobius, it's tough to translate what a genuinely remarkable experience it is and the differences it will make in your gaming reality. Just check out these responses to our phenomenal headphones from early product testing."
 
 
 

 

 

Delivering strategic advantage to take your game to the next level

Mobius is the first premium high-end, fully immersive 3D cinematic audio and head tracking-enabled headphone designed specifically for gamers. Mobius harnesses Audeze’s award winning planar magnetic technology and combines it with leading-edge head-tracking, room emulation, and sound localization technologies to unlock the full potential of gaming audio. 

 

 

 

Bringing Audeze’s award-winning audiophile sound to the gaming world

Audeze headphones have achieved worldwide acclaim among music industry professionals and audiophiles alike for their pure, spacious, and highly detailed sound and for innovation which has kept Audeze on the cutting-edge of audio technology for a decade.

Conceived under the belief that audio quality should never be compromised for the sake of utility, Mobius will be the first headphone to provide the unsurpassed level of detail, clarity, and positional accuracy of planar magnetic drivers in a feature-rich package designed specifically around the needs of both professional and casual gamers.

 

 

 

Want to customize your audio mix to better accentuate those details which are most important to you? 

Mobius features a diverse array of EQ presets that will make that award-winning soundtrack even more rich and vibrant, those explosions even more impactful, and those gunshots even more precise.

 

 

 

Looking for the edge that's finally going to push you to the top of the leaderboards?

Mobius’ technology truly optimizes the way your brain processes sound.  It breathes life into your game, spreading immersion beyond your monitor and encapsulating your whole room.   More specifically, with Mobius you will be able to hear your opponent sneaking up behind you, before you even see them, as clearly as if they were in the room with you!

 

 
 

 

Designed for comfortable, long-term use

But what good is all this great sound if the headphone is uncomfortable?  We designed Mobius with comfort in mind.

Mobius’ advanced technology and lightweight, ergonomic design provides comfortable, long-term use and reduced listening fatigue. Comfort is enhanced by the inclusion of fully replaceable, contoured memory foam ear pads and an adjustable, durable memory-foam padded, headband.

Mobius is tuned in the Audeze labs to reproduce a very natural sounding environment resulting in reduced listening fatigue and allowing you to enjoy your headphones for long periods of time. 

 

 

 

Featuring crystal-clear voice quality

In online gaming, it is important not just to hear the smallest details, but also to be heard by your team. 

Mobius comes with a flexible and detachable boom microphone with built-in noise attenuation, mute/unmute functionality, and independent microphone volume controls to provide professional voice quality.  Dictate your team strategy without having to worry about the details getting lost in translation.  

Switching to a single player game?  Simply detach the microphone and store for future use.

 

 

 

 

Plug and play with your favorite devices

While Mobius includes a wealth of ground-breaking features: it remains intuitively compatible with all of your favorite devices. Interface with your gaming rig or mobile device using USB, USB-C, or auxiliary connections.

 

 

 

 

Want to go wireless for mobile gaming?

Mobius also features Bluetooth functionality with almost three times the data bandwidth as other Bluetooth headphones. This level of versatility allows you to enjoy all of the benefits of Mobius on whichever platform you prefer.

 

 

 

 

 Not just the world’s most innovative gaming headphone, Mobius is a truly immersive, mixed media platform

 

 

With fully-integrated surround sound functionality, Mobius produces the same awe-inspiring cinematic experience you would find in a theatre.  Immerse yourself in your favorite movie.  Unplug and listen to music, binge watch Netflix, or rewatch Game of Thrones. 

 

 

 

Are you a content creator?

The optional Mobius Creator Package comes bundled with the latest 3D audio plugins from Waves, including the B360 Ambisonics Encoder and the NX Virtual Mix Room; both crucial tools for anyone working with Virtual and Augmented Reality applications.

 CREATORS EDITION FEATURES

•  Plugin based processing
•  Waves Nx Virtual Mix Room plugin
•  Waves Ambisonics B360 plugin
•  Audeze Cipher DSP
•  Unity Plugin support for VR audio from Waves
•  Realtime monitoring of Ambisonics B-Format
•  Pro Tools (HD), Logic Pro, Nuendo, Cubase, REAPER
•  Mono / Stereo / 5.0/ 5.1 / 7.1 to Quad
•  AmbiX to FuMa
•  FuMa to AmbiX

 

 

 The World's Leading Developer of Audio DSP Solutions

Waves is the world-leading developer of audio DSP technologies and the driving power behind hit records, major motion pictures and popular video games the world over. A recipient of a Technical GRAMMY® Award, Waves is acclaimed by top professional and prosumer users worldwide. More than 400,000 recording studios, mixing and mastering facilities use Waves' portfolio of cutting edge technologies on a daily basis to create top-selling music, movies and games. Waves' professional technologies, 25 years of expertise, and passion for sound are now utilized for all premium audio experiences on consumer electronics devices.

 

 

 

Extremely powerful and fully customizable

 Mobius is on the cutting edge of audio technology, offering gamers top tier technologies:

​

 

 

 

What's inside MOBIUS?

Mobius creates immersive cinematic 3D audio using a rich assortment of technologies and features.  At the foundation of Mobius’ great sound is our cutting edge planar magnetic technology that creates an accurate, distortion free, immersive sound, one that produces a real-world listening experience.  With materials originally designed for NASA, Audeze’s drivers are the most powerful and effective transducers in the world and make the Mobius sound just as incredible.  You won’t find this driver technology in any other gaming headphone!

 

 

 

 

The most technologically advanced headphone 

Mobius’ leading-edge technologies work together to take you from inside your headphone and out of your head into your content. You need all of these technologies to create realistic 3D audio and to produce immersive cinematic experience.

 

•  Full 3D emulation with support for popular surround soundmodes (7.1, 5.1, 5.0, 2.1, 2.0)
•  Integrated head tracking that tracks the tiniest movements of your head 1000 times a second
•  Pin point sound localization
•  Anatomy calibration to tailor the sound to the user
•  Full room emulation
•   Mobius integrates Waves Nx technology for real-time 3D processing in hardware

 

 

 

 

ACCURATE SOUND LOCALIZATION

Mobius creates a compelling surround sound experience with accurate 3D sound localization. Sound localization is a listener's ability to identify the location or origin of a detected sound, both in direction and by distance. The brain uses a variety of cues to precisely do so, the primary of these being the difference of timing and intensity of a sound as it reaches each ear.  These differences enable the brain to accurately locate sounds.

 

     

     

    CUSTOMIZABLE ROOM EMULATION

    The sound we hear comes directly from the source and also from multiple reflections of the sound on room walls and other objects. The brain uses the difference between the primary source and reflections to determine space. Mobius uses a very sophisticated customizable room model to create a sense of space.

     

       

       

      INTEGRATED HEAD TRACKING

      Adding head tracking to headphones enhances the experience of immersion in the game. Mobius precisely tracks head movements 1000 times a second and feeds the 3D emulation algorithm with head position information to aid sound localization and ultimately eliminate the cone of confusion: the brain’s inability to place sounds directly in front or behind without head movement.

       

       

       

      Are you Team Copper or Team Blue?

       

       

       WHATS IN THE BOX:

      •  Mobius Headphone
      •  Detachable Microphone
      •  USB-C to USB-C cable
      •  USB-A to USB-C cable
      •  Analog 3.5 mm cable
      •  Quick Start Guide
      •  User Guide
      •  Certificate of Authenticity

       

       

       

      MOBIUS SPECIFICATIONS

       

      Headphone style Over-ear, closed-circumaural
      Transducer type 100mm planar transducer
      Diaphragm Ultra-thin Uniforce™
      Acoustic impedance matching Fazor™ wave guides
      DSP Audeze Cipher DSP
      Magnet type Neodymium N50
      Amplifier Built-in balanced amplifier (output 1W)
      Maximum SPL >120 dB
      Headphone frequency response 10 Hz to 50 kHz
      Total harmonic distortion < 0.1% (1 kHz, 1 mW)
      Earpads Contoured memory foam: artificial leather
      Microphone Detachable with separate volume control
      Battery type Lithium-polymer
      Wireless Connection Bluetooth (SBC, AAC, LDAC)
      Wired Connection USB-C, USB-A, 3.5mm analog audio
      Weight 350g (including battery)

       

       

       

       

      THE MOST CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED HEADPHONE BRAND IN THE WORLD

      – Audeze Ranked #1 Best Reviewed Headphone Brand –

      PickyEar.com recently analyzed 310,067 headphone reviews to answer this question: What is the best headphone brand?  They looked at expert reviews. They looked at reputable forum reviews. They even looked at regular-user reviews. They collected and analyzed this data to see which of 32 brands consistently produce quality headphones, and ranked them based on this.  And what did they find:  The #1  top-ranked headphone brand is Audeze!

      “Audeze is the only real champion to the throne of headphones. There's no compromise with Audeze, and if you favor the bass end of the spectrum, you have probably been dreaming about some Audeze headphones for a while now. Each Audeze headphone has its own characteristics, but they offer the same level of quality across their range of products.”

      – PickyEar.com

       

       

       

      A JOURNEY INTO AUDIO

      Our story begins in 2008 at a small garage in the suburbs of Orange County, California with a vision and commitment to develop headphones that deliver the highest sound quality possible. We produced our first headphones in that garage. We also found our name there. Hanging on the wall was a movie poster for the classic 2001: A Space Odyssey. Wanting our company to deliver a “journey through audio,” the name Audeze (pronounced “odyssey”) was a perfect fit.

       

       

      We have grown since our beginning and are now internationally recognized for our leading-edge technology and innovation. To this date, our headphones continue to be designed and engineered in our Southern California facility.

       

      Audeze’s headphones connect you to your music in its purest form.  Many other brands of headphones add colorations to the sound, like pumped-up bass, a peaky midrange, or grating high frequencies.  That's not Audeze.  Building upon the many strengths of planar magnetic technology, Audeze has significantly advanced the art of transducer design and delivers the most exciting and engaging audio experience.  

      "If you’re passionate about music like we are, you’ll have songs and albums you have listened to for your whole life. You’ve heard these songs in a million different places on a million different systems. We are confident that the first time you listen to an Audeze headphone, you will discover details in the music you may have never heard before."

       – Sankar Thiagasamudram, CEO Audeze

       

       

       

       

      CUTTING-EDGE TECHNOLOGY

      Every Audeze headphone employs cutting-edge planar magnetic technology for more accurate, high-quality audiophile sound. Our headphones use proprietary, custom-cast magnets placed on one or both sides of the diaphragm to create a powerful magnetic field. The result is our high-end planar magnetic technology connects you to your favorite artists and musicians as if you were right there at the original event.

       

       

       

      BUILT FOR PERFORMANCE

      Audeze designs every headphone with quality first and foremost in mind. Our headphones are put through exacting inspections and thoroughly tested before leaving our facility for world-wide distribution. Audeze’s advanced manufacturing process combined with the latest materials and technology produces extremely accurate and incredible sounding headphones.

       

       

       

      UNCOMPROMISED AUDIO

      Since we produced our first headphone in 2008, our headphones have earned multiple awards, rave reviews and are the top choice of artists and audiophiles worldwide.

      These are some of those who know our products and have given us praise:


       

      MOBIUS TIMELINE

       


       

      INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS

      Shipping Internationally? Customers are responsible for any additional taxes, duties, or VAT for any product shipped outside the USA. Please read the FAQ below for details.

       

       

      FAQs

       

      How is Mobius different from other headphones?

      Mobius’ leading-edge technologies listed below work together to create realistic 3D audio and to produce an immersive cinematic experience.

      • Audeze's planar magnetic drivers optimized for spatial audio
      • Advanced 3D sound emulation algorithm that uses 6-axis (quaternion) tracking with 3-axial accelerometer and 3-axial gyroscope for continuous, intelligent head-tracking
      • Anatomically calibrated sound-field personalized based on head geometry
      • Psychoacoustically motivated customization of sound-field size
      • Support for surround sound modes

      The plug and play options with USB-C, Analog (3.5 mm) and Bluetooth with AAC / LDAC support allows you to get the Mobius high fidelity sound experience wherever you go, whenever you need it.   Mobius delivers a realistic 3D sound experience, in a manner consistent with real-world listening.  This means that you will hear your gaming opponent sneaking up behind you as clearly as though they were in the room with you!

      I’ve been burned in the past with Kickstarter and Indiegogo projects that either were very, very late, or never even shipped. What is my risk with the Mobius?

      Your risk is minimal because Mobius is beyond the research and development stage – Mobius is in the production stage!  Furthermore, Audeze is experienced as a company producing boundary-pushing technologies that have been tried, true, and awarded.   Currently, we are conducting safety, compliance, and other certifications.  Based on testing results, possible modifications might be required to pass said tests.  Firmware changes are relatively easy, but physical changes to Mobius might result in a small delay. Additionally, while we fully expect to start customer shipments in June, we could experience some delays in ramping up production if demand is exceedingly higher than expected based on long chipset lead times.  Regardless, Mobius is on the way and soon you can experience it too!

      Is this Vaporware?

      Most definitely not. Mobius has been tested and is undergoing final certifications as we speak.  This means we’re fully prepared to ship starting in June!  We’re ready to deliver and that time is nearly upon us.  Additionally, we expect the number of testimonials from people who have experienced Mobius to grow as the campaign continues. 

      Why is Audeze launching Mobius on Indiegogo?

      Making hardware is tough.  Even though the tooling and product development is complete, estimating demand is difficult for small and large companies alike.  This is an entirely new market for us and we need exposure beyond our traditional customer base. Indiegogo has proven its effectiveness in reaching the technophile and gaming sphere.   Putting this project on Indiegogo for this thirty-day introduction gives us a chance to reach out to as many new customers as possible.  It also allows us to better estimate how much we have to plan and order for initial production.

      Do I need any special software for this to work?

      No, this is not an encode/decode system. Mobius is designed specifically to provide you with the ease of a plug and play setup.  There is a software application for Windows that can be used to customize the headphone audio for those that so choose.  This will work without any need for external software.  However, the special Mobius Creator edition will require the plugins for VR and AR content creation. These will work with Windows, Macintosh, Linux, and Android (with correct USB audio drivers in use).

      We will release an application for Windows that will allow firmware updates, customization based on head geometry, and room size.  App support for other platforms will depend on demand. 

      Will Mobius work with my Xbox/Playstation/Switch?

      Mobius will work with Xbox/PS4/Switch using only the analog cable (or Bluetooth if applicable).  USB audio will not work with these devices.  However, the headtracking, room emulation, and spatialization also work in analog and Bluetooth modes.  So, even though you don't get USB audio, the analog connection with 3D audio is very compelling.

      Can I turn off the 3D features?

      Yes.  The 3D features can be turned off if you choose and Mobius can be used as standard Audeze planar headphones.

      Is the boom microphone included?

      Yes.  It uses a standard 3.5mm TRRS plug/jack.  You can easily remove it at any time, but please note it is “keyed” and should be inserted correctly.

      How long is the battery life, and how long does it take to fully charge?

      Battery life is around 10+ hours with 3D audio enabled.  With USB usage, the battery will be charged when plugged in.  Charge time with a 1.0 Amp charger and Mobius turned off is about 3 hours from 0% to 100%.

      If the battery runs out and I’m using the analog cable, will Mobius continue to work?

      No, due to all the features we’ve included, Mobius must either run on battery power or be plugged into a USB port.

      What is the material on the ear pads and headband? Are the ear pads replaceable?

      The ear pads and headband use memory foam covered in artificial leather.  The ear pads are contoured to provide both a good seal and comfort and are user replaceable. 

      Can I use Mobius for things other than gaming?

      Absolutely.  You can use Mobius for listening to music, watching movies in 5.1 or 7.1 surround sound, mixing or mastering audio (especially multichannel audio), creating content for VR/AR applications, or to simply wear around your neck.  In fact, they work great for teleconferencing (SKYPE, Discord, TeamSpeak calls!) and even FaceTime on iPhones.  Mobius is tuned to have frequency response like our LCD series of professional headphones and is equally great if used beyond gaming.

      Will this work over USB-C on my Android phone?

      We have tested Mobius with the following phones: Google Pixel phones, Sony USB-C models, Razer, and Samsung Galaxy s9.  We cannot guarantee compatibility with every USB-C mobile phone since the Android USB Audio implementation varies between manufacturers.  It will also work using the camera adapter on iDevices.

      Will this work with my iPhone?

      Mobius will work with iDevices using the Lightning-to-USB camera adapter.  There is no native Lightning connectivity.

      My cell phone only has a micro USB port. How do I get it to work with the USB C of the Mobius?

      A micro USB to C adapter (not included) should work for that purpose.

      Which Bluetooth profiles are supported?

      SBC, AAC and LDAC are supported.  LDAC support is still in compliance testing.

      Does Mobius support fast charging or wireless charging?

      No.

      What about support for Dolby Atmos, Ambisonics, MPEG-H, etc.?

      To bring Mobius to you as soon as possible, we’ve worked hard managing the fine balance between the features we can deliver in a timely manner, content availability, and what is truly capable within chipsets that are available today.  We firmly believe Mobius offers an unbeatable combination of price for its incredible feature set.  Some features not currently included today are on our road map for the future.  At this time, we have chosen to support Ambisonics through plugins.

      What is the warranty for Mobius?

      We offer a one-year warranty unless otherwise mandated by local laws.

      What is the battery warranty?

      Battery warranty is one year from the date we ship your Mobius.

      Will the Mobius be hand-built in Southern California like the rest of Audeze’s headphones?

      The Mobius is designed and engineered in our California facility. The planar transducers and their special thin films will also be manufactured here. Other parts will be sourced from different countries including Taiwan, China, and Japan. However, due to the large quantities needed to satisfy worldwide demand, the final assembly of Mobius will be in China with our own quality control department in charge of production.

      How much is the shipping?

      We offer free shipping within the USA.  The International shipping cost will vary by country as detailed below. Additionally, you will be responsible for any additional taxes, duties, or VAT for any product shipped outside the USA. 

      • Canada: $20
      • Europe: $30
      • Australia and New Zealand: $60
      • The rest of world:  $40

      Why should I order now?

      During this Indiegogo campaign, we are offering incredible value and remarkable discounts for our early adopters.  Early backers will receive the deepest discounts. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country and when you’ve placed your order. We will keep you up to date on every step of the process. 

      Where can I buy Mobius after the Indiegogo campaign ends?

      After our campaign ends, Mobius will be available directly from Audeze.com, the Audeze Amazon page, and a few select retailers in the USA (like Micro Center).  Mobius will also be available to virtually all countries via our international distributors.  However, due to different certifications required by each country, some countries may have delayed availability.

      I can’t wait to experience Mobius.  Is there anywhere that I can listen to the Mobius?

      Yes. We will be giving demos at our facility in Santa Ana, California. You can also demo Mobius at various trade shows including CanJam in LA and London, VRLA in Los Angeles, AXPONA in Chicago, among others.  We also have plans to host various gaming events in the future (details to come).

Featuring crystal-clear voice quality
In online gaming, it is important not just to hear the smallest details, but also to be heard by your team. Mobius comes with a flexible and detachable boom microphone with built-in noise attenuation, mute/unmute functionality, and independent microphone volume controls to provide professional voice quality.  Dictate your team strategy without having to worry about the details getting lost in translation.  
Switching to a single player game?  Simply detach the microphone and store for future use.
 
 
 

 
Plug and play with your favorite devices
While Mobius includes a wealth of ground-breaking features: it remains intuitively compatible with all of your favorite devices. Interface with your gaming rig or mobile device using USB, USB-C, or auxiliary connections.
 
 
 

 
Want to go wireless for mobile gaming?
Mobius also features Bluetooth functionality with almost three times the data bandwidth as other Bluetooth headphones. This level of versatility allows you to enjoy all of the benefits of Mobius on whichever platform you prefer.
 

 
 
 
 Not just the world’s most innovative gaming headphone, Mobius is a truly immersive, mixed media platform
 

 
With fully-integrated surround sound functionality, Mobius produces the same awe-inspiring cinematic experience you would find in a theatre.  Immerse yourself in your favorite movie.  Unplug and listen to music, binge watch Netflix, or rewatch Game of Thrones. 
 
 

 
Are you a content creator?
The optional Mobius Creator Package comes bundled with the latest 3D audio plugins from Waves, including the B360 Ambisonics Encoder and the NX Virtual Mix Room; both crucial tools for anyone working with Virtual and Augmented Reality applications.
 CREATORS EDITION FEATURES

•  Plugin based processing•  Waves Nx Virtual Mix Room plugin•  Waves Ambisonics B360 plugin•  Audeze Cipher DSP•  Unity Plugin support for VR audio from Waves•  Realtime monitoring of Ambisonics B-Format•  Pro Tools (HD), Logic Pro, Nuendo, Cubase, REAPER•  Mono / Stereo / 5.0/ 5.1 / 7.1 to Quad•  AmbiX to FuMa•  FuMa to AmbiX
 


 

 The World's Leading Developer of Audio DSP Solutions
Waves is the world-leading developer of audio DSP technologies and the driving power behind hit records, major motion pictures and popular video games the world over. A recipient of a Technical GRAMMY® Award, Waves is acclaimed by top professional and prosumer users worldwide. More than 400,000 recording studios, mixing and mastering facilities use Waves' portfolio of cutting edge technologies on a daily basis to create top-selling music, movies and games. Waves' professional technologies, 25 years of expertise, and passion for sound are now utilized for all premium audio experiences on consumer electronics devices.
 
 
 
Extremely powerful and fully customizable
 Mobius is on the cutting edge of audio technology, offering gamers top tier technologies:
​
 
 
 

What's inside MOBIUS?
Mobius creates immersive cinematic 3D audio using a rich assortment of technologies and features.  At the foundation of Mobius’ great sound is our cutting edge planar magnetic technology that creates an accurate, distortion free, immersive sound, one that produces a real-world listening experience.  With materials originally designed for NASA, Audeze’s drivers are the most powerful and effective transducers in the world and make the Mobius sound just as incredible.  You won’t find this driver technology in any other gaming headphone!

 
 
 
 
The most technologically advanced headphone 
Mobius’ leading-edge technologies work together to take you from inside your headphone and out of your head into your content. You need all of these technologies to create realistic 3D audio and to produce immersive cinematic experience.
 

•  Full 3D emulation with support for popular surround soundmodes (7.1, 5.1, 5.0, 2.1, 2.0)•  Integrated head tracking that tracks the tiniest movements of your head 1000 times a second•  Pin point sound localization•  Anatomy calibration to tailor the sound to the user•  Full room emulation•   Mobius integrates Waves Nx technology for real-time 3D processing in hardware
 
 
 

 
ACCURATE SOUND LOCALIZATION
Mobius creates a compelling surround sound experience with accurate 3D sound localization. Sound localization is a listener's ability to identify the location or origin of a detected sound, both in direction and by distance. The brain uses a variety of cues to precisely do so, the primary of these being the difference of timing and intensity of a sound as it reaches each ear.  These differences enable the brain to accurately locate sounds.
 

 

 
CUSTOMIZABLE ROOM EMULATION
The sound we hear comes directly from the source and also from multiple reflections of the sound on room walls and other objects. The brain uses the difference between the primary source and reflections to determine space. Mobius uses a very sophisticated customizable room model to create a sense of space.
 

 

 
INTEGRATED HEAD TRACKING
Adding head tracking to headphones enhances the experience of immersion in the game. Mobius precisely tracks head movements 1000 times a second and feeds the 3D emulation algorithm with head position information to aid sound localization and ultimately eliminate the cone of confusion: the brain’s inability to place sounds directly in front or behind without head movement.
 
 
 
Are you Team Copper or Team Blue?
 

 
 WHATS IN THE BOX:

•  Mobius Headphone•  Detachable Microphone•  USB-C to USB-C cable•  USB-A to USB-C cable•  Analog 3.5 mm cable•  Quick Start Guide•  User Guide•  Certificate of Authenticity
 
 
 
MOBIUS SPECIFICATIONS
 


Headphone style
Over-ear, closed-circumaural


Transducer type
100mm planar transducer


Diaphragm
Ultra-thin Uniforce™


Acoustic impedance matching
Fazor™ wave guides


DSP
Audeze Cipher DSP


Magnet type
Neodymium N50


Amplifier
Built-in balanced amplifier (output 1W)


Maximum SPL
>120 dB


Headphone frequency response
10 Hz to 50 kHz


Total harmonic distortion
< 0.1% (1 kHz, 1 mW)


Earpads
Contoured memory foam: artificial leather


Microphone
Detachable with separate volume control


Battery type
Lithium-polymer


Wireless Connection
Bluetooth (SBC, AAC, LDAC)


Wired Connection
USB-C, USB-A, 3.5mm analog audio


Weight
350g (including battery)


 


 
 
 

THE MOST CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED HEADPHONE BRAND IN THE WORLD
– Audeze Ranked #1 Best Reviewed Headphone Brand –
PickyEar.com recently analyzed 310,067 headphone reviews to answer this question: What is the best headphone brand?  They looked at expert reviews. They looked at reputable forum reviews. They even looked at regular-user reviews. They collected and analyzed this data to see which of 32 brands consistently produce quality headphones, and ranked them based on this.  And what did they find:  The #1  top-ranked headphone brand is Audeze!
“Audeze is the only real champion to the throne of headphones. There's no compromise with Audeze, and if you favor the bass end of the spectrum, you have probably been dreaming about some Audeze headphones for a while now. Each Audeze headphone has its own characteristics, but they offer the same level of quality across their range of products.”
– PickyEar.com
 
 

 
A JOURNEY INTO AUDIO
Our story begins in 2008 at a small garage in the suburbs of Orange County, California with a vision and commitment to develop headphones that deliver the highest sound quality possible. We produced our first headphones in that garage. We also found our name there. Hanging on the wall was a movie poster for the classic 2001: A Space Odyssey. Wanting our company to deliver a “journey through audio,” the name Audeze (pronounced “odyssey”) was a perfect fit.
 

 
We have grown since our beginning and are now internationally recognized for our leading-edge technology and innovation. To this date, our headphones continue to be designed and engineered in our Southern California facility.

 
Audeze’s headphones connect you to your music in its purest form.  Many other brands of headphones add colorations to the sound, like pumped-up bass, a peaky midrange, or grating high frequencies.  That's not Audeze.  Building upon the many strengths of planar magnetic technology, Audeze has significantly advanced the art of transducer design and delivers the most exciting and engaging audio experience.  
"If you’re passionate about music like we are, you’ll have songs and albums you have listened to for your whole life. You’ve heard these songs in a million different places on a million different systems. We are confident that the first time you listen to an Audeze headphone, you will discover details in the music you may have never heard before."
 – Sankar Thiagasamudram, CEO Audeze
 
 
 

 
CUTTING-EDGE TECHNOLOGY
Every Audeze headphone employs cutting-edge planar magnetic technology for more accurate, high-quality audiophile sound. Our headphones use proprietary, custom-cast magnets placed on one or both sides of the diaphragm to create a powerful magnetic field. The result is our high-end planar magnetic technology connects you to your favorite artists and musicians as if you were right there at the original event.
 
 

 
BUILT FOR PERFORMANCE
Audeze designs every headphone with quality first and foremost in mind. Our headphones are put through exacting inspections and thoroughly tested before leaving our facility for world-wide distribution. Audeze’s advanced manufacturing process combined with the latest materials and technology produces extremely accurate and incredible sounding headphones.
 
 
 
UNCOMPROMISED AUDIO
Since we produced our first headphone in 2008, our headphones have earned multiple awards, rave reviews and are the top choice of artists and audiophiles worldwide.
These are some of those who know our products and have given us praise:


 
MOBIUS TIMELINE

 

 

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS
Shipping Internationally? Customers are responsible for any additional taxes, duties, or VAT for any product shipped outside the USA. Please read the FAQ below for details.

 
 
FAQs
 
How is Mobius different from other headphones?
Mobius’ leading-edge technologies listed below work together to create realistic 3D audio and to produce an immersive cinematic experience.

Audeze's planar magnetic drivers optimized for spatial audio
Advanced 3D sound emulation algorithm that uses 6-axis (quaternion) tracking with 3-axial accelerometer and 3-axial gyroscope for continuous, intelligent head-tracking
Anatomically calibrated sound-field personalized based on head geometry
Psychoacoustically motivated customization of sound-field size
Support for surround sound modes

The plug and play options with USB-C, Analog (3.5 mm) and Bluetooth with AAC / LDAC support allows you to get the Mobius high fidelity sound experience wherever you go, whenever you need it.   Mobius delivers a realistic 3D sound experience, in a manner consistent with real-world listening.  This means that you will hear your gaming opponent sneaking up behind you as clearly as though they were in the room with you!
I’ve been burned in the past with Kickstarter and Indiegogo projects that either were very, very late, or never even shipped. What is my risk with the Mobius?
Your risk is minimal because Mobius is beyond the research and development stage – Mobius is in the production stage!  Furthermore, Audeze is experienced as a company producing boundary-pushing technologies that have been tried, true, and awarded.   Currently, we are conducting safety, compliance, and other certifications.  Based on testing results, possible modifications might be required to pass said tests.  Firmware changes are relatively easy, but physical changes to Mobius might result in a small delay. Additionally, while we fully expect to start customer shipments in June, we could experience some delays in ramping up production if demand is exceedingly higher than expected based on long chipset lead times.  Regardless, Mobius is on the way and soon you can experience it too!
Is this Vaporware?
Most definitely not. Mobius has been tested and is undergoing final certifications as we speak.  This means we’re fully prepared to ship starting in June!  We’re ready to deliver and that time is nearly upon us.  Additionally, we expect the number of testimonials from people who have experienced Mobius to grow as the campaign continues. 
Why is Audeze launching Mobius on Indiegogo?
Making hardware is tough.  Even though the tooling and product development is complete, estimating demand is difficult for small and large companies alike.  This is an entirely new market for us and we need exposure beyond our traditional customer base. Indiegogo has proven its effectiveness in reaching the technophile and gaming sphere.   Putting this project on Indiegogo for this thirty-day introduction gives us a chance to reach out to as many new customers as possible.  It also allows us to better estimate how much we have to plan and order for initial production.
Do I need any special software for this to work?
No, this is not an encode/decode system. Mobius is designed specifically to provide you with the ease of a plug and play setup.  There is a software application for Windows that can be used to customize the headphone audio for those that so choose.  This will work without any need for external software.  However, the special Mobius Creator edition will require the plugins for VR and AR content creation. These will work with Windows, Macintosh, Linux, and Android (with correct USB audio drivers in use).
We will release an application for Windows that will allow firmware updates, customization based on head geometry, and room size.  App support for other platforms will depend on demand. 
Will Mobius work with my Xbox/Playstation/Switch?
Mobius will work with Xbox/PS4/Switch using only the analog cable (or Bluetooth if applicable).  USB audio will not work with these devices.  However, the headtracking, room emulation, and spatialization also work in analog and Bluetooth modes.  So, even though you don't get USB audio, the analog connection with 3D audio is very compelling.
Can I turn off the 3D features?
Yes.  The 3D features can be turned off if you choose and Mobius can be used as standard Audeze planar headphones.
Is the boom microphone included?
Yes.  It uses a standard 3.5mm TRRS plug/jack.  You can easily remove it at any time, but please note it is “keyed” and should be inserted correctly.
How long is the battery life, and how long does it take to fully charge?
Battery life is around 10+ hours with 3D audio enabled.  With USB usage, the battery will be charged when plugged in.  Charge time with a 1.0 Amp charger and Mobius turned off is about 3 hours from 0% to 100%.
If the battery runs out and I’m using the analog cable, will Mobius continue to work?
No, due to all the features we’ve included, Mobius must either run on battery power or be plugged into a USB port.
What is the material on the ear pads and headband? Are the ear pads replaceable?
The ear pads and headband use memory foam covered in artificial leather.  The ear pads are contoured to provide both a good seal and comfort and are user replaceable. 
Can I use Mobius for things other than gaming?
Absolutely.  You can use Mobius for listening to music, watching movies in 5.1 or 7.1 surround sound, mixing or mastering audio (especially multichannel audio), creating content for VR/AR applications, or to simply wear around your neck.  In fact, they work great for teleconferencing (SKYPE, Discord, TeamSpeak calls!) and even FaceTime on iPhones.  Mobius is tuned to have frequency response like our LCD series of professional headphones and is equally great if used beyond gaming.
Will this work over USB-C on my Android phone?
We have tested Mobius with the following phones: Google Pixel phones, Sony USB-C models, Razer, and Samsung Galaxy s9.  We cannot guarantee compatibility with every USB-C mobile phone since the Android USB Audio implementation varies between manufacturers.  It will also work using the camera adapter on iDevices.
Will this work with my iPhone?
Mobius will work with iDevices using the Lightning-to-USB camera adapter.  There is no native Lightning connectivity.
My cell phone only has a micro USB port. How do I get it to work with the USB C of the Mobius?
A micro USB to C adapter (not included) should work for that purpose.
Which Bluetooth profiles are supported?
SBC, AAC and LDAC are supported.  LDAC support is still in compliance testing.
Does Mobius support fast charging or wireless charging?
No.
What about support for Dolby Atmos, Ambisonics, MPEG-H, etc.?
To bring Mobius to you as soon as possible, we’ve worked hard managing the fine balance between the features we can deliver in a timely manner, content availability, and what is truly capable within chipsets that are available today.  We firmly believe Mobius offers an unbeatable combination of price for its incredible feature set.  Some features not currently included today are on our road map for the future.  At this time, we have chosen to support Ambisonics through plugins.
What is the warranty for Mobius?
We offer a one-year warranty unless otherwise mandated by local laws.
What is the battery warranty?
Battery warranty is one year from the date we ship your Mobius.
Will the Mobius be hand-built in Southern California like the rest of Audeze’s headphones?
The Mobius is designed and engineered in our California facility. The planar transducers and their special thin films will also be manufactured here. Other parts will be sourced from different countries including Taiwan, China, and Japan. However, due to the large quantities needed to satisfy worldwide demand, the final assembly of Mobius will be in China with our own quality control department in charge of production.
How much is the shipping?
We offer free shipping within the USA.  The International shipping cost will vary by country as detailed below. Additionally, you will be responsible for any additional taxes, duties, or VAT for any product shipped outside the USA. 

Canada: $20
Europe: $30
Australia and New Zealand: $60
The rest of world:  $40

Why should I order now?
During this Indiegogo campaign, we are offering incredible value and remarkable discounts for our early adopters.  Early backers will receive the deepest discounts. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country and when you’ve placed your order. We will keep you up to date on every step of the process. 
Where can I buy Mobius after the Indiegogo campaign ends?
After our campaign ends, Mobius will be available directly from Audeze.com, the Audeze Amazon page, and a few select retailers in the USA (like Micro Center).  Mobius will also be available to virtually all countries via our international distributors.  However, due to different certifications required by each country, some countries may have delayed availability.
I can’t wait to experience Mobius.  Is there anywhere that I can listen to the Mobius?
Yes. We will be giving demos at our facility in Santa Ana, California. You can also demo Mobius at various trade shows including CanJam in LA and London, VRLA in Los Angeles, AXPONA in Chicago, among others.  We also have plans to host various gaming events in the future (details to come).

story:
Our Indiegogo InDemand campaign has ended but you can still pre-order Zungle Panther at :  ZUNGLE Website

 

* Delivery : In order to keep up with the production schedule and sequential delivery, those who contribute starting on February 21st of 2017 (PST) will be in the new delivery schedule.
For those who contribute starting on February 21st of 2017 (PST), the new expected delivery will be in May. 
However, for those who have already contributed by February 20th of 2017 (PST), the expected delivery will be in April, the same as before. We assure you that those who contributed by February 20th of 2017 (PST) will receive the product in April. 

 

** Survey : We sent the survey out to every contributors. (by March 31st)

  • Please let us know if you still haven't received the survey yet. (The survey was sent to email address which is registered as your Indiegogo account)
  • If you want to update your information, you can edit the survey through the link (Edit survey) which is included in the survey confirmation e-mail from Google Forms.

 

Each color frame will come with a set of default color lenses.

    - FRAME x LENSES

    - Matt Black x Bonfire

    - Matt White x Moss Green

    - Gray x Oasis Blue

    - Neon Green x Blood Ruby

    - Neon Pink x Aurora Purple

However, you will have a set of additional FREE lens. You will select the color of the additional lens set.  (This will not be applied after the 2nd survey. Feb 28th)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

*By placing your pre-order through Indiegogo, you agree to Zungle's warranty disclaimer. You can check the warranty details from the website.

**After the 2nd survey, a refund cannot be made without any legitimate cause.

 

 

 

 

 

The PP product is made for the experimental production phase. It is produced to find out problems that we did not expect from our designing stage with the modeling data that we shared last time. Sometimes what we see from the computer screen is different once it comes out to the real life. If we find out any issue from the PP product, we indicate the problems to the manufacturer and they compensate the defects. Also, by assembling the product, we can check out the details of each component. Most importantly, every component has a design intended function and we must double check whether it works well or not by assembling them. In our case, we are producing 1,000 PP product and some of them are already compensated it's defect.

2. Lens Frame

We would like to show a hidden wire. The wire is installed inside of the frame. The wire connects the battery to the PCV module. Thus, we cut the lens frame in half to show you the wire that we put inside. The frame is holing the wire so tight that it will not be moving around the frame. 

3. Right Leg

The right leg has a touch pad, a PCV module, a power button and etc. As you see from the images below, some of you may ask us why the right leg has more components than the other side. It is because to keep the balance equal to the left leg. Also because there are more right handed people in the world, the control pad is on the right side.

4. Left Leg

This is where the battery goes inside. The battery is one of the heaviest components of Zungle Panther.(BUT, it is still light :)) As it is mentioned above, keeping the balance is one of our goals and it worked well. Check out the images below.

5. Speakers

The speakers, the most important part of Zungle Panther, are located at the end of each leg. The silver round shaped ones are the speakers. Then, a couple of silicon components and plastic components are surrounding the speakers. The surroundings prevent delivering the vibration from the speakers to the lens frame. Then, you will only be able to feel the vibration from the speakers. 

6. Complete Product

We all know you have been waiting for this. We won't talk much. Let's see it.

'Exploded View'

'Actual Outputs'

It is because to keep the balance equal to the left leg. Also because there are more right handed people in the world, the control pad is on the right side.4. Then, you will only be able to feel the vibration from the speakers. 6. Complete ProductWe all know you have been waiting for this. We won't talk much. Let's see it.

story:
You know the feeling. You’re getting ready for an epic day of riding. The sky is clear, the powder is fresh, the road is empty, the trails are calling your name. You slip into your best gear, put on your favorite playlist, pull your helmet on, and suddenly, your earbud headphones are digging into your ear canal like something out of an alien invasion movie.

You could skip the helmet, or you could skip the music. One seems pretty dangerous, and the other seems kind of boring. If you’re anything like us, you don’t want to have to choose between your favorite tunes and your favorite organ.

Thankfully, with Versafit wireless headphones, you don’t have to.

 

 

Versafit headphones were designed with the rider in mind. Our speakers lie flat and comfortable between your ears and even the tightest, most secure helmets. The adjustable memory wire wraps around your ear ensuring a comfortable, custom fit. And the sound is non-noise canceling, which means you can hear your music and the world around you (talk to friends, hear traffic, or simply avoid unnecessary collisions). Just because you’re wearing a helmet doesn’t mean you want to actually use it.

Versafit headphones aren’t just for riders - they’re for anyone who demands comfortable gear for an active lifestyle. Because of their design, Versafit headphones can be worn all day - in the gym, at the office, and on your commute - without causing the uncomfortable pressure points associated with earbuds or headphones - no sore ears, no bulky headband, just really comfortable sound.

 

 

 

Specifications:

Bluetooth® 4.1

Weight: 24 grams

Frequency range: 20-20khz 

Sweatproofing: IPX4 

Waterproof PCB nano-coating 

Battery life: Up to 10.5 hours of playback 

Battery size: 180mAh

Compatibility:

iPhone® 4S, 5, 5C, 5S, 6, 6S, 6 Plus, 7, 7 Plus

iPad® - all Android phones with Bluetooth 

Windows Phone with Bluetooth 

Blackberry with Bluetooth 

FOR AUDIO SUPPORT: Any Bluetooth A2DP or aptX® compatible device

Risks and challenges

The risks and challenges associated with this Kickstarter Campaign are related to the challenges associated with manufacturing and production.

As a company, we have been developing and manufacturing products since 2011, so while we are well aware of the challenges of manufacturing, we also know that sometimes, unexpected things happen.

We’ll do our best to keep our production schedule on track and deliver product as promised. However, there is always a risk for production and delivery delays.

Other product-related risks, including defective product, are guaranteed by our one-year manufacturer’s warranty. Any backers who encounter issues with their product will be welcome to exchange it at no cost by contacting our customer support department.

story:
Introducing Duo Speakers™



Duo Speakers™ Utilize Advanced Bluetooth Technology to Connect Two Wireless Speakers, to the Same Device, resulting in True Stereo Sound. 


Backers of our Rebel and Mighty Speaker Campaigns have been asking for the ability to pair two speakers to one device so they can enjoy stereo sound and listen to the same song in two adjoining rooms...we listened.

"Finally, a wireless Bluetooth speaker that can be split in two and placed in separate locations, providing true stereo sound and room-to-room streaming music." ~ Mike D. 


Product Details:

Duo Speakers™ consist of two Wireless Bluetooth Speakers that come packaged as one unit which can then be split into two separate speakers, both sharing the same Bluetooth connection.

The two speakers are located on opposite ends of the combined unit and held together by a magnetic connection in the middle.


You can enjoy standard stereo sound that other two-speaker bluetooth "pills, tubes and boxes" provide by using the Duo Speakers™ connected end to end as one unit facing apart or angled forward, or you can split the two speakers up and position them as close or far away from each other as you would like, to enjoy True Stereo Sound. 



Want to enjoy the same music in two adjoining rooms or areas?
Duo Speakers™ can be placed up to 32 feet apart (distance varies based on density of obstructions) allowing for both speakers to be located in different rooms while sharing the same Bluetooth connection and playing the same track.

Key Features of Duo Speakers™

  • Two Hi-Fi 3W Speakers Provide Clear, Crisp Sound
  • Both speakers connect to one device via Bluetooth 4.0
  • Duo Speakers™ can be used simultaneously or separately
  • Listen to them as one unit, apart in stereo or in separate rooms/areas
  • Speakers can be used up to 32 feet apart
  • Both speakers adjoin via internal magnets, forming one unit
  • Up to 7+ hours of music playback
  • Multiple color choices to suit your style (prototype shown, final design TBD)


What We Need & What You Get:

We are almost ready for our first production run of Duo Speakers™ with your help!

  • The $17,500 needed will be used for final production and perk fulfillment.
  • We are offering Early Backers over 50% off the MSRP.
  • Standard Backers will receive 30-40% off the MSRP.


Timeline of Events:

  • November 2014: Prototype testing & campaign launch on Indiegogo
  • December 2014: Pre-production adjustments based on testing and feedback
  • January 2015: Campaign ends, collect backer data, finalize production details
  • February 2015: Begin first full production run and packaging
  • March 2015: Begin shipping perks to EARLY backers!
  • June 2015: Standard shipping begins


Risks & Challenges:

We have launched several successful bluetooth audio products and have become quite familiar with the process, working with our manufacturing partners and navigating the Indiegogo and BackerKit platforms.

With that being said, one common problem we have faced in the past has been production and shipping delays.

We have implemented a more precise timeline of events for Duo Speakers™ based on what we have learned from our previous campaigns.

We are confident that we will provide you with a high quality product in a timely manner and will keep you updated along the way.


Product Specifications:

  • Two Speakers: 52mm Diameter, 3watt, Hi-Fi Audio
  • Built-in 800 mAh Rechargeable Lithium Ion Battery (per speaker)
  • Bluetooth 4.0 - CSR Bluetooth Chip
  • Charging Voltage 5V / 1A
  • Charging Time ~ 3-4 Hours
  • Playback Time 7+ Hours
  • Product Dimensions 6.1" x 2.44" x 2.44" (155mm x 62mm x 62mm)
  • Product Weight 1.1 lbs (500g)
  • Connection Distance 32 feet (10 meters)


Bloggers, Techies and Audiophiles Wanted:

If you operate a successful tech blog, review channel or website we want to hear from you, we are always looking for honest reviews and feedback.

Send an email to support@morrisoninnovations.com for:

  • A Free Demo Unit to Test and Review
  • Link-backs from our Indiegogo Campaign, Websites and Blog
  • Discount Coupon Codes for your Readers/Subscribers for after the campaign

story:
MADE FOR CREATORS 

For all the content creators, journalists, 
filmmakers & videographers

With Mikme Pocket, you add professional sound to your videos and films easily. So you can better focus on what is in front of the camera.
 


Featured in & used by

MIKME POCKET 

 

Because every moment matters

You can control Mikme Pocket and all audio aspects with the Mikme App. Listen in, monitor or level the sound with your smartphone. Create content faster than ever. Once finished, you can instantly edit your sound, add effects or share with an audience.

And if you film with your phone, the high-quality audio and video content will be in one place. Because the Mikme Pocket automatically syncs video and audio. It transmits professional sound in 44.1kHz and 24 Bits reliably over Bluetooth. No extra receiver, no dropouts. 
 


Carry less equipment

Standalone Recording 

Use the Mikme Pocket as standalone recorder for video shootings with a professional camera. Attach the clip-on mic to your talent and you record the finest audio for post production. 

Remote Control & Audio/Video Sync via Mikme App

Together with the dedicated App, you can start and stop a recording remotely and listen in to make sure your audio is in the right place. When you film with your phone, you can directly stream and sync the best Mikme sound with your phone’s video.

Mikme Pocket will work with other 3rd party audio/video apps like Filmic on iOS, Android, Windows or MacOS via Bluetooth HFP.*

Control, stream, sync and edit the audio of more than one Mikme Pocket but with just one phone; perfect for interviews and any situation with more than one person to record. You can also mix and capture audio simultaneously from a Mikme Pocket and one of our original Mikme Microphones.

Also, Mikme Pocket comes with a lavalier microphone, but you can easily connect any other microphone via the mini XLR connector.

Audio Recorder with studio sound

Mikme Pocket records highest quality sound, in 24Bits and up to 96kHz. No matter when inspiration strikes, just tap the main button and start recording with the built-in audio recorder. Bye bye confusing interfaces. 

Extended bandwidth for mobile shootings

When you film with your phone you'll always record best audio quality cause you pick up the sound right at the source. And you won't be limited by the standard bluetooth bandwidth (8 or 16kHz/16 Bits) as you stream wirelessly in 44.1kHz/24Bit with the Mikme App. No dropouts due to the failsafe on-device backup. 


Increase engagements

Mikme Pocket and the Mikme App let you stream live to Facebook and other social channels with professional sound and in real-time. Up your game easily and quickly with high quality live updates on social. Discover new ways to reach and engage your audience.



How does it sound?

Don't just take our word for it. Take a listen for yourself. Here is how Mikme Pocket sounds:  


MIKME APP 

There will be a PRO version that is included in most perks. The free BASIC version covers the essential features to record and sync best Mikme sound with your video. 
 

 

Here is a complete Mikme App run-through:

ARE YOU IN? 

Then pick a reward and click GET THIS PERK.

Do you want to spread the word? 

You can support us and benefit from it. :) Simply click the banner to signup for Kickbooster and your bonus:    

WHAT'S IN THE BOX  

  • Clip-on microphone with a wind screen and clip 
  • Micro usb cable
  • Mikme Pocket Pro 16GB 
  • Mikme Pocket belt clip 
  • Mikme Pro App Lifetime 

TECH SPECS    


More technical details


THE TIMELINE 

We are planning to ship Mikme Pocket in December 2019 and since this is already our third crowdfunding campaign, we feel confident about our ability to deliver on time and we promise to keep you in the loop along the way. 

90% of the Mikme Pocket and the Mikme Microphone share the electronics, housing parts and software, as well as the manufacturer. That means there is no hassle of finding a production line, that's been in place for years. 

Take a look at the timeline to see what we've achieved so far and what we're working on. ;-)

2019

  • February: First housing parts from injection molds – DONE 
  • April: Final housing parts received – DONE 
  • May: Electronics verified – DONE 
  • August: Electronics certification finished
  • October: Starting mass production
  • November: Android App (remote and audio only)
  • December: Shipping to first backers

2020 (Q1) 

  • Live streaming available 
  • Android App (Video) launch
  • Bluetooth Handsfree - works with 3rd party apps

MIKME TEAM

Passionate. Creative. Future-Thinking

We are passionate about giving creatives of all levels total freedom for their ideas by designing beautiful, simple to use and high-quality tools that capture creativity on the go.  

Mikme is designed in Austria and produced in Europe. We are a team of engineers, musicians and designers from around the world that has built successful, world-class audio products – like studio microphones, headphones, wireless microphones and Bluetooth speakers for companies such as AKG, JBL, Samsung, Audi and others.

On average, the team has 15 years of experience designing, engineering and marketing audio products. In sum, we hold 80+ patents and has won 40+ design awards.


Special Thanks  

to everybody involved in making this happen!

Extra ❤️goes out to Nicola and Jacob for the great video, Tom and Darius for the voice over and music, Nicci and Bernhard from the Speedinvest Pirates for all the support along the way, Stefan and Dominik for the help in the social universe and to the whole Mikme Team for working that hard making all this come true. 

www.mikme.com

story:
Pré-commande disponible sur https://www.octavio.fr/boutique/.

 
 
 

 

 

Vous aimez écouter votre musique en haute qualité ? Vous souhaitez en profiter partout chez vous ? Vous disposez sûrement de plusieurs enceintes dans votre maison.

Avec Octavio, connectez vos enceintes à vos services de streaming et profitez de votre musique en Wi-Fi. Octavio est compatible avec n'importe quel équipement audio doté d'une entrée auxiliaire ou analogique.

 

 

Nous avons choisi d'utiliser pour Wi-Fi pour transmettre le son sur nos différents appareils, tout en vous permettant de rendre ceci compatible à un maximum de services de streaming :

Spotify, Deezer, Qobuz, Tidal, Napster, Amazon Music, TuneIn, iHeartRadio et Audible

Bénéficiez des meilleures technologies possibles grâce à une compatibilité avec :

AirPlay2, Spotify Connect et Bluetooth (compatible en mode multiroom).

 

Imaginez pouvoir écouter une même musique partout dans votre maison, sur n'importe quel système audio. Rendez ceci possible en créant votre propre système multiroom avec plusieurs Octavio.

 

Le matin, lancez votre émission de radio au réveil, écoutez-la dans votre salle de bain en vous préparant et continuez à l’écouter dans votre cuisine en déjeunant, le tout sans aucune coupure !

Le soir, organisez une soirée et mettez de la musique dans toutes vos pièces pour épatez vos invités. Octavio vous permet d’en faire plus avec votre musique pour simplifier votre écoute à la maison.

Octavio transmet votre son en Wi-Fi et vous permet de diffuser votre musique dans toutes les pièces de votre maison. Il apporte les fonctionnalités multiroom à chacune de vos enceintes pour pouvoir écouter votre musique dans toutes vos pièces en équipant un appareil Octavio à chacun de vos systèmes sonores.

L’utilisation de la technologie Wi-Fi nous permet de respecter la qualité sonore de vos systèmes (jusqu'à 24 bits, 192Khz) et offre une portée bien supérieure à la technologie Bluetooth.

Vous pouvez avoir de nombreuses enceintes différentes dans votre maison, Octavio est compatible avec tous les haut-parleurs pré-amplifiés ayant une entrée analogique. Équipez-en autant que vous voulez dans votre maison : dans votre salon, dans votre chambre, votre cuisine, votre salle de bain… Vous pouvez l’utiliser sur un système audio haut de gamme dans votre salon, une enceinte bluetooth dans votre cuisine, un ensemble de haut-parleurs milieu de gamme dans votre chambre et également ressortir une vieille chaine Hi-Fi de votre grenier ! Octavio donne une seconde jeunesse à vos enceintes en leur ajoutant les dernières technologies de diffusion sonore. Alors pourquoi racheter des enceintes ?

 

Le contrôle de la musique est facilité avec l’application mobile. Diffusez la musique vers Octavio depuis vos applications préférées, ne perdez pas vos habitudes. Contrôlez votre musique depuis l’application Octavio, choisissez votre source audio, réglez le volume, gérez vos appareils.

Pour profiter encore plus rapidement de votre musique, des contrôles sont présents sur l’appareil pour lancer et couper la diffusion du son.

 

 
 
 

Octavio est né de la rencontre de deux passionnés de musique, Victor et David. C’est sur les bancs de l’université, lors de notre master en musicologie que nous avons eu l’idée de créer Octavio.

Passionnés de musique et de nouvelles technologies, nous nous sommes tous les deux retrouvés face à la même problématique lorsque l’on écoutait de la musique chez nous : dès que nous quittions une pièce, nous n’entendions plus la musique diffusée dans celle-ci. Nous avons donc décidé de créer un dispositif qui nous permettrait d’écouter notre musique sans interruption, dans toutes les pièces de notre maison.

Une fois l’appareil créé, nous avons été témoins de l’engouement de nos amis pour notre création, nous avons donc décidé de permettre à tout le monde de profiter de cette innovation. C’est donc après de nombreuses heures passées à améliorer la solution, de nombreux tests effectués auprès d’un large panel que nous sommes heureux d’annoncer le lancement d’Octavio.

Incubés à la Plaine Images, nous nous sommes découvert une réelle fibre entrepreneuriale, chacun a trouvé sa place au sein de la direction d’Octavio et afin de se donner les moyens de mener à bien ce projet, nous avons décidé de lancer cette campagne de financement participative.

 

Saviez-vous que plus de 30% des hauts-parleurs jetés chaque année fonctionnent encore ?

Chez Octavio, nous sommes persuadés qu’une surconsommation de ce genre d'équipements peut-être évitée. Pourquoi renouveler l'entièreté de son système audio quand il fonctionne encore ?Pour bénéficier des dernières technologies, bien-sûr. Et sur ce point, nous devons vous avouer que les dernières innovations, on les aime aussi. Mais on aime aussi notre éco-système.

Plutôt que de vous imposer une nouvelle couleur sonore, et de vous obliger à mettre vos anciennes enceintes au placard, nous avons fait le choix de leur donner une deuxième jeunesse. Car après tout, elles diffusent de la musique, et c'est tout ce que nous leur demandons. Le reste, Octavio s'en occupe.

Octavio rend n'importe quel système compatible aux technologies de diffusion sonore actuelles et est régulièrement mis à jour, afin de vous faire toujours bénéficier des dernières innovations.

 

L'obsolescence programmée et la réparabilité, un sujet d'actualité.

L'appareil Octavio est conçu pour être entièrement réparable. En effet, Octavio est constitué de plusieurs parties indépendantes les unes des autres. Un souci du côté de la carte son ? Nous remplaçons cette partie défectueuse, rendant le reste de l'appareil intact.

Le boîtier est conçu pour être démonté, pour réparer facilement chacun des appareils.

Le SAV est entièrement effectué par l'équipe Octavio, en France. Le savoir-faire français a encore la côte, et nous comptons bien le prouver.

 

L'objet connecté qui respecte votre vie privée.

Tout ce qui se passe chez vous reste chez vous. Nous n'avons aucune envie et aucun intérêt de collecter vos données personnelles.

Octavio est entièrement sécurisé, et bénéficie de mises à jour de sécurité régulières.

Nous avons conçu Octavio avec vous, grâce à vous et pour vous ! Vos retours nous ont permis d’améliorer le produit et nous ont fait grandir.

 

 

Parce que chacun d’entre vous peut rendre Octavio possible à son échelle, vous pouvez nous aider en partageant notre projet, et en parlant de nous à vos amis sur les réseaux sociaux !

 

 

Lancer un nouveau produit hardware sur le marché est compliqué. Il y a de nombreuses dépenses à assumer, notre produit comporte différents aspects qui nécessitent votre aide. Bien sûr, il y a la production de l’électronique et l’achat de nos composants, mais également le passage des certifications pour vous garantir la sécurité de notre produit. La production de nos Octavio n’étant qu’une partie de notre activité : nous avons aussi des coûts de recherche et de développement : système embarqué, application mobile.

Pour vous proposer un produit avec un design qui vous plaît nous avons également besoin d’argent pour faire fabriquer nos outillages d’injection.

Enfin, comme pour tout produit, des dépenses de communication et de marketing sont nécessaires pour le rendre visible sur le marché.
