Octavio transmet votre son en Wi-Fi et vous permet de diffuser votre musique dans toutes les pièces de votre maison. Il apporte les fonctionnalités multiroom à chacune de vos enceintes pour pouvoir écouter votre musique dans toutes vos pièces en équipant un appareil Octavio à chacun de vos systèmes sonores.
L’utilisation de la technologie Wi-Fi nous permet de respecter la qualité sonore de vos systèmes (jusqu'à 24 bits, 192Khz) et offre une portée bien supérieure à la technologie Bluetooth.

Vous pouvez avoir de nombreuses enceintes différentes dans votre maison, Octavio est compatible avec tous les haut-parleurs pré-amplifiés ayant une entrée analogique. Équipez-en autant que vous voulez dans votre maison : dans votre salon, dans votre chambre, votre cuisine, votre salle de bain… Vous pouvez l’utiliser sur un système audio haut de gamme dans votre salon, une enceinte bluetooth dans votre cuisine, un ensemble de haut-parleurs milieu de gamme dans votre chambre et également ressortir une vieille chaine Hi-Fi de votre grenier ! Octavio donne une seconde jeunesse à vos enceintes en leur ajoutant les dernières technologies de diffusion sonore. Alors pourquoi racheter des enceintes ?
 

Le contrôle de la musique est facilité avec l’application mobile. Diffusez la musique vers Octavio depuis vos applications préférées, ne perdez pas vos habitudes. Contrôlez votre musique depuis l’application Octavio, choisissez votre source audio, réglez le volume, gérez vos appareils.
Pour profiter encore plus rapidement de votre musique, des contrôles sont présents sur l’appareil pour lancer et couper la diffusion du son.
 



 
 

 

Octavio est né de la rencontre de deux passionnés de musique, Victor et David. C’est sur les bancs de l’université, lors de notre master en musicologie que nous avons eu l’idée de créer Octavio.
Passionnés de musique et de nouvelles technologies, nous nous sommes tous les deux retrouvés face à la même problématique lorsque l’on écoutait de la musique chez nous : dès que nous quittions une pièce, nous n’entendions plus la musique diffusée dans celle-ci. Nous avons donc décidé de créer un dispositif qui nous permettrait d’écouter notre musique sans interruption, dans toutes les pièces de notre maison.
Une fois l’appareil créé, nous avons été témoins de l’engouement de nos amis pour notre création, nous avons donc décidé de permettre à tout le monde de profiter de cette innovation. C’est donc après de nombreuses heures passées à améliorer la solution, de nombreux tests effectués auprès d’un large panel que nous sommes heureux d’annoncer le lancement d’Octavio.
Incubés à la Plaine Images, nous nous sommes découvert une réelle fibre entrepreneuriale, chacun a trouvé sa place au sein de la direction d’Octavio et afin de se donner les moyens de mener à bien ce projet, nous avons décidé de lancer cette campagne de financement participative.
 

Saviez-vous que plus de 30% des hauts-parleurs jetés chaque année fonctionnent encore ?
Chez Octavio, nous sommes persuadés qu’une surconsommation de ce genre d'équipements peut-être évitée. Pourquoi renouveler l'entièreté de son système audio quand il fonctionne encore ?Pour bénéficier des dernières technologies, bien-sûr. Et sur ce point, nous devons vous avouer que les dernières innovations, on les aime aussi. Mais on aime aussi notre éco-système.
Plutôt que de vous imposer une nouvelle couleur sonore, et de vous obliger à mettre vos anciennes enceintes au placard, nous avons fait le choix de leur donner une deuxième jeunesse. Car après tout, elles diffusent de la musique, et c'est tout ce que nous leur demandons. Le reste, Octavio s'en occupe.
Octavio rend n'importe quel système compatible aux technologies de diffusion sonore actuelles et est régulièrement mis à jour, afin de vous faire toujours bénéficier des dernières innovations.
 
L'obsolescence programmée et la réparabilité, un sujet d'actualité.
L'appareil Octavio est conçu pour être entièrement réparable. En effet, Octavio est constitué de plusieurs parties indépendantes les unes des autres. Un souci du côté de la carte son ? Nous remplaçons cette partie défectueuse, rendant le reste de l'appareil intact.
Le boîtier est conçu pour être démonté, pour réparer facilement chacun des appareils.
Le SAV est entièrement effectué par l'équipe Octavio, en France. Le savoir-faire français a encore la côte, et nous comptons bien le prouver.
 
L'objet connecté qui respecte votre vie privée.
Tout ce qui se passe chez vous reste chez vous. Nous n'avons aucune envie et aucun intérêt de collecter vos données personnelles.
Octavio est entièrement sécurisé, et bénéficie de mises à jour de sécurité régulières.

Nous avons conçu Octavio avec vous, grâce à vous et pour vous ! Vos retours nous ont permis d’améliorer le produit et nous ont fait grandir.





 



 
Parce que chacun d’entre vous peut rendre Octavio possible à son échelle, vous pouvez nous aider en partageant notre projet, et en parlant de nous à vos amis sur les réseaux sociaux !



 

 
Lancer un nouveau produit hardware sur le marché est compliqué. Il y a de nombreuses dépenses à assumer, notre produit comporte différents aspects qui nécessitent votre aide. Bien sûr, il y a la production de l’électronique et l’achat de nos composants, mais également le passage des certifications pour vous garantir la sécurité de notre produit. La production de nos Octavio n’étant qu’une partie de notre activité : nous avons aussi des coûts de recherche et de développement : système embarqué, application mobile.
Pour vous proposer un produit avec un design qui vous plaît nous avons également besoin d’argent pour faire fabriquer nos outillages d’injection.
Enfin, comme pour tout produit, des dépenses de communication et de marketing sont nécessaires pour le rendre visible sur le marché.

story:
Muse Auto is a small Bluetooth device that brings the power and convenience of Amazon Alexa to the car. Just plug it in, pair with your smartphone and say "Alexa".

 

 

With Muse Auto in your car, you can ask Alexa to play your music, news, and audiobooks, control your garage door or home security, manage your to-dos, take care of shopping, and more, all with your voice! It is the perfect holiday gift for gadget lovers.

Pre-order now! We have limited quantities available for December shipment.



Muse Auto is featured at the Target Open House in San Francisco. If you are in the area, come experience it first-hand!

THE POWER OF ALEXA - IN YOUR CAR

What would you do if you had an intelligent and highly versatile assistant in your car? Unlike your phone's native assistant, Alexa does not ask you to unlock your phone. It has over 25,000 skills that work with just your voice.


NO SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED

Muse Auto offers the best hands and eyes-free audio entertainment in the car without requiring a paid music subscription. Voice control music from your favorite artists, popular radio stations, millions of podcasts with free services like iHeartRadio and TuneIn.

Muse Auto uses your iPhone or Android phone's standard data plan, and it works with a free Amazon account. Want on-demand music? Amazon Music ($7.99) and Prime Music (free for Prime members) are already supported. Spotify and Pandora support is planned as a free update.

HANDS-FREE CALLING

Safety in the car is of paramount importance to us. That's why we've included hands-free calling in Muse Auto. Hear the caller from your car stereo and speak with confidence with our best-in-class noise-canceling microphone.

EVERYTHING IS INCLUDED

The box includes everything you need to get set up in most cars. It includes the Muse Auto device and the magnetic mount. We've also included a dual USB car charger so you can power Muse Auto and charge your phone! All you need is an Android or iOS phone with cellular data plan, and of course, a car.

SUPER EASY INSTALLATION

Muse Auto fits nicely into any car and takes less than 3 minutes to set up. It comes with a 6.5-foot long cable and removable magnetic mount that gives you the flexibility to place it on the dash, in the center console, or wherever you like. 

 

PRIVACY WHEN YOU NEED IT

Muse Auto features hardware-level mute so that you can turn off any and all audio going into Muse Auto. Just hold and release the Microphone button to turn on mute and neither Muse Auto nor Alexa will hear anything.

 

MUSE AUTO PRODUCT DESIGN

Inside the modest case is a highly-capable car accessory that is packed with innovative features and unparalleled smarts.  


Muse Auto runs on a powerful Qualcomm processor that is loaded with our innovative voice recognition, noise cancellation, hands-free calling and Bluetooth technology. It seamlessly integrates with the Muse Auto app on your smartphone for setup, connectivity, and visuals feedback.

WE ARE IN PRODUCTION

Our goal has always been to come to Indiegogo with a production-ready product. We have made a lot of progress to that end. In fact, we are nearly done. Our factory has started production of the hardware. Our software teams have finalized the firmware, and the Android and iOS companion apps.

We have completed more than a thousand hours of testing, ourselves and with Amazon's Alexa team. 

TESTIMONIALS FROM THE ROAD

Here's a video from one of the test sessions. Don't miss the reactions near the end!


REMAINING MILESTONES

 
  1. A few more tests by us and our partners
  2. Final quality assurance of production line
  3. Delivery of product to the USA for customer shipment

 

MEET THE TEAM

Greetings Indiegogoers! We are Speak Music, a Voice and Artificial Intelligence startup, part of the Stanford University StartX accelerator.

We have raised over $3M to help us bring disruption-free audio entertainment to the world. After successfully launching Melody - Music Assistant, which has sold over 1 million devices, we set out to solve the ultimate use case for voice: the car. 

HOW YOU CAN HELP

Pledge now to get your discounted Muse Auto by the holidays. Don't leave your friends and family behind. Give them the gift of productive, entertainment and safety in the car by getting them their very own Muse Auto.

Pledge now to get your Muse Auto by the holidays at a highly discounted price,
and help us bring productivity, entertainment, and safety to all drivers.

Limited quantities. USA shipment only (for now).

Help us get the word out by sharing this Indiegogo page.
Together, we will make driving fun, productive and safe.

FAQs

Do I need an Amazon Prime or an Echo device to use Muse Auto?

No, you don't need a Prime subscription and you don't need any other Alexa device. You can use Muse Auto with a free Amazon account.

Will Muse Auto work while I am using navigation apps like Google Maps or Waze?

Yes, you can use Muse Auto while using navigation and other apps. 

When will Muse Auto be available in UK, Germany, Austria, Australia, India, Japan and elsewhere?

We plan to bring Muse Auto to every market supported by Amazon Alexa. We are targeting Canada, UK, Austria, Australia, and Germany for the first quarter of 2018, with other markets to follow soon after.

I don't have Aux, Line-In, USB or Bluetooth in my car. Can I still use Muse Auto?

Yes, you can use Muse Auto with the phone speaker in any car that has a cigarette lighter. If you have RCA, you can get one of these. Other options for integrating with the car stereo include FM transmitters, aux-to-cassette adapters or a quick wiring job by a technician.

Will Muse Auto work in the car without my smartphone?

No, Muse Auto requires your smartphone for connectivity and audio streaming. 

I have Wi-Fi in my car. Can I use it for Muse Auto?

Yes, Muse Auto can connect using the Wi-Fi in your connected car through your smartphone.

Which versions of iOS and Android does Muse Auto support?

Muse Auto requires iOS 10 and Android 6. The minimum supported versions are subject to change. 

Are there specific phones that are not supported?

Samsung S5 and older Samsung phones are currently not supported

story:
CARD20 is the world’s slimmest TWS Bluetooth headphones combining classy look, sublime comfort and unparalleled audio performance. The patented layout of the built-in antenna and the seminal cutout design of the charging case squeeze the total thickness of the earbuds and the case to a mindblowing 0.5in in striking contrast to at least 1in of others. Each component is strategically arranged based on the form of over thousands of human ears to dramatically improve its universal comfort, fit and stability. 

It features Qualcomm chip to stream superior wireless audio with balanced treble, mid and bass. The tech-packed CARD20 is exactly the headphones you are looking for that bring nothing but the beats to your ears.

CARD20, with its slimness and compactness that are second to none, is hands down the thinnest and smallest TWS headphones in the world. It is only 0.5 inch in thickness measured with the charging case, which is easily 40%~70% thinner and 60%~80% less bulky than others in the market.

The built-in antenna of a patented design is ingeniously laid out in the rod to reduce size and strengthen signals, making CARD20 so light and discreet that you feel like there is nothing but music in your ears.

We designed CARD20 with high consideration towards fit and comfort. These half-in ear headphones were tested in more than 6000 human ears for an exceptional conformity to an individual’s ear shape that significantly improves the comfort by 83.2% and a secure seal that keeps them in place through the toughest workouts. It also helps to prevent the stethoscope effect which generally exists among earbuds.(Stethoscope effect is a very unpleasant sound caused by vibration, collision or friction of the earplug wire or the unit.）

The charging case of CARD20 has a proprietary design featuring a slit in the center of the cover for easy observation of the earbuds. It takes no more than a look at the case for you to ascertain that you are bringing both earbuds with you when you are in a hurry.

The case is crafted out of a whole piece of aviation aluminum and covered in a fine layer of paint that gives it a silky touch and a sleek look. The edges of the cutout is burnished for supreme precision and luster; the rotating hinges of the case are hidden and invisible when viewed from the outside; the hinges interiors and the shells of the earbuds are embellished with spiral tracks that are reminiscent of CDs, a tribute to that epoch as well as an outlook into the future.

 

The Qualcomm QCC3020 chip embedded in the CARD20 is the most advanced TWS earphone chip there is that allows each earbud to pair to your device individually. You can connect both earbuds to your device simultaneously for stereo mode, or use either one separately for mono mode. The switch between the two is seamless without any delay or interruption. CARD20 auto-pairs to your formerly connected device the second you open the charging case with no hassle.

Thanks to Bluetooth 5.0, CARD20 outperforms others in faster wireless signal transfer speed, wider connection range and stronger signal broadcasting ability at lower power consumption.

CARD20 supports aptX codec which proves to transmit audio without damaging the quality to ensure you get the very most from it and significantly reduces latency to keep your audio and video in sync.

The dynamic driver unit guarantees that everything you hear from the CARD20 is unheard of.

CARD20 incorporates a 13mm large-diameter speaker with ultra-thin 2mm diaphragm which delivers a powerful and crisp sound which is further fine-tuned by our engineers to create a hi-fi immersive listening experience for you. The audio is harmonic in mixing frequencies of high, mid and low, and superb in the clarity and richness of vocals. 

Dominate your music, calls and more with easy touch controls instead of fiddling with your smartphone. Gently double-tap the force sensor to play/pause, skip forward/backward or answer/end a phone call. A simple “Hey Siri” or three taps summons your favorite personal assistant.

CARD20 employs advanced CVC algorithms by Qualcomm which cancels out echoes and suppresses ambient noises so it appears you are in a quiet indoor space when you are making a call. It also features a nylon microphone net that improves call clarity in windy situations.

CARD20 will always be ready to go the next time you need them. The charging case provides more than 16 hours of listening time with multiple additional charges to the headphones. They can play music continuously for up to 4 hours at full volume, or 5.5 hours at 70% full volume on one charge.

Rated IPX4, CARD20 headphones resist sustained sweats, splashes and sprays, keeping up with you during the most rigorous challenges.

 

We add an optional logo-free version of CARD 20 for the preference of some backers. The visible exterior of the earbuds are logo-free. The logo will only be printed on the charging case. 

 

Guo Changming, the founder of YOBYBO, has 5 years of experience in production, operation and management in the smart wearables industry. He once led a TWS project which achieved $10 million sales.

The co-founder and chief designer Zhou Hongchao has 10 years’ experience of ID design. He has won 14 international design awards including “Red Dot”, “IF” and “Idea”. He excels at drawing design inspiration from everyday life and things, humanizing products to meet the inner needs of customers. He also adds advanced and unique ergonomics in his design which reaches high standard in both value and comfort.

We adhere to the concepts of "Small Innovation, Big Difference", "Nothing But The Best", "All For The Customers", "Experience Rules", "We Value When We Add Value To The Supply Chain". We focus on providing customers with high-value smart wearables that are eye-candy and awe-inspiring.

YOBYBO has applied for more than 30 patents worldwide, and has sales in 20 countries and regions, including the U.S., Europe, Japan, Russia, South Korea, etc. In October 2019, YOBYBO launched five earphones, including Ripple (SR-20), Note Paper (Note 20) and Card (Card 20), which attended the 1st exhibition of Hong Kong's global resources and caused sensation in the audience. Card (Card 20) also won the "Conference Product Analyst Recommended Gold Award" and "iF DESIGN AWARD 2020".

story:
The KLŌS Cable has premium cable features:

 

  • Oxygen Free Copper

Our silent cable uses copper that is oxygen free, making it more conductive and less likely to corrode, giving it a longer life expectancy and improving the performance and sound of the cable.

 

  • Ultra Low Capacitance

Low capacitance cables preserve instrument tone and timbre.

 

  • Automatic Silencing Button on both ends

Our innovative Automatic Silencing Button is the special component that keeps this cable silent until plugged in. The button closes the cable's electrical circuit until it is pressed in by the input connector. 

 

  • Works with Active and Passive Pickups

Passive pickups rely on amplifiers and are generally found on electric guitars and electric basses. Active pickups are battery powered and are commonly used in acoustic electric guitars, as well as various electro-acoustic instruments. This means the cable is suited to work with any electric instrument, making it an incredibly versatile performance tool.

 

  • Braided Shielding

Braided shielding is the standard for quality cable shielding and offers greater versatility than foil shielding. This shielding is both strong and flexible.

 

  • Durable and Flexible Sheath

A cable sheath wraps around the outside of a cable to hold and protect the conductors on the inside. 

 

  • Cable Length Options

10 and 20 ft options are available, and each length will have the option of having straight - straight connector ends, or straight - L connector ends. 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The founders of KLŌS Guitars are both engineers.

Adam Klosowiak studied electrical engineering at Princeton University, and Ian Klosowiak studied mechanical engineering at Brigham Young University. With their technical background, and after having built over 6000 instruments and interacted with hundreds of musicians playing thousands of shows, they decided they've had enough with unnecessary cable noise, when it could be solved with such a product like the KLŌS Silent Cable.

 

A little bit more about our instruments

KLŌS carbon fiber instruments were born out of a desire to apply a modern innovative material - carbon fiber - to a timeless, centuries old invention - the guitar. Wood, especially thin wood in instruments, is a fragile material that is susceptible to temperature and humidity changes. Carbon fiber solves all that - and with it, you can still make an instrument that has incredible playability, sounds amazing, and is super lightweight and strong.

 

 

A Thriving Brand

Nearly 6 years after starting, KLOS Guitars has shipped over 6000 instruments to over 80 countries and all 50 states. Now we can't wait to see the KLOS Silent Cable reach a similar audience!

 

 

 

 

KLŌS Ambassadors Page

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

As with any project, there is always the risk that something doesn't go according to plan. However, KLOS Guitars is launching our 7th crowdfunding, and we've fulfilled all of the previous campaigns successfully. We're confident in our ability to produce new and innovative products and deliver them successfully to customers!


Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design
By using high quality materials and components, this cable should outlast your average cable!

Environmentally friendly factories
We only work with factories who prove that they are environmentally friendly and conscious!
story_txt:
The KLŌS Cable has premium cable features: Oxygen Free CopperOur silent cable uses copper that is oxygen free, making it more conductive and less likely to corrode, giving it a longer life expectancy and improving the performance and sound of the cable. Ultra Low CapacitanceLow capacitance cables preserve instrument tone and timbre. Automatic Silencing Button on both endsOur innovative Automatic Silencing Button is the special component that keeps this cable silent until plugged in. The button closes the cable's electrical circuit until it is pressed in by the input connector.  Works with Active and Passive PickupsPassive pickups rely on amplifiers and are generally found on electric guitars and electric basses. Active pickups are battery powered and are commonly used in acoustic electric guitars, as well as various electro-acoustic instruments. This means the cable is suited to work with any electric instrument, making it an incredibly versatile performance tool. Braided ShieldingBraided shielding is the standard for quality cable shielding and offers greater versatility than foil shielding. This shielding is both strong and flexible. Durable and Flexible SheathA cable sheath wraps around the outside of a cable to hold and protect the conductors on the inside.  Cable Length Options10 and 20 ft options are available, and each length will have the option of having straight - straight connector ends, or straight - L connector ends.             The founders of KLŌS Guitars are both engineers.Adam Klosowiak studied electrical engineering at Princeton University, and Ian Klosowiak studied mechanical engineering at Brigham Young University. With their technical background, and after having built over 6000 instruments and interacted with hundreds of musicians playing thousands of shows, they decided they've had enough with unnecessary cable noise, when it could be solved with such a product like the KLŌS Silent Cable. A little bit more about our instrumentsKLŌS carbon fiber instruments were born out of a desire to apply a modern innovative material - carbon fiber - to a timeless, centuries old invention - the guitar. Wood, especially thin wood in instruments, is a fragile material that is susceptible to temperature and humidity changes. Carbon fiber solves all that - and with it, you can still make an instrument that has incredible playability, sounds amazing, and is super lightweight and strong.  A Thriving BrandNearly 6 years after starting, KLOS Guitars has shipped over 6000 instruments to over 80 countries and all 50 states. Now we can't wait to see the KLOS Silent Cable reach a similar audience!     KLŌS Ambassadors Page         Risks and challengesAs with any project, there is always the risk that something doesn't go according to plan. However, KLOS Guitars is launching our 7th crowdfunding, and we've fulfilled all of the previous campaigns successfully. We're confident in our ability to produce new and innovative products and deliver them successfully to customers!
Environmental commitmentsLong-lasting designBy using high quality materials and components, this cable should outlast your average cable!Environmentally friendly factoriesWe only work with factories who prove that they are environmentally friendly and conscious!

story:
From the Creators of Guitar Hero®

 

 

The World's #1 Rated Karaoke Experience

Reviewed by over 150 Publications

 

 

Note: For a shipping guide to US territories (outside of contiguous, continental USA), Canada and international shipping please scroll to the bottom of the Story section. 

 

The Singtrix Party Bundle Stadium Edition 

Features 40 watt speaker w/subwoofer, 3 levels of vocal enhancement, a rock solid mic stand with upgraded effects, free 2nd mic, pro mic stand, and extended warranty. All at the lowest price ever...

 

 

Singtrix Brings the Party

 

The Next-Gen Singtrix Studio Controller is a simple interface: just spin the dial to your favorite effect and adjust your settings in real-time using the backlit display.

 

  1. Professional-Quality high-fidelity audio
  2. 3 Skill Modes to adjust pitch correction: Enhanced, Semi-Pro & Pro
  3. Features over 300+ built-in effects (see FAQs for full list). Sound like Darth Vader, sing like Princess Elsa, play lead guitar with just your vocals, and time travel to any genre and era of music

Note: Sunglasses, leather pants, and disco balls not included.

 

Top View

  1. Easy-to-read Backlit Display
  2. Use the “Song Voice” button to lower and mask vocals from any song in your library
  3. Adjusts Microphone Volume
  4. Turn the dial to select your desired effect. New feature: push the dial to jump to your favorite category or Instrument Mode
  5. Tap the “My Voice” button to select your skill level
  6. Adjust overall volume for PA systems and headphones 
  7. Tap the Hit Effect button on the console (or mic) to trigger 4-part harmonies, back up singers, or any other selected effect

 

Back View

  1. DC Line In
  2. Power Button
  3. (1) 3.5mm Music Input (for karaoke music or musical instrument)
  4. (2) 3.5mm Stereo Outputs (for Singtrix speaker, headphones & third-party PAs)
  5. (2) ¼ Mic Inputs (Lead/Mic 1 Input- full effects, Backup/Mic 2 Input - basic effects, no pitch correction or harmonies) or use your favorite wireless mic.
  6. (M) USB 2.0 Type B Input (for factory use)

 

Bottom View

  1. Locking Mic Stand Attachment
  2. Extendable Legs for Desktop Surface

 

Singtrix Microphone

  1. Hit Button controls harmonies & other effects
  2. 6-foot long Mic Cable with ¼” TRS Plug
  3. Mic Input 1 offers full effects. Mic Input 2 offers basic effects for backup vocals, no pitch correction, Hit Effects or harmonies.

 

    Professional Stage Mic Stand

  1. Fully adjustable microphone stand with boom-arm
  2. Attachable Device Holder comes standard for your mobile devices
  3. Portable & fully collapsible

 

   Incredible Sounding Portable Speaker (It's loud.)

  1. Powerful 40-watt 2.1 stereo speakers
  2. Built-in subwoofer
  3. Power Switch
  4. Volume Control
  5. Treble Control
  6. Bass Control
  7. L/R RCA Stereo Input (backside)
  8. DC Line in with external 24V power supply (backside)

Our speaker sounds so good, you'll replace your current multimedia and gaming speakers. 

 

Dress Singtrix in Your Favorite Color

Every Singtrix comes with a set of interchangeable colored faceplates. 

 

Any Music From Any Device

Music

Plug and play any FREE YouTube® song, Lyric Video, or third-party karaoke app from any device with a standard 3.5mm headphone jack input: iPhone, Android, Mac, PC, if it plays music, that's all that matters. 

 

Instruments

Set Singtrix to Live Instrument Mode. Plug in your guitar, keyboards or most electronic instruments including instrument-apps (using Singtrix 3.5mm music input). Singtrix will pitch-correct your voice and harmonies in real-time to the chords you play on the instrument.

 

Scalpers Selling Singtrix at Outrageous Prices

NOT COOL!

 

 

Now Choose the Stadium Bundle That’s Best For You

 

 

 

 

 

 

Stars, Stars, Stars - We Love User Reviews!

See the Stellar Singtrix Reviews on Google for Yourself. 

 

This Isn’t Our First Show

 

 

Industry Honors & Awards

CES Top-10 Best In Show & Innovation Award Winner

Thomas Edison Award Winner

 

 

 

 

Designed, Produced, and Delivered

by the Creators of Guitar Hero

For over 20 years, our team has been fortunate enough to surround ourselves with amazing talent all focused on bringing innovative musical experiences to everyone. We are super proud of the team and all of the accomplishments we have achieved together. We are always pushing the boundaries and we are looking forward to sharing new Singtrix technologies with you in the future.

Team Singtrix: John Devecka, Eric Berkowitz, Al Roque, Charles Huang, Kai Huang, Johan Ohlin

 

Join us in our effort to support an amazing cause:

Singtrix will be partnering with VH1's Save The Music Foundation on their mission to help kids, schools, and communities realize their full potential through the power of making music furthering our initiative of giving back. 

 

What's In the Box

Every Singtrix Stadium Bundle from Indiegogo comes with: Upgraded Studio Controller with (300+) built-in effects and voices, (2) Singtrix Microphones with Hit Effect button (includes Indiegogo-special free 2nd mic), (1) 40-Watt 2.1 Stereo Speaker with Subwoofer, (2) Stereo speaker outputs, (1) 3.5mm Audio Input for your music device, (1) Full-sized Mic Stand, (1) Mobile Device Holder stand attachment, (1) Cable Package, and 1-Year Extended Warranty.

 

Manufacturing

Due to crazy demand from some serious karaoke fans, each holiday season we totally sell out. To insure availability, we needed to transition to a new factory that could keep up with the demand. So we’ve come to you, Indiegogo, to ask for your support by pre-ordering our first round of Singtrix Stadium Bundles and, in return, we’re offering you the the lowest price ever.

The Next-Gen Singtrix Studio Controller Tooling is Ready to Rock

Please don’t hesitate to reach out to us in the comments section or on social media if you have any questions and be sure to check out our FAQs below.

On behalf of everyone at Singtrix, thank you for backing our campaign, and Sing the Dream!

 

 

Shipping Options for International

and Non-Contiguous, Non-Continental USA

 

Due to the size and weight of this Special Party Bundle Package (26lbs, 15in x 21.18in  x 15in) we only ship directly to Contiguous Continental USA.  For backers outside the coverage area, there are specialized 3rd-party international shopping & freight forwarding services available.  We recommend that you select a service that has a forwarding warehouse closest to your final destination and compare price quotes (note that quotes do not cover certain import costs: duties, VAT, broker fees etc).  Once a service is selected, just purchase your Singtrix and have it delivered to the assigned warehouse address they give you. For more information, please see the links below.  

International shipping options list is for information purposes only.  Singtrix LLC claims no affiliation with 3rd party shippers and is not responsible for any loss or damage caused by the shipper.  The purchaser is solely responsible for choosing a shipper.

 

 MyUS.com

      • Get a Free Account 
      • MYUS (warehouse on East Coast - FL)   https://www.myus.com
      • Shipping Rate Calculator https://www.myus.com/pricing/
      • Services: https://www.myus.com/how-myus-works/
      • Shop using the MyUS App - one checkout with global delivery https://shopping.myus.com
      • Additional Customs and other shipping FAQ - https://www.myus.com/faq/  

      Shipito.com

      • Get a Free Account
      • Shipito.com (warehouse on West Coast - CA, OR)
      • Shipping Rate Calulator   https://www.shipito.com/en/shipping-calculator 
      • Services: https://www.shipito.com/en/shipito-free-us-address
      • Additional Customs and other shipping FAQ - https://www.shipito.com/en/help/faq/customs

       

       

      DISCLAIMER

      1. From the creators of the original Guitar Hero® game! Guitar Hero® is a registered trademark of Activision® Publishing, Inc. Activision® is not associated or affiliated with Singtrix in any way.
      2. Auto-Tune® is a registered trademark Antares Audio Technologies.  Antares Audio Technologies is not associated or affiliated with Singtrix in any way.
      3. Actual product may vary in appearance from images shown. Any slight variances will be cosmetic and a result of updated tooling, manufacturing equipment etc. at our new production facility. 
      4. International shipping options list is for information purposes only.  Singtrix claims no affiliation with 3rd party shippers and is not responsible for any loss or damage due to using 3rd party services.  The purchaser is solely responsible for choosing a shipper.

      Connect with the #1 Team in Crowdfunding at: https://www.earlybirdstudios.com/

story:
A Headphone Stand that Shines

An ideal stand for your headphones — does it necessarily need to look like a coat hanger? Think about a headphone stand as a useful yet colorful lighting accessory to match your home computer or HiFi system setup. It’s all about color lights these days: your keyboard, your mouse, your mic, your AV and now a stand for your headphones.

 

Design

Are you playing games, listening to music, watching YouTube, or streaming your own video with headphones over your ears? Your headphone stand is idling and just taking up space on the desk during such moments. So why not turn it into something that makes your digital corner more cozy, personal, and colorful? With this in mind, we’ve designed our headphone stand. 

 

Light module

A big lantern is the centerpiece of the SpotLight headphone stand. This distinctive design feature not just sets the stand apart from other products: due to its mild light, the lantern can serve as a night light in your bedroom. Images engraved on the front and rear glass create the effect of depth. Three image themes are available -  Sound Wave, Sky Map and City Scape. Our backers can choose any of the images with their perks. 

The lantern also helps relieve strain on your eyes by creating bias lighting when you are sitting in front of your screen in a dark room.*

*Details about the positive effect of bias lighting on your eyes can be found here: Lighting Research Center, Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. "New Study Tests The Effects Of Watching TV In A Dark Room." ScienceDaily. 25 April 2006.

With an included remote control, you can:

  • Change LED colors manually
  • Select auto color change mode
  • Adjust LED brightness

Shape. The curves of the stand naturally repeat the shape of the headband to securely hold headphones in place.

The base is wide enough to rest on the tabletop very firmly and is covered with a non-slip material. The stand won’t fall even if you accidentally push it with your hand.

Materials. The main body is made of eco-friendly high-quality birch plywood. We offer  two variations of the stand — one is coated with oak veneer, and the other one is covered with non-toxic varnish to show the natural color of the plywood. 

LEDs are used as light sources. The stand is powered by an external 12V power adapter (US plug/100V or European plug/220V versions will be included depending on your region).

Dimensions. We’ve chosen the size of the stand in such a manner so that it won’t occupy much space on your desk, and at the same time is bold and aesthetical.

 

Timeframe 

Production will be carried out by us at our workshop in Ukraine. We have vast experience in working with wood and light fixtures. Quality is our highest priority, and we have well-established quality control procedures. 

Shipping

We will ship from our Ukrainian workshop using proven postal service providers we’ve already tested. You’ll find details about shipping options with each pledge. We use reliable packing to protect the goods in transit.

 

Meet the team

Mikhail Mishutin - designer & maker. Over 15 years experience in interior design, home decor, and woodcrafts.

Yurii Goriashchenko - designer, wood processing and interior design professional.

Together, we are JoinTheLight team.

Risks & Challenges

We have all the necessary tooling to make the stand and have already started manufacturing after a crowdfunding campaign successfully funded  on another platform. We’ve also established long-standing reliable relations with the local suppliers of raw materials and components, and our quality control procedures are proven at each step. Our biggest risk at the moment is scaling up the production beyond 10,000 units, so we've successfully negoted with a contract manufactur and have a backup facility in addition to our own workshop.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even your smallest contribution can help bring the project to life faster. Please use the Indiegogo social media sharing tools in the upper-right corner of this page to spread the word about the SpotLight Headphone Stand!

story:
Pусский | 日本語

Why we've built the AP200:

Audio that comes from portable devices tend to not sound great. At Hidizs, we’re trying to change this by designing our own portable music player that enhances the music listening experience. We believe that no one should ever compromise on sound quality.

After spending two years on more than 50 design sketches, 10 prototypes, we present to you:

The AP200’s Hi-Res Audio certification was issued by JAS (Japan Audio Association) and CEA (Consumer Technology Association), showing our commitment to crafting a high quality sound equipment.

AP200's mission is to provide the best possible listening experience of your favorite digital music.

This tiny device allows you to unleash high fidelity sound from every music device.

Comparison Chart

 

 

From the very beginning, the HIDIZS AP200 was designed to be a totally breakthrough product in numerous aspects. First and foremost is the one-piece CNC’d stainless-steel/aluminium-alloy structure.

Once the solid stainless-steel/aluminium-alloy blocks have been selected they are clamped to the machining brackets. The high precision CNC milling machine then bevels the four sides in accordance with our customized computer design. The main chassis alone takes 120 minutes to cut into shape.

The AP200 brings a unique physical and aesthetic experience. We designed the AP200 with symmetrical buttons so you can operate AP200 without looking to the device. This makes the AP200 is an easy-to-operate, smart Hi-Fi music player. Single click the up & down buttons for volume adjustment, double click the up & down buttons to skip to the next/previous song.

The AP200 utilizes USB Type-C, the most up-to-date USB connection type, for faster data transfer and charging speeds. It also offers one micro SD card slot, supporting up to 256GB.

Hidizs AP200 features a 3.54-inch (960x640, 325 PPI) touch screen, a perfect portable size for using the AP200. With a 2.28x0.62x4.17 inch product dimension, Hidizs AP200 is perfect for one hand operation.

 

 

Hidizs AP200 lasts 10 hours on a single charge. Enjoy uninterrupted music for as long as you need. Coupled with Japanese precision protection circuit, this makes the 3100mAh lithium battery extra safe and reliable.

 

The AP200 is the first high resolution music player to utilize individual flagship ESS ES9118C DAC chips for each channel (Left/Right). Perfect channel separation is achieved as the sound field reaches an unprecedented broad width, both in the vertical and horizontal planes.

Vocal and instrument reproduction is exceptionally accurate, which allows the AP200 to effortlessly playback a wide range of music genres, from pop to orchestral symphonies. Enjoy music as though you are in the middle of a concert, right in front of your favorite singer, band or orchestra.

 

To further improve the sound quality of the AP200, HIDIZS specifically custom-made a 24K gold-plated shield for each ES9118C DAC chip. This means that each DAC chip operates within a fully shielded environment, eliminating interference from surrounding signals, which gives a cleaner music sound without any noise and signal interference. 

The AP200 utilizes two separate crystal oscillators - one for DSD/44.1/88.2/176.4/352.8 kHz sampling-rates, and the other for 48/96/192/384 kHz sampling-rates. This results in significantly reduced jitter, improved clock accuracy, and more stable operation, which equates to a faithful reproduction of the original sound. Experience sound like never before.

 

Other hardware specs and features include a 3.54-inch (960x640, 325 PPI) touch display, 1GB of internal RAM, 32GB/64GB/128GB internal storage and expandable up to 256GB with external Micro SD card slot. Additionally, the AP200 utilizes Rockchip’s 28nm RK3188 SoC, which contains 4 Cortex-A9 cores, resulting in an increase of 35% processing speed as compared to the previous generations.It also features Android™ OS 5.1 with Google Play™.

 

The AP200 supports most Hi-Res lossless formats, including FLAC, APE, WMA, WAV, ALAC, Apple LOSSLESS, DSF, and DSDIFF. Native support for DSD 64/128, PCM up to 384Khz/32bit, ISO DSD format

 

The AP200 supports two-way transmission for both Bluetooth 4.0 and the apt-X lossless transmission protocol. This versatility means that the AP200 has the capability to both transmit, as well as receive audio signals over Bluetooth. When connected to a Bluetooth equipped smartphone or computer, the AP200 will decode the signal via its dual DAC chips. Enjoy your wireless music experience like never before.

The AP200 can also be used as a high-quality music source by connecting it to headphones/IEMs via a wired connection or over Bluetooth, as well as an in-vehicle device when connected to a Bluetooth-equipped vehicle audio system. (Please note that your headphones or other Bluetooth devices must support the apt-X protocol in order to take advantage of the AP200’s apt-X lossless transmission)

The AP200 utilizes an IEEE 802.11 b/g/n 2.4GHz WiFi module. This allows users to listen to their favourite online streaming services, or install any online 3rd-party music app, such as streaming through Spotify, Tidal, Pandora, or any other music streaming app, allowing for an immediately upgraded sound experience. With the HIDIZS AP200 you can enjoy your HiFi music anytime, anywhere. Break the bondage of conventional wired connections, and become immersed in wireless music heaven. 

Prototype Video#1

Prototype Video#2

In this video, we use AP200 to review apps on google play, listen to online music through Spotify and watch video on Youtube.

 

Following on from two-way Bluetooth support, the AP200 also supports two-way USB DAC functionality, up to 384kHz/32Bit. The AP200 can act as a DAC (external audio decoding and amplification) when connected to a computer or smartphone (Supports Windows, Mac, and Android smartphones with OTG Host functionality).

AP200 also can be used as a digital transport when connected to an external DAC, such as Chord Mojo, IFI Micro iDSD. The 3.5mm headphone jack of the AP200 can be used either to connect to a set of headphones/IEMs, or as a line out to connect to an external amplifier or powered speakers. No compromises.

 

The AP200 flagship digital music player offers two operational modes: Android mode and Pure Music mode. In Android mode, users may freely install and run any 3rd-party Android apps to satisfy their needs. In Pure Music mode, no apps other than the main music player is available, which means smoother operation and purer sound.

Comparative Measurements 

To understand the sound quality difference between AP200 and smartphone, it is useful to compare the objective performance between APP200 and the iPhone 6 directly. We used professional equipment Audio Precision APX515 to measure all of the acoustic data below.

Channel Separation

For the audio system, lower crosstalk brings better stereo image and channel separation. Hidizs AP200 has lower channel separation date than the iPhone 6 which means it can provide clearer sound that’s more crisp.

Frequency Response

The AP200 can reach the Hi-Res standard 40kHz, while the iPhone 6 can only reach the 20kHz, this means AP200 contains much more detail of the original track.

SRN

The signal-to-noise ratio is defined as the ratio of the power of a signal (meaningful information) and the power of background noise (unwanted signal). The AP200 has a higher SRN than the iPhone 6, which means that AP200 can provide a purer sound. Some high-end supra-aural headphones require the source to have a certain SRN to be able to maximize the headphone’s capabilities.

THD+N Ratio

The THD (Total harmonic distortion) ratio of AP200 is only half of the iPhone 6. In audio systems, lower distortion means the equipment produce a more accurate reproduction of an audio recording.

AP200 Versions 

We have developed two body versions for AP200. 
 
The aluminum alloy body version is paired with a tempered glass rear cover, and comes in 3 different colors for individual aesthetic appeal. 
 
The stainless-steel body is paired with a choice of 3 different rear panels, giving the AP200 an even more distinguished look.
 
AP200 aluminum alloy body version - 32GB
The chassis of the 32GB internal storage is made from aluminum alloy and the rear is covered in tempered glass, available in blue, black or silver. Expandable storage is available on every AP200.
 

 AP200 stainless-steel body version - 64GB/128GB

 

  •  Carbon Fiber Glass rear panel (middle) 

For those who appreciate geometric beauty. The weaved pattern is clearly visible, making for a high-tech look and feel. 

  •  Rosewood rear panel (right)

For the noble and dignified. Each piece of wood has its own unique texture, which gives it a personalized style along with a touch of nature. Truly one of a kind. 

  •  Pure glass rear panel (left) 

For the minimalist. The simplicity of translucent glass provides a modern feel.  

What's in the box

Specs

Timeline

Team & Story

Hidizs was founded early in 2009, when pocket HiFi had just emerged. At that time, those devices were either very pricey or lacking in quality. In order to produce a superior, and affordable pocket HiFi audio device, a group of technicians with experience in HiFi audio R&D teamed up to create the Hidizs brand. In early 2010, the Hidizs team started researching the global HiFi audio market; in Oct 2012, the Hidizs R&D team became official. In Jan 2014, Hidizs’ first pocket HiFi audio player AP100 was officially launch at CES, Las Vegas. After fine-tuning our designs, the AP200 was born.

We believe that no one should ever compromise on sound quality.After spending two years on more than 50 design sketches, 10 prototypes, we present to you:The AP200’s Hi-Res Audio certification was issued by JAS (Japan Audio Association) and CEA (Consumer Technology Association), showing our commitment to crafting a high quality sound equipment.AP200's mission is to provide the best possible listening experience of your favorite digital music.This tiny device allows you to unleash high fidelity sound from every music device.Comparison Chart  From the very beginning, the HIDIZS AP200 was designed to be a totally breakthrough product in numerous aspects. story:
How do you choose the right pair of headphones when we all hear differently? Sound and hearing are very hard to objectively self-assess. How do you know what you’re missing? Audiophiles are skilled at the art, but this takes them years of experience. 

Nura empowers everyone who loves music to find their perfect sound - automatically. Nura actually knows which sounds are getting through fully and which sounds are not. It uses this information to fill in your musical black spots.

 

 

"They sound amazing to everyone here who's tried them... but what really dropped my jaw was when we passed them around the office and saw just how different a sound they created for each of the guys on the team." - Loz Blain, Gizmag

"The dual speaker setup meant the vocals, instrumentals and bass (my God, the bass!) all came through remarkably clear. I was picking up on things in songs I hadn't heard before. It sounded great." - Luke Lancaster, CNET

"The personalization mode was incredible, especially listening to a live-recorded track... With the super bass, the experience was even better." - Jason Lim, Forbes

"Everything comes through with great balance, and the instrumentation is extremely clear. I was impressed." - Brian Heater, TechCrunch  

"The separated design of the headphones... stopped the bass from eating up the higher frequencies." - FACT  

"The intimacy of the vocals, the rumbling of the bass, the heartbeat of the drums, and every single note of the churning lead guitar was distinct, perfectly balanced, and rocking." - Dennis Baum, Geek Girlfriends  

"The headphones are designed for comfort and have dual isolation, which prevents sound coming in or going out during use." - Dean Takahashi, VentureBeat  

"The depth of sound is incredible." - Arielle Duhaime-Ross, Verge  

"The Nura headphones craft the perfect audio for your ear." - Kris Naudus, Engadget  

"We got a chance to try a Nura prototype, and the differences between the tuning for various members of our team were striking." - Nathan McAlone, Business Insider  

"There isn't another set of headphones out there that combines neuroscience, acoustics and deep hearing in this way. And when we tested the products at a recent demo we found the resulting sound to be a substantial improvement." - David Graver, Cool Hunting  

"All notes can be heard perfectly, and the volume is also balanced to help to protect ears from damage." - Stanley Goodner, Gizmag 

"This is a promising product that will leave you wondering why you used lacklustre earbuds for so long" - Ariel Bogle, Mashable

"I'll admit, I was sceptical. I thought the Nura sounded too good to be true. But then I tried a pair, and that shut me up quick smart." - Luke Lancaster, CNET

 

 

We know that most backers won't have the opportunity to experience Nura before pledging, but we are confident that you are going to love Nura. We will reward your faith in us by offering a 30-day money back guarantee. It’s simple. If you don’t like the comfort or love the sound of your Nura headphones, send them back within 30-days for a full refund.

 

Some headphones sound tinny and lack beat, others have too much bass which drowns out the detail. The acoustic separation of Nura’s design allows for the deepest bass and clearest tones. The over-ear cup delivers bass you can feel through your skin. The earbud prevents the bass from drowning out the detail and delivers crystal clear notes directly into your ear. Your brain combines the sensations into a fully immersive experience - you hear and you feel the music.

With Nura, you can experience the music you love for the first time again. Be immersed in all the beautiful detail and nuance of the recording.

 

Just like every human face and voice are unique, so too is the structure of everyone’s inner ear. These variations in anatomy result in us hearing sounds differently. There’s a very wide range in our sensitivities to different frequencies - normal hearing range is >20dB at each frequency (that’s about seven clicks on the volume button of a smartphone).

When soundwaves enter your ear canal, they vibrate the eardrum. These vibrations are transferred through a series of small bones to the cochlea - our favorite organ in the body.

The cochlea converts these vibrations to electrical signals which are sent to the brain. Our brain then interprets these signals as sound!

Incredibly, at the same time, signals are also sent back out through the ear creating a very faint sound. Yes, your ears create sound!

Nura uses a microphone to know exactly what sound went in, and also uses the same microphone to listen to the faint sounds that return from the ear. This makes Nura very different from any other type of calibration. It actually knows the response of the inner ear. The inner ear detection is performed using an adaption of OAE (otoacoustic emission).

The sound that is produced by our ears and detected by our headphones’ internal microphone is encoded with information about how well you actually heard the sound that went in.

Nura headphones connect to your smartphone. You press go, and they sweep through a bunch of tones for about 30 seconds. At the same time, they listen to the sounds your ear is making. By processing these signals it works out how well specific frequencies of sound got through to your brain. Once they know this, they sonically mould to match your ears perfectly and provide rich, balanced sound for you.

 

Our technology combines deep hearing and neuroscience, psychoacoustics, signal processing and acoustics. Nura does not require you to answer a test. You sit there and listen for 30s. That’s it.

  • The first time you put them on your head, they’ll measure your hearing - a process that takes about 30 seconds.
  • Nura headphones actually know you. Any time you put them on, Nura will recognize you in less than two seconds.
  • Once Nura identifies you, they load your profile. Any music you listen to (no matter the app) will be optimized for your hearing, so you can hear every note perfectly.

 

Please share your thoughts with us. And if you’re passionate about music, please share our story with the world.

 

 

 

Being a lifelong music lover and engineer, Kyle started systematically looking for the perfect pair of headphones and discovered that headphones are like shoes - perfection depends on who’s wearing them. This led to the realization that headphones need to be able to understand the person’s hearing so that they can adapt and match the listener.

Kyle approached Luke to explore whether it would be possible to squeeze a hearing measurement machine into a pair of headphones and make a closed-loop music experience. They found out it could be done and started working on the core technology to make it possible.

 

We’re passionate about music and enabling people to experience it fully.
 
In January of this year, we were accepted into the

HAX Accelerator, which has lower acceptance rate (3%) than Stanford (4.7%) or Harvard (5.2%). We dropped everything, leaving our friends, families, and careers to come to China for four months to work on development and prototyping.

We’re now ready to move ahead with manufacturing and plan to start production at the end of 2016. This includes tooling, sourcing and regulatory certifications. Our product will be ready to ship to our Indiegogo InDemand supporters by May 2017.

PARTNERSHIPS & CREDITS

  • HAX Accelerator  
  • Melbourne Accelerator Program 
  • PR by Proper Propaganda and float 
  • CGI by Vladimir Petkovic and Vuk Nikolic 
  • Graphic elements by detraform 
  • Visual Identity, Industrial Design and Product Photography by Office For Product Design 
  • Early Concepts by Tricycle 
  • Video by Antony Bui and blanktape music 
  • Original music by Luke Howard
  • Online marketing by Jellop
story_txt:
Thank you to all our Contributors for all your encouragement and support! You can now pre-order, find answers to FAQs and get in touch with the nura team at nuraphone.com



Did you know that your hearing is as unique as your fingerprint, your face and your voice? Each of us has different sensitivities to different frequencies of sound. This means the same pair of headphones sound different for each person. And the difference is significant.
How the listening experience can differ between two people
 

How do you choose the right pair of headphones when we all hear differently? Sound and hearing are very hard to objectively self-assess. How do you know what you’re missing? Audiophiles are skilled at the art, but this takes them years of experience. 
Nura empowers everyone who loves music to find their perfect sound - automatically. Nura actually knows which sounds are getting through fully and which sounds are not. It uses this information to fill in your musical black spots.
 








Our backers spoke! We are proud to announce the addition of wireless (Bluetooth) and analog (3.5mm) connectivity!

You don’t have to spend countless hours and lots of money to find great audio. It’s not necessary to be a sound expert either (that’s where we come in). Nura is designed for music enthusiasts. So, if you love music, Nura is for you!


Please share your thoughts with us. And if you’re passionate about music, please share our story with the world.

Melbourne Accelerator Program 
PR by Proper Propaganda and float 

CGI by Vladimir Petkovic and Vuk Nikolic

story:
About

Welcome, fans and friends! We are Strip66, the jazz-funk band from New York who needs your help to make a music video for our song Minimal Drizzle! Here's a link to the song on BandCamp: https://strip66.bandcamp.com/releases

The continuous flow of nature represent many facets of love, relationships, careers, and life in general. Our song, Minimal Drizzle, is about how our surroundings and environment can affect our mood and change with the flexibility of our daily lives. But it’s also a spiritual song, with nature symbolizing continuity of life, which is free-flowing and fluid. The song is a positive reflection to sinking beneath water, it’s easy to begin feeling heavier and more weighted, with an overwhelming sense of pressure and force. But if you relax, it can be freeing, you feel beside yourself, and there is a calming knowledge that as long as you keep yourself awake, something bright is waiting for you above the surface when you float back up.

We are choosing to film this video in the wintertime because even though physically, nature is less fluid, it is continuous in terms of its lifetime. The water, trees, and flowers will soon wake up again, like they always do. This song is very important to us because when we play it, we feel the audience connecting with us. We want to make a music video that is personifying of nature, allowing anybody who watches it to interpret it in any way they want.

We need your help to make this project happen, so please donate anything you can. Thank you!

Our Vision for the Video

We hope to produce a video where the band is trapped inside a snow-globe that they break out of. We will be using special effects to do this. The video will be filmed in Madison, NH. We chose to film it in Madison because it has very beautiful spots that we hope to feature in the song. We will also feature shots from a drone. We hope to convey the message that even though things might get hard, you can still find ways to enjoy life. The video is also about letting the stresses of everyday life is and enjoying the environment around you. 

Feel free to reach out for a more in-depth description of the music video.

Budget

To make this project happen, we will need money for transportation to Madison, NH. We will also need money to get food for everyone involved during the production shoots. The money will also be used to pay some of the crew members.

If you donate to our project, there are several perks that you will receive. If you cannot donate, you can still help by sharing this campaign!

If we do not reach our entire goal, we will still make this music video, but we will cut our budget down.

A more in-depth budget is available upon request.

The Impact of Your Donation

Your donation will mean so much to both the band, and the crew. You will help Strip66 gain attention. You will be able to see the song Minimal Drizzle come to life, and we have some awesome perks to offer.

About The Crew

Producer: Samantha Hayes 

 

Samantha Hayes is a junior at Fitchburg State University. She most recently directed a short film titled, Polite Police. Samantha also produced and edited a short documentary for FSU's Black Student Union titled, My Black Is... Samantha has also produced a short documentary to promote Fitchburg's Community Read events. She has taken classes such as Producing, Audio Production, Editing, and Sound Design. Samantha is very excited to bring the song Minimal Drizzle to life. 

Director: Paul Stamper 

Paul is a hard working filmmaker; a self-taught visual effects artist, a director/producer, an editor, and a YouTube Semi-Celebrity with Rob Dyke. Having created his own feature film in 2010 to 2011, Paul began his journey to a creative and hard working adventure, and has filmed many music videos for independent artists. http://paulstamper.com/

Director of Photography: Trevor Robertson

Trevor is a talented cinematographer. He is currently a sophomore at Fitchburg State University, but has worked on many different projects. Most recently, he made a music video for Jenna Hannon's cover of Sandcastles by Beyonce. He was also the director of photography for a short film titled, Impasse. He also was a sound operator for a short film called, The Party. Trevor is really looking forward to making this music video come together.

Script-supervisor: Tara Burke

Tara Burke is a passionate filmmaker attending school at Fitchburg State University. Tara volunteers at Fitchburg Access Television. Tara most recently worked as the script-supervisor and editor for a short film called, The Key to Happiness. Tara is very hard-working, and is looking forward to making this music video. 

Production Assistant/ Editor: Joseph LeBlanc
 
Joseph LeBlanc is a junior at Fitchburg State University. Most recently, he worked as a production assistant for the short film, Polite Police. Joseph also recently did the cinematography for the short film, The Hunt. He is passionate about bringing a vision to life. Joseph is looking forward to working on this music video.

story:
What is "Le Pavé Parisien" ?

 

Le Pavé Parisien - which means "The Parisian Cobblestone" in french is a cubical concrete speaker made in Paris and designed by Pierre-Axel Izérable, who is an sound expert and The Concrete Family's CEO.

❤️❤️❤️

Le Pavé Parisien est une enceinte unique en son genre : cubique et en béton, elle est conçue à Paris par Pierre-Axel Izérable, expert en son, et Président de The Concrete Family.

 

 
 

# Technical specifications :

 

 

 

- Material : high performance fiber-reinforced concrete
- Cover grid : made with stainless steel
- Woofer : ferrite and water-resistant
- Amplifier : 20 Watts RMS
- Connectivity : Bluetooth 4.1 (BLE)
- Battery : 8 hours of playtime - USB-C connection
- Stereo : input and output stereo with a mini jack cable to chain two speakers

 

☀️☀️☀️

 

- Matériau: béton fibré haute performance
- Grille de recouvrement: en acier inoxydable
- Woofer: ferrite et résistant à l'eau
- Amplificateur: 20 Watts RMS
- Connectivité: Bluetooth 4.1 (BLE)
- Batterie: 8 heures de lecture - Connectivité USB-C
- Stéréo: entrée et sortie stéréo avec un câble mini jack pour enchaîner deux enceintes 

 

# Family :

The Concrete Family company was created to gather a family of four brothers, Stanislas, Pierre-Axel, Baptiste and Benjamin, around a business project they love.

⛱️⛱️⛱️

The Concrete Family est une société créée autour d'une famille de quatre frères, Stanislas, Pierre-Axel, Baptiste et Benjamin, autour d'un projet d'entreprise qu'ils aiment.

 

# R & D :

 

The journey started in 2015, in Pierre-Axel's parents garden, where he made with his brothers the first concrete speakers !

The Pavé Parisien is a concentrate of technology, made possible by the democratization of production tools and the availability on the market, of an increasingly sharp and efficient electronics. Thanks to the evolution of the semiconductor market and the miniaturization of digital, The Concrete Family offers a powerful speaker with a precise and transparent sound. What to rediscover your music every moment!

 

☀️☀️☀️

 

Le voyage a commencé en 2015, dans le jardin des parents de Pierre-Axel, où il a fabriqué avec ses frères les premières enceintes en béton !

Le Pavé Parisien est un concentré de technologie, rendu possible par la démocratisation des outils de production et la disponibilité sur le marché, d'une électronique de plus en plus pointu et performante. Grâce à l'évolution du marché des semi-conducteurs et de la miniaturisation du numérique, The Concrete Family vous propose une enceinte puissante avec un son précis et transparent. De quoi redécouvrir votre musique à chaque instant !  

 

# Made in France :

Cock-a-doodle-doo ! (Cocorico in french) ! The Concrete Family is a project born in Paris, France. Our woofers come from a family business as well, the great audio professional Audax. Even our concrete is french ! We are working with the Smart'Up concrete formula from Vicat, a 165 years family business.

❤️❤️❤️

Cocorico ! The Concrete Family est un projet né à Paris, en France. Notre haut-parleurs provient également d'une entreprise familiale, le grand professionnel audio Audax. Même notre béton est français ! Nous travaillons avec la formule de béton Smart'Up de Vicat, une entreprise familiale de 165 ans.



# Market :

Le Pavé Parisien is an outsider in the audio device market. Concrete objects are finding their places in the interior design and decoration field in the contemporary world as more and more people find themselves appealed by the originality of this rough but soft material.

We are proud of being independent craftmen. We'll help our company to get off the ground with passion, hard work and with you !

 

❤️❤️❤️

 

Le Pavé Parisien est un outsider sur le marché des appareils audio. Les objets en béton trouvent leur place dans le domaine du design d'intérieur et de la décoration dans le monde contemporain. De plus en plus de gens sont séduits par l'originalité de ce matériau rugueux mais doux.

Nous sommes fiers d'être des artisans indépendants ! Cela permet à notre entreprise de décoller avec passion, travail et grâce à vous !

 

Why is "Le Pavé Parisien" on Indiegogo ?

 

After a successful campaign on the french crowdfunding platform Kisskissbankbank, we collected 47 745 € from 186 backers !

❤️❤️❤️

Après une campagne réussie sur la plateforme française de crowdfunding Kisskissbankbank, nous avons collecté 47 745 € auprès de 186 contributeurs!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It is a great sign that the french market is positively answering to our product's launch ! Now the show must go on !

❤️❤️❤️

C'est un très bon signe que le marché français réponde positivement au lancement de notre produit ! Maintenant l'aventure continue !

 

# What's next ?

 

The Concrete Family's next goal is to create a manufacture in Paris and to have careers opportunity to offer around concrete craftmanship, 3D printing, electronic expertise, marketing and communication.

We also want to bring Le Pavé Parisien abroad in order to get more feedbacks and to expand our community of craftmanship, concrete and good sound lovers !

⛱️⛱️⛱️

Le prochain objectif de The Concrete Family est de créer une manufacture à Paris et de lancer une synergie autour de l’artisanat du béton, de l’impression 3D, de l’expertise électronique, du marketing et de la communication.

Nous souhaitons également proposer Le Pavé Parisien à l’étranger afin d'élargir notre communauté de savoir-faire, d’amateurs de béton et d'amateurs de bon son !

 

 

 

Thanks et Merci ! 

 

Thanks for your interest, we are very proud and impatient to send you the best product we can !

❤️We believe you'll soon become concrete fans like us ❤️

 

❤️❤️❤️

 

Merci pour votre intérêt, nous sommes très fiers et impatients de vous envoyer le meilleur produit possible!

❤️Nous croyons que vous allez bientôt devenir des fan de béton comme nous ❤️

story:
what do you really need from your headphones?

QUALITY sound
Great STYLE
VALUE for money

So, that's as complicated as this gets. We've created wireless headphones that look great, sound incredible, and the price tag is amazing, so YOU CAN'T SAY NO!

 

 

 

Who is GoGoGadget?

 

We’d like to introduce ourselves: our small team has come together from the USA, UK, and Asia to create GoGoGadget.

Our focus is to bring to you the best gadgets for the best value.

We’ve worked closely with manufacturers across Europe and Asia delivering quality electronics for brands and retailers internationally for over 10 years, including many products you may have backed on Indiegogo and other crowdfunding platforms.

Our mission now is to cut out the middle man and bring them direct to you...

 

It sounds simple, because it is…

We consult with manufacturers on numerous products each month, and the ones we love the most we’re taking to crowdfunding to bring you the latest gadgets at the best possible price, AND with the quickest delivery!

The challenge for us is to reach the volumes or funding targets to allow us to do this, so spread the word, like our page and thank you for helping us bring the best to you for less :)

Welcome to GoGoGadget!

story:
Short Summary about who we are and why you should fund this.

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about, like the awesome industrial EBM band, Ten Cent Toys' new release due out February, 2nd, 2020, and to people they trust, with a decade of continued work and efforts in the Florida scene.

Here are some things to do in this section of information we have gathered:

  • We introduce ourselves, as a band, and explain our background.
  • We briefly described our campaign and why it's important to you and us.
  • We also expressed the magnitude of what contributors, like yourself, will help us achieve.

Remember, we kept it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if were amused so far and stopped reading here, would you be ready to make a contribution to getting your name in a music video on YouTube and getting a copy of the extremely limited edition version of our brand new Ten Cent Toys album, Twist Of Fate? I think you would.

Only 100 copies of this album will ever exist and won't be reproduced by us ever again!!!!! ACT NOW AND GET YOUR COPY TODAY!!!!! ONLY $25 for something that will never happen like this ever again!!!!!

story:
With premium tech and distinctive design inspired by mechanical art, Black Shark Ophidian redefines the way gaming earbuds are made. Finely tuned acoustics, RGB lights, and more than 14+ hours of playback time on a single charge make Black Shark Ophidian the new choice for long gaming sessions.

 

Get Ophidian Gaming Earbuds for $69 USD NOW!
 
 

See YouTuber Unbox Black Shark Ophidian Gaming Earbuds And The Latest Black Shark Gaming Gadgets

 

Thanks to world-renowned Knowles balanced armature drivers, a 10mm moving coil, and LHDC with a bandwidth that is 3x larger than most Bluetooth earphones, Black Shark Ophidian delivers a premium listening experience.

 

Black Shark Ophidian has a uniquely low latency of 50+ms. This allows for the audio to always sync with the device. Whether it’s gaming, music, or video, you’re able to hear everything in the same instant it happens on your screen with no lags or stutters.

 

Fully charge your earbuds through the USB-C connector in 90 minutes. Enjoy a total of 14 hours of playback time without RBG lights, or 10 hours with RGB lights.

Also Ophidian integrates cutting-edge quick charging technology. 10 mins charging can provide you 4h+ playback time!

 

RGB Breathing lights with an intense color gamut and a suite of unique breathing effects.

 

Black Shark Ophidian was designed with looks and comfort in mind. At only 22g, the ergonomic bullet-style earbuds have a sleek design that’s complemented by bright and saturated RGB lights, making them fit perfectly with any gaming setup. 

 

The companion app allows you to take full control over your listening experience, with multiple preset sound profiles, EQ manual adjustments, and RGB light control.

 

In order to provide better sound and bass performance, great fitting earphones are a must. To ensure a flawless audio experience, Ophidian comes with a selection of ear fins, guaranteed to provide you with a secure and comfortable fit.

 

Use the built-in magnets to clip the earbuds together, and pause your music when you need to. Unclipping will automatically resume your playback.

 

Ophidian gaming earbuds in a seamless structure are strictly waterproofing and sweat proofing processed, making it the ideal choice for your long time gaming, jogging, yoga, hiking, traveling, etc.

 

 

 

 
 

Share Indiegogo campaign referral link, get FREE prizes!

Prize:  Free Black Shark 2 Pro (12G+256G) Gaming Phone

(Worth €699 Euro. Product introduction here)

Quantity: 30

story_txt:
With premium tech and distinctive design inspired by mechanical art, Black Shark Ophidian redefines the way gaming earbuds are made. Finely tuned acoustics, RGB lights, and more than 14+ hours of playback time on a single charge make Black Shark Ophidian the new choice for long gaming sessions.
 

Get Ophidian Gaming Earbuds for $69 USD NOW!
 
 
See YouTuber Unbox Black Shark Ophidian Gaming Earbuds And The Latest Black Shark Gaming Gadgets


 
Thanks to world-renowned Knowles balanced armature drivers, a 10mm moving coil, and LHDC with a bandwidth that is 3x larger than most Bluetooth earphones, Black Shark Ophidian delivers a premium listening experience.


 

Black Shark Ophidian has a uniquely low latency of 50+ms. This allows for the audio to always sync with the device. Whether it’s gaming, music, or video, you’re able to hear everything in the same instant it happens on your screen with no lags or stutters.



 

Fully charge your earbuds through the USB-C connector in 90 minutes. Enjoy a total of 14 hours of playback time without RBG lights, or 10 hours with RGB lights.
Also Ophidian integrates cutting-edge quick charging technology. 10 mins charging can provide you 4h+ playback time!

 
RGB Breathing lights with an intense color gamut and a suite of unique breathing effects.


 
Black Shark Ophidian was designed with looks and comfort in mind. At only 22g, the ergonomic bullet-style earbuds have a sleek design that’s complemented by bright and saturated RGB lights, making them fit perfectly with any gaming setup. 


 

The companion app allows you to take full control over your listening experience, with multiple preset sound profiles, EQ manual adjustments, and RGB light control.

 

In order to provide better sound and bass performance, great fitting earphones are a must. To ensure a flawless audio experience, Ophidian comes with a selection of ear fins, guaranteed to provide you with a secure and comfortable fit.


 

Use the built-in magnets to clip the earbuds together, and pause your music when you need to. Unclipping will automatically resume your playback.


 
Ophidian gaming earbuds in a seamless structure are strictly waterproofing and sweat proofing processed, making it the ideal choice for your long time gaming, jogging, yoga, hiking, traveling, etc.

story:
WHY SMARTEARRINGS

Remember when Apple announced it was getting rid of the phone jack on their iphones?

That was the moment we knew our SmartEarrings™ had to happen! 

...

BENEFITS 

They not only let you take and make calls, they also bring Siri/Google smart assistants to your ear. The end result: your life is easier and smarter!  

...

HOW TO

We designed our SmartEarrings™ to be easy to pair and wear.

To Pair:

  1. Go to the Settings menu on your smartphone, and make sure Bluetooth® is on.  
  2. Press and hold the button on the module of your SmartEarrings™ until it is in pairing mode. 
  3. Select it when its entry shows up in your Bluetooth® settings. 

And you already know how to wear earrings. That's how easy it is to pair and wear our SmartEarrings™.

Just in case you decide to wear the earrings just for their beauty, you can simply slip off the tech module, and voila! you have a beautiful pair of everyday earrings.  

The tech module is interchangeable  so you can match your earrings to the occasion. 

We should mention that unlike most other wearables where you have to throw away the entire gadget when it reaches the end of its tech life, our earrings are forever! That’s because we designed them to be worn with or without the tech module.  Well after you upgrade to newer modules, you can still continue to rock your earrings.  

...

THE TEAM

We, the founders of peripherii, are two women engineers who decided to create smartearrings when we couldn't find wireless earphones that were stylish, date-night worthy, and minus the many short-comings of existing headphones. 

Thanks to our many advisors and experts and, yes, detractors as well, we have gotten this far. And thanks to your support we will hopefully get a lot further!  

...

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Ours is a two-part project: a pair of earrings and a tech module. We don't anticipate any issues with the jewelry part of the earrings, and will ship them as soon as they are ready. Should we run into manufacturing or supply chain issues with the module, we will update you immediately! 

...

And that's all we have for now, but let's keep the conversation going!  Please do feel free to reach out with your questions/comments/clarifications. To get the ball rolling, we asked (and answered) a few questions ourselves... 

...

F A Q

Q1. Is the tech module rechargeable?

A1. Yes! The tech module includes a battery that is rechargeable.

 

Q2. Can I wear my SmartEarrings without the module?

A2. Yes, you can wear your SmartEarrings with or without the module!

 

Q3. Can I buy your earrings without the module?

A3. Yes!   

 

Q4. Can I wear my own earrings with your module?

A4. Technically, yes. But for the right look, only some styles of earrings will be a good fit.

 

So there you have it. It may have started as our idea, but you helped make it concrete. Support us by either pre-ordering and sharing our campaign, or even by just spreading the word.
