story: ENDED CAMPAIGN
story_txt: ENDED CAMPAIGN

story:
RiderBuds is our response to all of your audio challenges as a rider.

We've talked with well over 1,000 riders during our development process.

These are the earphones you've told us to make.

This is the ultimate audio solution so many riders have been waiting for. They fit under any helmet, stay comfortable, cut down the wind noise, and deliver next-level sound quality and precision.


 





We’ve seriously prioritized making RiderBuds the smallest earphones ever.

In order to make earphones that are guaranteed to work with even the tightest helmets, never dislodge, and stay comfortable, we had no other choice - we had to make earphones that would hide entirely inside the ear canal.

 

 


Size is what really differentiates RiderBuds from any other earphones.

With our earphone disappearing entirely inside your ear canal, there’s nothing to come in interference with your helmet liner. This means no more dislodging, no pressure points, and no vibrations being transferred from the helmet at high speeds.




 

Our earphones are the first ones to be able to clear even the tightest helmets out there. They will never fall out or break seal while putting your helmet on, period.

 
 

Most earphones easily break their seal with even a lightest pull on the wire. RiderBuds seal up inside your ear canal so well that it takes a far greater effort to break their strong seal compared to ordinary earphones.

 




Ordinary in-helmet speakers that come with the popular intercom headsets have been the bane of existence for most riders who’ve tried them.

The sheer logic behind how they’re supposed to work - by producing the sound outside of your ear in a high noise environment (often reaching 110dB+), while fighting through protective earplugs - is so utterly counterproductive, it might as well be a bad joke.

...except it has been the reality for many riders.
 

 




With RiderBuds, we’ve taken a fundamentally different approach with delivering audio into your ears. Instead of having the source of the sound outside of your ear, it’s deep inside your ear.

The combination of superior noise attenuation and use of our extremely precise audio driver means one thing. Enjoy the quality and crispness of sound that’s never been experienced before on a bike. At any speed.


 


We’ve tested every single available Balanced Armature driver on the market before deciding on the absolute best one.

It wasn’t an easy process - the driver had to be small enough to fit inside the ear canal rather than outside of it like in conventional earphones.

After a long and stringent selection process, we’ve decided to go with the single best driver on the market for its size, made in USA. The end result is very impressive - extremely crisp, precise audio, with a decent bass response.







 

Studies have shown that it only takes 15 minutes of wind noise exposure at highway speeds to lose some of your hearing permanently, without wearing any protection.

Wind noise is not a joke. It’s also called a “silent killer” for a reason. The hearing loss happens slowly and gradually, over long time. We don’t really notice it until it’s already too late.

The damage has already been done, and it's irreversible.

That’s why an adequate level of noise attenuation is absolutely key for protecting our hearing as riders.

Most ordinary earphones or In-Ear Monitors don’t offer the same level of hearing protection as a set of a good industrial foam earplugs does.

Thanks to our unique silicone and foam ear tips design, we were able to match the level of noise reduction normally only seen in protective earplugs.










Every rider has individual preferences. Some prefer the rock solid seal and durability of the triple-flanged high grade silicone tips, while some prefer the comfort and cushiness of memory foam tips.

We’ve made the ear tips entirely replaceable, and both of them are washable. Foam tips will always degrade faster with use and washing, but that’s why we’re throwing in an extra spare set into each shipped RiderBuds unit. Replacements will be obviously also available, so you can continue on using our earphones season after season.




Where most of the earphones have a hard plastic housing that digs into your ears under tight helmets, ours have a soft and rounded silicone shell. This ensures that your ear tips of choice will stay comfortable, even on those very long rides and adventures.
 

 
 



We know that our users will put RiderBuds through their paces.

Building our earphones extremely tough was a big priority during the design process.

We’ve achieved an unseen-before strength of connection between the cable and the speaker. Since RiderBuds need to be pulled by the cable every time when removing them from your ears, it’s absolutely essential that they can withstand that kind of use and abuse over a long time.

No more replacing your earphones every riding season.





 





After collecting nearly a thousand responses on our survey for the cable modules, we’ve listened and picked the riders’ absolute favorites.

Here are the modules you’ve told us to make - and we’re including all of them with each shipped unit of RiderBuds!



Intercom headset user? Our short cable module does the trick. No extra wires hanging around and getting all tangled up. Easily connect and disconnect your RiderBuds with your helmet already on.

 

Using other devices? Just use one of the two longer modules - with or without the remote controller.

 

Our uniquely over-sized volume remote controller is easily operated with all kinds of gloves.

 




The modular cable design we've used also has another very important added feature.

Imagine what could happen in a crash with the Kevlar-reinforced wires attached to earphones deeply anchored inside your ears - not a pretty picture.

With RiderBuds, the wire simply disconnects at the mid-way connection point as soon as enough force is applied. It won't disconnect on its own, but will save your ears from some serious pain in an event of any sudden pull - whether it's a dismount, or any other scenario.


 


With ordinary earphones, once you're all geared up, the cable of the earphones usually ends up being "trapped" between the jacket and your body.

This creates a very easy opportunity for the cable to get pulled as soon as you move or twist your head - and ultimately, have the earphones dislodge or break their seal.

That's all about to change now. RiderBuds are the first mass production earphones to feature a unique coiled cable section that stays around your neck area.

This is the final step that guarantees your earphones will never get dislodged again.



 




Some people have asked us why we didn't go with wireless earphones - it's 2018 after all, right?

Except that Bluetooth earphones have serious challenges when used on a bike.
 

  •  The battery has to go somewhere, which is usually around your ears, neck, or somewhere in between - not a good idea to have any bulky parts where a tight helmet meets your head.
     
  • Once under the helmet, the quality and reliability of connection becomes an issue.
     
  • Once the battery is dead, they're useless. (And many won't even last a whole day of riding).


(Plus, over 2,000+ surveyed riders and 1,000+ conversations say that most riders prefer the all-important advantages of wired earphones: low profile, reliability, ability to connect to their intercom.)







 




You can have the best of both worlds with above setups:

  • The extreme low profile of RiderBuds - unrivaled fit and comfort under a helmet
  • Superior battery life and connection quality
  • Once battery runs out, you can still use the earphones
     



 

As motorcycle riders, we have a very unique set of challenges around our audio.

We need:

  • Something that fits under our helmet and stays comfortable.
  • Precise and crisp sound - at any speed - whether we’re listening to music, communicating with each other, or hearing navigation commands.
  • Adequate hearing protection. Far too many riders develop hearing loss over their years in the saddle.
  • A solution that's reliable and won't start breaking up on us in the middle of a season, a commute, or - especially - a long trip.


The in-helmet speakers that come with all intercom headsets are always a big disappointment. With earplugs in, the sound is barely audible at high speed. It’s utterly counter-productive to have the speakers fight through both the wind noise, and protective earplugs. With no earplugs in, the audio is still mixed with the wind and exhaust noise.

The currently available earphones don’t fit well under the helmet. They dislodge, break seal, become uncomfortable, put too much pressure on your ears, and transfer vibrations from the helmet - straight into your ear canals. They don’t offer as much hearing protection as earplugs do.
 








I’m Maurice - the guy behind RiderBuds™

RiderBuds started over one year ago when I was doing a lot of sport touring around Asia on various different bikes. I found myself in need of an audio solution that would let me hear my navigation, music, and rider communication - while also protecting my hearing and staying comfortable.

After shelling out well over a few thousand dollars on some of the quietest modular helmets on the market, two high-end intercom headsets, and countless different earphones - I was mind-boggled. How could there not be ANY good earphones or audio solutions for riders out there?

And then it all began...

I did a very extensive research, validated the product concept using proven lean startup principles, talked with over 1,000 riders in the process, and then finally hired very competent people to develop RiderBuds to where we they are today.


This isn't my first time manufacturing and delivering a product.
 

My background is creating new, better products and delivering them to the market.

Just over the last 12 months, I've made, sold, and shipped over 31,000 units of fully proprietary products in my other businesses. I am not new to manufacturing and making customers happy, at all.

I have extensive knowledge and expertise around manufacturing a new product, as well as all of the connections and resources we need to make RiderBuds a huge success.

After I saw just how many riders were looking for a better audio solution that didn't exist out there yet, I was hooked and it became my number one mission to change that.

I saw that as the perfect opportunity to apply all of my experience, creativity, and relentless drive.

Motorcycles are my #1 true, genuine passion, and that isn't changing anytime soon.

My intention and vision is to focus 100% of my efforts on fundamentally changing the audio experience for riders, worldwide.

I stand behind my product and will not stop until we've made, shipped, and delivered RiderBuds to your hands. And if you're not satisfied, I will personally refund you.
 



We've done multiple prototype iterations and have the final designs and prototypes in place, already in use by our Beta Testers in 7+ countries.

All we really need to do now is get everything ready for mass manufacturing. We'll be making last little tweaks - to streamline the assembly process and  make sure that overall quality stays really premium. The core design and function are already there and working very well - as evidenced by our Beta Testers. We've already secured factories for all of the components.




















We are shipping worldwide - to all countries*

We have backers from all over the world. Main countries include United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, UK, Ireland, and more. Please see our FAQ section for estimated duties and taxes for your region.

*Excluding Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen.

Legal disclaimer

Using this device while operating a motor vehicle may increase the risk of serious injury or death to you, your passengers, and/or other drivers. By using this device, you agree that you understand these risks and waive all liability of RiderBuds Limited and its owners. Always ride in a responsible manner, respecting state and local law. RiderBuds Limited informs that using this device while operating a motor vehicle may not be authorized by law in your state or country. Certain states and countries prohibit an operator of a motor vehicle from using earphones, earbuds, or headsets in public traffic. Please check your local law and use this device only out of public traffic such as private properties or closed circuits. if the simultaneous use of both ear speakers while riding a motorcycle is prohibited by your local law, please use only a single ear speaker while riding. Should you choose not to respect this warning, RiderBuds Limited denies any liability. Using earphones with loud volume may be harmful to your health by damaging your eardrums and causing hearing loss. Please maintain proper volume level to protect your ears.
story_txt:
RiderBuds is our response to all of your audio challenges as a rider.We've talked with well over 1,000 riders during our development process.These are the earphones you've told us to make.This is the ultimate audio solution so many riders have been waiting for. They fit under any helmet, stay comfortable, cut down the wind noise, and deliver next-level sound quality and precision. We’ve seriously prioritized making RiderBuds the smallest earphones ever.In order to make earphones that are guaranteed to work with even the tightest helmets, never dislodge, and stay comfortable, we had no other choice - we had to make earphones that would hide entirely inside the ear canal.  Size is what really differentiates RiderBuds from any other earphones.With our earphone disappearing entirely inside your ear canal, there’s nothing to come in interference with your helmet liner. This means no more dislodging, no pressure points, and no vibrations being transferred from the helmet at high speeds. Our earphones are the first ones to be able to clear even the tightest helmets out there. They will never fall out or break seal while putting your helmet on, period.  Most earphones easily break their seal with even a lightest pull on the wire. RiderBuds seal up inside your ear canal so well that it takes a far greater effort to break their strong seal compared to ordinary earphones. Ordinary in-helmet speakers that come with the popular intercom headsets have been the bane of existence for most riders who’ve tried them.The sheer logic behind how they’re supposed to work - by producing the sound outside of your ear in a high noise environment (often reaching 110dB+), while fighting through protective earplugs - is so utterly counterproductive, it might as well be a bad joke....except it has been the reality for many riders.  With RiderBuds, we’ve taken a fundamentally different approach with delivering audio into your ears. Instead of having the source of the sound outside of your ear, it’s deep inside your ear.The combination of superior noise attenuation and use of our extremely precise audio driver means one thing. Enjoy the quality and crispness of sound that’s never been experienced before on a bike. At any speed. We’ve tested every single available Balanced Armature driver on the market before deciding on the absolute best one.It wasn’t an easy process - the driver had to be small enough to fit inside the ear canal rather than outside of it like in conventional earphones.After a long and stringent selection process, we’ve decided to go with the single best driver on the market for its size, made in USA. The end result is very impressive - extremely crisp, precise audio, with a decent bass response. Studies have shown that it only takes 15 minutes of wind noise exposure at highway speeds to lose some of your hearing permanently, without wearing any protection.Wind noise is not a joke. It’s also called a “silent killer” for a reason. The hearing loss happens slowly and gradually, over long time. We don’t really notice it until it’s already too late.The damage has already been done, and it's irreversible.That’s why an adequate level of noise attenuation is absolutely key for protecting our hearing as riders.Most ordinary earphones or In-Ear Monitors don’t offer the same level of hearing protection as a set of a good industrial foam earplugs does.Thanks to our unique silicone and foam ear tips design, we were able to match the level of noise reduction normally only seen in protective earplugs.
Every rider has individual preferences. Some prefer the rock solid seal and durability of the triple-flanged high grade silicone tips, while some prefer the comfort and cushiness of memory foam tips.We’ve made the ear tips entirely replaceable, and both of them are washable. Foam tips will always degrade faster with use and washing, but that’s why we’re throwing in an extra spare set into each shipped RiderBuds unit. Replacements will be obviously also available, so you can continue on using our earphones season after season.Where most of the earphones have a hard plastic housing that digs into your ears under tight helmets, ours have a soft and rounded silicone shell. This ensures that your ear tips of choice will stay comfortable, even on those very long rides and adventures.   We know that our users will put RiderBuds through their paces.Building our earphones extremely tough was a big priority during the design process.We’ve achieved an unseen-before strength of connection between the cable and the speaker. Since RiderBuds need to be pulled by the cable every time when removing them from your ears, it’s absolutely essential that they can withstand that kind of use and abuse over a long time.No more replacing your earphones every riding season. After collecting nearly a thousand responses on our survey for the cable modules, we’ve listened and picked the riders’ absolute favorites.Here are the modules you’ve told us to make - and we’re including all of them with each shipped unit of RiderBuds!Intercom headset user? Our short cable module does the trick. No extra wires hanging around and getting all tangled up. Easily connect and disconnect your RiderBuds with your helmet already on. Using other devices? Just use one of the two longer modules - with or without the remote controller. Our uniquely over-sized volume remote controller is easily operated with all kinds of gloves. The modular cable design we've used also has another very important added feature.Imagine what could happen in a crash with the Kevlar-reinforced wires attached to earphones deeply anchored inside your ears - not a pretty picture.With RiderBuds, the wire simply disconnects at the mid-way connection point as soon as enough force is applied. It won't disconnect on its own, but will save your ears from some serious pain in an event of any sudden pull - whether it's a dismount, or any other scenario. With ordinary earphones, once you're all geared up, the cable of the earphones usually ends up being "trapped" between the jacket and your body.This creates a very easy opportunity for the cable to get pulled as soon as you move or twist your head - and ultimately, have the earphones dislodge or break their seal.That's all about to change now. RiderBuds are the first mass production earphones to feature a unique coiled cable section that stays around your neck area.This is the final step that guarantees your earphones will never get dislodged again. Some people have asked us why we didn't go with wireless earphones - it's 2018 after all, right?Except that Bluetooth earphones have serious challenges when used on a bike. 
 The battery has to go somewhere, which is usually around your ears, neck, or somewhere in between - not a good idea to have any bulky parts where a tight helmet meets your head. 
Once under the helmet, the quality and reliability of connection becomes an issue. 
Once the battery is dead, they're useless. (And many won't even last a whole day of riding).
(Plus, over 2,000+ surveyed riders and 1,000+ conversations say that most riders prefer the all-important advantages of wired earphones: low profile, reliability, ability to connect to their intercom.) You can have the best of both worlds with above setups:
The extreme low profile of RiderBuds - unrivaled fit and comfort under a helmet
Superior battery life and connection quality
Once battery runs out, you can still use the earphones 
 As motorcycle riders, we have a very unique set of challenges around our audio.We need:
Something that fits under our helmet and stays comfortable.

Precise and crisp sound - at any speed - whether we’re listening to music, communicating with each other, or hearing navigation commands.

Adequate hearing protection. Far too many riders develop hearing loss over their years in the saddle.

A solution that's reliable and won't start breaking up on us in the middle of a season, a commute, or - especially - a long trip.
The in-helmet speakers that come with all intercom headsets are always a big disappointment. With earplugs in, the sound is barely audible at high speed. It’s utterly counter-productive to have the speakers fight through both the wind noise, and protective earplugs. With no earplugs in, the audio is still mixed with the wind and exhaust noise.The currently available earphones don’t fit well under the helmet. They dislodge, break seal, become uncomfortable, put too much pressure on your ears, and transfer vibrations from the helmet - straight into your ear canals. They don’t offer as much hearing protection as earplugs do. 

I’m Maurice - the guy behind RiderBuds™RiderBuds started over one year ago when I was doing a lot of sport touring around Asia on various different bikes. I found myself in need of an audio solution that would let me hear my navigation, music, and rider communication - while also protecting my hearing and staying comfortable.After shelling out well over a few thousand dollars on some of the quietest modular helmets on the market, two high-end intercom headsets, and countless different earphones - I was mind-boggled. How could there not be ANY good earphones or audio solutions for riders out there?And then it all began...I did a very extensive research, validated the product concept using proven lean startup principles, talked with over 1,000 riders in the process, and then finally hired very competent people to develop RiderBuds to where we they are today.This isn't my first time manufacturing and delivering a product. My background is creating new, better products and delivering them to the market.Just over the last 12 months, I've made, sold, and shipped over 31,000 units of fully proprietary products in my other businesses. I am not new to manufacturing and making customers happy, at all.I have extensive knowledge and expertise around manufacturing a new product, as well as all of the connections and resources we need to make RiderBuds a huge success.After I saw just how many riders were looking for a better audio solution that didn't exist out there yet, I was hooked and it became my number one mission to change that.I saw that as the perfect opportunity to apply all of my experience, creativity, and relentless drive.Motorcycles are my #1 true, genuine passion, and that isn't changing anytime soon.My intention and vision is to focus 100% of my efforts on fundamentally changing the audio experience for riders, worldwide.I stand behind my product and will not stop until we've made, shipped, and delivered RiderBuds to your hands. And if you're not satisfied, I will personally refund you. We've done multiple prototype iterations and have the final designs and prototypes in place, already in use by our Beta Testers in 7+ countries.All we really need to do now is get everything ready for mass manufacturing. We'll be making last little tweaks - to streamline the assembly process and  make sure that overall quality stays really premium. The core design and function are already there and working very well - as evidenced by our Beta Testers. We've already secured factories for all of the components.We are shipping worldwide - to all countries*We have backers from all over the world. Main countries include United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, UK, Ireland, and more. Please see our FAQ section for estimated duties and taxes for your region.*Excluding Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen.Legal disclaimerUsing this device while operating a motor vehicle may increase the risk of serious injury or death to you, your passengers, and/or other drivers. By using this device, you agree that you understand these risks and waive all liability of RiderBuds Limited and its owners. Always ride in a responsible manner, respecting state and local law. RiderBuds Limited informs that using this device while operating a motor vehicle may not be authorized by law in your state or country. Certain states and countries prohibit an operator of a motor vehicle from using earphones, earbuds, or headsets in public traffic. Please check your local law and use this device only out of public traffic such as private properties or closed circuits. if the simultaneous use of both ear speakers while riding a motorcycle is prohibited by your local law, please use only a single ear speaker while riding. Should you choose not to respect this warning, RiderBuds Limited denies any liability. Using earphones with loud volume may be harmful to your health by damaging your eardrums and causing hearing loss. Please maintain proper volume level to protect your ears.

story:
Simply Great Audio

My name is Robert, and I really like music. I have about 6 years of electrical engineering experience and I want to use that to bring you great audio for your headphones.
We are not ready to break up with our headphone jacks. We are also not ready to pay hundreds of dollars for "Hi-Fi" systems promising the world. Quality audio does cost money, but not as much as the big manufacturers make you think.
What I will do for you is handle the low level, nerdy, mundane tasks of picking DAC hardware, power supplies, suppressing noise, etc. 
All you have to do is snap it on and enjoy Simply Great Audio.

What You Get

This is part of the Motorola campaign to transform how smartphones are made. The idea is that you get the parts of the phone that are most important to you. I am focused on these areas:

  • Drive a wide range of headphones
  • Don't sacrifice battery life
  • Don't sacrifice your wallet

You also get options! I will be making two exciting and equally beautiful models

  1. 'Pine' - Designed to meet your on-the-go audio needs. Sleek, slim styling doesn't stretch out your pants pocket. Full, rounded audio won't stretch out your ear drums.
  2. 'Birch' - Designed to provide full, rich sound. Robust and elegant design feels as good in your hands as it does in your ears. Take a seat in your most comfortable couch or chair in the music hall of your dreams.

Necessary Risks

Consumer electronics are hard to make. I have a lot of experience testing products like this one and it is a long, arduous process to get it right. I will be using the money from this campaign to help fund these items:

  • Certification Testing - Those little marks and tags on all our new products we so easily overlook. The tests behind them keep us safe, and they are not free.
  • Production Readiness - Finalizing design work to make the product easier to build and ship on time.
  • Packaging - Another often overlooked hurdle and one I am not familiar with. Everybody loves that new box in the mail; it's the moment you've been waiting for and the moment for me to shine!

Other Ways You Can Help

You can spread the word to friends and family. I know your word is important and I will not let you down.

story:
Tattoo Audio - the ‘world's first' premium wireless headphone with integrated smartwatch - to smartphone or other smart-connected-device.


We invite you to become part of ‘history' by supporting our project!


Updates 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT -

WE SOLD OUT 2 PERKS and reached our Campaign target.

We also received two (2) FUNDING PARTNER STATUS PERKS of $10,000 each.

Please help us hit our next Stretch Goal provided in chart below.

Our Referral Program

The Problem!

Lack of 'intelligence' within the $3 billion dollar 'premium headphone' market

Premium Headphone Market - Competitor Analysis


The above CHART highlights the 'industry and primary players' within the 'Premium Headphone Market' and MSRP for each model. Based upon market data, the average or (mean) price for 'Premium' headphones is $375/each.

Sensor Functions: Some competitor models offering an incorporated (sensor) providing user's a similar experience - are sold for $400 or more.

None of the Market Leaders - $300 to $450 premium headphones possess an integrated smartwatch from its conveniently integrated - docking station located at the top of Tattoo Audio's over-ear premium wireless headphones.

Market rate MSRP for premium wireless headphones and a separate smartwatch, with similar functions as Tattoo Audio's, is $600 to $700 when purchased separately. 

The Solution!

The world's first - (tri-connection) premium headphone with integrated smartwatch!


Incredible! The 'World's First' Premium Headphone with Integrated Smartwatch!

As uniquely 'intelligent' as they are beautiful - Tattoo Audio® is the World's First 'tri-connection' premium wireless headphone with integrated smartwatch - to smartphone or other smart-connected-device!


Tattoo Audio's® innovative game-changing IP technologies sets a new 'intelligent global standard' for next-generation lifestyles trends and emerging technologies within the current $3 billion premium headphone market and the projected $70 billion global market for wearable technology in 2024, up from $14 billion in 2014.

While the industry charges $350 to $450 for just a basic in-line, wireless BT, or (brail) headphones (only) - we took a 'quantum leap' by delivering an ingenious premium headphone with integrated smartwatch all rolled into an extremely fashionable design.

MARKET COMPARISON CHART

PERKS - CHART



Goals & Stretch Goals 


How our (tri-connection) premium wireless headphones with integrated smartwatch works



Dynamic Tri-Connection - refers to Tattoo Audio's® products ability to 'ubiquitously' configure its 'Premium' wireless headphones + integrated smartwatch with your smartphone or other smart-connected-device - all simultaneously!
 
With Android (Configuration) - a user can 'simultaneously configure' multiple Bluetooth devices (e.g. your Smartphone, wireless headphone and smartwatch (tri-connection) all at the same time). Ubiquitous NFC® touch-and-go pairing from Tattoo Audio's® premium wireless headphones and wireless Bluetooth® 4.0 or later with its integrated smartwatch.


iOS (Configuration) - currently, a user can only 'simultaneously configure' their smartphone or other smart-connected-device to one wireless Bluetooth® device (e.g. your smartphone to our premium wireless headphones, or your smartphone to our smartwatch (dual-connection) with premium headphones in-line).
 
Note : i). Apple® iPhone® is not ‘Open Source'. ii). Apple® does not currently support multiple Bluetooth® device configuration simultaneously. iii). Once Apple® makes this update, Apple® users will be able enjoy ‘multiple wireless Bluetooth connections' simultaneously. 


UNIQUE FEATURES


Dock.. Undock

An integrated docking station conveniently located at the top of the premium headphones provides for quick and convenient attachment and removal of the intelligent smartwatch.


NFC


aptX


40mm Neodymium Speakers


Bluetooth 4.0 and later


Active lifestyle


Shopping lifestyle


Relaxed or working lifestyle

You could be outside your house working in your yard, washing your vehicle, or just relaxing poolside - all while your smartphone is inside the house on the table recharging its battery. 

All phone calls, SMS, Social notifications, Music control functions are right there on your wrist. If a call comes in, answer it right away with our smartwatch, listen and speak with our premium wireless headphones, and End-Call right from the integrated smartwatch. And after ending your call, Music start playing right where you left off! Amazing! No need to have your smartphone with you at all times.


For the multi-tasking 'generation', true multi-tasking capabilities all rolled into an ingeniously designed headphone + smartwatch set.

Now the world is finally at your command! You can 'simultaneously' listen to MUSIC, surf the WEB or play GAMES, and keep up to date with the latest SOCIAL conversations - 'uninterrupted' and without missing a beat!

Keeping you intelligently informed, on-the-fly user controls - all directly from your integrated smartwatch. Music, Call answer, end, reject, or dialing, SMS or Social communications - and so much more, faster than it takes to pull your smartphone out of your pocket or purse!

All this packed tightly into a remarkably attractive and unique high-end fashion design.

24 Revisions and 3 functional prototypes later and the Tattoo Audio® TA-220 premium over-ear wireless headphones with integrated smartwatch you see in our video are all real and fully functional products!


TA-200 & TA-220 Android compatible models (with integrated smartwatch)


TA-800 iOS & Android compatible models (with integrated smartwatch)


In The Box - Pledge Kits






Who We Are

Corporate value creation through 'intellectual property' (IP) investigation. In accordance with Tattoo Audio's® guiding principles, we create game-changing technologies, products and product-line extensions supported by a solid portfolio of intellectual property (IP).

What We Do

In accordance with Tattoo Audio's® guiding principles, 'we create game-changing technologies, products and product-line extensions' supported by a solid portfolio of Intellectual Property, (IP) that;

- delivers next-generation lifestyle trends and emerging technologies;

- provides a competitive advantage within the global marketplace;

- blocks competitors from directly competing against new IP platforms;

- protects these new high-margin high-growth business segments;

- delivers (breadth and depth) product offerings to both consumer and corporate markets;

- delivers multiple product-line extensions for improving earnings and revenue stories, and

- creates new multi-billion dollar vertical market segments within a specified product category and industry at a global level.

The Value of 'IP' has on an Industry and Business

It has been well documented 'significant' Earnings and CAGR stories predominately come from 'ideation' and creation of intellectual property (IP) providing a ‘competitive advantage' within the global marketplace and thus preserving development of a 'high-growth' and 'high-margin' business model for that particular business entity.

Our Ideation

Intellectual Property (IP) creation and management – has been a central part of Tattoo Audio's® ‘Corporate Value Creation' specifically within the current $3 billion Premium Headphone market and the projected $70 billion global market for wearable technology in 2024, up from $14 billion in 2014.

Under our Six-Year Product Development Plan - we believe with innovative IP creation, management, and utilization the Premium Headphone market will grow to $8 billion by 2020. 

Global Collaboration

At Tattoo Audio® we engage with capable EMS and SMT providers - under a full spectrum of new product design, prototype, test, and related engineering services that shorten product development cycles, resulting in faster time to market and reduced costs.

What Makes Us Different

Solid offshore manufacturing - with a high-quality EMS publicly-listed Asian group, 'clients include Apple and Samsung', has already been carefully put into place. We are relying upon their expertise for delivering high quality products to our customers on schedule - on a global level.

Knowledge & Experience:  Our CEO and Co-Founder, Tattoo Audio possesses 20-years expertise living, working and doing business throughout the Asia Pacific Rim region in the capacity of Chief International Executive or Regional Director within the  consumer electronics and technology field overseeing product life-cycle management functions: (product concept, definition, specification, implementation, qualification, production, and end-of-life).

Additional information at www.tattooaudio.com

Developers

If you're an App developer, big or small, please keep us in mind! Sign up for our Developer's mailing list here. We will keep you informed when we will be calling upon the App developer community for creating wonderful Apps and content.
 
Signing up has never been so easy at: www.tattooaudio.com/ad-community.html

Graphic Designer - CONTESTS

We are calling a 'shout out' to all great graphic designers!

We have TWO Contests for our Indiegogo Community BUYERS to participate in.

1.  Help us select the best GUI Icon – design to be shipped with our TA-220 model products x-factory, and

2.  Help us select our FIRST Graffiti Artwork – design for TA-800 model.

We are offering PRIZE MONEY to the WINNING DESIGNERS for both Contests! 

TOP entries for both contests as well as FINAL contest results will be POSTED on our web site at;

http://tattooaudio.com/gui-icon-contest.html

http://tattooaudio.com/graffiti-contest.html

Who knows - they might just become FAMOUS! 

Here's one of our Designer Entries :

YES, you Indiegogo Community can make a difference!

Signing up has never been so easy at: www.tattooaudio.com/gui-artists2signup

 Industrial Designers

We are calling a 'shout out' to all great industrial designers! After our Indiegogo campaign, as part of our 6-year business development plan, we created Intellectual Property, IP, for more than a dozen different types of products within the following 'Classifications'; headphones, ear-cups, wireless speakers docking stations and more.
 
Signing up has never been so easy at:www.tattooaudio.com/id-community.html


The Press

High Resolution photos for PRESS kindly sign up and download here: www.tattooaudio.com/press-center.html
 
For press inquiries, please contact media@tattooaudio.com
 
Follow Tattoo Audio® on:

Twitter
Facebook
You Tube
Instagram ​
Tumblr
Pinterest

Where We Are

TA-220 model, (shown in Video), we are;

  • Post – patent(s) applications;
  • Post – ID Design concept  - (Concept)
  • Post – Engineering Validation Test – (EVT);
  • Post – Design Validation Test – (DVT);
  • Pre– Production Validation Test – (PVT), Volume Production – (Volume), and Excess Obsolescence plans – (EOL);
  • Our Authorized EMS Supplier is a solid mainland-China publicly traded group, large customers include – Samsung and Apple;
  • We have yet to acquire our:  BQB Global license;
  • The following Certifications to be completed:  UL, CE, FCC, RoHS and IP57;  
  • We confirmed our tooling and plastics injection molding suppliers;
  • We confirmed all our Preferred Suppliers and Vendors for BOM and components with long-order-cycles or volatile pricing;
  • Stay-tuned, keep-in-touch, and watch us as we grow around the world!

Product Development Cycle Chart


We work with equipment suppliers for developing next-generation products and product-line extensions for global markets utilizing our core IP and related technologies through electronic manufacturing systems, (EMS), product development processes provided in ‘chart form' at http://tattooaudio.com/mfg.html.

Why We Chose Indiegogo?

Prior to Indiegogo - the world of fund raising and bringing innovative products to market was controlled by the top 1-percent. Wealth creation was predicated upon passing these 'gatekeepers'. Indiegogo - has leveled this playing field for the 99-percent of us and now everyone has the 'potentiality' to build real wealth, bring their 'visions' to life and make this world a better place!

My how things have changed. Thank you - Indiegogo!
 

If you 'LOVE' our products and what we have created for you, please give us a 'thumbs-up' by pledging as 'intensely as possible' and choose to make a difference in this world today!


Funding Functions


Technical Specifications:


Production Timeline


Our Pricing Strengths


Premium Headphone Market (Factoids) :

  • In 2012, overall U.S. headphone market sales were $2.4 billion up from $1.8 billion in 2011 and in 2013 surpassed $3 billion.
  • 73-percent – Growth of U.S. sales in 2012 of headphone that costs more than $100/set.
  • 50-percent – of the market is classified as ‘Premium' headphones.
  • Currently, ‘Premium' wireless headphones range between $350 and $450/each.
  • Recent acquisition of Beats for $3.2 billion - 'validates' the importance of the global 'Premium Headphone' vertical niche market.

Global Smart Watch Market (Factoids) :

Similarly, high-end 'smart watches' range between $250 and $300/each.

Global Wearable Technology Market (Factoids) :
 
Wearable technology global spending is projected grow from $14 billion in 2014 to $70 billion in 2024.

Establishing an MSRP

The market sets 'Premium Headphones' MSRP with intelligent-sensor, NFC, and Bluetooth integration between $350 and $450/each.
 
The market also sets 'Smartwatch' MSRP with integrated functions and quality materials between $250 and $300/each.

A consumer would have to spend between $600 and $750 to get almost 'the same specs' as our integrated tri-connection products.


Long-Term Global Sales

Less than 30-percent of global sales will be derived within the United States of America and Canada.
 
More than 50-percent of sales will be within the Asia Pacific Rim region, (where new advanced high technology products are more frantically acquired by the Youth Market, some purchasing several of the same types of devices annually), with the remaining sales from Europe, South America and other regions of the world (combined).

Global Buyers:  We have already signed Country Sole Agent Agreements with (quality) groups for the following countries; United Kingdom, Belgium, Germany, France, Japan, Australia, Middle East (region), Scandinavia (region),  and currently in discussions for the countries of Thailand and People's Republic of China ( PRC ).

Products Shipped by Contributor Level

First Level

Products shipped straight off the production line (directly from the factory) to you:

  • Senior Funding Partners
  • Funding Partners

Second Level 

First products shipped from our U.S. warehouse/distribution center in Seattle, Washington to you:

  • Distributor Pack – All distributor pack buyers

FAQ


Q.  Are Tattoo Audio® headphones NFC enabled? 

A.  Yes. We incorporated NFC® technology into our premium headphones making it (tap-easy automatic connection) to configure its Bluetooth® connection to a ‘smart-device'. Just touch-and-go! If you hate tediously manually-pairing your headsets required for standard Bluetooth® headsets you know what we're talking about.

If you jump between multiple types of smart-connected-devices at different times of the 'day' and 'night, (like we do), ubiquitous NFC® touch-and-go pairing of devices is the only way to go!

Q.  Are Tattoo Audio® headphones Bluetooth enabled? 

A.  Yes. All models of Tattoo Audio® premium wireless over-ear headphones are both Bluetooth® v4.0.

Q.  Does Tattoo Audio® headphones offer high-quality audio coding? 

A.  Yes. Integrated with both Tattoo Audio® premium over-ear wireless headphones TA-200 and TA-800, AAC and aptX® audio coding (audio codec compression algorithms) delivers high-quality coding wirelessly over Bluetooth®, enabling users to lose the wires without compromising on audio quality. To find out more go to: http://www.csr.com

We tried our very best to eliminate the lag, delay, or break in music or other audio traditionally experienced using Bluetooth by integrating high-quality coding technologies wirelessly over Bluetooth® with our premium over-ear headphones.

Q.  Does Tattoo Audio® headphones have any type of integrated intelligent sensor? 

A.  Yes. Set Them Down.. really! And tad-a! Music and phone conversations immediately stop and Tattoo Audio's® intelligent headphones hibernate to conserve power resources.

Pick Them Back Up.. and WOW! Music starts playing right where you left off and never missing a 'beat'.

Tattoo Audio's® 'ingeniously' integrated smart-sensor is at your command. On/Off integrated button to the ear-cups makes it quick and convenient to turn the sensor On/Off for cases when you listen to music or watch a movie lying down.

Q.  What does (tri-connection) mean? 

A.  'Tri-connection' means our premium over-ear headphones can be connected wirelessly to your smartphone while simultaneously being connected wirelessly to our integrated smartwatch. Android compatible smartphones can simultaneously connect to more than just one device by wireless configuration.

Tattoo Audio® is the World's First (tri-connected) premium headphone with integrated smartwatch. (Wow, this is ingenious!)

Q.  Are iOS devices able to connect to multiple devices simultaneously? 

A.  Currently No. Apple's iOS, built on CSR 8670 platform, only allows one iOS device (such as iPhone, iPad, iPod, etc...) to be simultaneously configured. (There are rumors Apple might be updating their iOS to enable multiple wireless device configuration. As soon as this update is made, iOS users will be able to experience simultaneously connecting to multiple devices by wireless connection).

Q.  How long does the battery last for the premium headphones? 

A.  The internal rechargeable lithium ion battery keeps our headphones going for about 15 – 16 hours typical use.

Q.  How long does it take to recharge the headphones battery? 

A.  Typical charge time is 2-3 hours by micro-USB connection or A/C adapter included (in the Box).

Q.  Can the headphones lithium ion battery be removed for charging or replace with another? 

A.  No. In order for us to pass the ‘Safety Drop Test' we had to build the lithium ion battery as non-removable to our premium headphones. ‘It's a safety issue, not a technical issue'.

Q.  Are Tattoo Audio® headphones ANC enabled? 

A.  Sorry, not the first two models. Including ANC technology will increase development costs and test-validation time frame 2-3 months. Plus, every ANC headset when QC inspected during production has to be individually hand tested one-by-one increasing unit costs above our budget.

If consumer demand is there, we will certainly come out with a 3rd generation headphone model specifically catering to ANC (Active-Noise Cancellation).

However since ANC headsets are currently less than 10-percent of the ‘Premium' headphone market, we can only cater to the much smaller niche ANC market with later versions. We have already created Six-Generations of headphones and our IP supports more than twelve-generations, so the ANC feature will be addressed within our 'six-year product development plan'. *Remember, crawl, walk, and then run!

Q.  Are the ear-cup padding to the headphones replaceable? 

A.  Yes. We designed our soft memory foam ear-cup padding to be replaceable over time as the memory foam wears out. Replacements will be made available on our global e-commerce web sites.

Q.  Can Tattoo Audio® headphones be used to listen and speak with incoming Calls? 

A.  Yes, absolutely. You can listen and speak with incoming calls (wirelessly or in-line) with our premium headphones from your smartphone.

Q.  How far away from the Smartphone can I be? 

A.  The industry predominately utilizes Bluetooth wireless protocol providing up to 10-meters (or 30-feet) range between wirelessly configured devices. As such, a person can be this far away from their smartphone while wearing and enjoying our premium over-ear wireless headphones and integrated smartwatch (simultaneously or individually).

Q.  How long does the battery last for the integrated smartwatch? 

A.  The internal rechargeable lithium ion battery keeps the TA-220 model smartwatch going for 1-2 days full-time use and 3-days standby.

The TA-200 and TA-800 model has 3-4 days normal usage and 5-7 days standby. Yes, we realize other smartwatches provide up to 7-days standby, however they utilize a different OS, processor, e-paper screen, (not a vibrant 65k full-color screen), and battery size.

Q.  Does the integrated smartwatch display stay on all the time? 

A.  Yes. The display shows a watch face at all times.

Q.  What type of display are you using? 

A.  A vibrant 1.6” TFT, 65k (16bit) – pixels (240 x 240) touch-sensitive display.

Q.  Is the watch waterproof? 

A.  Yes. Our smartwatches will be Certified water resistant to IP57 standard. The same Standard as multi-billion dollar conglomerates smartwatches on the market today.

Q.  Scratchproof? 

A.  Our smartwatches have a scratch and shatter resistant lens with an anti-glare optical coating.

Q.  Does it use up my smartphones battery? 

A.  Our premium wireless headphones with integrated smartwatch are both wireless Bluetooth® devices. Yes, it does affect the battery life of your Smart phone, usually using up an extra 5-10% per day.

Q.  How do I charge the smartwatch? 

A.  We include (in the Box) x1 connection-pin cable for the smartwatch.

Q.  How long does it take to recharge the smartwatch battery? 

A.  Typical charge time is 2-3 hours.

Q.  Can I replace the watch band?

A.  Yes. Although we had to ingeniously design an integrated docking station to our premium headphones for quick and convenient (removal and storage) of the smartwatch and bands, this unique feature making it impossible to use standard belt-type watch bands found in the market (they won't fit within the incorporated docking station), we resolved this issue by offering replaceable 6-color watch band sets as an Accessory item to match your clothes, mood or even smartphone.

Color 'theme' packages are being developed to 'trend' with iPhone and Android color variations and popularity. As time goes on, we will introduce a plurality of replaceable watch band sets including fashionable graffiti artwork designs in our famous 'Designers Series'.

Q.  Are Tattoo Audio® smartwatches Bluetooth enabled? 

A.  Yes.

  • TA- 220 smartwatch is Bluetooth v2.1 & v3.0,
  • TA-200 smartwatch is Bluetooth v4.0 and later, and
  • TA-800 model smartwatch is Bluetooth® v4.0 and later.

Q.  Can TA-220 model Bluetooth v2.1 & v3.0 also work with Bluetooth v4.0 or later model Android smartphones? 

A.  Yes. Absolutely.

Thus far, we have tested all major brands of Android model smartphones (such as;  Samsung, HTC, Sony, LG, Huawei, and more) and Note 1, 2, and 3.

Q.  What kind of functions can the integrated smartwatch provide? 

A.   Keeping you intelligently informed, on-the-fly user controls - are directly at your command from the integrated smartwatch.

With Voice, Vibrate and Display - Call record, answer, end, reject, dialing,  (SMS), SMS or social communications, Music, in-phase Phonebook, call logs and Search features, anti-loss, find my smartphone - and so much more faster than it takes to pull your smartphone out of your pocket or purse!

Q.  Can I speak into the integrated smartwatch for user-control-functions? 

A.   No. Just like market leaders, we tested and found that the sound quality for such a small speaker is not that good, (you have to actually hold the smartwatch up to your ear to listen and then hold the smartwatch to your mouth to speak).

Our IP approach by integrating a premium over-ear headphone with a smartwatch is a more brilliant way of resolving device audible sound quality issues.

Q.  Can I use the premium headphones with integrated smartwatch while my smartphone is charging or in another room or while I'm outside? 

A.  Yes. Your smartphone can be in another room recharging or just safe in the house, while you're outside washing the car or working in the yard, freely enjoying MUSIC, reading the latest SMS and Social happenings, and even answering or making phone calls!

- Try doing that with your top branded $400 to $450 Premium headphone!

Q.  Do I have to use both the premium headphones and integrated smartwatch both at the same time? 

A.  No. You can chose to use both the premium headphones and integrated smartwatch simultaneously or one at a time. It's really up to you.

The point of inventing and developing our IP is to give you the advantages of utilizing both devices simultaneously - in keeping up with Youth Markets active lifestyles, trends and social happenings.

Q.  Do I have to use the Premium headphones wirelessly? 

A.  No. You can chose to use our premium over-ear headphones wirelessly or in-line to a smartphone, tabletPC, digital music player, or other smart-connected-device. It's really up to you. The point is we give you a choice, while the world does not.

Q.  I love your smartwatch, can I buy the smartwatch only? 

A.  Yes. As requested by Tattoo Audio's® Fans, TA-100SW model enables consumers to purchase just our 'sexy' Smartwatch on our website. Simply click on TA-100SW section of our website to place an order after our Indiegogo Campaign at http://www.tattooaudio.com/ta-100sw.html.

Q.  Will you ever sell your Premium Headpones only? 

A.  Yes. Our Country Sole Agents have significant demand generation from their distributors, dealers, wholesalers, importers and retailers to support such product introductions at a global level model is TA-800-HD.  Although the functions to our premium over-ear wireless headphones are being sold for $400 to $450 each by market leaders, our Intellectual Property, IP, does enable us to develop next-generation headphones which are actually intelligent, like us, not year-after-year producing old-school brainless in-line, wireless and (brail) control function headphones like market leaders. 

Q.  Does the smartwatch possess voice control functions? 

A.  Sorry, but No. All technologies providing voice recognition or speech enabled navigation we tested the accuracy rate was not high enough to be confident in adding this feature with our products or Brand at this time.

We would rather do it right, than have critics complaining our 'Voice Control' accuracy rate is less than 80-percent as global market leaders products have experienced. (Remember, crawl, walk, and then run!)

Q.  Does your smartwatch possess integrated sensors for fitness tracker?

A.  No . We chose not to integrate 'sports or fitness' tracking functions such as 'accelerometer' to our initial premium wireless over-ear headphones and integrated smartwatches because;

• health and fitness is such a small percentage of the overall user mass-market for premium headphones and smartwatches;
• higher certified water and dust resistant design is mandatory so users can jog, run or play in the rain, snow, or other extreme weather conditions;
• it would be more logical to come out with a line of premium headphones with integrated smartwatch 'specifically designed' for the Health & Fitness market after our patent portfolio is more fortifyed blocking inevitable competitors; and
• design and development costs to introduce high-quality premium headphones with integrated smartwatch within the Health & Fitness market is actually more expensive than the mass-market line. Unfortunately we're not a multi-billion dollar multinational conglomerate with an almost unlimited R&D budget. Remember, crawl, walk then run!

The next premium headphone with integrated smartwatch for the 'Health & Fitness' market is scheduled to be our next model introduced under our six-year product development plan. Careful patent mapping is required to secure our IP development processes. 

Q.  Does your smartwatch possess an integrated digital camera?

A.  No . We chose not to integrate a digital camera to our smartwatch device because the quality attained from smartwatches that do possess an integrated digital camera pales in comparison to the level of quality attained from a smartphone today.

Q.  Does your smartwatch possess an integrated GPS chip?

A.  No . We chose not to integrate a GPS chip to our smartwatch because this would drive up BOM, unit costs, and MSRP pricing that would drastically reduce volume sales for our initial models. GPS functions will be integrated into our next-generation 'Health & Fitness' model scheduled to out in 2015.

Q.  What are the methods of notification for the smartwatch device?

A.  Audible, vibrate and full-color back-lit touch-sensitive display.

Q.  How do you handle developing the global markets?

A.  We appoint Country Sole Agents who either handle a specific Country or Region (group of countries) who are in charge of all aspects of sales, marketing, distribution, advertising, public relations and event management.

Q.  What Countries have already been taken?

A.  United Kingdom, Germany, France, Belgium, Japan, Australia, Middle East (region), Scandinavia (region) and (in discussions) for People's Republic of China ( PRC ).

Q.  Can the integrated smartwatch provide push-notifications?

A.  Yes. Our TA-220, TA-200, and TA-800 models integrated smartwatch all provides push-notifications for users, however.

Compatible smartphones and OS : Many Tattoo Audio® Smartwatch features require an internet connection via Bluetooth™ tethering. Tattoo Audio® TA-200 model Smartwatch requires Android 4.0+ operating system and TA-800 model Smartwatch requires Android 4.0+ or iOS® 4+ operating system.

Important :
• Not all smartphone models allow Bluetooth™ tethering.
• Not all versions of the same Operating System allow Bluetooth™ tethering.
• Not all smartphone versions allow Bluetooth™ tethering.
• There are at least 16 different types of the same (model) smartphone sold by region around the world. Not all smartphones even of the (same) model provides actual SMS and Social message. Some provide - Notification Only.
• Not all mobile network operators allow Bluetooth™ tethering.

Note : Tattoo Audio® Smartwatch is not a standalone smartphone and therefore needs to connect to smartphones.

recognized and have your names listed in the Tattoo Audio® User's
Manuals for Indiegogo shipments under ‘Funding Partners - Honorable
Mentions' as well as your name listed on the Companies Corporate web site. 
Two (2) Tattoo Audio®  models – in colors of your choice - we will
pay for the shipping worldwide.
Pledge $20,000 or more:  All Senior Funding Partner's that pledge $20,000 or more
will be recognized and have your names listed in the Tattoo Audio®
User's Manuals for Indiegogo shipments under ‘Senior Funding Partners -
Honorable Mentions' as well as your name, photo and short Bio listed on the
Companies Corporate web site. Two (2) Tattoo Audio®  models – in colors of
your choice - we will pay for the shipping worldwide.http://tattooaudio.com/honorable-mentions.html
PERK T-SHIRTSAvailable in:  S, M, L and XL.  Just let us know your size after the indiegogo listing and we will ship out our AWESOME t-shirts as quickly as possible. Start sending us (Selfie) photos of you wearing our Tattoo Audio® t-shirts in action in your daily life, and we'll post as many as we can on our corporate web site and social media platforms. Thank you so much for your support - Indiegogo Community! FAQ Q.  Are Tattoo Audio® headphones NFC enabled?  A.  Yes. We incorporated NFC® technology into our premium headphones making it (tap-easy automatic connection) to configure its Bluetooth® connection to a ‘smart-device'. Just touch-and-go! If you hate tediously manually-pairing your headsets required for standard Bluetooth® headsets you know what we're talking about.If you jump between multiple types of smart-connected-devices at different times of the 'day' and 'night, (like we do), ubiquitous NFC® touch-and-go pairing of devices is the only way to go!Q.  Are Tattoo Audio® headphones Bluetooth enabled?  A.  Yes. All models of Tattoo Audio® premium wireless over-ear headphones are both Bluetooth® v4.0.Q.  Does Tattoo Audio® headphones offer high-quality audio coding?  A.  Yes. Integrated with both Tattoo Audio® premium over-ear wireless headphones TA-200 and TA-800, AAC and aptX® audio coding (audio codec compression algorithms) delivers high-quality coding wirelessly over Bluetooth®, enabling users to lose the wires without compromising on audio quality. To find out more go to: http://www.csr.comWe tried our very best to eliminate the lag, delay, or break in music or other audio traditionally experienced using Bluetooth by integrating high-quality coding technologies wirelessly over Bluetooth® with our premium over-ear headphones.Q.  Does Tattoo Audio® headphones have any type of integrated intelligent sensor?  A.  Yes. Set Them Down.. really! And tad-a! Music and phone conversations immediately stop and Tattoo Audio's® intelligent headphones hibernate to conserve power resources.Pick Them Back Up.. and WOW! Music starts playing right where you left off and never missing a 'beat'.Tattoo Audio's® 'ingeniously' integrated smart-sensor is at your command. On/Off integrated button to the ear-cups makes it quick and convenient to turn the sensor On/Off for cases when you listen to music or watch a movie lying down.Q.  What does (tri-connection) mean?  A.  'Tri-connection' means our premium over-ear headphones can be connected wirelessly to your smartphone while simultaneously being connected wirelessly to our integrated smartwatch. Android compatible smartphones can simultaneously connect to more than just one device by wireless configuration.Tattoo Audio® is the World's First (tri-connected) premium headphone with integrated smartwatch. (Wow, this is ingenious!)Q.  Are iOS devices able to connect to multiple devices simultaneously?  A.  Currently No. Apple's iOS, built on CSR 8670 platform, only allows one iOS device (such as iPhone, iPad, iPod, etc...) to be simultaneously configured. (There are rumors Apple might be updating their iOS to enable multiple wireless device configuration. As soon as this update is made, iOS users will be able to experience simultaneously connecting to multiple devices by wireless connection).Q.  How long does the battery last for the premium headphones?  A.  The internal rechargeable lithium ion battery keeps our headphones going for about 15 – 16 hours typical use. Q.  How long does it take to recharge the headphones battery?  A.  Typical charge time is 2-3 hours by micro-USB connection or A/C adapter included (in the Box).Q.  Can the headphones lithium ion battery be removed for charging or replace with another?  A.  No. In order for us to pass the ‘Safety Drop Test' we had to build the lithium ion battery as non-removable to our premium headphones. ‘It's a safety issue, not a technical issue'.Q.  Are Tattoo Audio® headphones ANC enabled?  A.  Sorry, not the first two models. Including ANC technology will increase development costs and test-validation time frame 2-3 months. Plus, every ANC headset when QC inspected during production has to be individually hand tested one-by-one increasing unit costs above our budget.If consumer demand is there, we will certainly come out with a 3rd generation headphone model specifically catering to ANC (Active-Noise Cancellation). However since ANC headsets are currently less than 10-percent of the ‘Premium' headphone market, we can only cater to the much smaller niche ANC market with later versions. We have already created Six-Generations of headphones and our IP supports more than twelve-generations, so the ANC feature will be addressed within our 'six-year product development plan'. *Remember, crawl, walk, and then run!Q.  Are the ear-cup padding to the headphones replaceable?  A.  Yes. We designed our soft memory foam ear-cup padding to be replaceable over time as the memory foam wears out. Replacements will be made available on our global e-commerce web sites.Q.  Can Tattoo Audio® headphones be used to listen and speak with incoming Calls?  A.  Yes, absolutely. You can listen and speak with incoming calls (wirelessly or in-line) with our premium headphones from your smartphone.Q.  How far away from the Smartphone can I be?  A.  The industry predominately utilizes Bluetooth wireless protocol providing up to 10-meters (or 30-feet) range between wirelessly configured devices. As such, a person can be this far away from their smartphone while wearing and enjoying our premium over-ear wireless headphones and integrated smartwatch (simultaneously or individually).Q.  How long does the battery last for the integrated smartwatch?  A.  The internal rechargeable lithium ion battery keeps the TA-220 model smartwatch going for 1-2 days full-time use and 3-days standby. The TA-200 and TA-800 model has 3-4 days normal usage and 5-7 days standby. Yes, we realize other smartwatches provide up to 7-days standby, however they utilize a different OS, processor, e-paper screen, (not a vibrant 65k full-color screen), and battery size.Q.  Does the integrated smartwatch display stay on all the time?  A.  Yes. The display shows a watch face at all times.Q.  What type of display are you using?  A.  A vibrant 1.6” TFT, 65k (16bit) – pixels (240 x 240) touch-sensitive display.Q.  Is the watch waterproof?  A.  Yes. Our smartwatches will be Certified water resistant to IP57 standard. The same Standard as multi-billion dollar conglomerates smartwatches on the market today.Q.  Scratchproof?  A.  Our smartwatches have a scratch and shatter resistant lens with an anti-glare optical coating.Q.  Does it use up my smartphones battery?  A.  Our premium wireless headphones with integrated smartwatch are both wireless Bluetooth® devices. Yes, it does affect the battery life of your Smart phone, usually using up an extra 5-10% per day.Q.  How do I charge the smartwatch?  A.  We include (in the Box) x1 connection-pin cable for the smartwatch.Q.  How long does it take to recharge the smartwatch battery?  A.  Typical charge time is 2-3 hours.Q.  Can I replace the watch band? A.  Yes. Although we had to ingeniously design an integrated docking station to our premium headphones for quick and convenient (removal and storage) of the smartwatch and bands, this unique feature making it impossible to use standard belt-type watch bands found in the market (they won't fit within the incorporated docking station), we resolved this issue by offering replaceable 6-color watch band sets as an Accessory item to match your clothes, mood or even smartphone. Color 'theme' packages are being developed to 'trend' with iPhone and Android color variations and popularity. As time goes on, we will introduce a plurality of replaceable watch band sets including fashionable graffiti artwork designs in our famous 'Designers Series'.Q.  Are Tattoo Audio® smartwatches Bluetooth enabled?  A.  Yes. 
TA- 220 smartwatch is Bluetooth v2.1 & v3.0, 

TA-200 smartwatch is Bluetooth v4.0 and later, and 

TA-800 model smartwatch is Bluetooth® v4.0 and later.
Q.  Can TA-220 model Bluetooth v2.1 & v3.0 also work with Bluetooth v4.0 or later model Android smartphones?  A.  Yes. Absolutely. Thus far, we have tested all major brands of Android model smartphones (such as;  Samsung, HTC, Sony, LG, Huawei, and more) and Note 1, 2, and 3. Q.  What kind of functions can the integrated smartwatch provide?  A.   Keeping you intelligently informed, on-the-fly user controls - are directly at your command from the integrated smartwatch.With Voice, Vibrate and Display - Call record, answer, end, reject, dialing,  (SMS), SMS or social communications, Music, in-phase Phonebook, call logs and Search features, anti-loss, find my smartphone - and so much more faster than it takes to pull your smartphone out of your pocket or purse!Q.  Can I speak into the integrated smartwatch for user-control-functions?  A.   No. Just like market leaders, we tested and found that the sound quality for such a small speaker is not that good, (you have to actually hold the smartwatch up to your ear to listen and then hold the smartwatch to your mouth to speak). Our IP approach by integrating a premium over-ear headphone with a smartwatch is a more brilliant way of resolving device audible sound quality issues.Q.  Can I use the premium headphones with integrated smartwatch while my smartphone is charging or in another room or while I'm outside?  A.  Yes. Your smartphone can be in another room recharging or just safe in the house, while you're outside washing the car or working in the yard, freely enjoying MUSIC, reading the latest SMS and Social happenings, and even answering or making phone calls! - Try doing that with your top branded $400 to $450 Premium headphone! Q.  Do I have to use both the premium headphones and integrated smartwatch both at the same time?  A.  No. You can chose to use both the premium headphones and integrated smartwatch simultaneously or one at a time. It's really up to you. The point of inventing and developing our IP is to give you the advantages of utilizing both devices simultaneously - in keeping up with Youth Markets active lifestyles, trends and social happenings.Q.  Do I have to use the Premium headphones wirelessly?  A.  No. You can chose to use our premium over-ear headphones wirelessly or in-line to a smartphone, tabletPC, digital music player, or other smart-connected-device. It's really up to you. The point is we give you a choice, while the world does not. Q.  I love your smartwatch, can I buy the smartwatch only?  A.  Yes. As requested by Tattoo Audio's® Fans, TA-100SW model enables consumers to purchase just our 'sexy' Smartwatch on our website. Simply click on TA-100SW section of our website to place an order after our Indiegogo Campaign at http://www.tattooaudio.com/ta-100sw.html.Q.  Will you ever sell your Premium Headpones only?  A.  Yes. Our Country Sole Agents have significant demand generation from their distributors, dealers, wholesalers, importers and retailers to support such product introductions at a global level model is TA-800-HD.  Although the functions to our premium over-ear wireless headphones are being sold for $400 to $450 each by market leaders, our Intellectual Property, IP, does enable us to develop next-generation headphones which are actually intelligent, like us, not year-after-year producing old-school brainless in-line, wireless and (brail) control function headphones like market leaders.  Q.  Does the smartwatch possess voice control functions?  A.  Sorry, but No. All technologies providing voice recognition or speech enabled navigation we tested the accuracy rate was not high enough to be confident in adding this feature with our products or Brand at this time.We would rather do it right, than have critics complaining our 'Voice Control' accuracy rate is less than 80-percent as global market leaders products have experienced. (Remember, crawl, walk, and then run!)Q.  Does your smartwatch possess integrated sensors for fitness tracker? A.  No . We chose not to integrate 'sports or fitness' tracking functions such as 'accelerometer' to our initial premium wireless over-ear headphones and integrated smartwatches because;• health and fitness is such a small percentage of the overall user mass-market for premium headphones and smartwatches;• higher certified water and dust resistant design is mandatory so users can jog, run or play in the rain, snow, or other extreme weather conditions;• it would be more logical to come out with a line of premium headphones with integrated smartwatch 'specifically designed' for the Health & Fitness market after our patent portfolio is more fortifyed blocking inevitable competitors; and• design and development costs to introduce high-quality premium headphones with integrated smartwatch within the Health & Fitness market is actually more expensive than the mass-market line. Unfortunately we're not a multi-billion dollar multinational conglomerate with an almost unlimited R&D budget. Remember, crawl, walk then run!The next premium headphone with integrated smartwatch for the 'Health & Fitness' market is scheduled to be our next model introduced under our six-year product development plan. Careful patent mapping is required to secure our IP development processes.  Q.  Does your smartwatch possess an integrated digital camera? A.  No . We chose not to integrate a digital camera to our smartwatch device because the quality attained from smartwatches that do possess an integrated digital camera pales in comparison to the level of quality attained from a smartphone today.Q.  Does your smartwatch possess an integrated GPS chip? A.  No . We chose not to integrate a GPS chip to our smartwatch because this would drive up BOM, unit costs, and MSRP pricing that would drastically reduce volume sales for our initial models. GPS functions will be integrated into our next-generation  'Health & Fitness' model scheduled to out in 2015. Q.  What are the methods of notification for the smartwatch device? A.  Audible, vibrate and full-color back-lit touch-sensitive display.Q.  How do you handle developing the global markets? A.  We appoint Country Sole Agents who either handle a specific Country or Region (group of countries) who are in charge of all aspects of sales, marketing, distribution, advertising, public relations and event management.Q.  What Countries have already been taken?A.  United Kingdom, Germany, France, Belgium, Japan, Australia, Middle East (region), Scandinavia (region) and (in discussions) for People's Republic of China ( PRC ).Q.  Can the integrated smartwatch provide push-notifications? A.  Yes. Our TA-220, TA-200, and TA-800 models integrated smartwatch all provides push-notifications for users, however.Compatible smartphones and OS : Many Tattoo Audio® Smartwatch features require an internet connection via Bluetooth™ tethering. Tattoo Audio® TA-200 model Smartwatch requires Android 4.0+ operating system and TA-800 model Smartwatch requires Android 4.0+ or iOS® 4+ operating system.Important :• Not all smartphone models allow Bluetooth™ tethering.• Not all versions of the same Operating System allow Bluetooth™ tethering.• Not all smartphone versions allow Bluetooth™ tethering.• There are at least 16 different types of the same (model) smartphone sold by region around the world. Not all smartphones even of the (same) model provides actual SMS and Social message. Some provide - Notification Only.• Not all mobile network operators allow Bluetooth™ tethering.Note : Tattoo Audio® Smartwatch is not a standalone smartphone and therefore needs to connect to smartphones.

story:
"SPARK IS PROBABLY THE MOST CLEVER EARBUDS ACCESSORY TO EVER CONCEIVED" - mikeshouts -

"SPARK BY WISYFAB IS (FOR ME) - THE MOST PRACTICAL ACCESSORY FOR YOUR SMARTPHONE HEADPHONES" - mobilitylounge -

"SPARK IS AN INNOVAVION MULTIPURPOSE CORD THAT TAKES THE WEAR AND SRAIN OFF OUR HEADPHONES" - majorhifi -

...

 

Spark untangles your earbud-related issues!

 

SPARK can be attached to your earphones in an instant, making them easier to use, easier to take off, more comfortable to wear, and smarter.

 

 

SPARK is a useful companion in all situations. With its pure and minimalist design, it can be suited to your look. SPARK is also a high tech device which comprises a highly resistant flexible cord, high precision tips, magnetic fastenings and an integrated NFC chip.
 

 
SPARK can be attached to your earphones in an instant because of its magnetic fastenings.
 

 

 

 

 
SPARK makes carrying your earbuds easy. Worn around the neck, they are instantly available.
 
 
  • Remove your earbuds when you no longer need them and just drop them; SPARK will take care of them. They will remain elegantly suspended, and instantly retrievable when you next want them.
  • In listening mode, enjoy improved comfort; SPARK takes the strain of any wire-tugging so that your ears don’t have to!
  • Since your earphones are no longer subject to strain, their life is extended.
 

Keep roaming! Your earphones can be put away easily and neatly in a jiffy.

SPARK’s flexible cord has been specially designed to make it easy for you to put your earphones away in two simple steps:

  • 1) wind the wire of your earphones around your hand 
  • 2) wind the SPARK cord around the wires
 

 
Opening them out in two seconds. No more wasting time over tangled wires. Undo the SPARK cord, and the wires will instantly unwind, ready for use.
 

 
All you need to do is bring your (NFC compatible) smarphone close to the SPARK NFC chip to read the data on it. This will reduce any set of repetitive actions down to one single movement.

For example, the simple motion of bringing your phone close to your NFC tag before going to sleep will set off your predefined set of actions, such as turning off the WiFi, switching the phone to silent mode, and setting your alarm for the next morning, all by itself
 

 
In a single movement, you can transform SPARK into a Smartphone stand.
The standing mode is ideal for watching films in trains or planes, for Skype videoconferences, for using your Smartphone as a clock or wake-up alarm, etc.
 

 
After one year of design and development, over one hundred prototypes and one patent, we are proud to introduce the best possible accessory for your earbuds.

story:
Short Summary

Ryddm, the future of music marketing. A streaming platform, a social network, a marketing hub- all in one convenient location. Ryddm solves music marketing and allows emerging artists a place to thrive.

There are more than 1.5 million 'recording-stage' musicians, many of which have exceptional talent. According to Next Big Sound, over 90% remain undiscovered. 

Big streaming platforms claim that they have measures in place to help artists get their music heard, but never deliver on their promises. Why? because every time you stream a song, they need to pay out a royalty to artists, losing revenue.

Ryddm is here to fix that. Ryddm provides a platform for artists to thrive. If you publish a song on Ryddm, there is an exceptional chance for your music to be heard by a massive amount of listeners.  Ryddm disrupts a bad business model, and helps listeners find the hottest new songs, while promoting artists to grow and flourish.

This app's development is fully funded and over half way done, and is seeking funds for marketing and operations only!

 

What We Need & What You Get 

We are seeking 250k-500k funding for marketing and operations. Development has been paid in full. You will receive access to our beta version and access to claim your unique username after contributing!

The Impact

This campaign will help millions of artists make more money for themselves and advance in their careers. Listeners can find new music easier than ever before.  This is a pivotal moment for the music industry, where major streaming services are designed to win and keep the artist suppressed.

Our founders have expertise in streaming and have worked for two out of the three major record labels.
