Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools!


And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Simplify and enhance your adventures with the only performance sports sunglasses that pack the punch of premium, proven and patented AfterShokz bone conduction technology.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The worldwide leader in bone conduction technology is here to elevate the sunglass game. With over 200 patents held, AfterShokz is offering the best pair of bone conduction sunglasses ever made available.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Bone conduction is a natural part of the hearing process—sound travels through our eardrums and bones simultaneously. We’ve taken the concept to the next level through the development of a suite of proprietary audio technologies and design patents.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Not all bone conduction audio is alike. Only OptiShokz uses AfterShokz’s proven technology and design to bring the ultimate open-ear audio experience. Using feedback from previous iterations and from those who have used our competitors' products, AfterShokz continues to develop technology that truly delivers the best bone conduction user experience available.

 

 

Our enhanced, high-tech sound technology LeakSlayer ™ prevents sound leakage. Our PremiumPitch+™  technology moderates and enhances the pitch of audio. Together, along with our premium hardware and industry-leading expertise, our technologies ensure that you will always get the highest-quality bone conduction sound possible.

 

 

 

Patented dual suspension transducers guarantee the finest in bone conduction audio available. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

For all warranty claims, please contact your original retailer or submit an online claim at OptiShokz.com. Valid proof of purchase is required for warranty service.

 

Replacement lenses can be purchased through a local OptiShokz
dealer or at OptiShokz.com

 

 

Whether you’re ditching your earbuds to run in the sun or taking a hands-free call while on the move, you’ll be unobstructed and untethered.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

FREE U.S SHIPPING

 

 

 

 

 

Click on the image to earn cash rewards for pledges from your own referral link!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Lens Interchangeable Teijin ® Polycarbonate lens. ANSI Z80 rated
Frame Materials TR90, Rubber, Ni-Ti Alloy
Battery Rechargeable 180mAh Li-Polymer battery
Battery Life 6-hour continuous play; up to 10 days standby
Charge in < 2 hours
Sweatproof IP55
Bluetooth Version Bluetooth 5.0 Support: HSP, HFP, A2DP AND AVRCP
Wireless range 33 feet
Weight 45.0±0.5g
Warranty Two Year
Speakers Specifications
Speaker type Bone Conduction Transducers
Dimensions 17.40×13.50×13.80mm
Impedance DC：8.5±0.5Ω
Sensitivity 100dB±3dB
Frequency Range 20Hz-20kHz
Microphone Specifications
Microphone MEMS
Microphone Dimensions φ4.0×2.0mm
Sensitivity -38dB±3dB（94dB SPL @1Khz）
Directivity Omnidirectional
Output Impedance 2.2kΩ（At 1kHz）
Supply Volt DC, 1.5~3.6V
Current Consumption < 0.5mA
Signal to Noise Ratio 60dB（94dB SPL @1Khz, A weighed)

 

 

 

The technology within OptiShokz has been tested and proven. As industry pioneers, we perfected bone conduction audio technology with our AfterShokz family of products. Now, it's time to bring it to performance eyewear. 

 

 


 

    

 

Our debut audio sunglasses, featuring AfterShokz bone conduction technology, deliver a totally tuned-in audio experience unlike anything else before it. As industry pioneers, we are excited to bring our premium, proven audio technology to the sports fashion eyewear market. Never miss a beat, no matter your adventure.

Our goal with this upcoming campaign is to connect with early adopters, as well as technology and sports enthusiasts, and to position ourselves for delivering the best bone conduction experience available. This is not a traditional crowdfunding campaign, as we are completely ready to ship Revvez at campaign’s end. Together, we can bring this amazing technology to the masses.

 


 

 

 

 

 

We ship worldwide. See reward details for shipping costs. Prices exclude any local duties or sales tax.

 

We plan to ship the product to backers in  June 2019.  OptiShokz will ship to the Super Early Bird backers first and then begin shipping to the Early Bird backers. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

Actual ship dates may vary.

 

By backing now,  you'll get to own OptiShokz at an exclusive price that won’t be offered again commercially.  We promise to provide production updates every 2-3 weeks via the campaign page update tab and e-mail. 

 

 

 

Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend, family member or coworker who need this!

 

 

 

 

Check out our FAQ section by clicking here.  Still have questions?  Send a message to hello@optishokz.com or post a comment on the page here, if you're a backer, and we'll be happy to help!

story:
NanoSound is a Raspberry Pi audio add-on board for audiophiles. While it works out of the box running volumio & kodi, it is designed to be fully customizable and configurable by taking advantage of Raspberry Pi.  NanoSound have already been successfully funded, in production and sold in over 12 resellers.

It has received a 5-star full score from Pi Magazine!

\
 
 
 
 

Yes, it works out of the box with Volumio & Kodi.  A pre-configured Volumio & Kodi image will be available for download.  Just plug NanoSound onto the Raspberry Pi, assemble the included mounting screws, insert the SD card and it's done!

Side view showing mounting screws

 

NanoSound is an audio add-on board designed to plug on top of Raspberry Pi 2 / 3 (which has 40-pin GPIO connector). 

It combines: 

  • Texas Instruments PCM5122 DAC (24bit Resolution & 384khz Sampling Rate)
  • Power switch (using same design as our Pi Switch product)
  • 6 GPIO buttons for Media Control
  • Infrared receiver and remote control
  • 1.3" OLED display with multi-language support

Multi-language Support

It provides an all-in-one solution for audiophonics who want an affordable and high quality DAC with many convenience features. 

Absolutely, NanoSound is fully customizable and programmable! we take full advantage of the Raspberry Pi’s open architecture.  

  • The 6 buttons are simple GPIO buttons. Python source code will be provided to read button events.
  • The IR receiver and control is LIRC compatible. Lircd.conf will be provided to read button input. 
  • The 1.3" OLED display is using i2c. The python display driver code is open sourced. 
  • The onboard on/off switch uses the same design and software as our first kickstarter project. It has an attiny85 onboard and is open sourced. 

Because NanoSound’s DAC uses the very common TI 5122 chip, it is compatible with many distributions (such as Openlibre, Raspbian) etc. Nanosound’s DAC uses the same driver as HifiBerry DAC+ . 

NanoSound uses a high quality Texas Instruments PCM5122 DAC (Burr Brown 112/106-dB Audio Stereo DAC With 32-bit, 384-kHz). It is also accompanied by Hifi grade capacitors from EVOX RIFA, WIMA and ELNA.  

We have tested NanoSound with many hi-end hifi systems and headphone. The quality is really good and on par with audio player which cost a few hundred USD more.  

We have done blind listening comparison with other DACs using same chipset. As far as we are hear, they all sound equally good!

Yes,  3D printed is available for purchase and download

Rewards & Models:

 Installation

Hardware

story:
Sound Comparison Test. Bose SoundLink II Vs. Super Buoy

Several musical genres are played to show how the Super Buoy performs in comparison. You should listen to the test using headphones to get the real effect. Music played from an iPhone 6S Plus via airplay. Both speakers connected via Bluetooth. Volume was set at 50%.You should know the Bose SoundLink Mini 2 retails in Australia  for AUD$290 or about USD$215. Now you can imagine what the Super Buoy Plus sounds like.

 

"Voted Best Bluetooth Speaker" 

"The Buoy and Big Buoy are a hard act to follow"

"Voted Most Innovative Speaker"

THE WAY YOU EXPERIENCE SOUND IS ABOUT TO CHANGE FOREVER!

Super Buoy & Super Buoy +: Multi-dimensional waterproof Bluetooth speakers with Stunning Sound Quality. The small timeless speakers pack a massive musical punch, connecting via Bluetooth, Auxiliary Audio Cable or from a Micro SD card.
On a full charge, it’ll play for 16 hours anywhere you take it. And works as a power bank to charge your devices on the go.

Choose Super Buoy, a 15-Watt speaker or Super Buoy + for 25 Watts of power. Two full-range drivers provide an incredible output coupled with a passive subwoofer to maximise the base response and pump out incredible 360º sound in true stereo for precise multi-dimensional sound reproduction and all in a beautiful package that fits in your hand and budget.

When your phone is paired with Buoy for music, it is also automatically paired for hands-free calling. Should your phone ring, you can take the call and use Buoy as your hands-free microphone and speaker.

While the Buoy and Big Buoy are amazing, we had to challenge ourselves to make them better. Much better. All the changes are on the inside. We completely redesigned the  drivers so the speaker not only sounds better than the original but also plays 25 percent louder at its top volume. You will be very impressed with how loudly the speaker plays for its size and that it's able to deliver as full sound as it does.

The Super Buoys enclosure is packed with more technology than meets the eye. Highly efficient transducer achieves full-range sound.  Tight passive radiator for deep lows with no unwanted vibrations. And any imperfect noise is eliminated with a cone pressure trap to produce real-life sound and real-life Goosebumps.

Super Buoy and the Plus are more powerful speakers with improved everything! From the circuit board to battery, Drivers, firmware & software to deliver a more powerful more reliable companion to your music listening experience.

Super Buoy with 50% more output power at 15Watts

Super Buoy + with 25% more output power at 25Watts

Deep. Loud. And Immersive, too

Crank the tunes no matter where you go with the Super Buoy Waterproof Speaker. In addition to the extreme portability, the Super Buoy has a built-in 4400mAh rechargeable lithium ion battery. With this, you get a whopping 16 hours of playtime, so the party never has to stop. Super Buoy boasts an IPX7 waterproof rating. This means you can take out rain or shine and no matter where life takes you, keep Super Buoy by your side for stunning audio.

Just like the Buoy, Super Buoy is an accessory that you would be proud to take everywhere with you or at home or professional environment.

"If you thought Buoy sounds amazing then wait till you hear Super Buoy, it looks just as beautiful but sounds more amazing, functions flawlessly and has a 15Watts of total output."

Deep, Powerful Bass

Crank the tunes no matter where you go. These speakers allows for totally wireless connection and control. Suitable for iOS, Windows, and Android devices, the Super Buoys use Apple AirPlay, Bluetooth aptX, Micro SD, and a 3.5 mini-jack connection for seamless ability

There is also a detachable genuine leather strap handle on the side for easy portability. Coming in your choice of two colours, the Super Buoys sport a fully wrapped silicone casing with front and back metal grill. This design makes the Buoys an instant staple for any room in your home or even your office and the perfect companion to any outing or picnic, hiking or camping, boating or on the beach.

Keep your hands free with the Super Buoys. Use it with your Bluetooth-enabled phone, or connect an MP3 player via the auxiliary input port or from a micro SD card so you can always leave your phone behind but never leaving your music behind.

Packed with power

You can even charge your smartphone or tablet with the built-in USB port. The speaker features DSP sound technology for an extraordinary audio experience. 

These powerful speakers deliver crystal clear clarity in every direction. Ideal for use by the pool or on the beach, the silicone-wrapped casing is rough and rugged to withstand it all while providing a full 16 hours of playtime. 

Buoy speakers have always delivered on the promise of Sound Beyond Size and with each generation offer, better sound than before.

The Super Buoys are the epitome of form and function working in synergy.  Featuring two 10-Watt & 15-Watt high-quality Drivers with neodymium magnets and a stiff passive radiator to deliver crisp clear audio with zero distortion. With Bluetooth connectivity and DSP Noise-cancelling Microphone, the Super Buoys filter background disturbance when you make a call.

"Outstandingly Crisp, Clear and Cleaner Sound, and Solid Bass Performance."

Unlike other systems on the market, the Super Buoys are truly waterproof. In fact, they achieve a rating of IPX7.

The Super Buoy 'Gone Fishing'

Buoy Water test

Getting to Know Buoy

Who we are

Magtunes is a small company based out of Sydney and was founded by a 3 passionate individuals from the worlds of business and technology. We are passionate about using technology to create experiences that leave an impression. Out of our own frustrations over poorly made products or good products that are overpriced, we created Magtunes.  At Magtunes, we are on a mission to make premium audio products accessible to everyone. Premium audio products at affordable prices and achieve a perfect balance between size, price and acoustics. 

We are small but fearless trio that think outside the square and love challenging the status quo. Our first project, Lumiére is a success and owed to the amazing 271 backers that helped us make it a reality. Our Buoy and Big Buoy campaign was backed by over 500 amazing backers that made all of this possible. Amp.i.Am is just getting delivered and reviews are coming in slowly but surely. All of these backers have invested their time, feedback and money and together, we made it happen. We produced and delivered on time as promised and we are now on a mission with our fifth project to repeat the success and exploit our experience and relationship for Super Buoy & Plus and make it a reality. This is an amazing speaker and we know you are going to love it and we ask for your kind support.

Risks and challenges

We have already delivered on all our campaign promises, have produced Buoy and Big Buoy to rave reviews. We are ex Apple and Microsoft Engineers and we’ve worked hard over the last year to get Super Buoy to this point and we successfully completed critical milestones and confidently consider the risks very minimal.

Our application for FCC certification has been amended to reflect the changes and certification should be granted  by the time this campaign is over and we will then start tooling and manufacturing to meet our promise of superior quality and delivery.

We are confident that we will be able to produce and deliver the Super Buoy and plus in August for several reasons:

1. We have experts on our team who have over 19 years of experience in hardware manufacturing. 

2. Super Buoy has a factory and production facilities secured in Shenzhen, China that have successfully built the original Buoy & Big Buoy.

3. We’ve already produced working models of Super Buoy & the Plus using our current facilities and are prepared to scale our operation to meet the backer demand. 

Our team deeply understands this campaign is an opportunity to establish a passionate customer base. It is our mission to leave our backers completely satisfied with our product and service!

Thank you for reading this far - let's make this happen and hope to have you as a Proud Backer and please Share this campaign with everyone you know.

FAQs

Is Super Buoy and Super Buoy+ the same size.

NO. The cabinet is of different size to support the bigger passive radiator, bigger pressure trap and the more powerful drivers in order to achieve optimum performance.
Measurements in Millimetres...
The super Buoy measures 180L x 75H x 45D
The Super Buoy+ measures 195L x 80H x 60D

What are the battery capacities and play time of Super Buoy and Super Buoy+?

Both Buoys have the same batteries 2 X 2200mAh or 4400mAh. Super Buoy has 16 hours of playtime and the Plus has 12.

Both Buoys have the same batteries 2 X 2200mAh or 4400mAh. Super Buoy has 16 hours of playtime and the Plus has 12.

story:
In 2019, we launched Wearbuds - World’s First On-Wrist Charging True Wireless Hi-Fi Earbuds on Kickstarter. With 8586 backers and over $944,923 earned, it goes without saying that it was a massive hit. Now we are back with the 2nd Generation – Wearbuds Pro, the ultimate TWS audio and fitness tracking wearable for modern lifestyles. Pro version, Premium experience!

Wearbuds are the first TWS earbuds that combine wireless audio into a fitness tracking wearable, the patented design is an industry game-changer! Answer/reject phone calls, play or pause music and more with just a tap and done. With Wearbuds Pro, you have everything that comes from your phones. 

Listening To Musics

Answering Calls & Checking Messages

 

With the built-in seven-axis accelerometer, motion, heart rate and pressure sensors, Wearbuds Pro works seamlessly with you. Sleep, step, floor, and heart rate real-time monitoring supported, and calorie calculation is available. Support for multiple activity modes such as walking, brisk walking, cycling and more.

Running

Cycling

Sleeping

 

Wearbuds Pro earbuds pair instantly with the fitness band using a rock-solid Bluetooth 5.0 connection to access music, playback or pause, and answer or hang-up calls. All real-time phone notifications appear on your wrist for hands-free, carefree, viewing. Single, double or multi-touch screen compatible with various gestures makes your audio and fitness experience smooth and intuitive.

 

With the built-in seven-axis accelerometer, motion, heart rate and pressure sensors, Wearbuds Pro works seamlessly with you. Sleep, step, floor, and heart rate real-time monitoring supported, and calorie calculation is available. Support for multiple activity modes such as walking, brisk walking, cycling and more.

 

Wearbuds Pro use the latest mobile audio technology to sound like the future! They deliver crystal-clear, powerful and super balanced premium Hi-Fi sound. With the advanced Graphene Dynamic Driver and Qualcomm smart audio chip, Wearbuds Pro truly pushes the boundaries and sets a new standard for sound. Truly immersive audio with zero latency: palpable, dynamic and smooth. Switch seamlessly from single-ear or double ear mode depending on activity. 

 

Wearbuds Pro app helps you to understand your real-time body condition to train and live better! Brilliant user interface design, gorgeous 262K colors TFT HD display and phenomenally user-friendly and intuitive in-app use. 

 

Wearbuds Pro's patented Snap-on design secures the earbuds for charging or storage in a solid metal case with a classic matte finish. The screen of the wristband is ultra-strong Corning Gorilla glass with up to 7H hardness that makes it shatter & scratch-proof and fingerprint resistant.

 

Enjoy up to 15 hours of non-stop music or calls when used with the charging band. The earbuds work for about 5.5 hours on a single charge and can be charged twice from the fully charged fitness band so that the soundtrack of your life never ends. 

Last for up to 10 days standby time so it’s ready to go when you are!

 

 

 

 

*The price you see might in HKD or your country's currency.

 

 

The timeless combination of superior sound experience and unmatched design. Wearbuds is dedicated to providing every user with a more convenient and professional acoustic wireless wearable. We’re the first one to make it happen, and we’re the one to make it perfect!


Let's take a peak at the production:

Q: What is the warranty policy?

A:We back Wearbuds with a two-year limited warranty.

We grant a limited warranty on Wearbuds backed from this campaign. The warranty starts from the date of delivery to you for the first time, as evidenced by the invoice. Only the original backer is entitled to claim warranty. The warranty only applies to the following parts:

- Fitness band

- Earbuds

- Magnetic charging cable

 

Exclusions

This warranty does not apply to and therefore not cover:

1. any other parts except the Warranted Parts;

2. any defect or damage caused by failure to follow the instructions in the Quick Start Guides and online Manuals, including but not limited to inappropriate, incorrect or improper use;

3. any defect or damage caused by an accident, including but not limited to natural calamities such as fire hazard, and human causes such as falling off, collision and soaking in water;

4. any defect or damage caused by the use of third-party materials, accessories or software, etc.;

5. normal wear and tear.

 

Actions that will void this Warranty

The following actions will void this warranty:

1. any modification made to any hardware or firmware of the Product;

2. abuse, misuse or improper storage of the Product;

3. use the Product for any illegal purposes;

4. serviced by distributors other than Aipower or an authorized Aipower distributor.

story:
MOKiN Soundlink

HiFi Digital Audio Converter 

Wish you could get more out of the audio from your iPhone, we did too!  So we invented a solution for this problem with the MOKiN Soundlink.

This is a high-dynamic range/low power HiFi digital audio converter with best-in-class amplifier, which presents a 114-dB & 24-bit/192kHz quality sound bringing you a perfect listening experience.

NOTE - Normal iPhone audio output is only 16-bit/48kHZ

Sound Quality is 30% Higher w/MOKiN Soundlink!

Here is what makes our product one of a kind...
  • Stereo Headphone Output w/114-dB Dynamic Range
  • Supports 24-bit/192kHz High-Definition Audio Output
  • Supports Multiple Audio Formats
  • Headphone Load Detection of 15 or 30Ω
  • Headphone Insertion/Removal Detection w/WAKE
  • Audio Serial Port (ASP): Supports Up To 32-bit Audio Inputs Includes Bypassable SRC's
  • Sample Rate Support For 8 to 92kHZ
  • Ultra Low Power Consumption w/No Need For External Battery
  • Kickstand Perfect For Watching Videos
Works with iPod Touch 5th Generation, iPhone 5, iPhone 5s/5c, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad 4th Generation, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPad Air, iPad Air 2nd Generation, iPad Mini, iPad Mini 2nd Generation, iPad Mini 3

In July 2015 we finished technical design for the MOKiN Soundlink, which could improve the iPhone’s audio quality. We used DAC IC CS43L36 to convert the digital audio from the iPhone’s lightning output. The power dissipation is lower than 1000ma meeting Apple’s requirements. It can output audio 114-dB & 24-bit/192kHz.

From a design aspect we wanted to focus not only on the inside of the device, but also on it’s exterior appearance.

C-Smartlink Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 with an emphasis on R&D, technology, management, manufacturing and distributing. The company’s modern factory building with advanced equipment and their group of highly qualified professionals provides systemic solutions for HD equipment connection around the world. Currently, C-Smartlink products are exported to North and South America, Europe, Oceania and Asia and are recognized by both domestic and international customers. For more information, visit www.c-smartlink.com.


Special Thanks To...

Moons of Mars - Soundcloud

story:
Your search for the perfect pair of earphones has finally come to an end! Revols are the world’s first Quick Custom-Fit Wireless Earphones that mold to the unique shape of your ears in exactly 60 seconds. The coolest part? The entire molding process is controlled by YOU using our companion app on your phone! These revolutionary earphones are designed to provide you with the perfect fit, delivering the unparalleled comfort and sound you’ve been searching for.

Compromising on nothing, Revols bring you the same comfort benefits as traditional custom-fit earphones while saving you tons of time and money!

Traditional Custom-Fit Earphones

  • 1-month process
  • $1000+

Traditional approach

Involves you, an audiologist and a whole lot of patience!

Revols Custom-Fit Earphones

  • 60-second process
  • $214 (Indiegogo Special)

REVOLutionary approach 

Involves you, your ears and a simple app on your phone!


Generic Earphones

They’re either too big, too small or simply don’t fit right. This poor fit causes generic earphones to put pressure, cause pain and often fall out. 

Custom-Fit Earphones 

They’re designed just for you so they fit perfectly every time. They mold to the unique grooves of your ears, sitting comfortably and never falling out!


We’ve designed Revols to be the perfect fit for you and your lifestyle! By combining sleek aesthetics with durable materials, we’re giving you the versatility you want and need. Whether you’re going for a run, catching a flight, commuting to work or sitting at your desk, you can wear Revols anywhere, anytime.


To truly deliver great earphones, we knew that the sound had to be as perfect as the fit. That’s why we’re proud to announce our partnership with Onkyo, the esteemed Japanese corporation known for over 70 years of experience in high-end audio technology. We’re working alongside their team of acoustic engineers to deliver world-class audio and craft the ultimate listening experience.



Whether you’re in the midst of a movie marathon or binge watching your favorite show - don’t let your earphones stop you! Revols allow you to charge while listening! Clip the charging cable on the back of the earphone wire and plug the usb into your computer or a charging outlet to enjoy unlimited playback!


Why so many color options? WHY NOT!
Fashion and function have never been more in sync than with the Revols Sports Skins! Besides, who wouldn’t want to match their earphones to their running shoes?


  • Change tip size (every pair comes with extra tips in an alternate size) 
  • Share your earphones with a friend
  • Have a separate pair for a separate purpose (ex: working out)

Because why the heck not?!



Within minutes of taking them out of the box, you can have your very own pair of custom-fit earphones! In just 4 simple steps you will achieve the perfect fit and be able to enjoy revolutionary, long lasting and more comfortable listening!



Molding Testing:

Perfecting our nanocomposite and optimizing our molding tip geometry.


Device Fitting:

Our ears are as unique as our fingerprints. In order to achieve the optimal design for the Revols molding tip, we underwent months of device fitting testing on ears of all shapes and sizes.


A big thank you to our family and friends whose support has helped make these campaigns possible. A special shout-out to Antony Bui, our videographer (www.antonybui.com), Jon Lerch, our graphic designer (www.instagram.com/hearhear_design), Tomas Rosen and Nicol Boyd, our industrial designers (www.officeforproductdesign.com), Jackson Wightman, our PR professional (www.properpropaganda.net), and Gil Shterzer and Iddo Sternberg, our direct response online advertising agency (http://jellopcrowdfunding.com/)  for their amazing work and dedication! 


If you’re ready for an earphone revolution, please support our campaign and spread the word!

Please note that shipping to any country outside North America and Canada may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations. In a case of cancellation we will refund your pledge. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

Your search for the perfect pair of earphones has finally come to an end! Revols are the world’s first Quick Custom-Fit Wireless Earphones that mold to the unique shape of your ears in exactly 60 seconds. The coolest part? The entire molding process is controlled by YOU using our companion app on your phone! These revolutionary earphones are designed to provide you with the perfect fit, delivering the unparalleled comfort and sound you’ve been searching for.

Compromising on nothing, Revols bring you the same comfort benefits as traditional custom-fit earphones while saving you tons of time and money!
Traditional Custom-Fit Earphones

1-month process
$1000+

Traditional approach
Involves you, an audiologist and a whole lot of patience!
Revols Custom-Fit Earphones

60-second process
$214 (Indiegogo Special)

REVOLutionary approach 
Involves you, your ears and a simple app on your phone!





































Our ears are as unique as our fingerprints and so they can’t  be satisfied by a one-size-fits-all earphone mold. The Revols proprietary shaped molding tip combines a specially formulated nanocomposite and a unique ergonomic design to achieve the desired perfect fit.









Generic (left) versus Revols custom-fit (right)


Generic Earphones
They’re either too big, too small or simply don’t fit right. This poor fit causes generic earphones to put pressure, cause pain and often fall out. 
Custom-Fit Earphones 
They’re designed just for you so they fit perfectly every time. They mold to the unique grooves of your ears, sitting comfortably and never falling out!






We’ve designed Revols to be the perfect fit for you and your lifestyle! By combining sleek aesthetics with durable materials, we’re giving you the versatility you want and need. Whether you’re going for a run, catching a flight, commuting to work or sitting at your desk, you can wear Revols anywhere, anytime.




Don't fall out





Ultimate comfort





Extra scratch, sweat & water protection





Passive noise isolation





Lightweight





Premium aesthetics







To truly deliver great earphones, we knew that the sound had to be as perfect as the fit. That’s why we’re proud to announce our partnership with Onkyo, the esteemed Japanese corporation known for over 70 years of experience in high-end audio technology. We’re working alongside their team of acoustic engineers to deliver world-class audio and craft the ultimate listening experience.













Left to right: Navi (Revols), Jason (Onkyo), Daniel (Revols)


















You’re in the driver’s seat - all you have to do is press the start button on the app to activate the molding process. In just 60 seconds, the tips will transform from their initial gel-like state to their permanently hardened, customized shape… It’s really that easy, promise!




The earphones are equipped with 8 hours of reliable playtime. But to keep you company on those long journeys abroad, we’re introducing the Revols Revive battery pack. An industry first, this battery extender simply clips on to the back of the earphone wire for an extra 6 hours of listening!




Whether you’re in the midst of a movie marathon or binge watching your favorite show - don’t let your earphones stop you! Revols allow you to charge while listening! Clip the charging cable on the back of the earphone wire and plug the usb into your computer or a charging outlet to enjoy unlimited playback!












The Revols Sports Skin adds an extra layer of protection and an extra flare of personality! Effortlessly attach the silicone skin to your Revols earphones and get a whole new look with a whole new purpose. Rain or rugged terrain can’t stop these skins from protecting your earphones against scratches, sweat and water damage.  






Why so many color options? WHY NOT!
Fashion and function have never been more in sync than with the Revols Sports Skins! Besides, who wouldn’t want to match their earphones to their running shoes?











Live in a big city? Love to exercise outdoors? Your workout regime just got a whole lot safer with the Revols Adjustable Soundscape. The mics mounted on each ear will allow you to control the amount of surrounding noise played back over your music. With this feature, not only will you hear external noise, but you’ll also know exactly which direction it’s coming from.









Reasons why you’d want to change the molding tips:


Change tip size (every pair comes with extra tips in an alternate size) 
Share your earphones with a friend
Have a separate pair for a separate purpose (ex: working out)

Because why the heck not?!







Do you like when it hangs or when it hooks? Or a little bit of both? YOU CHOOSE!
Customize how you wear the connecting wire with the Revols Rotating Bezel.





Left: 6 o'clock position - Right: 10 o'clock position





 








A compact carrying case that includes a battery and an attached USB cable. This REVOLutionary charging case combines storage and power to provide your earphones with up to two full charges on the go!
















Revols app home screen





Pair, customize and wait only 60 seconds!





Adjustable soundscape





Equalizer







Within minutes of taking them out of the box, you can have your very own pair of custom-fit earphones! In just 4 simple steps you will achieve the perfect fit and be able to enjoy revolutionary,  long lasting and more comfortable listening!




























































Molding Testing:
Perfecting our nanocomposite and optimizing our molding tip geometry.


















Left: soft, flexible pre-mold. Right: solid custom mold of Dan's ear.



Device Fitting:
Our ears are as unique as our fingerprints. In order to achieve the optimal design for the Revols molding tip, we underwent months of device fitting testing on ears of all shapes and sizes.


Our 2 sizes of molding tips allow everyone to enjoy earphones that fit perfectly resulting in enhanced passive noise isolation. This makes it possible for people to listen to their music at safer volume levels for extended periods of time.













 































A big thank you to our family and friends whose support has helped make these campaigns possible. A special shout-out to Antony Bui, our videographer (www.antonybui.com), Jon Lerch, our graphic designer (www.instagram.com/hearhear_design), Tomas Rosen and Nicol Boyd, our industrial designers (www.officeforproductdesign.com), Jackson Wightman, our PR professional (www.properpropaganda.net), and Gil Shterzer and Iddo Sternberg, our direct response online advertising agency (http://jellopcrowdfunding.com/)  for their amazing work and dedication! 


 

If you’re ready for an earphone revolution, please support our campaign and spread the word!





























Please note that shipping to any country outside North America and Canada may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations. In a case of cancellation we will refund your pledge. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

story:
Now Available on Amazon.com!

Save 40% off through this link
Supplies are limited and will sell out

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Link to video review: http://www.digitaltrends.com/home-theater/dot-bluetooth-earbud-kickstarter-video-review/


Together, we can make Dot a crowdfunding reality. The World's Smallest Bluetooth Headset Earbud as featured on IndieGoGo and Kickstarter.

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE

Dot is changing the way we listen to music. If the campaign doesn't successfully fund and the product is not delivered, you'll get your money back.

CLICK HERE TO SHARE ON FACEBOOK

 

FAQ

 

When will I receive the BackerKit surveys?

 

You will receive your BackerKit survey 15 days after the campaign ends. IndieGoGo needs 15 days to process all contributions.

 

Can the two earbuds for Dot stereo be used independently in mono?

 

Yes, both Dot earbuds have microphone, multi-function, and speaker capabilities. You can use them independently as a mono unit.

 

For the Dot stereo, can you charge one earbud while using the other?

 

Yes, when the Dot earbud is being charged, it will disconnect from the device. The other Dot earbud will remain connected

 

What colours are available for Dot?

 

Dot will be available in two colors: Black and White. Selecting the color will be done post campaign through the fulfilment service BackerKit

 

How much is shipping?

 

Shipping will be $9 for anywhere in the USA, $19 for Canada, and $29 for the rest of the world.

 

What devices is Dot compatible with?

 

Dot features Bluetooth 4 technology to connect to any desktop computer, tablet, IOT, and mobile phone. Dot will pair with any Android, iOS, and Windows device which includes Bluetooth connectivity.

 

How do you charge Dot?

 

Dot magnetically docks into the portable charging case and charges through contact ports on the earbud. The portable charging case is charged with a standard micro USB cable.

 

What Bluetooth profiles does Dot support?

 

A2DP / HFP / HSP / AVRCP

 

How do I connect this to my Bluetooth device?

 

Each Dot earbud features a single multi-function bottom which activates "pairing mode" with a long press. The LED indicators will flash red / blue to let you know. Simply pair your device once, and it will automatically connect for the next time.

 

How can I change my address for shipping?

 

Making changes to your order is done through your BackerKit account. To request another link to access your BackerKit account, please go to https://dot.backerkit.com and enter in the same email address listed on your Indiegogo contribution. Once you sent a request, you will receive an email with a link to your BackerKit account. 

If you are unable to update your shipping address through BackerKit, it may be because your perk has been locked down. This means your perk and shipping information has already been sent to fulfillment and will be shipped to you soon, therefore no changes can be made.

story:
About us

We are a committee dedicated to seeing that the controversial and discriminatory motorcycle only noise bylaw enacted June 9, 2010 in Edmonton is either expanded to include all forms of vehicles or repealed until it can be applied equally to all. We feel it goes against the Canadian Charter of Rights & Freedoms which states clearly we have the right to be held to and protected by the same laws equally and without discrimination.

Why are other forms of vehicles allowed to commit the same infraction without receiving the same penalties? Why did City Council feel it was necessary to target one group of people when there were already sufficient noise laws in existence?

All information stated on our website is information that could be found by any person in the general public. All research has been conducted in a professional manner.

We continue to thank all of the supporters - both from the riding and non-riding community. We invite anyone with questions to please email our general email or join our facebook group (Edmonton Motorcycle Club)

Our Mission

To build and maintain a comprehensive program that informs and educates riders, residents, and visitors to the Edmonton area on the current noise bylaw.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Money is required to pay for the costs associated with an upcoming legal challenge.
  • You can feel good about preventing government discrimination against a minority group that's been unfairly singled out as a nuisance to others.
  • All funds will go to supporting the legal challenge.

The Impact

1. Educate riders on their rights and responsibilities

2. Educate the public on noise information, vehicular responsibility and current discrimination against a single group

3. Maintain a defense package and strategy against noise bylaw tickets

4. Gain general public support through information sharing with full disclosure


Other Ways You Can Help - Come to our FUNdraiser!

Event Details

Ticket Locations

Date:  March 28, 2015
Time:  Doors at 7:00pm, bands at 8:00pm
Location:  Newcastle Pub & Grill, 8170 50th Street
Tickets:  $10 in advance, $15 at door

Entertainment featuring:
Harder
Northern Comfort
more to be announced
Tickets will be available starting January 31st (maybe sooner) at the following locations:

Coming soon!  Check website event page for updates.

Sponsors

We are currently looking for donations for door prizes, auctions items, raffle items and more.  If your business would be interested in helping out our event, please contact us directly.  We will be updating our website with sponsor names as they come on board to support our event.

Some MORE background

In June of 2010, the City of Edmonton enacted the first motorcycle only noise bylaw in Canada.  Since that time, a dedicated group of motorcyclists have been trying to work with the City in an effort to regain equality in excessive vehicle noise laws.  Currently motorcycles are subjected to different regulations, enforcement and fines.  Although we believe there are those that warrant a fine for excessively loud motorcycles, this issue is not limited to our community.

Because we believe in equal law for excessive noise, we will soon be in Provincial court supporting one of our own in our first challenge against the bylaw itself.  Our goal is to either have the motorcycle only noise bylaw expanded to include all forms of passenger vehicles or have the bylaw rescinded and excessive noise dealt with under the Provincial Traffic Safety Act (TSA).  We want the best outcome for all of the citizens of Edmonton.  There are other benefits to returning to the use of the TSA that could lead to effectively dealing with the noise issue that cannot be done under a municipal bylaw.

To prepare for the costs that our community will incur during this process, we are holding this fundraiser with possible future dates as well.  We will require at minimum legal advice along the way, if not legal representation depending on how the case proceeds.  As with any long standing tradition in the motorcycle community, any and all monies not used in this case will be donated to charity.

We thank you for your support in the fight for equality in laws.
story_txt:
About us
We are a committee dedicated to seeing that the controversial and discriminatory motorcycle only noise bylaw enacted June 9, 2010 in Edmonton is either expanded to include all forms of vehicles or repealed until it can be applied equally to all. We feel it goes against the Canadian Charter of Rights & Freedoms which states clearly we have the right to be held to and protected by the same laws equally and without discrimination.Why are other forms of vehicles allowed to commit the same infraction without receiving the same penalties? Why did City Council feel it was necessary to target one group of people when there were already sufficient noise laws in existence?All information stated on our website is information that could be found by any person in the general public. All research has been conducted in a professional manner.We continue to thank all of the supporters - both from the riding and non-riding community. We invite anyone with questions to please email our general email or join our facebook group (Edmonton Motorcycle Club)



Our Mission
To build and maintain a comprehensive program that informs and educates riders, residents, and visitors to the Edmonton area on the current noise bylaw.



   What We Need & What You Get  Money is required to pay for the costs associated with an upcoming legal challenge. You can feel good about preventing government discrimination against a minority group that's been unfairly singled out as a nuisance to others. All funds will go to supporting the legal challenge.    The Impact 1. Educate riders on their rights and responsibilities2. Educate the public on noise information, vehicular responsibility and current discrimination against a single group3. Maintain a defense package and strategy against noise bylaw tickets4. Gain general public support through information sharing with full disclosure

story:
Sound quality is one of the top priorities in content creation. However, can be very expensive and inefficient to purchase different microphones for different types of video content. Q Mic has three main functions - 360°, directional, and ASMR – that are some of the most widely used types of sound recording. All the settings have been simplied for ease of use!

 Q Mic Review by Trend Adopter!

There is no need for special settings of applications in order to record sound in a quick manner. Q Mic’s ASMR mode, Directional Mode, and Omni Mode enables its users to record sounds in different ways all with a simple dial. You can verify which mode you are using just by looking at the dial.

 

 

 

 

Try using Q Mic with different platforms such as YouTube, Twitch, Facebook, and Instagram Live. We’re confident that our mic will take the quality of your content to the next level.

Q Mic is compatible with all video equipments that have a 3.5mm jack. It’s easy enough for new users and professional content creators. You can change the mode without an app.   

*Cable

3-pole and 4-pole terminal are provided in Q Mic package. 3-pole terminal is for DSLR or action camera, and 4-pole terminal is for mobile connection. 

Q Mic is compatible with cameras, smartphones, tablet PCs, GoPro, and other devices. You can easily change cables that suit your preferred devices with one of the 4 different cables provided.  

With a full 360 degree range of rotation, Q Mic is effortless, and stays in place no matter how you adjust it.

Q Mic does not need a battery. All you need to do is plug it into your device with the appropriate cable to begin recording!

 Q Mic is equipped with 0.25 inch shoe mount, allows it to be used with almost any mount.

Q Mic provides ¼ inch Shoe mount to be connected your Smartphone & DSLR

 - iPhone requires an Apple Lightning to 3.5 mm headphone jack adapter. (It's not included)

- GoPro requires a 3.5mm audio cable adapter. (It's not included)

  - iPhone requires an Apple Lightning to 3.5 mm headphone jack adapter. (It's not included) 

--

Q Mic Official Partners

story:
Meet, Bonjour. She’s a revolutionary voice-controlled and A.I. enhanced alarm clock that acts as your personal assistant. She even knows who's talking thanks to Biometric Identification allowing her to give personalized information.  

 

With a human voice and mindful mannerisms, she’s the first alarm clock you’ll be happy to wake up to.

Bonjour is the first and only voice-controlled assistant that has the ability to recognize who is talking and adapt its recommendations, 

The Bonjour Smart Alarm Clock is like the personal assistant you never had. The best part about Bonjour? She's always there early to wake you up and make the most of your day.

 

 

 

 

By tracking traffic on your morning commute, Bonjour can suggest you leave early if there's heavy traffic on your way to work or order you an Uber earlier than usual. 

 

 

 

Bonjour integrates with your calendar so she knows your agenda, allowing her to automatically set your alarm. You'll never oversleep and miss another meeting again.

Bonjour learns your routine: she learns how long it takes you to get ready in the morning and how long you commute is so she can make customized suggestions to make your mornings more enjoyable.

 

 
 

 

Bonjour is the "hub" of your sleep needs and has the ability to help you sleep better. Ultimately, she can help you fall asleep faster with her guided relaxation program. She seamlessly connects with your Pebble, Apple Watch, and/or holi's SleepSensor allowing her to give insights and data to help improve your sleep routine (bedtime regularity and sleep-time consistency). Additionally, Bonjour can connect to many popular tracking devices such as Fitbit and Misfit to provide you with a comprehensive sleep analysis.

 

 

 

 

Bonjour can check local weather, surf forecasts, & wind presence to help plan your activities. Bonjour also connects with your FitBit. 

Bonjour helps you plan and track your fitness: when integrated with device like FitBit, Apple Health, or Withings, Bonjour is able to track how many steps you've taken throughout the day. If you haven't been very active, weather is good, and your schedule allows, Bonjour will suggest you go for a run, helping you reach your fitness goals.

 

 

 

Bonjour acts as a voice-controlled smart hub for iOT, Home Automation and smart home devices making your home even smarter. She proactively checks if your home is safe and ideal for your sleep. She seamlessly integrates with IFTTT to do more with the services you love.

 

 

 

 

BONJOUR is the simplest way to add voice-control to your favorite smart home devices. Use her 180 degree voice recognition system to control your environment without leaving the comfort of your bed. Bonjour easily integrates with your favorite smart home devices such as WeMo, Philips Hue and Nest. She's even compatible with Amazon's Alexa!

 

Connect your smart lights and thermostat to create a perfect and automated environment to start  your day. Teach Bonjour to check if your home is safe (night mode) each time you tell her “good night”. She would then do a routine check and warn you if the garage door is still open or the door isn’t locked.

 

Bonjour has the ability to connect with certain home security systems over WiFi and show you its camera view on her screen.

  

 

 

 

 

Bonjour is able to check your bedroom's temperature and humidity in real time, ensuring the most comfortable sleeping and waking environment. 

 

 

 

 

Bonjour's voice recognition software lets you converse with unmatched accuracy.

Bonjour's brain is built in the cloud, so she will get smarter everyday by learning your preferences, gaining new skills, and learning new requests from the BONJOUR user community.

 

  • Simply Ask:  You can ask Bonjour to check the weather, news, or even how many steps you've taken in a day! More detailed questions can be asked such as directions to your meeting, and what you should wear. You can even order an Uber using Bonjour! 
  • Voice Recognition: Bonjour will start recording and analyzing your speech as soon as you say the magic words, "OK BONJOUR." After those words you can ask Bonjour your question or tell her your command.
  • Privacy Button: Bonjour's thoughtful design includes a privacy button so you can choose when she hears you. Additionally, unlike our competitors, we can ensure our backers that user information is never shared. 

 

 

  

 

 

Rise to your favorite song from your online music services or web radios. With two speakers and a bass radiator, BONJOUR fills the room with immersive sound. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Bonjour has the perfect curves. 

 

Bonjour's sleek and compact design perfectly fits your home’s décor and your bedroom’s nightstand. BONJOUR has perfect curves, chrome finish, and a large colorful screen that offers amazing graphics and animations.  

 

 

   

We’ve developed a companion app to make setup simple.

 

Our app seamlessly integrates Bonjour with your smartphone making for easy set-up.  The learning truly begins once you sync your accounts, devices, and third party apps with Bonjour.

 

 

 

Check out BONJOUR team at CES & TechCrunch! 

 

 

 

 

Technical specifications that will keep Bonjour a staple smart device for years.

 

 

 

 

We are at the production stage. Bonjour is coming soon!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Creativity and innovation continue to drive us forward in our desire to create amazing products and software services. As we continue to grow, our products are getting smarter, nicer and better connected to our world. Our mission: to make you sleep better and wake up bright. You can learn more about holi on LinkedIn.

story:
Karaoke re-defined.

Go on, express yourself.

 

What is Moment™?

Moment is a high-fidelity sound bar, only more versatile. This world's first compact sound bar comes with a built-in mixer, complete with a wireless microphone & subwoofer to serve your entertainment needs. Whether it's singing karaoke, listening to music, enjoying a movie at home or even gaming - Moment does it all minus the cable mess. Isn't that awesome?


True karaoke experience.

Conventional karaoke machines are always plagued by limited song availability, restricted by CDs, DVDs, or a subscription model. More often then not, even as we are willing to put up with the extra costs and hassle, songs we want frequently aren't available. Overly complex technical components, coupled with difficulty in setting up usually is enough to put us off having a karaoke system at home.

Wouldn’t it be great if you could karaoke to any song you like, whenever you feel like doing so? Moment lets you to do this, with ease.

Unlike conventional systems, Moment™ works any file, app, or online streaming site that your devices play, enabling you to let loose and sing your heart out. This means you have access to an unlimited, and always up to date karaoke song library with apps like Smule, YouTube, Spotify, Apple Music, Google Play Music, Pandora, and more.



Wireless Microphones.

Moment's wireless microphones uses dual-band UHF frequencies, you are able to switch between the bands, minimising occurrences of a signal conflict amongst other UHF products in the household, like your TV or radio receiver for example.

Designing our microphones, we made sure to be extra critical of today's microphones. That's why we designed Moment's microphone to include volume controls, so you don't have to reach for the remote control every time it's your turn to sing.

And because we are karaoke enthusiasts ourselves, we included active feedback cancellation into Moment's microphones - so you can sing a duet in harmony without fear of that irritating, high pitch feedback when 2 microphones are near each other.

No cable mess.

What do you think of when wanting to set up a sound system? Difficult, costly, messy?

Not this time. Moment™ comes with a wireless subwoofer and microphone that automatically pairs up once in range. No setup required.




Because no one likes to deal with cable mess.


Compatible with any device.

Moment™ connects to any device you have, and produces quality audio no matter the connection. The built-in AUX port as well as Optical Audio port accepts connection with your analog or digital devices. Bluetooth aptX technology provides CD-like quality audio when streaming wirelessly.


Enhanced home movies.

Utilising technology from DTS TruSurround™, we tuned Moment™ for peak performance, accurate extraction and placement of audio cues, resulting in a realistic and immersive virtual surround experience.


The post-processing and psychoacoustic techniques implemented for bass and dialog enhancement with DTS TruSurround™ provides a high frequency definition for maximum realism and clarity to complete the audio entertainment experience.


Moment™ + DTS TruSurround™ = Better sounding movies, tv shows, music & karaoke.


For Gamers, too.



Moment is designed to fit under most desktop monitors - it is even compact enough to sit on a stool - yet provide enough oomph for sounds and effects.


Heart-pumping bass provided by Moment's wireless subwoofer and DTS TruSurround technologies enhances your gaming experience, making sure audio cues are placed more accurately - so you can not only see, but hear and feel your enemy approaching. Never lose sight of the objectives again.


EQ personalised.

Whether you’d like to attempt those high falsetto notes, feel the explosion as the fighter jet flies by, or quietly catch up on the latest Game of Thrones episode while your baby naps.


That is why we carefully thought out 4 preset equaliser modes which should cover most moments. In case that's not enough, Moment comes with a free Moment app where you can customise your own equaliser settings to your liking.




Utilising the free Moment app on your iOS or Android device, a full spectrum equaliser lets you adjust finer things such as treble and bass, volume and even echo levels for the microphones.


Bigger size ≠ better sound.



Conceptualising Moment, one of the first realisations we had was space constraints. Moment was created with modern homes in mind, packing a true karaoke experience, DTS TruSurround technology, wireless streaming, digital and analog interfaces, all into one sleek, compact design. The result is a 16-inch footprint - space we can all afford.




Delivering clean, crisp audio.

On the road to making Moment, we referenced tons of sound bars & speakers currently in the market and found that most of these lack mid-bass, often heard with snares and certain types of drums - especially so at the 180 - 200hz range. Utilising hardware and software tuning, Moment represents sounds as they should be heard, for a clean, crisp audio experience.


A pair of 3.5" drivers focuses on vocals and mid-frequency notes, while two 1" soft dome tweeters supply the high notes (up to 20kHz). We then dedicated the 6.5" driver in Moment's wireless subwoofer to handle all low notes, cutting off at 180hz, resulting in a deep, clean-sounding bass that you can enjoy for hours.
Moment, in spite of its 16” footprint, is a sound bar with audio prowess capable of filling up an entire room.


Indiegogo Story.

We seeded the idea for Moment™ back in early 2014. Avid karaoke lovers ourselves, we wanted to make karaoke simple and fun - like it was intended to be - and so we set out on Project Moment™.

Conventional karaoke setups were limited by song availability, and required too many other components to work.



The project went through numerous iterations before we identified what Project Moment™ stood for: a chance to express yourself.

Our entire team rallied behind Project Moment™ and we managed to create our first prototype earlier this year. In Summer 2015, we successfully created a fully functional prototype. Despite having the initial costs for tooling, audio tuning and hardware development covered, we still came up a little short. We now turn to the Indiegogo community's help. Help re-define karaoke, and make Moment a reality.


Media coverage.


See Moment in action.


Far Imtiazi from London trying out Moment during our premiere in Montreal.

Testimonials and feedback.



FAQs.

I like Moment. How do I make a purchase?

On a computer: Click on the big pink "Contribute Now" button near the top of this page, then click on "Add Perk" on the next page and select the Moment "bundle" that you like.
Alternatively, you can also choose a perk in the "Select a Perk" section near the top of this page, just below the "Contribute Now" button.

On the Indiegogo app: Go back to the "Campaign Overview" page, then tap on "Contribute", or simply scroll down and "Select a Perk".

When can I receive my Moment?

Shipping typically takes between 2 working days up to a week, depending on where you are located.

My country isn't listed for delivery, can I still purchase Moment?

Yes you definitely can! Please select the perk of your choice then write in to us at hello@moment-sound.com and we can get a subsidised shipping quote for you. 

How many microphones can I connect to Moment?

You can connect up to 2 microphones.

I received my Moment Soundbar and have some technical questions.

Please refer to this tech FAQ we've setup at http://www.acryan.com/faqs/

You also wish to reach out to us on our Facebook page or by emailing us.

What is the range of Moment's wireless subwoofer and microphones?

Moment Subwoofer has a maximum range of 10ft. This is also dependant upon the intensity and number of wireless networks in your area.
Moment wireless microphones are built on UHF technology and have a longer range of 25ft.

Will there be conflict with all the wireless components?

Not unless you have a ton of wireless networks in your home.
Moment Subwoofer operates on a 2.4GHz bandwidth (which is similar to your router/Wi-Fi's), hence we suggest that you position Moment Subwoofer within 10ft or less of Moment Sound bar.
Moment wireless microphones are on a UHF bandwidth, which is different from Moment Subwoofer and your home Wi-Fi, and should not cause interference.

Can I use my own UHF microphones?

In order to provide a seamless and fun karaoke experience, all our microphones pair up automatically when in range of Moment.
Even if using a UHF microphone on the same frequency as Moment wireless microphone, the modulation algorithms will be different. So in short, you cannot use your own microphones.

How do I get lyrics to display on my TV to get a full karaoke experience?

There are a few ways to do this, such as using a HDMI cable, Chromecast or Apple TV. We can also connect other Smart devices like an Android Media Player to our TV and sing using apps like YouTube or Sing! by Smule.
Of course, Moment also works with Smart TVs, so you can connect Moment directly to your Smart TV if you have one.

I have an Android Media Player/ Chromecast/ Apple Tv, how do I set it up with Moment?

Because Moment works with any device and has AUX and Optical ports, you can connect it directly to your TV or Smart TV.
Thereafter, any HDMI input to your TV will have its audio sent through Moment.

What other devices can Moment work with?

Moment works with any device - media players, DVD players, Blu-ray players, desktop computers, laptop computers, tablets, smartphones, projectors...

What are some apps I can use to enjoy karaoke?

You can use any music app! We like Sing! by Smule and YouTube. If you are not comfortable singing solo, you can also use Spotify, Pandora and many other music streaming apps to sing-along.

I don't like the preset equaliser modes.

That makes us sad! :(
No worries though, Moment Console App is a free download for both iOS and Android devices that allows you to fine-tune and adjust Moment's equaliser to your personal liking.

I have a question but it isn't listed here.

Please write in to us at hello@moment-sound.com or leave a message at our Facebook page.
story_txt:
Karaoke re-defined. Go on, express yourself.
 What is Moment™?
Moment is a high-fidelity sound bar, only more versatile. This world's first compact sound bar comes with a built-in mixer, complete with a wireless microphone & subwoofer to serve your entertainment needs. Whether it's singing karaoke, listening to music, enjoying a movie at home or even gaming - Moment does it all minus the cable mess. Isn't that awesome?

True karaoke experience.

Conventional karaoke machines are always plagued by limited song availability, restricted by CDs, DVDs, or a subscription model. More often then not, even as we are willing to put up with the extra costs and hassle, songs we want frequently aren't available. Overly complex technical components, coupled with difficulty in setting up usually is enough to put us off having a karaoke system at home.
Wouldn’t it be great if you could karaoke to any song you like, whenever you feel like doing so? Moment lets you to do this, with ease.

Unlike conventional systems, Moment™ works any file, app, or online streaming site that your devices play, enabling you to let loose and sing your heart out. This means you have access to an unlimited, and always up to date karaoke song library with apps like Smule, YouTube, Spotify, Apple Music, Google Play Music, Pandora, and more.





Wireless Microphones.
Moment's wireless microphones uses dual-band UHF frequencies, you are able to switch between the bands, minimising occurrences of a signal conflict amongst other UHF products in the household, like your TV or radio receiver for example.

Designing our microphones, we made sure to be extra critical of today's microphones. That's why we designed Moment's microphone to include volume controls, so you don't have to reach for the remote control every time it's your turn to sing.
And because we are karaoke enthusiasts ourselves, we included active feedback cancellation into Moment's microphones - so you can sing a duet in harmony without fear of that irritating, high pitch feedback when 2 microphones are near each other.
No cable mess.
What do you think of when wanting to set up a sound system? Difficult, costly, messy?
Not this time. Moment™ comes with a wireless subwoofer and microphone that automatically pairs up once in range. No setup required.




Because no one likes to deal with cable mess.




Compatible with any device.
Moment™ connects to any device you have, and produces quality audio no matter the connection. The built-in AUX port as well as Optical Audio port accepts connection with your analog or digital devices. Bluetooth aptX technology provides CD-like quality audio when streaming wirelessly.

Enhanced home movies.

Utilising technology from DTS TruSurround™, we tuned Moment™ for peak performance, accurate extraction and placement of audio cues, resulting in a realistic and immersive virtual surround experience.

The post-processing and psychoacoustic techniques implemented for bass and dialog enhancement with DTS TruSurround™ provides a high frequency definition for maximum realism and clarity to complete the audio entertainment experience.


Moment™ + DTS TruSurround™ = Better sounding movies, tv shows, music & karaoke.
 


For Gamers, too.


Moment is designed to fit under most desktop monitors - it is even compact enough to sit on a stool - yet provide enough oomph for sounds and effects.

Heart-pumping bass provided by Moment's wireless subwoofer and DTS TruSurround technologies enhances your gaming experience, making sure audio cues are placed more accurately - so you can not only see, but hear and feel your enemy approaching. Never lose sight of the objectives again.

EQ personalised.
Whether you’d like to attempt those high falsetto notes, feel the explosion as the fighter jet flies by, or quietly catch up on the latest Game of Thrones episode while your baby naps.

That is why we carefully thought out 4 preset equaliser modes which should cover most moments. In case that's not enough, Moment comes with a free Moment app where you can customise your own equaliser settings to your liking.



Utilising the free Moment app on your iOS or Android device, a full spectrum equaliser lets you adjust finer things such as treble and bass, volume and even echo levels for the microphones.

Bigger size ≠ better sound.

Conceptualising Moment, one of the first realisations we had was space constraints. Moment was created with modern homes in mind, packing a true karaoke experience, DTS TruSurround technology, wireless streaming, digital and analog interfaces, all into one sleek, compact design. The result is a 16-inch footprint - space we can all afford.

Delivering clean, crisp audio.
On the road to making Moment, we referenced tons of sound bars & speakers currently in the market and found that most of these lack mid-bass, often heard with snares and certain types of drums - especially so at the 180 - 200hz range. Utilising hardware and software tuning, Moment represents sounds as they should be heard, for a clean, crisp audio experience.



A pair of 3.5" drivers focuses on vocals and mid-frequency notes, while two 1" soft dome tweeters supply the high notes (up to 20kHz). We then dedicated the 6.5" driver in Moment's wireless subwoofer to handle all low notes, cutting off at 180hz, resulting in a deep, clean-sounding bass that you can enjoy for hours.Moment, in spite of its 16” footprint, is a sound bar with audio prowess capable of filling up an entire room.



Indiegogo Story.
We seeded the idea for Moment™ back in early 2014. Avid karaoke lovers ourselves, we wanted to make karaoke simple and fun - like it was intended to be - and so we set out on Project Moment™.

Conventional karaoke setups were limited by song availability, and required too many other components to work.



The project went through numerous iterations before we identified what Project Moment™ stood for: a chance to express yourself.
 Our entire team rallied behind Project Moment™ and we managed to create our first prototype earlier this year. In Summer 2015, we successfully created a fully functional prototype. Despite having the initial costs for tooling, audio tuning and hardware development covered, we still came up a little short. We now turn to the Indiegogo community's help. Help re-define karaoke, and make Moment a reality.

Media coverage.


See Moment in action.



Far Imtiazi from London trying out Moment during our premiere in Montreal.

Testimonials and feedback.







FAQs.
I like Moment. How do I make a purchase?
On a computer: Click on the big pink "Contribute Now" button near the top of this page, then click on "Add Perk" on the next page and select the Moment "bundle" that you like.Alternatively, you can also choose a perk in the "Select a Perk" section near the top of this page, just below the "Contribute Now" button.
On the Indiegogo app: Go back to the "Campaign Overview" page, then tap on "Contribute", or simply scroll down and "Select a Perk".
When can I receive my Moment?
Shipping typically takes between 2 working days up to a week, depending on where you are located.

My country isn't listed for delivery, can I still purchase Moment?

Yes you definitely can! Please select the perk of your choice then write in to us at hello@moment-sound.com and we can get a subsidised shipping quote for you. 
How many microphones can I connect to Moment?
You can connect up to 2 microphones.
I received my Moment Soundbar and have some technical questions.
Please refer to this tech FAQ we've setup at http://www.acryan.com/faqs/You also wish to reach out to us on our Facebook page or by emailing us.
What is the range of Moment's wireless subwoofer and microphones?
Moment Subwoofer has a maximum range of 10ft. This is also dependant upon the intensity and number of wireless networks in your area.Moment wireless microphones are built on UHF technology and have a longer range of 25ft.
Will there be conflict with all the wireless components?
Not unless you have a ton of wireless networks in your home.Moment Subwoofer operates on a 2.4GHz bandwidth (which is similar to your router/Wi-Fi's), hence we suggest that you position Moment Subwoofer within 10ft or less of Moment Sound bar.Moment wireless microphones are on a UHF bandwidth, which is different from Moment Subwoofer and your home Wi-Fi, and should not cause interference.

Can I use my own UHF microphones?

In order to provide a seamless and fun karaoke experience, all our microphones pair up automatically when in range of Moment.Even if using a UHF microphone on the same frequency as Moment wireless microphone, the modulation algorithms will be different. So in short, you cannot use your own microphones.
How do I get lyrics to display on my TV to get a full karaoke experience?
There are a few ways to do this, such as using a HDMI cable, Chromecast or Apple TV. We can also connect other Smart devices like an Android Media Player to our TV and sing using apps like YouTube or Sing! by Smule.Of course, Moment also works with Smart TVs, so you can connect Moment directly to your Smart TV if you have one.
I have an Android Media Player/ Chromecast/ Apple Tv, how do I set it up with Moment?
Because Moment works with any device and has AUX and Optical ports, you can connect it directly to your TV or Smart TV.Thereafter, any HDMI input to your TV will have its audio sent through Moment.
What other devices can Moment work with?
Moment works with any device - media players, DVD players, Blu-ray players, desktop computers, laptop computers, tablets, smartphones, projectors...
What are some apps I can use to enjoy karaoke?
You can use any music app! We like Sing! by Smule and YouTube. If you are not comfortable singing solo, you can also use Spotify, Pandora and many other music streaming apps to sing-along.
I don't like the preset equaliser modes.
That makes us sad! :(No worries though, Moment Console App is a free download for both iOS and Android devices that allows you to fine-tune and adjust Moment's equaliser to your personal liking.
I have a question but it isn't listed here.
Please write in to us at hello@moment-sound.com or leave a message at our Facebook page.

story:
Lofree Poison is a combination of vintage classic aesthetics and modern digital audio technology.


It comes with Venetian Red

 Pure White

Olive Green

Turquoise Blue

 

 

Let us pay tribute to items from the past and give them new meaning today while memorizing ol’ good melodies.

Lofree Poison is a blend of 1950s radio with innovative modern technology which makes for a nostalgic classic gadget a modern coating. 

 

 

Designed with acoustics in mind, we engineered the Bass Enhancement System that lets the Poison produce mids and trebles from the front, while an ultra large diaphragm in the back pumps out powerful, deep, full-bodied bass.
story_txt:
Lofree Poison is a combination of vintage classic aesthetics and modern digital audio technology.An enhanced bass driver pumps out powerful and full-bodied bass while not sacrificing mids and trebles. The Poison can play up to six hours of CD quality music wirelessly. Or you can instantly back the good ol’ days of radio channel surfing.It comes with Venetian Red Pure WhiteOlive GreenTurquoise Blue  Let us pay tribute to items from the past and give them new meaning today while memorizing ol’ good melodies.Lofree Poison is a blend of 1950s radio with innovative modern technology which makes for a nostalgic classic gadget a modern coating.   Designed with acoustics in mind, we engineered the Bass Enhancement System that lets the Poison produce mids and trebles from the front, while an ultra large diaphragm in the back pumps out powerful, deep, full-bodied bass.
The meticulously designed housing went through five iterations. It’s been perfected to ensure a long lasting and stable bass performance.
Does a tiny speaker mean weaker sound? No. With 20-watt amplifiers (two pieces of 10-watt amplifiers) processing audio output, the Poison sounds more vast than other speakers of similar size.We’ve engineered renowned Waves® MaxxAudio Acoustic Solution that’s built into the speaker, so it can produce richer and full-bodied sounding content. The algorithms of sound perception(including noise and music) create a perceived low bass and compensate for the acoustic limitations of tiny devices. Waves received a Technical GRAMMY® Award in recognition of its outstanding contributions to the recording industry.With a 2000mAh built-in rechargeable battery, Poison can play up to six hours of CD quality music wireless and portable. If you prefer to connect in another way, the Poison also lets you connect via the aux cable.
 
Like a fine wine that became even more valuable with age. With a physical rotating dial for channel scanning, the Poison will bring back nostalgic memories of the good ol’ days of radio channel surfing.Credit to @SuperphenblogDesign IterationA little change for a better experienceIn order to have the Poison more durable that last for years and lower defective rates in production, we’ve decided to engrave functional symbols on the device’s buttons instead of the original silk printing.We understand you may love the previous design. But after we tested three prototypes in the past few weeks, we think the latest version offers the best user experience.When you combine love and free, you get lofree. We all come from a designer's background - as reflected in our product. We dedicate ourselves to keep the most sophisticated product simple and elegant, in order to benefit and reach more people. We push boundaries in product design and have won several Red Dot and iF design awards. We love the way of life. This is lofree. 
Risks and challenges
With a successful crowdfunding of Lofree Keyboard on Indiegogo, we are confident that we can get support across the globe if we continue to make great stuff. That’s why we are launching the Poison on Kickstarter. We want to prove that a tiny speaker can pump out superior sound by improving the housing structure and sound tuning. Since this is our first time making a speaker, we faced lots of challenges, such as molding, user experience, battery consumption and acoustic tuning. Our team worked around the clock in the past few months. Finally, we have overcome all of the problems, hence our Kickstarter campaign, and mass production soon! 
FAQ
When will you ship the item?We will ship the item as we promised in the perk, but the time of delivery depends on local delivery speed and customs clearance, which we cannot fully control. Therefore, we cannot guarantee that you will receive the package in September.
VAT or Import tax included?Due to the customs policy of different countries, we CANNOT control if there is tax for you. Our product price does not included VAT or import tax of your country. We will try our best to declare a comparatively lower value for the product, If you have further question of the declared value, please feel free to email to hello@lofree.co, thank you.
Remote area shipping cost.Shipping cost does NOT include extra costs defined as remote area shipping fees on DHL’s website. Please check here if you think your location may be considered remote: http://raslist.dhl.com/jsp/first.jsp. Use with your city’s postal code only for accurate checking.
What radio broadcasting frequency does the Poison support?FM radio (88-108MHz)
How long does the battery last on a single charge?Up to six hours
Does it work as a speakerphone?No.
